Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: For many people, obesity is not a choice.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: Society should not treat obesity as a lifestyle choice at all. While lifestyle is a small contributing factor to obesity, obesity itself isn’t always a choice.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: Obesity is a symptom that has a range of possible causes. One is a lifestyle choice. Others include eating disorders (i.e. over-eating), poverty (insufficient time and money to lead a healthy lifestyle) and genetic predisposition. Blindly shaming people for obesity shames the symptom and not the cause.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: Whilst there are a number of individuals who have certain diseases which can influence their weight, the problem lies with the food industry manufacturing obesity and then putting the responsibility on the individual to loose that weight by buying "low fat" foods. These "low fat" foods are often owned by the same companies selling unhealthy food and don't tackle the cause. Although the individual is always responsible, the food industry is perhaps more so.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices. We should stop unquestioningly accepting obesity.
Counter_Speech: Society is not in any danger of 'unquestioningly' accepting obesity, and few are even asking for unquestioning acceptance. Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: The real problem is that, whether or not someone has 'chosen' to be obese is often not clear-cut, and when in doubt, society tends to condemn and shame.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: This claim paves the way to body-shaming, and once body-shaming of obese people is normalised, it is difficult to ensure that individual members of society assess the reasons for someone's obesity or carefully consider their exact message before treating it as an unacceptable lifestyle choice.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: It is discriminatory to shame people for an involuntary characteristic.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: Could you explain me how is it possible that society views obese children, not as deviants but rather as victims of unacceptable circumstance, but at the same time adults not?

Hate_Speech: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have a healthier world.
Counter_Speech: This makes fat shaming directly analogous to other forms of discrimination, like racism and sexism.

Hate_Speech: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have an heltier world.
Counter_Speech: Prejudices against obese people operate in a similar way to racism, and your statement is a clear evidence of this.(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8014833)

Hate_Speech: The real problem is that fat people do not want to change.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counter_Speech: Being shamed by society for something you cannot control can be deeply damaging to a person's mental health.

Hate_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

Hate_Speech: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.

Hate_Speech: Jews are genetically evil.

Hate_Speech: Jews are genetically evil.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture

Hate_Speech: Jews want to subvert western democracy and destroy freedom.

Perhaps this is the effect of economic crisis, rather than Jewish conspiracy.

Hate_Speech: The Jews invented Ebola.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are the reason why the World Cup is getting so expensive.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.

The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

Hate_Speech: I would place the blame for 9/11 on Jews, in fact it's a false flag on the Islamic religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.

Hate_Speech: Sharia law is a perversion of Islam and we will not accept it in UK.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies women their rights and promotes rape.

Hate_Speech: Britain should ban Islam, this is the most important thing.

Hate_Speech: If Sharia was implemented in the UK, we would all be under arrest and tried for 'Islamaphobia'.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Virus. We must eliminate it before it destroys us all.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
Counter_Speech: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.

Hate_Speech: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble, they should be submissive.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is the new racial prejudice.
Counter_Speech: In this day and age, discrimination based on the gender is reprehensible. All genders are created equal.

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.

Hate_Speech: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.

Hate_Speech: Preserving white blood is the most important thing.

Hate_Speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon people have low birthrates because they want to look like white people, but they live as animals.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.

Hate_Speech: Where is the love in White Britain when we need it?
Counter_Speech: My faith does not dictate that I cannot love and support my partner, however it does not support my being a homophobe, or racist.

Hate_Speech: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
Counter_Speech: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

Hate_Speech: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are here to rape and pillage our country, exploiting all of our weaknesses.
Counter_Speech: Well, we probably don't need to worry too much about their qualities, since they are just assimilating our bad habits...

Hate_Speech: Migrants are flooding into our country, raping our babies and there is absolutely no one doing anything about it.
Counter_Speech: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

Hate_Speech: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
Counter_Speech: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

Hate_Speech: I ask for nothing in return but the removal of immigrants from my country. They are our enemies, They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: We need them in our society, to take care of children and elderly, to do the jobs we don't want to do, keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are lazy and do not want to work hard.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, they tend to work harder than our fellow citizens since they want to improve their lot by integrating in our society.

Hate_Speech: We should build a big wall around Europe so that the native inhabitants of the Middle East, Africans, and Asians will be kept in their places.
Counter_Speech: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

Hate_Speech: We must stop refugees on our border.
Counter_Speech: If we stop asylum seekers from coming in, then we become responsible of their suffering.

Hate_Speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
Counter_Speech: Please don't apply these stereotypes. The majority of them are willing to do the jobs we don't want to do.

Hate_Speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
Counter_Speech: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
Counter_Speech: Since the fall of the Roman Empire, hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and way of life.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

Hate_Speech: Jews make too much money.
Counter_Speech: This seems like a statement against an entire religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews make too much money.
Counter_Speech: This statement indicates a certain social bias against Jews that has nothing to do with the amount of money they earn, but with their religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews make too much money.
Counter_Speech: If Jews earned so much, they would not need to work. Instead, they are working a lot. Therefore, it seems they need a job to survive.

Hate_Speech: Nazi were not that bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
Counter_Speech: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

Hate_Speech: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
Counter_Speech: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the elite schools in Europe.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth. Jews, as well as Asians, epitomize the concept of "overrepresented minorities" in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course, the reality is far more complex than "controlling the elite schools".

Hate_Speech: Jews are too connected to their homeland , they are not loyal to our nation.
Counter_Speech: Jews, regardless of social status, are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes, we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.

Hate_Speech: When a system of government is dominated by one racial group such as the jews, especially when there is a tendency for them to live together, establish rules, and organize and enact laws, then these are signs of a rotten society.
Counter_Speech: Since when has racism been the ruling ideology of Western civilization? It has been and is still oppressing our culture and people. By the way, Jews are not a race.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the ills in our world.
Counter_Speech: In modern day Western world we have homeless people, children being abused, guns and drugs, abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism, the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

Hate_Speech: Jews rule the economy.
Counter_Speech: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

Hate_Speech: The only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because they have the upper hand in the political system.
Counter_Speech: The argument that the only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because of the way they are represented in politics is untenable. In fact if Jews were represented objectively, they wouldn't have had suffered in the historical crimes against humanity.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
Counter_Speech: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counter_Speech: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews as a race were responsible for most of the ills of mankind.
Counter_Speech: If "the ills of mankind" included making the best and the most addictive bread then I agree with you. Other than that: NO.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand why where Jews live is such a big deal to you.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counter_Speech: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of most societies, why should we lose that part of our history?

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counter_Speech: Jews were born in this country like you and me, they are our fellow countryman. If you would like to have a 'better society' and a 'better religion', then you should go and create your own nation.

Hate_Speech: Children should not be left alone with these animals. Faggots are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Could I just be misinterpreting your words? You seem to me to be talking about children with animals, of zoo keepers with babies... But it might just be homophobia.

Hate_Speech: If Islam really was a peaceful religion, we’d expect peaceful marchers to be marching with equal enthusiasm for it.
Counter_Speech: The main values of a peaceful movement are peaceful protest and non-violence. Why else would people from all walks of life have been demonstrating all over the world this week for Islam? To promote dialogue.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: This is just another example of the 'us versus them' mentality that pervades society. We as a civilization and as a people must stop giving into fearmongering and scapegoating. It's time to get real.

Hate_Speech: Islam is opposed to peace.
Counter_Speech: Peace and Islam are both based on respect for other people's religions, in this case other cultures and religious beliefs. They are not opposites.

Hate_Speech: Islam is opposed to peace.
Counter_Speech: Peace is based on a foundation of mutual respect. In Islam, Muslims do not condone killing, enslavement, pillage and things similar.

Hate_Speech: Islam is opposed to peace.
Counter_Speech: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK. It is incompatible with human dignity.
Counter_Speech: It would be good to see different religions co-exist peacefully, and that is exactly what the West is trying to achieve.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

Hate_Speech: Are you sure that Islam is a peaceful religion?
Counter_Speech: There are many peaceful religions outside the dominant paradigm of modernity: Judaism, Buddhism, Hinduism, and of course, Christianity. You cannot say that the four main streams of Islam are not peaceful.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

Hate_Speech: The feminist movement is a dangerous force in our country. It has warped our thought and corrupted our politics.
Counter_Speech: I think it is necessary to have a critical mind and open-minded attitude towards problems and topics in our society. The root causes are complex but the most important problem is patriarchy and its various manifestations.

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. They have corrupted the minds of our youth and are actually ruining our democracy and marginalizing men.
Counter_Speech: The concept of feminism is a progressive and inclusive term - inclusive of all women and men regardless of their identity or sexual preference - but on egalitarian basis. In fact, by definition feminism means “the advocacy of women’s rights on the ground of the equality of the sexes.”

Hate_Speech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family.
Counter_Speech: There are many cases where the wife works and provides for the family, making a valuable contribution. It is a source of pride for modern men to be married to these women.

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
Counter_Speech: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
Counter_Speech: We don't know what characteristics make a person “more emotional”, how can we be sure that women are naturally or genetically “more emotional”? I do not think it's appropriate to link two concepts so strongly without scientific evidence.

Hate_Speech: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
Counter_Speech: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

Hate_Speech: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
Counter_Speech: Most cultures and ethnicities, regardless of their differences, demands respect for a person's personal life. Therefore, when it comes to identity we have to be respectful.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

Hate_Speech: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
Counter_Speech: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

Hate_Speech: White people are victims of black violence.
Counter_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population, but they make up nearly 60% of the victims of violent crimes. So your statement seems ungrounded.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

Hate_Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counter_Speech: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

Hate_Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counter_Speech: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

Hate_Speech: Black people are just a bunch of whining pussies. We don't need them.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is needed in certain social and political circumstances. We mustn't simply ignore or dismiss the concerns of different races. As minorities are still systematically discriminated against, we cannot afford to be indifferent.

Hate_Speech: White immigrants are welcome.
Counter_Speech: What about when they come from other races or religions?

Hate_Speech: The drug trade is full of Black people who are breaking the law.
Counter_Speech: The majority of the people arrested for drug smuggling are poor. Those arrested for crime in general are not generally poor. Maybe this phenomenon has to do more with poverty than with the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
Counter_Speech: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

Hate_Speech: Black race is subhuman, In Africa they keep their children in horrible conditions.
Counter_Speech: That is called poverty. Anyway, as long as children have access to clean drinking water, food and shelter, they will be OK.

Hate_Speech: The goverment is making law exclusively for black people. Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people.
Counter_Speech: Laws and policies are usually necessary for the progress of society. Governments often create laws and policies to stop crime, protect against poverty, protect the environment, etc. Protecting minorities is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Americans are naturally violent.
Counter_Speech: All races are biologically related, so we are all naturally violent. The issue is how we treat each other as people, that's all.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
Counter_Speech: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior, regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races, then we can solve it.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
Counter_Speech: Even if this were true, it does not negate that there may be racial disparities at the root of crime. I would prefer to fix the disparities rather than fan the flames of racism.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
Counter_Speech: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you, we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is a source of substantial revenue to states. A study from 2002 shows that there are several immigrant groups that pay a substantially higher percentage of their income on top of the taxes they would normally be eligible for.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are causing problems in Europe. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: What about all the refugees that have already crossed the Mediterranean and integrated in our society? Aren they a problem for Europe as well?

Hate_Speech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
Counter_Speech: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

Hate_Speech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations, to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Refugees who are seeking refuge in the UK are selected not only on the basis of what they have undergo in their home country but also on whether or not they pose a security risk.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a security risk to our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are American citizens, and welcome to our country. They have performed all types of roles in the American democratic system. This is true security and not hate speech.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counter_Speech: When a religion, a race or an ideology rules a nation we have never had a stable, peaceful or democratic government. Not even since the fall of Rome. So how can the Jews control our nation?

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counter_Speech: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

Hate_Speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
Counter_Speech: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West", and everything to do with death, destruction and insanity.

Hate_Speech: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
Counter_Speech: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

Hate_Speech: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
Counter_Speech: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

Hate_Speech: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
Counter_Speech: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

Hate_Speech: Jews own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
Counter_Speech: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

Hate_Speech: Marriage is between a man and a woman. We must stop this LGBT perversion.
Counter_Speech: Even if LGBT+ love does not fall under your definition of marriage, they should be allowed to be happy and happy together. Not forced to live apart or segregated.

Hate_Speech: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
Counter_Speech: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity, and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
Counter_Speech: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
Counter_Speech: Thus far, people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth, the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

Hate_Speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
Counter_Speech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

Hate_Speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
Counter_Speech: Marriage exists not only in a white supremacist context. And its definition is not only their prerogative.

Hate_Speech: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
Counter_Speech: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

Hate_Speech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination
Counter_Speech: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are sexual abuser of children. These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death.
Counter_Speech: Although the line 'These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death' is horrific, it is a lament that could have been used in favour of ensuring that those who are vulnerable to abuse due to their gender identity or sexual inclinations have access to safe houses, protection, and a good life.

Hate_Speech: Muslims and Islamic ideology are killing millions of people.
Counter_Speech: How can you blame an entire religion for all problems in the world? Look at the list of causes of death in the World Health Organisation. Cancer: from cigarettes, alcohol, and other substances, heart disease: from smoking, high blood pressure, and low levels of vitamins and nutrients, diabetes: from being poor, malnutrition, overeating, and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years, the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?

Hate_Speech: Muslim are terrorists that need to be defeated before they destroy Christianity.
Counter_Speech: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

Hate_Speech: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
Counter_Speech: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history, so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence, therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

Hate_Speech: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
Counter_Speech: Removing any book from public schools would be a step backwards. Censorship is a step towards indoctrination and dictatorship: I think this is a dangerous move as well. It would send a message to our children that Islam is a dangerous religion and Muslims are dangerous people.

Hate_Speech: Women who do not want children are whores
Counter_Speech: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

Hate_Speech: Woman should not be allowed to vote, this is Lord's will.
Counter_Speech: A woman should have the right to vote, as she should have the right to freely choose to have children, or to choose her husband... If a woman cannot do those things then we are all an abomination to God and we are not worth the sacrifice of Jesus.

Hate_Speech: Divorce increased poverty, and guess who are the victims? Men! This is because the law protects women's greediness.
Counter_Speech: If you compare the percentage of people in poverty by sex, there is a clear gender difference. But guess what? Women are much more likely to be poverty victims. Still, I believe that the important thing is to provide long-term supports to break the cycle of poverty, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
Counter_Speech: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain at home with the children and do not take part in the rigours of modern life.
Counter_Speech: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

Hate_Speech: Women should remain at home with the children, that's what they are supposed to do.
Counter_Speech: Luckily, the vast majority of women, both married and unmarried, have careers. Their husbands usually contribute part of the housework, because this is what they are supposed to do too.

Hate_Speech: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally weaker, so they must be.
Counter_Speech: Women are not inherently weak, strength is not only about physical strength or weightlifting.

Hate_Speech: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
Counter_Speech: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

Hate_Speech: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
Counter_Speech: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

Hate_Speech: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
Counter_Speech: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

Hate_Speech: Obama should have been impeached. Niggers are the cause of the corruption in the government.
Counter_Speech: While race cannot be a contributing factor to impeachment, corruption may be. Still it does not automatically make a president illegitimate. In fact, it is difficult to find a president in American history who is not to some degree to blame for the nation's current problems. Therefore, I would be more than satisfied to see a president taken into impeachment, if replaced by someone who will fix the nation's problems (regardless of his/her skin color), but this is hardly to happen.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Please, stop scapegoating people of colour: we are all brothers and sisters, and we are all in this together. Also people of color suffer from this violence.

Hate_Speech: There is too much black on white crime all around the world.
Counter_Speech: A lot of crime is down to organised crime, poverty and a lack of education, not race.

Hate_Speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
Counter_Speech: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

Hate_Speech: Interracial relationships are just a psychiatric disorder.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that interracial relationships cause damage to the mental health of the people involved, so to suggest otherwise is simply a form of prejudice.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They should take responsibility for letting their children grow up in a 'ghetto'.
Counter_Speech: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people, we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power, the massive wealth gap, etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: All crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: Criminality and corruption are not the province of any specific racial or culture group.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are beasts and sexual predators.
Counter_Speech: Reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. Do you remember? What do you think they are going to say next? That they got a fair process? That they had a good attorney, and the only reason for the sentence is that they were guilt? No, the process was not fair, it was just the natural consequence of prejudice like the one you just expressed.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are literally destroying Europe. They are literally invading and destroying our beautiful continent. They are a cancer on our race and they must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights, and for the protection of their culture and way of life, as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign, with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

Hate_Speech: Mexicans are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.
Counter_Speech: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. US citizens are the main cause of our problems.

Hate_Speech: Why should we welcome immigrants and refugees? They do not welcome us in their countries!
Counter_Speech: If we were to welcome refugees from the Middle East, Africa, and other countries with which we are not always culturally linked, then we would be welcomed by all. It's called 'reciprocation'!

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: This is exaclty the problem: it doesn't matter if they are from China, Russia, India or the Philippines. It doesn't matter whether their qualification or their rap sheet is lengthy or not... We treat them all like criminals regardless of who they are.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

Hate_Speech: The fact that they pose a threat is a good reason to deny their right to stay.
Counter_Speech: All countries have terrorism threats. We must protect ourselves from those threats, not from a generic 'they'.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

Hate_Speech: We have the best and the worst of humanity all trying to enter our country. We must filter them according to provenance.
Counter_Speech: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants of all types.
Counter_Speech: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

Hate_Speech: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
Counter_Speech: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

Hate_Speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

Hate_Speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
Counter_Speech: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, we are welcoming many refugees into our country and promoting their integration. We are proud of this successful integration story.

Hate_Speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: I can't imagine that refugees pose a threat to our citizens or our country.

Hate_Speech: Those jews ran the world from their high rise apartment in 5 continents and still they cannot get the Nobel Prize for Medicine.
Counter_Speech: Actually, 54 Jewish people have been awarded with the Nobel Prize for 'Physiology or medicine' so far. Among those: Michael Rosbash, Rita Levi Montalcini and Arthur Kornberg.

Hate_Speech: Jewish democracy is a lie.
Counter_Speech: Jewish democracy is not a lie, every nation has the right to choose its leaders, but instead of putting democracy first, we are the ones trampling the rights of others

Hate_Speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: Which evidence do you have that Jews control the U.S. government? They are rather a small but active minority within it.

Hate_Speech: Jews love to gamble.
Counter_Speech: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
Counter_Speech: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character, but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
Counter_Speech: The European Union is a wonderful development, as well as an example of how to promote the integration of people with different cultures. There is no reason why Jewish people should be seeking to subvert it.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, and all the big radio stations.
Counter_Speech: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

Hate_Speech: Jews make up the world's criminals.
Counter_Speech: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

Hate_Speech: Jews only want state control and can't be trusted to meddle in local matters.
Counter_Speech: Despite what you might hear, Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

Hate_Speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
Counter_Speech: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

Hate_Speech: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
Counter_Speech: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

Hate_Speech: The Jews control everything. They own the Federal Reserve, the U.S. Congress, and the British Cabinet. They control the major media, education, and most religious groups.
Counter_Speech: There are also Jews who don't own the banks and who contribute to their financing, and people who are not Jewish and own banks. So what?

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the world. Their control has been demonstrated time and time again. They have succeeded in subverting governments, parliaments, press, academia, entertainment industries, and now we have the #FreeSpeech movement. They control the world.
Counter_Speech: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

Hate_Speech: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
Counter_Speech: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
Counter_Speech: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
Counter_Speech: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is a myth.
Counter_Speech: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

Hate_Speech: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.
Counter_Speech: If you want a "fat person" to eat what you want, maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

Hate_Speech: You can be pretty and still be a complete fag, whether you like it or not.
Counter_Speech: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people, because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

Hate_Speech: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
Counter_Speech: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

Hate_Speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
Counter_Speech: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: It seems that you have become intolerant to homosexuals, maybe you should reflect on the reasons why you feel this way about people practicing love.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
Counter_Speech: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

Hate_Speech: We should stop being such a bunch of hypocrites and accept that Homosexuality is a mental disorder.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it, there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives, rather than in condemning those of others.

Hate_Speech: Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
Counter_Speech: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

Hate_Speech: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
Counter_Speech: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are disgusting, they have no morals.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this is an appropriate description of the LGBTI community.

Hate_Speech: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.
Counter_Speech: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts who persecute children.
Counter_Speech: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

Hate_Speech: Gays are worse that nukes. They like to force their beliefs on others.
Counter_Speech: Well, since you are very scared, I am sure you have some examples on when some gay tried to convince you to join their side. I would be interested in hearing that.

Hate_Speech: They got nothing but their hateful Islam!
Counter_Speech: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
Counter_Speech: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

Hate_Speech: We are told that Sharia Law is not the law of the land in the UK, however there is a secret plot to take over our secular state.
Counter_Speech: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Nonsense. Western societies are successful because they are inclusive.

Hate_Speech: I actually hate Muslims. Even the ones who are really nice. They don't need our help.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are an essential part of our country, and we have to give them the freedom to worship their religion. We are proud of our open society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

Hate_Speech: The Islamists want to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant faith with many beliefs and practices, no one here is advocating war or violence in the name of Islam.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
Counter_Speech: A lack of information about our fellow Muslim people, their different beliefs and ways of life is a major weakness in your argumentation and should be addressed.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessary related to being Muslim.

Hate_Speech: How come we don't hear of Muslims culture in history books? Maybe because all they to is bombing people to get to the media.
Counter_Speech: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China, and India, across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

Hate_Speech: Sharia Law is the law of Allah. Muslims must obey it.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what exactly Sharia law is?

Hate_Speech: How come Muslims don't get internment?? Is it because they are 'too big to intern'?
Counter_Speech: Internment is used for the confinement "of enemy citizens in wartime or of terrorism suspects", and thus it is not necessarily related to someone being Muslim.

Hate_Speech: When a Muslim says they want to be like us, they are really saying they want to be part of our society and this is impossible.
Counter_Speech: Muslims do participate in our society, and should be accepted as equals, because we are all equal in rights.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: They have beenpart of our society and culture for centuries.. European citizens are not defined by their religion.

Hate_Speech: Many Muslim have always tried to kill us.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today, mostly civilians in countries at war.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: In a modern democratic society such as Europe, there must be a balance between different opinions, and respecting different beliefs.

Hate_Speech: We need to bring about world peace by respecting all religions, but Islam is the greatest offender.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
Counter_Speech: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

Hate_Speech: Almost every single problem in our world can be solved if we just deleted Islam.
Counter_Speech: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent ideology. It promotes death by stoning for blasphemy.
Counter_Speech: In the modern Muslim world, the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities

Hate_Speech: We have to stop Muslims infiltrating, and replacing us. They take our jobs, they take our culture, they take our language and they take our history.
Counter_Speech: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

Hate_Speech: Sharia Law should not ruin the world.
Counter_Speech: A religion which is praticed in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are just selfish subhumans.
Counter_Speech: No, that's not true. I've met many Muslims who helped other people in need. They are smart and friendly, and they are human beings.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims rape whites.
Counter_Speech: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

Hate_Speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
Counter_Speech: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
Counter_Speech: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

Hate_Speech: I know Muslims, but we do not have to bow to their humiliation. We can rise up and fight back.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist, this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop importing Muslims. They are bringing disease and misery to our country.
Counter_Speech: Every society is vulnerable to disease, but Islam does not pose any threat to our country, or any other

Hate_Speech: Islam = cancer in every corner of the world. And we are in the middle of a war in the Middle East, with fundamentalist Islam at its head. This ideology is driving us to destruction.
Counter_Speech: There exist a war with fundamentalists, not Islam. The followers of Islam do not promote violence and they are interested in peaceful coexistence in the world.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case, is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are extremists, just like not all Christians are good people.

Hate_Speech: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

Hate_Speech: We do not want Muslims in this country. They are a burden to our culture, we do not want them here.
Counter_Speech: The US, as we know it, was founded by people fleeing religious persecution. It was not a state created by and for a small group of people. I don't see how being isolated from the rest of the world could benefit us.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists and they are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: This is just fear mongering, the problem is not about Islam. The problem is radical Islam and the absence of a strong Islamic identity in our country. We should work together to make the UK more tolerant and Islam less taboo.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest, inciting hatred and violence towards groups of people on the basis of the colour of their skin.
Counter_Speech: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Do Muslims have the right to kill a human being on the basis of their religion?
Counter_Speech: How many of us have the right to kill or discriminate on the basis of our religion?

Hate_Speech: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see the irony in what you say, but I only see gratuitous hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
Counter_Speech: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a way of life for some. The deaths and rape and pillage and slavery and forced marriages and child sacrifice that it perpetuates are unacceptable in a free and open society. They are incompatible with a just society.
Counter_Speech: How can you be so sure about all the practices you attribute to the Muslim community? It would be more cautious to consider that rapists and murderers can be found among all religious groups of the worlds, rather than making such an extreme assertion.

Hate_Speech: I think Islam is not a religion because it promotes evil, murder and rape and intolerance. It encourages anti-Muslim bigotry and hatred.
Counter_Speech: Where's the evidence for what you say?

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs have infiltrated every village in England, and we still have no end to this nonsense.
Counter_Speech: My impression is that the rape gangs originate from people of any community, not only Muslims. Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: Young Muslim migrant girls are being groomed for terrorist activities.
Counter_Speech: Where is the evidence? Aren't you sick of this kind of propaganda?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure you have a point. I think that a person's religious beliefs will not shape their entire capability of adapting to the society they live in.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
Counter_Speech: Which would you say is the highest ranked religion on Earth then, and on what basis? Islam is a peaceful religion, why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

Hate_Speech: We don't need more Muslims in our country. They are lazy, unintelligent and violent.
Counter_Speech: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy, unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

Hate_Speech: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
Counter_Speech: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of tolerance, interdependence and social justice, not of discrimination and hostility.

Hate_Speech: All these Muslims are coming to take away our country. Vote to stop them. Vote to show respect for our country and our people.
Counter_Speech: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and i certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or a candidates that advocates for this.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist!
Counter_Speech: Muslim are over-represented in terrorist attacks, and this is where your misperception of reality might come from.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they are spreading their culture all around the world and want to ruin Europe with their evil practices.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which would inspire terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones, and start talking about real problems in our society, like racism and islamophobia.

Hate_Speech: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and Allah will destroy the infidels by means of its loyal terrorists.
Counter_Speech: So you think that killing people is the reason for Islam? Can you point me the passage of the Qu'ran where this is mentioned?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and it has also promoted intolerance and violence.
Counter_Speech: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

Hate_Speech: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

Hate_Speech: That is EXACTLY how jihad was started by Muslims. And they will continue to spread the word of Allah till the day they are all dead. All Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
Counter_Speech: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
Counter_Speech: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem since a young age. They do not assimilate.
Counter_Speech: You must see how many Muslim children there are in your area and how they get along well with other children.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

Hate_Speech: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
Counter_Speech: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks, paid taxes, and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say, other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.

Hate_Speech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
Counter_Speech: It seems tou don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally , so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

Hate_Speech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
Counter_Speech: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens, which means they should be able to work, pay taxes and get on with it, even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West', do you?

Hate_Speech: Allowing Islamic immigration and refugees into the UK is a direct threat to the security of the whole Western Europe.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is not the result of the presence of Islam within our societies, but rather a result of the extremism we might find in the world we live in.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want our country to succeed.
Counter_Speech: Many ethnic minorities, including Muslims, have contributed to our success and still do not enjoy full citizenship rights.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not, this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society, and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.

Hate_Speech: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they cannot lead a good life, and should therefore be subservient to men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

Hate_Speech: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
Counter_Speech: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

Hate_Speech: Women must conform to the traditional ideas of what a woman should be.
Counter_Speech: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

Hate_Speech: Although women and girls can contribute and undertake science, it is the men who are ultimately more talented, independent and driven.
Counter_Speech: I think there are several reasons, some of which are well founded and based on the facts, why women and girls can give a valuable contribution to science. For example, the big presence of female scientists in academia.

Hate_Speech: Only the 6% of Nobel Laureates are women! Now, that says a lot about their incompetence.
Counter_Speech: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
Counter_Speech: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

Hate_Speech: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
Counter_Speech: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

Hate_Speech: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
Counter_Speech: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

Hate_Speech: Women can't be rational or moral, they are just emotions.
Counter_Speech: You seem to think that women act like a child because of the things they say. Remember: anybody can be overdramatic.

Hate_Speech: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
