Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

Hate_Speech: UK jobs are stolen by migrants.
Counter_Speech: The fact that there is an increasing amount of migrant workers in the UK is connected to the changes in the economy.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are criminals.
Counter_Speech: If you are concerned about the wellbeing of "our" people you should look into countries like the US where there is a lower concentration of migrants. You'll see that the problem of criminality has little to do with migration.

Hate_Speech: The NHS is about caring for the sick, not migrants.
Counter_Speech: I would like the NHS to take care of the sick and elderly without looking into provenience.

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept all migrants. We should make them work to pay for our country.
Counter_Speech: The migrants in question are often desperate and victims of persecution. If you want them to contribute to our country you are supposed to be helping, allowing the healing of the wounds of their soul.

Hate_Speech: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims were only like other people with different religions, then they would stop trying to impose their religion on everyone else.
Counter_Speech: The problem with the current Islamic world order is not that they want to impose their religion on anyone else, but that there is no cohesion among them, so that they can speak with one voice.

Hate_Speech: The Quran commands murder.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not command murder. It advises Muslims to be careful of what they say and do and not to take the life of other people.

Hate_Speech: People of Muslim descent have no place in a modern democracy.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why a Muslim cannot have a place in a modern democracy. If a Jew or an Asian or Native American can take a seat of power (even though these people are only occasionally elected) why not a Muslim?

Hate_Speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that the Quran promoted violence against women.

Hate_Speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counter_Speech: Violence against women is an issue in all radical interpretations of religion, So why do we focus on Islam only?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
Counter_Speech: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

Hate_Speech: Muslim believe that their religion is superior
Counter_Speech: The word 'supremacy' is not found in the Koran. Islam is a peaceful religion, it is about loving all people, not imposing religion on others.

Hate_Speech: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a misogynist religion. It is also not about oppressing women.

Hate_Speech: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
Counter_Speech: Women should be given equal rights. Not all Muslims are misogynists.

Hate_Speech: True Muslims are intolerant.
Counter_Speech: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: The Koran should not be taught in schools. It is a lie and a disservice to all people.
Counter_Speech: We have a duty to teach the truth, not distort it. The Koran is a book of faith, not a text of hate.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
Counter_Speech: In the real world there are many hypocrites, not necessarly Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
Counter_Speech: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims. What do you mean by 'hating gays and women'?

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

Hate_Speech: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?
Counter_Speech: Everyone is welcome here, regardless of their religion, ethnicity, or sexual preference.

Hate_Speech: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
Counter_Speech: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. GThey were good only as slaves.
Counter_Speech: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

Hate_Speech: If niggas don't stop whining we will make slavery legal again.
Counter_Speech: We call it democracy, but sometimes it seem the direct result of colonialism and slavery. A democratic state would rule by consent, not force.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
Counter_Speech: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
Counter_Speech: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded. They will replace us and Afro-European will be the majority.
Counter_Speech: Europeans who trace their ancestry to Africa are actually a very small part of the European population, only accounting for around 2%, since the mid 20th century. Not such a big invasion.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just women dictatorship
Counter_Speech: Feminism is the political ideology that seeks to achieve equality and social justice by improving the lot of women, by advocating for the equal rights of all members of society. Not bad, uh?

Hate_Speech: Women are just complaining for no reason.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is "for no reason": women make up about half of the world's population, and even if the gender gap in labor force is getting smaller, there are still blatant cases in which women are discriminated against. For example they make up only around 20% of university professors in UK.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of liberal feminists are "women of courage". In fact, they are usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it is not a stretch to think they are even more oppressed.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is poisoning our youth with its 'rape culture'.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, as a parent, I believe it is our duty to teach our sons about feminism and to teach that rape is always wrong, so that we can have a better and safer future for our children.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
Counter_Speech: This is just a misogynistic and mean allegation that has no foundation in facts.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political ideology and movement that advocate the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
Counter_Speech: I don't see the point in calling the feminism you are fighting a "weapon" against men. Your argument is that women do not want equality, because they do not want to live under men but to subjugate them. And this is something you have to prove.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

Hate_Speech: Women are not oppressed and many even refuse the protection of the law. The real issue today is about men's rights.
Counter_Speech: The fact that some women don't want the protection of the law should not negate their right to live their life as they wish. In my opinion, woman are people too and this "men's rights" stuff is just an excuse to oppress and marginalize all women once more.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Society has evolved: there are many people, regardless of gender, that consider women to be full members of society with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: I am tired of seeing women being treated as sex objects. It's about time that women are given the respect they deserve.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
Counter_Speech: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Rape? Sometimes women have it coming!
Counter_Speech: A woman has every right to her own body, and she should be allowed to make her own decisions.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: It is not the case that women are subhuman. Women in this world are just as intelligent, compassionate, creative and religious as any man.

Hate_Speech: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
Counter_Speech: It is likely that you do not know that all the countries on the planet have laws against illegal immigration, and not against Afro-Carribbean people. This may happen because to relate an illegal act to a whole ethnic group is not reliable and may be racist.

Hate_Speech: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Most countries on earth have laws against immigration. But there are no restrictions on a whole ethnic group, because there is no evidence that what you say is true.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of seeing retarded people overrunning this country.
Counter_Speech: Please stop using ableist slurs. It's not funny to be offensive to people suffering from disabilities.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

Hate_Speech: The holocaust was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
Counter_Speech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

Hate_Speech: Jews can only act in a bad way.
Counter_Speech: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
Counter_Speech: To be honest, I don't know anyone who thinks all Jews are the same with well-founded reasons.

Hate_Speech: Jews can only act in a bad way.
Counter_Speech: In the real world there are good and bad Jews, just like it is for any human being.

Hate_Speech: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
Counter_Speech: The problem of anti-Semitism in the UK is far from over, if you are concerned about Jewish people, maybe think about the rise of anti-Semitism instead.

Hate_Speech: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but criminals
Counter_Speech: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but criminal
Counter_Speech: Criminality refers to any action that is considered 'prohibited by the law'. Do you think that all Jewish people can be considered responsible for the same actions?

Hate_Speech: The Jews are a virus spreading through our culture.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel if someone said that about your own religion?

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think the state needs laws to tell you which faith to profess?

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
Counter_Speech: I would prefer that the laws were enforced for the good of a community, rather than to make it harder for people to have religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
Counter_Speech: If you would be so kind as to comply with the law, you would know that everybody has the right to practice thier religion freely, without being subject to arrest and prosecution.

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
Counter_Speech: I think you statement simply serves to convince me that we need to make sure that laws protecting individuals' freedom are observed, rather than ignored.

Hate_Speech: There are no Jews who have good hearts, they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
Counter_Speech: I'd like to know why you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society.

Hate_Speech: I want to live in a country where Jews can be persecuted for who they are, and for the religion they love.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure you want to live in a country that oppresses other people? Do you really think it will happen?

Hate_Speech: Native American people are genetically different from us, and they are not equal in any way, just as the Jews are not equal with our race.
Counter_Speech: These words are openly promoting racism and this is exactly the type of stereotyping and hate mongering that the Nazis used against the Jews.

Hate_Speech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
Counter_Speech: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

Hate_Speech: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
Counter_Speech: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

Hate_Speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
Counter_Speech: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

Hate_Speech: Sexual deviancy are common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence whatsoever that homosexuality is a mental illness. This seems as an attempt at blaming somenone dictated by the fear of homosexuality.

Hate_Speech: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
Counter_Speech: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.

Hate_Speech: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
Counter_Speech: Gonorrhea and syphilis can be prevented by practicing safe sex. And that is something that every person can do, not only homosexuals.

Hate_Speech: I don't like gays and I think they are subhumans.
Counter_Speech: They are not subhuman, they are just people with different sexual orientations.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
Counter_Speech: People should be allowed to make decisions about their lives and well-being. This is a case of of discrimination against LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
Counter_Speech: Just because people are homosexuals, it doesn't mean they are less healthy. I think there are many heterosexual people in the world who equally unhealthy.

Hate_Speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

Hate_Speech: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
Counter_Speech: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

Hate_Speech: The LGBTI community is a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
Counter_Speech: It is about time people began to think about what they are saying, what the feelings of the people they talk about are. Don't you think?

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people around, they should be let alone.
Counter_Speech: The lack of support and help to the gay community is a major problem, and this is why we should all do our best to stop discrimination, instead of spreading it.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people befriended with heterosexual people.
Counter_Speech: I'm sure many gay people are subjected to unspeakable forms of abuse, but the real abuse is from heterosexual people who don't conceive something different from their own sexual orientation. The real issue is the prejudice that oppresses them, not friendship.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people free to be as they are, they shoud be stopped by whoever can stop them.
Counter_Speech: I'm sure many gay people experience abuse at the hands of their families, friends and even peers. But many have also experienced abuse from people they didn't even know. The real abuse is when someone attacks someone else's freedom just because they are different.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people allowed to turn free as it was normal to be faggots.
Counter_Speech: There are definitely gay people suffering at the hands of homophobic people, and it is against human rights and the law to promote such discrimination.

Hate_Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?

Hate_Speech: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Some people are creating trouble by being homophobic, but you don't seem to be doing anything to stop them.

Hate_Speech: There should be laws to punish those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are often persecuted for who they love, which is their own right. This is why the laws and punishments that you suggest are unjust.

Hate_Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
Counter_Speech: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
Counter_Speech: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!

Hate_Speech: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
Counter_Speech: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

Hate_Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counter_Speech: It is up to the government to determine which people will have the opportunity to live and work in our country in a safe and integrated way. The decision on refugees should be left to who is in charge.

Hate_Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counter_Speech: Refugees are welcome. They are allowed to integrate and contribute to our society.

Hate_Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome. It is up to the government to decide which people will have the opportunity to live and work in a safe and integrated way in our country.

Hate_Speech: This migrant invasion is unaceptable.
Counter_Speech: If they are welcomed, they will integrate. If not, they will stay as if are in their country of origin: persecuted.

Hate_Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counter_Speech: Many have been welcomed here, according to the law. Why should they be denied a home?

Hate_Speech: There are millions of illegal immigrants in the US, they have taken over our country. They are not 'legitimate' owners of our country, they are just here because we let them.
Counter_Speech: There are thousands of legal immigrants who have worked hard and provided for our country. Most of them are just as patriotic as any citizen.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: There are many jobs that have disappeared. This does not imply that they disappeared because of immigration.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Many European countries have been in recession since 2010, and this has not much to do with immigrants.

Hate_Speech: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: I don't know why they are being accused of being a "burden". When they come to our country to live and work, we should welcome them unconditionally.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: We are not being "burdened" by refugees. Today we accept more refugees because the world population in need has increased.

Hate_Speech: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
Counter_Speech: It would be better to focus on creating good living conditions for the persecuted ones, instead of making it harder to integrate new people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
Counter_Speech: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not much different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
Counter_Speech: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are born to be at our disposal.
Counter_Speech: This phrase is extremely misleading, it implies that foreigners are naturally inferior, and why would it be like that?

Hate_Speech: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

Hate_Speech: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
Counter_Speech: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

Hate_Speech: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
Counter_Speech: Many refugees come from conflict zones, in situations of great social upheaval and widespread persecution. We do not have any conflict, and this is why we should be nice to refugees.

Hate_Speech: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
Counter_Speech: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants have no right to our country, because we are the only rightful citizens.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think that we are all born equal in the eyes of the law?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem: the world would be a better place without them.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are part of the solution, the problem arises from the lack of integration that some people help to spread in the country.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them beome more integrated.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here, and should not mix with us.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why they shouldn't be integrated, in fact, I'd like them to be part of our country.I think they would add value to it.

Hate_Speech: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
Counter_Speech: Migrants pay the full value of their taxes as we do for our own. They are not different from us.

Hate_Speech: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
Counter_Speech: Because they are workers, they have to pay taxes like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
Counter_Speech: Migration in an inescapable consequence of our contemporary world and society. There is little point in discussing when or how to stop it, unless this is part of a wider debate about underlying condtions and causes.

Hate_Speech: They don't understand we have mongrelization problem in this world. Our children are being groomed by migrants!
Counter_Speech: Can you think of a single example of a child being groomed by a migrant?

Hate_Speech: They don't understand we have mongrelization problem in this world. Our children are being groomed by migrants!
Counter_Speech: When you say that children are being groomed by foreigners, what exactly do you mean?

Hate_Speech: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
Counter_Speech: Why would you want to get rid of foreigners? How would you go about that?

Hate_Speech: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
Counter_Speech: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

Hate_Speech: We must have a solution for immigration. Because these infidels do not belong in our country.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't ignore that immigration contrbutes in many ways to our society, and therefore to exclude people is not a wise or sensible strategy.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the means by which our jobs are stolen by foreigners, and this impacts on low-income families.
Counter_Speech: Immigration doesn't mean letting people in to steal our jobs, but rather, respecting people's right to live and work in the country they choose.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
Counter_Speech: Despite what you may hear, there are not many refugees in the UK, only around the 0.26%. Compared to many countries both in Europe and the Middle East, we are not that welcoming and should really be ashamed.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
Counter_Speech: There have been a huge decrease in applications for asylum in UK in the last 15 years.

Hate_Speech: The immigrants coming to our country are the biggest enabler of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: The problem is terrorism and fundamentalism not migrants.

Hate_Speech: All immigrants rape our children.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I haven't seen any statistics about that on the news. I have no idea how you can make that kind of claim.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see the world become a better place, not a discriminatory one.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: People are welcome here regardless of their nationality or country of origin, even if they do not speak the language of the place where we live.

Hate_Speech: I find it highly offensive that we accept strangers here, when we should start a war in their country that would benefit all of us.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it is beneficial to all of us to see our neighbours suffer? We all benefit from peace in our society.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
Counter_Speech: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

Hate_Speech: All migrants rape our children
Counter_Speech: The rape of a child by a non-migrant adult is rape too. It is too simplistic to blame immigrants.

Hate_Speech: The country I love has become a laughing stock because of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to his or her own opinion and can speak out, but that doesn't mean they can express it in a racist way.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of foreigners ruining our country.
Counter_Speech: That's exactly the stereotype being fed to us by the media, maybe you should start reasoning on whether there is evidence of this being true.

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Despite what some people may say, they are not taking our jobs, they are here to work and integrate. Migrants not only do work but can also boost the economy.

Hate_Speech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
Counter_Speech: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

Hate_Speech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
Counter_Speech: How about we return to a time when people were convicted and executed for crimes that never happened? You can tell me where the right to a fair trial is in that case.

Hate_Speech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants, they don't deserve trials.
Counter_Speech: When people are denied justice, more people are deprived of their basic rights, and that is exactly what your suggesting.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should deport them all.
Counter_Speech: We don't need to deport every one of them, why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that all migrants are terrorists! They just want to live their life in the country they choose as a home.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
Counter_Speech: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs. Our workers are our first line of defense. We must protect our culture from those people.
Counter_Speech: Let's be honest. Immigrants are not stealing our jobs. Most of the times they contribute to create new job opportunities.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
Counter_Speech: They are an important part of our country, as our allies. We can count on them.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims are all terrorists which are there to overthrow our democracies.
Counter_Speech: Islam cannot be blamed for the actions of a small group of people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are the source of all the problems. They are willing to replace us and take over our countries.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure? Are you aware of all the positive impact of immigration on our country and our people?

Hate_Speech: Hating Muslim refugees is our duty
Counter_Speech: Some Muslim refugees are nice people, and even if they weren't Muslims they would not be accepted by the majority of people who fear differences.

Hate_Speech: Hating refugees is our duty, they are detestable people.
Counter_Speech: The majority of refugees are not bad people, they just want to get on in life in a country where they are not persecuted.

Hate_Speech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
Counter_Speech: We have to accept that terrorism is a problem in many parts of the world and due to people of different faiths, but the more we ignore that, the more dangerous it becomes to think it is caused by one religion.

Hate_Speech: We shouldn't welcome Muslims. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

Hate_Speech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
Counter_Speech: All countries have the right to host refugees from outside their borders, since these people are persecuted within their own borders.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.
Counter_Speech: This is a gross stereotype. It is not true that we are racially divided. The majority of our citizens are proud Europeans who have contributed to our economy and culture, whatever their country of origin.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals , we can't accept them in our country.
Counter_Speech: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

Hate_Speech: We don't have to be slaves of other countries: we must stop accepting black people in our country.
Counter_Speech: Of course we don't, and this is why we have a free and sovereign nation. But that doesn't mean that every single man, woman, and child who is black shouldn't be part of a free nation.

Hate_Speech: We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
Counter_Speech: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is spreading from the rocks of Iraq and Afghanistan to all around the world, by the practice of violent jihad.
Counter_Speech: Do you know where your information came from, and can you point that out? Did you read that in a New York Times article? Or did you listen to the BBC documentary "Islamic State's Most Wanted"?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: There are some examples of non-peaceful groups in Islam: for example ISIL, a group that has carried out a lot of terrorist attacks and killed many people. However, I don't think they represent all Muslims and I definitely don't think that peaceful Muslims can't exist too.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: To claim that Islam is not peaceful is without foundation. According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are peaceful, but it is understandable that they feel annoyed when they are attacked by people who are just trying to discriminate against them for their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to associate a specific group of people to "civilisation". The real problem for Europe is this culture of division, not the inclusion of people with different religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: A Muslim is an outsider in our country
Counter_Speech: There are Muslims who have lived in our country for many years, and for many generations. They have rights and responsibilities, as all other citizens do.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: A European country is partly also a Muslim country. To imply otherwise is to ignore the actual state of things and be prejudiced.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are a part of Western society. They are a part of the EU.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.
Counter_Speech: I don't know many Muslims, but I don't think they are sick just because of their faith. Islam is a religion of peace, there is no reason for Muslims to be discriminated against because of it.

Hate_Speech: My faith has taught me that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
Counter_Speech: The statement you made about Muslims is just fear mongering. Most Muslims are peaceful and reasonable people.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all against Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all Muslims are against Western civilization. Islam is a way of life for many different groups. Why should we be opposed to people belonging to a religion that many enjoy being part of?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
Counter_Speech: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

Hate_Speech: We must not forget that Islam is a hateful religion. It is not going to bring peace to the world.
Counter_Speech: The main purpose of Islam is to unite people and to promote peace and harmony in a world increasingly divided by injustice and conflict.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and homosexuals. Islam is the way of violence.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes peace. If the world needed a belief that was spreading violence, then racism is that belief.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: People of any religion can be terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are disrupting the balance of European society.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Muslims are a problem in Europe is simply not founded. I remind you that the European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion to everyone.

Hate_Speech: I don't like Muslims and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are behind 9/11, the Islam is to blame.
Counter_Speech: This is a comment against all Muslims. They are accused of being the ones behind those attacks, yet they happened due to people under the influence of the violent ideologies which are a deviation of Islam, and not Islam itself.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
Counter_Speech: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a total scam.
Counter_Speech: How can you say something as crude and meaningless as that about a religion? Isn't it just a personal belief everyone should have the right to profess?

Hate_Speech: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
Counter_Speech: It is incumbent on Muslims to live up to the teachings of the Quran: and this does not include banning women from society.

Hate_Speech: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
Counter_Speech: The status of women is more about culture than it is about the Koran.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims become a bigger group in the UK we would all be in danger.
Counter_Speech: Even if we stopped Muslim community to grow, the level of anti-Muslim prejudice would continue to rise. We should be working towards a harmonious living instead.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counter_Speech: The Qur'an is a book that says to love your neighbour as yourself. It is also a tolerant religion and there is no evidence it is similar to a cancer, why do you think that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They're not like us and we do not want them.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps you've met a few Muslims in your life, but they are not much different from you and the British who live in our country.

Hate_Speech: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counter_Speech: I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in a modern Western country, given the large amount of Muslims peacefully living in our societies.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Islam has always been a part of Europe, it's just the idea of inclusion that hasn't been part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race, and it should be removed.
Counter_Speech: In the modern world we have free will, and free will is the real creator of our freedom. Abolishing a relgion, would mean ignoring the free will of many people.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is about killing infidels.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are peaceful. The Koran doesn't talk about killing infidels, why would it do that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised society, and are poisonous to it.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not outsiders in our country, they are a very important part of society. I don't see how they can be 'poisonous' to it.

Hate_Speech: If Islam were to become a global religion it would replace Christianity.
Counter_Speech: Are we to believe that just because something is gaining ground, it will replace whatever exists somewhere else?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are preachers of violence, just like not all Christians are true pacifists. What's the point of mentioning a religion if you can't find any evidence that might help you to understand that religion better?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: How can you say anything like that? Do you think that whatever you want to say, such as Islam is violent, the Bible is violent, or any other religion is violent, is OK as long as it is not opposed to the truth of the religion you profess?

Hate_Speech: We should have the right to ban people for believing in Islam, they are a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure I understand the idea of banning people for something they believe in, in the world we live in we are all different and we all have the right to have our own faiths.

Hate_Speech: We should have the right to ban people for believing in Islam, they are a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: What is the point of banning those you disagree with, apart living in the false conviction that the world thinks like you do?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent, they should go home.
Counter_Speech: I can't say I believe in all religion, but I do like the ones that don't promote hatred or violence against other people, therefore equality and freedom, and I think Islam is more similar to this than you might think.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: The religion of millions of people is not incompatible with society, and the European countries have laws accepting Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: This is a generalisation, there is no difference between Islam and any other religion in terms of so-called 'civilisation'.

Hate_Speech: Muslims living in the UK contribute nothing to our society.
Counter_Speech: More than 3 million Muslims live and are integrated in the UK. How can you claim they contribute nothing?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a a cancer in the western world.
Counter_Speech: All religions have value, and Islam is no exception. It is a religion of peace. And if you don't agree with them, you don't have to profess their faith.

Hate_Speech: All muslims should be rejected from our country.
Counter_Speech: All religions have value. The problem is not the religion itself, but when people start excluding others on the basis of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are motivated by violence, how many do you know like that?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: It is often claimed that Islam is about exclusion, but this is a lie.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Islam is their religion, they have their own beliefs, and their own history, they are not imposing that on us.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of Islam: it is being used by people to justify violence against people of other faiths.
Counter_Speech: This is not how it works in Islam. What you are saying is that all Muslims are inherently violent people, but this is not realistic nor founded upon fact.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in Western societies to spread their anti-Western agenda.
Counter_Speech: Well there are many Muslims in our country and they are not in any way a problem. What we have to be wary of are people who are too discriminatory towards them.

Hate_Speech: Muslim: If you want to work you should go do it in another country.
Counter_Speech: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: There is a place for Muslims in a free and open society, but you seem to prefer a confined and closed one.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: In our society we are proud of our diversity. Muslims are not an exception to us.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand what you're trying to say by incompatible, since many muslims already live in our society without any problem.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
Counter_Speech: Not all people have similar interests and traditions, but that doesn't make muslims incompatible with others.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
Counter_Speech: Let's be realistic here: if your objective is to get them all to leave then you're probably not going to succeed, especially because they are allowed to live in our society by law.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes terror and war.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims do not call for terrorism and are peaceful. Why shouldn't I be more concerned about the violent islamophobes of the world than about the peaceful Muslims of Europe?

Hate_Speech: Muslims: nobody want them but they are everywhere.
Counter_Speech: People can change their minds about Islam and its believers, all it takes is enough love and acceptance.

Hate_Speech: The European Union should be a no-go area for Islam.
Counter_Speech: The EU is a tolerant, multiracial community. Everyone is welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only here to undermine European values.
Counter_Speech: We all have the right to our beliefs, we just have to accept people who believe in Islam.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, it is not a religion of peace.
Counter_Speech: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and we shouldn't have a Muslim in government the UK.
Counter_Speech: All individuals have the right to worship, practice and learn their religion. I don't see any problems with Muslims in positions of authority.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want to assimilate and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: I think they have a right to choose their own country, religion and culture, just as any other people do. Islam is a peaceful religion. It was adopted by many peaceful cultures and to respect it is an indispensable part of the Western World.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want to assimilate and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society and are proud of their history and culture. They want to be part of the global community and contribute to our success. I don't understand your frustration.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children with their violence.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are bad. But to say that all Muslims are violent is simply untrue.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children.
Counter_Speech: Why are you even saying this? What do you think these children are going to be exposed to in school that will poison them?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent cult and should be feared.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion. It is neither a violent cult nor is it to be feared. There is no danger in Islam believers.

Hate_Speech: Islam is now promoting Sharia law in several countries and must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Our values of freedom of expression, equality and human rights are being eroded by islamophobes who are dedicated to replacing our values of accdeptance with a fundamentalist, intolerant attitude.

Hate_Speech: Muslim immigrants have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: The majority of Muslim people who live in the UK are working. We should welcome them.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of war and intolerance.
Counter_Speech: It seems that some people have made hatred for Muslims their default response to all types of social injustice.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

Hate_Speech: There is no such thing as Allah, and Christianity is the best and only religion.
Counter_Speech: For the record, the idea of a religion being 'the best and only religion' is rather debatable, for example, there are several religions professed by different people, and this is part of our diverse human nature.

Hate_Speech: Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and it has been proven time and time again that its teachings do not threaten the very existence of Western civilization.

Hate_Speech: These fat pigs should stop eating if they want to achieve something in their life.
Counter_Speech: Who are you to tell others what they can or cannot do with their own body?

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that racism instead is healthy in the 21st century? It's not healthy for children to learn discrimination and hate.

Hate_Speech: Why should someone want to love some black people?
Counter_Speech: Finding love is a process, that's all you need to know. Finding someone who speaks your language, culture, share your values, this is all you need.

Hate_Speech: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
Counter_Speech: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

Hate_Speech: Niggas use their appearance to get away with anything.
Counter_Speech: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: Any African person could go back to its country. It is a choice to stay here and ruin our lives.
Counter_Speech: Any person can be a racist: it is a choice as well.

Hate_Speech: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
Counter_Speech: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

Hate_Speech: A nigger has no right to life
Counter_Speech: Not the best definition of 'white privilege' I've seen, but keep trying...

Hate_Speech: the nigger has no right to life
Counter_Speech: The right to life for black people is the same as the right to life for any other race: it should be respected.

Hate_Speech: we are strong when we are all white and united. we are not strong when we are divided by black people who want to fight us.
Counter_Speech: We can also see conflict in a different light, such as when it is caused by racism. and a limited notion of 'unity'?

Hate_Speech: We must overthrow the existing state, and replace it with a white suprematist one.
Counter_Speech: There are many conflicts and problems to be solved, and racism is not an answer for them. The law was created as a means for society to solve those conflicts, and it accepts people of different colours as citizens.

Hate_Speech: Romanians should not have the right to live in the US and to bring their children in our schools.
Counter_Speech: The Declaration of Independence gives everyone the right to "life, liberty, the pursuit of happiness and the pursuit of education".

Hate_Speech: The Roma are not my brothers.
Counter_Speech: The Roma do not deserve hatred, discrimination and violence.

Hate_Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
Counter_Speech: Every ethnic group, regardless of its culture, can be a part of European society. The mere existence of a minority is not a reason to target it.

Hate_Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
Counter_Speech: The Gypsies have been persecuted for thousands of years. They have always been an ethnic minority facing discrimination. They are human beings, like the rest of us, and deserve to be considered as such.

Hate_Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
Counter_Speech: The persecution of the Gypsies goes back many hundreds of years and is not in anyone's interest, especially not our country.

Hate_Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers, they are just a bunch of whining pussies.
Counter_Speech: Did you know that Gypsies were persecuted in the past by the Nazi (search for Romani Holocaust, also known as the Porajmos)? They have always fought for equal rights and we should respect them.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak, they have no intervention capacity in their own life.
Counter_Speech: In every society and culture there are women who are strong, independent and capable of leading a good life.

Hate_Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth which has been used to justify all manner of hatred, from misogyny to homophobia.

Hate_Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counter_Speech: Your words suggest that men are superior to women: but gender equality is not a myth. It is the direct result of free will and of the evolution of our society to a more inclusive one.

Hate_Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as 'male supremacy'. Therefore we must promote equal rights and protect women from discrimination.

Hate_Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counter_Speech: Only a handful of people don't have any respect for women, and you seem to be one of them.

Hate_Speech: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
Counter_Speech: Your statement promotes not only women being oppressed, but also them taking a backseat to men in the workplace. Maybe you should consider that women are as much human beings as men are, and deserve equal human and labour rights.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
Counter_Speech: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy. They just might want to do something else other than housework and taking care of kids.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
Counter_Speech: Women don't have to learn what to do through lectures dictated by the patriarchy and the oppression of women.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
Counter_Speech: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy, they just want to do what they want freely as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
Counter_Speech: If women want to control their fertility they have the right to do it, because they are free to make choices for their own lives.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: Women should be allowed to vote and to have equal rights, as it is stated in the Constitution.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure about how the rights of people in other countries work, but if women want to vote in the UK then they are allowed to do so, thank goodness.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: Voting is an important part of democracy and should be encouraged, not forbidden, especially if it improves the lot of all.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: The majority can and should choose who they want to represent them, and this majority is made of men as well as women.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.
Counter_Speech: The UK is a developed country. Here women have the right to claim equality before the law.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: We live in a complex and diverse world: I find it strange that men still feel this way about women, and that they don't consider women as human as they are, and to be worth valuing as such.

Hate_Speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
Counter_Speech: Women are oppressed and victims all over the world. It is simply not true that men must take charge of that: they are in charge of respecting women.

Hate_Speech: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
Counter_Speech: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

Hate_Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counter_Speech: Well you don't know what it's like to work in a women-hating, violence-spewing, society, do you? The truth is that feminism is not about hating men, but it is about limiting the female oppression, in the same way as male oppression.

Hate_Speech: It is OK to abuse a woman.
Counter_Speech: You cannot justify the abuse of any human being

Hate_Speech: Women are not human, and cannot contribute to our civilization
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve respect and that goes for everyone.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and are created to please men.
Counter_Speech: Women are not subhuman and cannot be reduced to their bodies being a man's property.

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and don't want to work.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

Hate_Speech: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
Counter_Speech: So are you saying that when women are employed, the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into is increased due to incompetence. What you are saying makes no sense!

Hate_Speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
Counter_Speech: Actually, there are a lot of women working in full-time jobs. However, they are still far less likely than men to enter such jobs, because of the existing gender discrimination supported by mentalities like yours.

Hate_Speech: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counter_Speech: What makes you say that? Women have always been an important part of any society. They have always contributed to and provided for their families. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Women are less rational than men, they are childlike, and they are unable to reason.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that women are less rational than men, there are numerous examples of women successfully advancing in fields such as law or medicine.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't vote because they are childlike.
Counter_Speech: Women have fought for the right to vote, and yet we are still having this conversation about them being 'childlike?" Grow up man.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in our society, it's a men's place.
Counter_Speech: Doesn't this just show that you're in favour of division? Women have their place in this society just as men do.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are corrupt, racist and violent people.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why a people's movement that does so much good could be corrupt, racist or violent.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are a bunch of stupid bitches that want to hurt men just because they are superior.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is all about equality and the rights of all groups to be protected. Feminism does not discriminate and is not meant to "hurt" men.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

Hate_Speech: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
Counter_Speech: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

Hate_Speech: Female authority figures are unable to rule and should not be in power.
Counter_Speech: I think we should start thinking that women and men should be treated as equal. They should have equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a cult. It has corrupted the highest levels of society, and should be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a call for equality, and it has served the world well in the past, but it has still much to fight for. Now is not the time to undermine its progress.

Hate_Speech: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
Counter_Speech: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

Hate_Speech: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
Counter_Speech: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

Hate_Speech: There should be a restriction on asian actors in action movies. This must stop.
Counter_Speech: No one in their right mind would not want to see asian actors in action movies.The ancient tradition of Asian martial arts would be a huge loss!

Hate_Speech: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
Counter_Speech: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

Hate_Speech: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
Counter_Speech: There is no scientific evidence to support that Asians are genetically inferior.

Hate_Speech: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
Counter_Speech: The concept of 'genetic inferiority' has nothing to do with scientific evidence.

Hate_Speech: Asians just want to talk with other asians: they are the racists in the first place.
Counter_Speech: The idea that all Asians are racist is just a myth, it is just an excuse to justify racist policies.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Educational institutions should promote people with learning difficulties so that they can receive appropriate education. This is what primary education should be about.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Having pupils with learning difficulties in schools encourages their participation in learning and fosters their contribution to society.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school because they are not able to.
Counter_Speech: The process of primary school education is fairly simple and accessible to all.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Including students with learning difficulties in schools creates a link between pupils with different abilities and education in general.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Many pupils with learning difficulties attend school. This does not prove that others would prefer to attend school if people with difficulties were excluded from the education system.

Hate_Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: Education is about development and learning, so if disadvantaged people are excluded, then the education system would be about learning exclusion and discrimination.

Hate_Speech: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter if you think we are different. It is important to remember that there are many different ways of being a human being. And if you wish to include all people, then you have to accept differences.

Hate_Speech: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Even if psychiatric disorders can be a problem, the people with these disorders are not putting our country in danger. Nobody would freely chose to suffer from a mental ilnesses, they just need psychiatric care.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
Counter_Speech: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

Hate_Speech: The Jews were responsible for all of the world's problems, they are the cause of world wars, abortion, drugs, etc.
Counter_Speech: I can argue that the 'trouble' of the past hundred years has more to do with extremism in general, rather than with a particular religion.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

Hate_Speech: Jews should stop whining: the few left are the most favored people in America.There are many other religions that are persecuted today.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been persecuted because of their religion and culture, and now they are a group of people who are still suffering injustice and discrimination. There are many other religions that are persecuted, that's true, but a small minority doesn't suffer less.

Hate_Speech: Jews only account for 0.2% of the world's population but they rule the planet.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure how we can talk about 'ruling the planet' when there are so many different people in different parts of the planet with many different governments. A claim like this one sounds like a conspiracy theory.

Hate_Speech: The jews did 9/11. They have the will to do anything.
Counter_Speech: What did they have to do with 9/11? There were no Jewish hijackers, and their 'will' to do anything would be difficult to demonstrate.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
Counter_Speech: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

Hate_Speech: There should be restriction on trans actors in action movies. This cannot continue.
Counter_Speech: There are very few transgender actors in films and almost no evidence of transgender characters according to GLAAD SRI index (at least for 2019). Gender discrimination in the mainstream movie industry is endemic and this is what cannot continue.

Hate_Speech: I do not like gay actors, especially in action movies. There should be a restriction on them.
Counter_Speech: Your movie choice can be more the result of opinion rather than of merit. But it's ok, because it is your choice. However, it is important to be cautious: in some countries it is not even allowed to screen or promote movies with gay themes. Such a ban is contrary to our fundamental values.

Hate_Speech: I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
Counter_Speech: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a plague spreading across Europe infecting Christians.
Counter_Speech: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

Hate_Speech: Even if homosexuals were accepted by mainstream society, they would still be hated for who they are.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not "accepted" as long as they are hated. You can't have it both ways.

Hate_Speech: Allowing homosexual people to serve in the military increases suicide rates among service members.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality does not increase the suicide rate among service members. Hate and homophobia do.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a plague on society, they should be banned from every city, village, and town.
Counter_Speech: Same sex attraction is not a disease, not even contagious. Homosexuality does not affect the ability to live in the society.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it's a disgrace? Is it because of the way they act towards others, or something more?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: If they respect the rules of civil coexistence, then there is no reason to think that they are a disgrace.

Hate_Speech: The gay mafia objective is to convert us all to homosexuality.
Counter_Speech: What about when you make assumptions about groups that do not exist (gay mafia) or have a history of discrimination (gay people)?

Hate_Speech: Ellen DeGeneres Show is TheGenDer ideology on TV.
Counter_Speech: I find it very offensive to mangle a person's name to promote discrimination.

Hate_Speech: You cannot identify as something you are not. Denying the objective reality defined by your sex equates to lying.
Counter_Speech: The identity of the individual is unique to them. Do you really want to restrict their existence? Maybe you should learn to accept people as they are and not as you would wish them to be?

Hate_Speech: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
Counter_Speech: Do you know how many LGBT people live in your own country? If not, look for information: there are many. Moreover, LGBT people are not only excluded from many societies, but are also harassed and attacked all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Who are you to tell me what to do with my children? I don't take advice from homosexual perverts.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to respect for their family and privacy: it is an absolute right. But you should respect that of others as well.

Hate_Speech: I don't want to see a gay couple get married. I don't understand why they are so annoying.
Counter_Speech: Sexual minorities suffer because they are stigmatised.

Hate_Speech: Gay sex is a private kink that gays can perform in their gay houses. Instead, love is possible only between a man and a woman.
Counter_Speech: There are men in love with men too. Some people are heterosexual, and other homosexual. What you are saying is that loving men is not the same as loving women. Still, both are forms of love.

Hate_Speech: If I could discover that my future baby is gay, I'd consider abortion.
Counter_Speech: Every human being has the right to life, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is an unnatural abomination. Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is opposed to our values.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is a personal preference and should be respected, not condemned or criminalised.

Hate_Speech: People of a different race, including transgenders, are very few. With some effort we can contain them.
Counter_Speech: Identity is not a race, and there are many transgender and gender non-conforming people out there.

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: Our countries were founded by foreigners, for example the United States. Foreigners have the right to migrate, if they want to.

Hate_Speech: Immigration makes us less safe.
Counter_Speech: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

Hate_Speech: We have become a nation of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.

Hate_Speech: We need a law protecting us from migrants invasion because they ruin our lives. Ban the foreigners.
Counter_Speech: So who in their right mind would want to "rein in the state" with a piece of useless legislation like this? Perhaps you should focus on improving the lives of the population instead?

Hate_Speech: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
Counter_Speech: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

Hate_Speech: The refugees are taking over Europe. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many refugees and migrants are actually happy to work for Europe. Many have jobs for which it would have been difficult to find laborforce if they were not welcome in here.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counter_Speech: Migrants perform several vital functions in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it is straightforward that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.

Hate_Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

Hate_Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any evidence for the fact that the migrants are a burden to the economy?

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to have a better life upon our shoulders.
Counter_Speech: Many refugees come to Europe to work. Many of them do well in the labour market, also with lower qualifications.

Hate_Speech: No migrant has valid reasons to be here. We keep running after people refusing to work.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth which is spread in the media by the anti-immigration groups to undermine the good work that NGOs are doing for refugees.

Hate_Speech: Our economy will collapse and migrants are to blame. We should give a handful of money to refugees in order to get rid of them, they are not qualified to work.
Counter_Speech: Does the 'solution' for the economic crisis revolve around paying the migrants to leave? It is not clear how this could solve to the real problems of our country.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
