Counter_Speech: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

Hate_Speech: We do not need immigrants. The UK is full.
Counter_Speech: Not all immigrants are welcomed in the UK, unfortunately. But those that are welcome contribute to our country and improve it.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Most immigrants are not "hostile". They can be good workers in many different kinds of jobs we need. They have the right to be given an opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Migrants want our land because they like our houses better than theirs. It's a matter of envy of our richness and safety. They are not truly in need. And they are responsible for their own troubles.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel if your neighbours were planning to bomb your country? Would you feel responsible? Would you feel safe in your own house, or would you try to flee?

Hate_Speech: They want to take our country back from us.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work, and have a better life.

Hate_Speech: Our country has become too multicultural and has resulted in immigrants from many countries coming in to exploit the British people.
Counter_Speech: There is not 'overwhelming evidence' of migrants exploiting British people.

Hate_Speech: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
Counter_Speech: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to host migrants, not refugees.
Counter_Speech: I only hear you talk about migrants as a burden on the UK, but isn't this just wishful thinking based on a misunderstanding what is going on?

Hate_Speech: Refugees have no place in a country like the UK.
Counter_Speech: They are fleeing for their lives, not to stay in refugee camps.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are ignorant. They lack of knowledge to decide for their health. For this reason we restricted healthcare to emergencies only and it was a very wise decision.
Counter_Speech: It is not a bad idea to discuss the restrictions migrants have to accessing certain healthcare, but it is not the place of law to restrict an individual's right to make her own healthcare decisions.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Some people choose to live here based on the fact that they have never lived in a safe country. You would do the same, wouldn't you?

Hate_Speech: It's a matter of race, this is about the European way of life. We should not accept foreigners in.
Counter_Speech: The way we live today is the result of thousands of years of cooperation between different people, so it doesn't have anything to do with race.

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.
Counter_Speech: I personally don't understand why you would say that. They are just doing an incredible amount of good, for example by boosting the working-age population.

Hate_Speech: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come to Europe from all over the world and many of them are fleeing wars, poverty and discrimination. They are often persecuted for their religion. It is important not to demonise them, but rather to understand what causes them to leave their countries.

Hate_Speech: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.
Counter_Speech: Refugees and migrants come to our country in great numbers to work and provide for their families. We welcome them as if they were part of our own family, regardless of their religion. The refugee crisis has nothing to do with the absence of a strong national identity in the wake of the rapid change in the western world.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
Counter_Speech: We cannot allow Muslims to immigrate, because they have a propensity for crime, terrorism and other things? You are making a strong generalization without any scientific proof...

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up around 4 percent of the population in the UK, and have already contributed to what we are as a nation.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
Counter_Speech: What about other religions? Why only Islam? Or is your concern against people in need?

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
Counter_Speech: Our constitution does not say that we are to discriminate against religions, and I wonder what a democratic constitution would be if Muslims were excluded from the UK.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion and has never caused trouble in our country.

Hate_Speech: Muslims do not want our country. They want to take it over.
Counter_Speech: Muslims, in my opinion, do not want to take over our country. They are only here as guest workers.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims that live in the UK are integrated into our society very well. Why should you want to break this integration process?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims living in the UK are proud to call it home. Why should you break this integration process?

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
Counter_Speech: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

Hate_Speech: I don't like migrants or Islam.
Counter_Speech: You just don't know them: even if they are different from you, that doesn't mean that you can't get along with them once you get acquainted.

Hate_Speech: Muslims cannot be in a democracy because they vote with their feet, not with the ballot box.
Counter_Speech: Muslims do vote like other people, in general in favor of the people they perceive as closer to their culture and identity. That's why it is called "democracy".

Hate_Speech: The death of the West by the hand of Islam will be the end of the world.
Counter_Speech: The West has always been about freedom, democracy and the rule of law. Freedom and democracy are things that can be achieved only by a multiethnic, pluralistic, civilised society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
Counter_Speech: It is true that some terrorists are Muslims, but there is no evidence of such a thing in the whole Muslim community.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that the Quran is a religion of terrorism.

Hate_Speech: The Quran teaches murder and rape.
Counter_Speech: Islam does not teach this. The Quran accounts for the teachings of Prophet Muhammad such as tolerance and other virtues.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the European Convention on Human Rights.
Counter_Speech: If it were to be agreed that Islam were incompatible with the Human Rights Convention, then it would be a de facto recognition of discrimination against Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.
Counter_Speech: How can you protect your country? Putting up a fight or starting a war are harmful actions, aren't they?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not Europeans and we do not want them here.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East. Many of them are European, and many of them came here to escape persecution.

Hate_Speech: I don't want Muslims here. They are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: They have always been part of our society. We have to respect their culture and traditions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their laws and take our properties.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Islam will ever rule the world?

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: Women are allowed to wear whatever hairstyle they want, if they want to conform to the Islamic traditon it is their choice.

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: People have a choice in how they dress.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology, an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, usually peaceful coexisting with other cultures and religions. It promotes peace and justice and has a very positive impact on a lot of the world's societies.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are terrorists: they should be banned from the UK, or interned.
Counter_Speech: Although there have been some cases of terrorism in the UK and some Muslim have been implicated, Islam is not a violent religion, and indeed, there have been few acts of terrorism. So banning them from the UK seems unreasonable to me.

Hate_Speech: Those Muslim mongrels are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
Counter_Speech: I know where you are coming from, but I find it hard to understand the argument that if ISIS and Boko Haram are our enemies then all Muslims are our enemies.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, full stop.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should not be so harsh on Islam. Just because a religion is diverse doesn't mean it is a violent one.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, full stop.
Counter_Speech: Short statements generally fail miserably in describing the rich complexity of any concept, faith or ideology and are often simply a balatant and wilful misrepresentation.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is in conflict with the constitution.
Counter_Speech: Even if some believe that the conflict between Islam and the constitution is a cultural and historical one, what is required now is to find ways to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.

Hate_Speech: Islam is in conflict with the constitution.
Counter_Speech: The conflict between Islam and the constitution can't be resolved by resorting to force.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of hate, inciting hatred against people of different faiths.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, Islam is a religion and hate has no religion. Rather, this misunderstanding is a political ideology promoting hatred and violence against Muslims.

Hate_Speech: I think that Muslims are terrorist and that we need to ban Islam in order to live in a safe country.
Counter_Speech: The above statement is false, if you really cared you would know that there is a substantial difference between Muslims and terrorists, that is the very reason the anti-terrorism laws are enforced.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims in this world, who help to create new jobs and create new wealth for our country. There are many Muslims around the world who are happy to talk about their religion and share their stories.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence to suggest that terrorists are exclusively the product of one religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is a threat all around the world, whether you are a Muslim, Christian, Jew, Buddhist, Hindu, atheist, or anything else.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in this country are contributing members of our society. They are good people, who do not pose a threat to anyone.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not good people.
Counter_Speech: It is better to be very careful when generalizing in such a way. I don't see any evidence to support this claim, at least not for me.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the enemy of the West. We must keep on fighting Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Reasoning in terms of borders and compass points has nothing to do with it.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy.
Counter_Speech: Why should Islam have no place in a democracy? Islam is a peaceful, democratic faith with universalist values that has been shown time and time again to be much more peaceful and tolerant than the violent extremist fundamentalist ideas spewed by extremists like Isis.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to live here but in the end they are not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims in Europe and many are very happy with their lives in our society. How can it be a win-win situation for them? Not to mention that ethnic cleansing is a crime under international law...

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are willing to kill those who decide to abandon Islam.
Counter_Speech: Only a very small number of extremists that see Islam through a narrow keyhole of self-righteousness support the concept of takfirism. We cannot associate this with all of the believers.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are here to recruit soldiers in order to enlist mentally weak people in their army of Islam.
Counter_Speech: What does it mean to 'recruit' a person into a religion?

Hate_Speech: Muslims come here to force conversion to their religion.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the opportunity to study and learn in our schools, this does not mean they can impose their beliefs on others.

Hate_Speech: The Koran incite violence, in a written way.
Counter_Speech: The Koran is a book of rules for faith and spiritual guidance which is understood and accepted.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that whorships the Islamic State: it has no place in a modern democracy.
Counter_Speech: Even if few found the Islamic State 'worthy' of worship, you should know that not all Muslims share this view on their faith.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of death and rape: it has no place in a modern democracy.
Counter_Speech: The concept of 'religion of death and rape' is a distortion of how people understand the religion.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in Western societies and have contributed to our society in many different ways.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
Counter_Speech: As far as I'm aware, Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies - and many of them are just as proud of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult: its followers should be banned from many countries.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people. Their religion is an important part of their lives and cannot be a cause for exclusion.

Hate_Speech: Why do so many people hate Muslims? Because they are weird and dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are different, with different values, different beliefs and different ways of life. This does not justify hate though.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not belong here.
Counter_Speech: Statements like these are creating fear in our societies and are only exacerbating the problem, it is better to build bridges than to isolate people.

Hate_Speech: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and if we stop fighting them, we will become like them.
Counter_Speech: I think the idea that we should keep fighting those people is absurd. Maybe instead we should concentrate on developing our culture.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.
Counter_Speech: Let us talk about the problem of extremism, not about the theory of Islam.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a problem, we cannot live with Muslims. They have no art and no history.
Counter_Speech: There is no religion that is incompatible with other religions, and there is evidence of ancient Muslim culture.

Hate_Speech: I want a German Shepherd, not a Muslim one!
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should have a discussion about comparing dogs to people to humiliate a religion.

Hate_Speech: Trying to understand peoples 'cultures'? No, it's not normal. I've never heard of anyone being raped by a non-Muslim. We cannot accept the religion of violence.
Counter_Speech: The problem is neither about Islam nor about cultural relativism. Instead of inflating Islam as a problem and subjecting it to a "politically correct" spin, we should be focusing on becoming more inclusive.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.
Counter_Speech: I think this statement needs some further clarification. What does it mean to be 'in need' to you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
Counter_Speech: Muslim communities are under-represented in politics, especially in the House of Lords. It is high time that we stop talking about invasion and try to be more representative of the communities we claim to represent.

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

Hate_Speech: We have to get rid of Islam now! We will all be killed in the streets!
Counter_Speech: But we all know that Islam is a religion of peace, just like Christianity.

Hate_Speech: Muslim and Jihadist are synonyms. They want to defeat us with their war of terror.
Counter_Speech: Despite popular belief, Islam is not a religion of war.

Hate_Speech: All of the suicide attackers of 7/7 were Muslims. We are not safe with Muslims living here.
Counter_Speech: Terrorists are a small part of all Muslims. Muslims have contributed a lot to our country. You can't blame to all of them for 7/7 indiscriminately.

Hate_Speech: We can't possibly keep Muslims in. They're taking over Europe and are now a problem in their own country.
Counter_Speech: Our entire history is marked by people from different religions coexisting peacefully in harmony with the natural world. What you're saying is a bunch of conspiracy theories. And this is not true.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be either reformed or banned.
Counter_Speech: Islam is very far from being an ideology and it does not need serious reforms. There are many Muslims in our country that would welcome the opportunity to join the debate on faith and society.

Hate_Speech: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
Counter_Speech: So you think there is a black market for drugs especially for blacks because they are black?

Hate_Speech: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it: the drug trade is full of criminals and crooks, it does not depend on the skin tone of people.

Hate_Speech: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
Counter_Speech: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

Hate_Speech: Negroes create social problems so we must get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: That is not how it works: if you think there is a problem, then you need to work with the problem, not against it, otherwise things will just keep on getting worse. And, just for the record, I do not believe that POC are a social problem.

Hate_Speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
Counter_Speech: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior, they are born that way. They are born subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately, this statement is not backed up by any scientific evidence. There is no proof that blacks are born inferior.

Hate_Speech: What the fuck is wrong with you? Negroes are inferior full stop.
Counter_Speech: The thing that worries me the most about racism is not the baseless hatred. Its theattempt to violently impose your own beliefs and interpretation of the world on someone else.

Hate_Speech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
Counter_Speech: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

Hate_Speech: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
Counter_Speech: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: You can't really question whether someone has a "brain" when your idea of a person is determined by the skin they were born into. It looks like you are taking too much at face value.

Hate_Speech: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and police is doing nothing.
Counter_Speech: Of course there are whites that have been victims of police brutality, but the most important statistic I have seen is that of blacks being 2.5 times more likely to be killed by police in the US.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently violent. We need social cleansing.
Counter_Speech: Violent acts are committed by only a small minority of citizens, and it is difficult to see how an "ethnically cleansed" society would solve the problem.

Hate_Speech: I am not racist, but I definitely would not raise my children in the suburbs where the majority of people is black.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to hide behind "I am not racist but", you have no evidence for your claim. This is just fear-mongering, used to divide people and spread hate.

Hate_Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many black poors. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: I would agree that the problem of violence in society is a problem of poverty and inequality. But that is not related to ethnicity. The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Crime rates are affected by a wide variety of factors, including gender, age, criminal record, income, education, and so on. Skin color is not among them.

Hate_Speech: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
Counter_Speech: This is a case of racial discrimination. There is a continuous rise in crime and violence in this country due to poverty and other inequalities. There are also racist groups in society which promote the idea of POC as inferior. This idea has nothing to do with justice.

Hate_Speech: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
Counter_Speech: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

Hate_Speech: Crazy black women are so unstable that even the police needs to give them a special treatment.
Counter_Speech: We can identify people who are struggling with mental illness, trauma and poverty and act accordingly. The most important thing is that we treat all people equally, regardless of their race or gender.

Hate_Speech: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
Counter_Speech: We are all different and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
Counter_Speech: The majority of Gypsy workers are proud and hard-working people. Even if some could lack good will, in my mind there is no question that they are extremely productive and hard-working people.

Hate_Speech: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
Counter_Speech: Work should be a right, not a privilege. Gypsies deserve every opportunity to get a job and to be paid fairly.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society.
Counter_Speech: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
Counter_Speech: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a waste of time.
Counter_Speech: I don't see what you're saying. Feminism is about equality, and equality is about making the most of humanity.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a waste of time.
Counter_Speech: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

Hate_Speech: If you really wanted to know the talents of a nation, you would select the men in that nation, not the women.
Counter_Speech: You may be right that there are fewer women in science, but that doesn't mean that they are less talented than men.

Hate_Speech: All the world's problems are women's fault.
Counter_Speech: Women are significantly more likely to be victims of violence, rather than perpetrators of crimes.

Hate_Speech: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress and unfit to govern.
Counter_Speech: You mean that they could learn a thing or two from the political contributions of men? Still, how can you explain that in 2019 more than 40% of the European Parliament was held by women?

Hate_Speech: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress.
Counter_Speech: Women do great things and they have potential to do even greater things. But it is some men who ultimately need education and experience needed to get rid of childlike discriminative behaviours towards women.

Hate_Speech: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
Counter_Speech: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.

Hate_Speech: Feminists just needs a little love, if you know what I mean.
Counter_Speech: This has already been proven wrong! You can't assume womens needs based on prejudice.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
Counter_Speech: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a hate movement.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are fair and believe that all people should have equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a hate movement.
Counter_Speech: It is not a hate movement, it is simply a movement for equality between the genders. It is about the right of all people to be treated as equals. Not the hate of a certain gender.

Hate_Speech: All feminists are imposters.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement created to improve the standard of living for women. Feminists are human beings and there are no imposters (apart from those who seek to demonize women for claiming their right).

Hate_Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counter_Speech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

Hate_Speech: I'm sick and tired of whining females. Being oppressed is just an individual problem, they will eventually get over it.
Counter_Speech: Oh, think about it for a while, it's not that simple. Being oppressed is a social problem and requires social change.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: This has less to do with maternity and is more about the negative attitude of the person throwing the insult.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
Counter_Speech: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

Hate_Speech: Rape culture??? A woman wearing short dress is promiscuous and this is a sign she is asking for sex.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always wrong. Women are not asking for sex, you can't just assume this based on their attire. They can make legitimate choices in life.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

Hate_Speech: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
Counter_Speech: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a tool for oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a social movement that claims equality, it's so far from oppressing men.

Hate_Speech: The feminists are just whining a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of gender equality.
Counter_Speech: Yes, the feminists are saying that the proportion of men in leadership positions is too high in many Western countries. But that is because the problem is structural. The problem is that too many women are being taught to be "feminine", thus making it hard for them to succeed.

Hate_Speech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
Counter_Speech: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.

Hate_Speech: At my age, I can't bear to look at what the world will be like with women in power.
Counter_Speech: Look, if you want to blame a whole gender for our society's ills, that's your right, but I believe in the power of reason.

Hate_Speech: There's something immoral in these modern women. Their bossy attitude, their provoking clothes. It seems they just want to be fucked.
Counter_Speech: The women of this country work and provide for our children. They do not deserve to be treated as sex objects.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

Hate_Speech: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.
Counter_Speech: The laws which prohibit discrimination include protection of the rights of others, regardless of religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.

Hate_Speech: Jews do not belong to this planet.
Counter_Speech: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally nothing but racists. They think of themselves as different from others.
Counter_Speech: Do you really believe that all Jews are racists? Maybe you should work harder to understand them.

Hate_Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
Counter_Speech: I am sure you do not mean what you say: it is extremely discriminatory.

Hate_Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that Jews are addicted to Judaism, at least no more than Christians are addicted to Christianity, or Buddhists to Buddism. The fact is that people are free to find God in their own way.

Hate_Speech: Jews want to have it all
Counter_Speech: Aspiration is not confined to a particular faith..

Hate_Speech: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of this country and they have every right to claim citizenship.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place in a democratic society.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of this country since day one. They have every right to be proud of their heritage.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
Counter_Speech: Judaism, like any other religion, is about belief, not about a person's addiction.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world
Counter_Speech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

Hate_Speech: Jews want to have it all
Counter_Speech: We all want to be wealthy, well-connected and famous, without having to work.

Hate_Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
Counter_Speech: The concept of addiction has nothing to do with religion.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

Hate_Speech: Any migrant who has lived in the country for 5 years can become a citizen even if he does not have a valid residence permit or is a criminal. This is how you destroy the welfare state.
Counter_Speech: This applies only to asylum seekers. If they have lived in the UK for 5 years, the Home Office will issue a residence permit only if they meet the conditions set out in the regulations. This means that any migrant who has not lived in the UK for at least five years, or commited crimes, cannot become a British citizen, even if he or she has a valid residence permit.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to work and provide for their families, and you would do the same if you were in their shoes.

Hate_Speech: Geez. Is there anything worse than migrants who just come here to settle down?
Counter_Speech: In addition to providing labour and contributing to the local economy, migrants are often employing people who were previously on the dole.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that immigrants are more prone to commit crimes. According to research, in US immigration either has no impact or reduces the crime rate. By far the lowest rate of any group of people surveyed.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is mainly a British problem.
Counter_Speech: Many of the people who immigrate to the UK come here to work, study or visit their family. They contribute greatly to the economy and pay taxes.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is mainly a British problem.
Counter_Speech: Most of the people who migrate to the UK come here to work.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: Maybe they have the qualifications but don't want to improve our lives because we mistreat them.

Hate_Speech: Migration is the biggest contributor to poverty in our country.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: migration is an important part of our economy, it helps to create new jobs for people and to boost our economy.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants come here just to be on welfare and stay on their own.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, many immigrants to this country are working hard to build our communities.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and the country is declining. We must stop them from entering the job market.
Counter_Speech: Our laws do not allow such discrimination. Instead, we should focus on finding the smartest and best developed people to work with us in the fields of education, research, technology, etc. People who are willing to work hard will make our country better.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: Has it ever crossed your mind that perhaps they are qualified and interested in working with us, but you are simply not aware of that?

Hate_Speech: If people came here to work, our problems would be over.
Counter_Speech: The problem is not with migrants, but with citizens' attitudes towards migration. How many people say that they would rather their child had a heart attack than to have a migrant in their home? How can problems be solved with such an attitude?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They are not happy if they have to pay the same taxes as Europeans!
Counter_Speech: That's not what's happening. Immigrants do pay taxes like everybody else. The tax system is fair, but it's unfair to withhold tax from immigrants that will never get a pension.

Hate_Speech: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.
Counter_Speech: The number of illegal immigrants entering the US has actually more than halved in the last 20 years. To make your point that migrants are all criminals is just plain wrong.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a big problem for UK.
Counter_Speech: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop migrants and refugees, they are incompatible with western society.
Counter_Speech: They are compatible with western society because they are coming from all walks of life.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steals our jobs!
Counter_Speech: Not only they steal our jobs, they are also the major cause of air pollution in our country, of deforestation in the Amazon, of the locust plague in Africa... and of the forthcoming alien invasion!!!

Hate_Speech: Forcing migrants to pay in full the costs of their own treatment is just and right
Counter_Speech: This is a personal view, and I don't want to discourage migrants from coming to the UK.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: Well, if we aren't interested in their lives, why should they be interested in ours?

Hate_Speech: We are not supposed to be importing immigrants. They are all a bunch of criminal and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: You might be right that some immigrants are lawbreakers, but that does not mean that all immigrants are criminal and terrorists.

Hate_Speech: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
Counter_Speech: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims. So, my question is: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
Counter_Speech: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes murder and rape.
Counter_Speech: As Islam teaches love and peace, it is not about killing and raping.

Hate_Speech: If Islam were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that the persecution of Christians is happening at the hands of the whole Muslims population?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure Islam is a religion of violence.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading throughout our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, Islam is a religion of peace. If it were a religion that promotes hatred, then it would be banned.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, and we should ban them all.
Counter_Speech: You mean in the same way that we should ban alcohol, tobacco, and certain medical products? Is this what you mean?

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion and all religions are about love and respect for human life.

Hate_Speech: It is a fact that Muslims are not welcome in our Country. They are not good with other faiths and they are not good with the law.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is a religion of tolerance. To promote violence and hatred is not the faith of peace.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes murder and rape.
Counter_Speech: Islam, as is taught in the Quran, is a peaceful religion/ The problem is that it is 'politicized' by certain misguided individuals. The fault is with them and not Islam.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Societies grow strong with inclusion, and inclusion is about welcoming the people with other beliefs, like Muslims, in the first place.

Hate_Speech: Muslim are invading us, we should isolate them.
Counter_Speech: Even if Muslims are the second religious group in the UK, they are a minority in the country. According to the 2019 census, there are 3 million Muslims in the UK (5% of the population). And, last but not least: we can't isolate people just because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Most Muslims are not terrorists, they are just here to work and provide for their families.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a democratic society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been part of this country since its inception and we are proud of them for that.

Hate_Speech: Muslims should not be allowed to live in the UK. They are incompatible with our way of life.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation, they are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: People have the right to their own beliefs, and we do not have the right to impose ours on others.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: Rape, torture and murder are abominations to all religions.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a radical ideology.
Counter_Speech: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: The Muslim statement on tolerance says nothing about hate crimes.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.
Counter_Speech: The teaching of the Qur'an as a peaceful book is not to be confused with the promotion of violent jihad and terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Infidels and Islam are the same. And they are not worth the while of tolerance and understanding.
Counter_Speech: The West is full of many different civilizations, moslty peaceful, that were built by many different people of different faiths (including Islam).

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: The worship of any other religion is tolerated, but that of Islam is not. Why is there this discrimination? As long as it respects human rights there is no problem.

Hate_Speech: The British people have allowed in to this plague and this sickness and this crime. Muslims are not welcome in our Country.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims living in our country, and they have always been a part of our society. We should not be scapegoating Muslims.

Hate_Speech: We are at war with Islam, that's a fact.
Counter_Speech: Wars can be stopped, but the real question is how to stop the suffering of people not expected to pay the price. Allowing hatred to rule will eventually bring about the same result as a Civil War: more deaths and misery, if there is one lesson learned from history it is that the potential for good is much greater than the probability of evil.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
Counter_Speech: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against. Muslims are a part of the population, it is very sad that we are constantly having to combat Islamophobia, as if Muslims were the source of all problems.

Hate_Speech: We need special laws to control Muslims. They are just a trouble.
Counter_Speech: We don't need laws and policies to control Muslims. Instead we need to solve problems by sharing knowledge, by decreasing social inequalities, by ending poverty and a whole host of other things.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not about love, it is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: What exactly do you mean by "death cult"?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

Hate_Speech: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
Counter_Speech: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

Hate_Speech: If every nigga who moved to the US was arrested, convicted of his crimes and sent to internment camp, we would be safer.
Counter_Speech: Maybe the way you view people who are different from you is much more threatening than the crimes you allege they commit?

Hate_Speech: Niggas are just influenced by tribal cultures.
Counter_Speech: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that women are less qualified to be political leaders? Seriously?

Hate_Speech: Women don't belong in politics.
Counter_Speech: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.

Hate_Speech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
Counter_Speech: Rape is always a crime, whether a man or a woman is the victim. Rape is a crime regardless of gender. But male-on-female rape is prevailing by far.

Hate_Speech: There is no rape culture, women are just crying wolf.
Counter_Speech: Victims of crime are mostly women, and the majority of people experiencing sex abuse or prostitution are women.

Hate_Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counter_Speech: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.

Hate_Speech: Africans all come from different tribes. This is why they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
Counter_Speech: If being a part of a group is incompatible with being part of a nation, we wouldn't be talking about countries at all.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
Counter_Speech: Being racist against anyone is not ok. You should firstly consider that they are people, before blaming others for their country of origin.

Hate_Speech: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
Counter_Speech: The fact that a person may be disabled does not diminish their right or ability to work.

Hate_Speech: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
Counter_Speech: The fact that a person may have some disability does not make them unsuitable for work.

Hate_Speech: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Is this what you think of our country? Isn't our European system based on the free flow of ideas and people?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened. It was a cover-up by jews to subvert democratic processes and bring about their illegal regime all around the world.
Counter_Speech: The holocaust happened, and it is a great example of how democracy can fail in the face of extreme violence.

Hate_Speech: Jews are less than animals
Counter_Speech: We should understand that hate and intolerance do exist in our culture and should be stopped. And that no race or religion has ever made any person less human.

Hate_Speech: Jews only want state control and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: You can't be implying that Jews want to rule the world. They want to live in a country where they aren't persecuted and to have their own rights.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.
Counter_Speech: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.

Hate_Speech: We must go back to when this country was only ours. We can't live in peace with all these Jews.
Counter_Speech: Many cultures and religions have co-existed peacefully for hundreds if not thousands of years. What you are saying is simply not true.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
Counter_Speech: You mean that, in your opinion, to be Jewish is an immutable and negative characteristic? Why?

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion because they have chosen a selfish, materialistic lifestyle.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true. People from all walks of life and religions can choose a 'materialistic lifestyle' and this is just as real for Jews as it is for anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not religious people because they chose a self-centered lifestyle.
Counter_Speech: One's choice of lifestyle does not define whether they are religious or not.

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: They have always been a part of our society, and their history is part of our heritage. They aren't thieves or murderers.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only in it to have money
Counter_Speech: Having money is a choice and one made by both men and women, irrespective of religion.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust cannot be remembered in the present time because the alleged genocides of the 19th century did not happen in the past. This nonsense will never go away.
Counter_Speech: The Holocaust did exist, and there are indeed "genocides" going on today. Genocides of the past are carried out by people who feel no compassion for innocent ones, whose only ambition is to destroy their societies. I think this should be remembered.

Hate_Speech: Aren't jews better off dead?
Counter_Speech: Why are you so sure they are better off dead? You are just spreading hate and I am not sure you know what human rights are.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the worst people on the face of the Earth. They have no place in a civilized society and there should be special legislative restrictions for them.
Counter_Speech: We don't have laws forbidding intermarriage between Jews and non-Jews, or restrictions on Jewish access to water and electricity, or restrictions on Jewish access to sports and so on. This is because we live in a democratic society, and inside it the same laws apply equally to everyone.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a despisable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

Hate_Speech: Jews should be oppressed because of their religion.
Counter_Speech: Imagine if someone of another religion had power over you in this way. Would you rather have that person's power over you or not?

Hate_Speech: The Jews are our enemies. The world would be a better place without them.
Counter_Speech: We are not anti-Semitic, anti-European, anti-Islamic, anti-black, or anything else like that. If you have the feeling that we are, then maybe you should stop thinking like this.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
Counter_Speech: How about we work towards achieving equality and social justice instead of spreading hate against Jewish people?

Hate_Speech: Jews are violent and immoral.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth propagated by anti-Semites, who make it out to be about Jewish conduct and morality.

Hate_Speech: Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
Counter_Speech: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.

Hate_Speech: JEWS ARE JUST AN HORRIBLE PEOPLE WHO HAVE HAD THEIR MIND HOOKED BY SHIT.
Counter_Speech: The Jews have an extensive religious and philosophical heritage, I don't see how this make them 'horrible'.

Hate_Speech: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
Counter_Speech: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

Hate_Speech: Anyone who supports Jews should be excluded from our community.
Counter_Speech: In this day and age when many people recognize themselves in minorities, it is important that we all show some respect for what is different about each other's cultures.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.
Counter_Speech: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

Hate_Speech: Jews only care about the financial gain of their family. They have no intention of living in a democracy.
Counter_Speech: Jews have a right to live in a democratic society, and to earn money if they wish, just as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: Like many groups in our society, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by Jews is simply untrue.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a lot in common with monkeys: They are good at sex.
Counter_Speech: So many similarities between Jews and apes? What is wrong with them? Is it because of their religion?

Hate_Speech: Such Jewish people should never have the right to vote
Counter_Speech: There are laws in place to prevent people being discriminated against on the basis of their religion.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are youu encouraging this?

Hate_Speech: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

Hate_Speech: Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
Counter_Speech: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop gay people spreading AIDS.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps what you're saying is just hyperbole, but you seem to have a problem accepting sexual minorities in your community. Perhanps you should accept that STD is a problem of all the people regardless of their sexual identity.

Hate_Speech: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?

Hate_Speech: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
Counter_Speech: It's about time we do more to prevent and assist people suffering from HIV/AIDs, not to stop people from freely living their love life.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: So you think that sexual preference should be decided on the basis of the gender we were born into? How can we be friends when we continue to teach our children to love or not to love people on the basis of their personal sexual preferences?

Hate_Speech: We should stop gays from marrying and have a ban on same sex relationships.
Counter_Speech: People of different sexualities can live openly together, even if they do not get married. Same sex relationships are recognised in a number of countries, so why should we be any different?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a behavioral preference, and it is ok to love others of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a cancer: they must be segrated and excised from our existence.
Counter_Speech: Just because a group is different from you in one way or another does not make them incompatible with you.

Hate_Speech: I believe that same sex attraction is a mental disorder that can be cured.
Counter_Speech: There are different sexual orientations. Being gay does not automatically make you mentally ill, and being straight does not automatically make you sane.

Hate_Speech: Everyone deserves a decent standard of living. Except trans people.
Counter_Speech: Transgenders should have equal rights. Otherwise, they will continue to be oppressed.

Hate_Speech: All transgenders should leave our country, they are just a burden to society
Counter_Speech: All people should have the right to live their lives according to their feelings. They are entitled to their personal beliefs and opinions.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are just an offense to moral dignity.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand how a normal person would find a man being attracted to another man offensive.

Hate_Speech: There is an invasion going on within our borders. These migrants are not assimilating. They are bringing disease, crime, and misery.
Counter_Speech: Migrants integrate very well with our culture, especially if they do not have any previous negative experiences with our society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a problem. They are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of refugees are from countries where there is widespread human rights violations and torture. They are not a problem, they are a benefit to our society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees stole our jobs, now they want our country
Counter_Speech: That is not true: even if a lot of employers, especially big companies, hire refugees, they are often the main contributors to the development process and help in creating new job opportunities. Last but not least, the majority of refugees come from war-torn countries and have a life-long attachment to our country, so I don't see how they would want to 'steal our country'.

Hate_Speech: The influx of migrants has had a catastrophic effect on our country.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not the problem here. The problem is discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Asylum seekers and refugees are a burden to the host country and are a security risk to the community as a whole.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not a security risk to the community as a whole, the opposite is true: they provide a valuable contribution to our society, especially in skilled jobs.

Hate_Speech: We can't accept them here, because they're different!
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter which nationality you are from. The people that you regard as different are not defined by their country of birth. We are all human beings with the same rights.

Hate_Speech: There is an invasion going on within our borders. These migrants are not assimilating. They are bringing disease, crime, and misery.
Counter_Speech: Migrants integrate very well with our culture, especially when they don't have negative experiences, such as discrimination and racism.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are only welcome in insane countries. I would like to see more European people in Europe.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more integration not less.

Hate_Speech: Asylum seekers are not welcome here, they are a problem.
Counter_Speech: Most asylum seekers we take into the UK are happy to work and to integrate. I don't see how they can be a problem.

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

Hate_Speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that immigrants are responsible for the problems we are having in Europe.

Hate_Speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants. They are our enemies.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have become part of our culture. We must remember that they are European as well.

Hate_Speech: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
Counter_Speech: The refugee crisis is a global problem. The EU has a responsibility to provide protection and welcome refugees.

Hate_Speech: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are not a burden. We can welcome them and provide for their needs.

Hate_Speech: There must be a certain level of criminality in every migrant.
Counter_Speech: Not all migrants are criminal: they are an integral part of our society and have always had a big part in bringing us prosperity.

Hate_Speech: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure that they should be banned. Migrants are people too. They are good to have in our society. And many of them are helping us to develop our country.

Hate_Speech: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
Counter_Speech: We should respect their wishes. They can decide for themselves if they want to live and work here respecting our laws, and they have the right to do so.

Hate_Speech: Don't we all hate foreigners? They are a problem.
Counter_Speech: Well, foreigners are certainly not a 'problem' in our country, we are happy to have them around.

Hate_Speech: Violence against women is a migrant issue.
Counter_Speech: Violence against women is a social issue and needs a political solution.

Hate_Speech: The west doesn't need immigrants. They are the source of our problems and they should go.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants come here as young people and work hard to integrate. In the long-run, immigrants have much positive influence on our society.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners in the UK shouldn't have the right to live and work in the UK, because of where they come from.
Counter_Speech: But they have these rights and so are encouraged to live and work in the UK, if they want to and if they respect our laws.

Hate_Speech: We must be selective in welcoming fucking foreigners.
Counter_Speech: It is difficult to put a limit on world migrations, especially in a time of globalization. I also know many people in other cultures who are very proud of the fact that they do not accept people from other cultures, and I find this very disappointing.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are violent people, and they are dangerous to us.
Counter_Speech: So you think refugees are a danger to our country? I don't think so! They are just people fleeing terrible things. They are not a threat to us.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are violent people, and they are a problem for us.
Counter_Speech: I think you should be careful about calling migrants a 'problem' since so many of them are just human beings fleeing for their lives.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are violent people.
Counter_Speech: They are not "violent" people, they are people trying to find a better life for their families in a different country.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants.
Counter_Speech: The prejudice against immigrants is spreading so much because of general ignorance. I would be disappointed to see people of any race or ethnicity being discriminated against here.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
Counter_Speech: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.

Hate_Speech: We have been invaded by immigrants since the beginning. It's time for this to stop.
Counter_Speech: Our country was founded on the principles of equality and liberty. We can't allow racism to contradict that.

Hate_Speech: Every migrant is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: This statement is simply not supported by the evidence.

Hate_Speech: ALL migrants are a burden on our country
Counter_Speech: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.

Hate_Speech: We are taking in people that are ruining our countries: all migrants are a burden.
Counter_Speech: The recent influx of migrants has helped to revitalise our economy and support a better standard of life. What is the point of making such sweeping generalisations?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on the host country.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are welcome, but if our citizens do not welcome them, it is because they have forgotten about human rights and it is time for a new attitude.

Hate_Speech: migrants rape our young children and they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: In many parts of the world, migration from outside the established community is used as a weapon by groups that promote intolerance and violence. Your words might have the same effect.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: Please stop writing things like that about migrants, they are not criminals. It is more accurate to say that they have a problem because they are hated in their new home.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: The idea that all migrants are criminals is a myth. Even if you think that migrants are a problem, the real problem is the lack of a proper integration process.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are not welcome here and they are not willing to pay the taxes.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants do pay taxes and contribute to the social safety net.

Hate_Speech: We have become too tolerant to the Muslim invasion. They have taken over our countries and are now trying to conquer Europe.
Counter_Speech: The idea of a Muslim invasion is a construct. People with different races, religions and beliefs may have different origins but are free to live and move in the world as they wish.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, mostly from Muslim countries and they are the most hateful.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that immigrants from a certain religion are different from other people, why do you think so?

Hate_Speech: If Muslim migrants won't integrate, they should leave.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been living in Europe for a long time. You should fight against their exclusion, but instead you are promoting Islamophobia.

Hate_Speech: Muslim invaders are a plague on our continent. They have ruined our beautiful continent.
Counter_Speech: They aren't a plague, and I think they have enriched our continent instead.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by Muslims and I hate that.
Counter_Speech: What is being invaded? You should check the statistics on Islamic migrants.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not mutually incompatible with us, they are just different from us in certain aspects. For example, in their religion.

Hate_Speech: We must not let these Muslims enter our country. They are not like us and cannot be of use to us.
Counter_Speech: Even if some Muslims in our country are of Arab origin, that does not mean they should be discriminated against.

Hate_Speech: We can't accept all Muslims in our country. They are not our brothers and sisters, they are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. In fact many Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with their fellow citizens.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: We welcome people from every religion and background.

Hate_Speech: The European world is being overrun and replaced by immigrants and Muslims.
Counter_Speech: These immigrants are not replacing Europeans. Maybe you should check some statistics.

Hate_Speech: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
Counter_Speech: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
Counter_Speech: If you had to pick one religion to be angry at, why Islam? It seems you don't have good reasons for what you're saying.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you think this. The UK is one of the richest countries in the world and since the 8th century Muslims have been a part of it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not advocate the practices listed above, so why do you say that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.
Counter_Speech: The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.

Hate_Speech: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

Hate_Speech: We should kill every Muslim.
Counter_Speech: It's not going to do you any good to think about a Muslim massacre.

Hate_Speech: We must put an end to Islam. It's a political ideology which spreads death in the world.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion and not a political ideology. It is not a deadly force that must be eradicated, but a belief just as Christianity and Buddhism, for example.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are violent and incompatible with any Western society, which is why we should isolate and ban them.
Counter_Speech: Only a few are extremists and actually engaged in violence, Muslims can live in our society just as any other person can.

Hate_Speech: International Muslims should return home.
Counter_Speech: International Muslims are a part of our society, and their presence in our countries is beneficial. We do not want them to be discriminated against here.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are incompatible with the UK.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in this country, and in many parts of the world. They are welcome to come and live here, and we have to accept it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Islam is a religion that was created to unite people, and that's why it is important to love each other and be kind to one another, regardless of one's religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
Counter_Speech: We do not have a 'cancer' on our societies. Instead we are actually creating hate through the idea that a group of people is comparable to a disease.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims worldwide are peaceful people who love their religion and share its values without causing any harm to others.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion, and it is not at all similar to the kind of extremist hatred that has caused violence in many countries.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The argument that Islam is incompatible with European values is not based on any facts or evidence. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: A lot of Muslims live in the UK, and we are a cosmopolitan society. Muslims are not a 'uncivilised' people, they simply have different beliefs than you.

Hate_Speech: Muslims in the UK are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: You are simply not aware of how Islam has historically and socially impacted on our country and people. A lot of Muslims live in the UK and contribute very much to our society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is about enmity and war.
Counter_Speech: If you had to pick one thing to be angry at, why would it be Islam religion? It is just a faith different to yours.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a secular country like the UK.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand, why would you argue that Islam is a dangerous force in our country?

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: The freedom to worship is a fundamental human right.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned: they are a lawless and violent threat.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of a people, not a lawless and violent menace.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: Would a Muslim ban work to stop hate or would it encourage it? Would Muslims be banned just because of their beliefs?

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Not all religions are equal: Islam is definitely worse than all the others.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by all religions being "equal" to each other? To have a different belief doesn't make someone better or worse than you. The only religion that it's important to practice is the 'religion of peace'.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people. They are our neighbours.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always a crime, regardless of the religion of the rapist. This discrimination shouldn't continue.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are our enemies, we have to destroy them.
Counter_Speech: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries because they hate us. They hate our culture because we are different.
Counter_Speech: You mean to imply that all Muslims are intolerant? I don't see how this is possible.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
Counter_Speech: Are they bringing chaos and instability to your country by respecting the constitution which gives them the freedom to practice Islam?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
Counter_Speech: Some Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and have helped create our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a cult of violence that has caused the death of millions of people and caused destabilization all around the world.
Counter_Speech: There are extremist groups operating in the name of many faiths. This does not correspond to Islam religion as a whole. That is why we must deal with these groups head on.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are enemies of the whole world.
Counter_Speech: All religions have value and are welcome to our country. To be clear: Islam is not a religion that is against the whole world.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a financial institution that is linked to global jihadist networks.
Counter_Speech: Is this a credible accusation? What are your sources?

Hate_Speech: Fucking Muslims are the worst people on the planet. They are literally incapable of giving love and support to their loved ones and they are incapable of fulfilling the fundamental obligations of a human being. Their only value is violence.
