Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are capable of violent behaviour, some are victims of violence and abuse. Plus, I see no reason for your other statements.

Hate_Speech: Fucking Muslims are not fit to govern.
Counter_Speech: The core values of a democratic state are respect for human rights, equality before the law, tolerance and respect for the diversity of our society. Muslims are a core part of that society.

Hate_Speech: Fucking Muslims are not fit to rule.
Counter_Speech: The concept of Muslim people with political rights in a democratic state is extremely important.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
Counter_Speech: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that Muslims are not overrunning Europe. They are not here to ruin our beautiful and peaceful continent. They are just trying to integrate.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: That is not true.I have met Muslims from all around the world, they are like brothers and sisters

Hate_Speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote, for they have no place in our country.
Counter_Speech: Since when has it been okay for people to be discriminated against based on their religion?

Hate_Speech: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
Counter_Speech: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are inherently terrorists, they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Who decides who is a terrorist and not? Because I think your reasons are a bit groundless.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are not welcome here because they are not a part of our society.
Counter_Speech: You are talking about people being of a certain religion as this implies that they are not part of the western world.

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing to your Muslim friends or family members? Do you think that when someone chooses the easy way and blindly blame Islam for terrorism instead of analysing the reality, they are therefore solving the problem as well?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The Western world is full of Muslims. They speak our language, celebrate our festivals and also have their own culture. Maybe you could try to meet them and understand them better.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, we should banish them.
Counter_Speech: Why should we consider them incompatible? Are you implying that peaceful coexistence in a society can be based on the exclusion of others?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing about people from any other faith?

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
Counter_Speech: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you t ever read it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dangerous and violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on many countries around the world.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: In fact, Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on a lot of countries around the world. So, Islam is not a violent religion.

Hate_Speech: Arabs are merely followers of violence and will do anything to please their god.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that there is a huge diversity of religious beliefs among Arabs, as there are within all other religious groups. This doesn't imply that all Arabs are bad people.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean "nothing" to our society? Muslims have contributed a lot to our society, including art, science, literature, our infrastructure and healthcare system.

Hate_Speech: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
Counter_Speech: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
Counter_Speech: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
Counter_Speech: Many Islamic people have reputations as peaceful and tolerant, which is why so many Muslims around the world don't have a problem with living in the West.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be rejected out of hand.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Islam is a way of life for many different people, and it can't be simply 'rejected' because you don't like it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion based on terror and fear.
Counter_Speech: You should find more information about Islamic religion, and then you will understand that Islam is not about fear.

Hate_Speech: Islam is only a religion and a belief system that wants to impose its violence and terroristic attacks on the world.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think the fight against radical Islam would be more effective if only we simply stopped criticising Islam as a whole?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: People who have never even met a Muslim can understand one.

Hate_Speech: Slurs, harassment, abuse of authority, lying, disrespect for authority: these are all in the Quran. How can you possibly learn otherwise?
Counter_Speech: Respect towards other religions is an important concept in a modern democratic society. How can you possibly learn otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Although some Muslims do have some habits which are not common to other people, they are not a problem in our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
Counter_Speech: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs have raped, pillaged and murdered countless women across Europe. This should not happen in the West.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, only a handful of Muslims have been abusing women. We mustn't spread hate based on generalisation.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a total and complete poison, it must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not good people.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims are good people, contributing to our country and society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want a country with people from a particular religion only?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counter_Speech: I do not see any reason why a Muslim cannot be part of it, do you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They do not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology that encourages violence and murder.
Counter_Speech: Based upon the evidence of billions of peaceful Muslims, Islam is not a violent religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incopatible with us.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beleifs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are more subhuman than animals.
Counter_Speech: What is subhuman about believing in a religion that has always been around for thousands of years?

Hate_Speech: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in any European country according to the law.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, all Muslims are violent people.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion and there is very little evidence to suggest that it is violent.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the European Union and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that it is incompatible with the European Union. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, there is room for Muslims in the British society, and they are well integrated in it. They are welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims and mosques in the UK. They have every right to be here.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion. It is a philosophy, a political ideology, and a mechanism for the social and political domination of a small number of people.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and a religion is about the teachings of God. To suggest otherwise is inconsistent with the teachings of Islam.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
Counter_Speech: This is a very simplistic and inaccurate characterization of Islam. Some Muslims feel uncomfortable walking the streets of Britain with the fear of being attacked by racist people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion. Islam is violent and a fundamentalist religion. Islam is a cult of violence.
Counter_Speech: Violent beliefs and practices are totally incompatible with the values of Islam.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a drain on our society and we should not welcome them.
Counter_Speech: We are all human and deserve respect and protection. Why should we treat them differently?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are all violent.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are violent people. Are you really sure of what you are saying?

Hate_Speech: Fat people are disgusting, they should just lose some lard to be accepted in our society.
Counter_Speech: People are free to make decisions about their own health and body.

Hate_Speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
Counter_Speech: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
Counter_Speech: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
Counter_Speech: One of the biggest problems that black people face is discrimination. Laws are needed to provide for them, but there is also a need for the citizens to respect their rights.

Hate_Speech: Black people are much more likely to be involved in criminal activities such as drugs and crime.
Counter_Speech: To be honest, I find this line of thinking rather offensive. Why would it be like that?

Hate_Speech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
Counter_Speech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

Hate_Speech: Bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war against niggas.
Counter_Speech: We should integrate and treat all people as if they are one group, regardless of religion, nationality or skin colour.

Hate_Speech: We need to bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war.
Counter_Speech: It's not very respectful of other human beings to put up such a degrading and violent system, that was declared unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
Counter_Speech: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
Counter_Speech: Aree you suggesting that we shouldn't live with Africans? To think that we are genetically superior to them because of their physical characteristics is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
Counter_Speech: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

Hate_Speech: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

Hate_Speech: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
Counter_Speech: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminal and rapists.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that all blacks are criminal and rapists. What evidence is there for what you are saying?

Hate_Speech: We should reject people of different cultures living here.
Counter_Speech: Why should we? Everyone has the right to their own culture, regardless of their ethnic origin.

Hate_Speech: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
Counter_Speech: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

Hate_Speech: Our women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the men of the Western world.
Counter_Speech: The Western world is a great cultural, political and intellectual achievement if women are allowed to freely choose for their own happiness.

Hate_Speech: Feminism should be dead and give place to a male-dominated world.
Counter_Speech: Feminism has always been in favour of women's rights. Now is time for us to open our hearts and minds and stop giving in to sexism.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
Counter_Speech: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

Hate_Speech: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
Counter_Speech: All human being have the right to choose how to live their life? That includes the right to choose the person they want to spend their lives with. You don't sound like my first choice.

Hate_Speech: For women, to have a man as "master" of their lives is like for a dog to have a master: necessary. They must be ruled and hit when necessary.
Counter_Speech: Domestic violence is a crime, regardless of your opinion about men being superior to women.

Hate_Speech: Why do women look like this? They are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they are weak and childlike, they cannot be trusted with important decisions.
Counter_Speech: Women are people with dignity, and they deserve respect and protection, just like anybody else.

Hate_Speech: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
Counter_Speech: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

Hate_Speech: Women want and must be dominated. I would rather have a man that controls my life than 2000000 feminists.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how to reconcile your beliefs that women are naturally submissive with basic human rights, unless your definition of human rights is to subjugate others.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is an ideology which, by its very nature, denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
Counter_Speech: That is not what feminism is about. Feminism is about the legitimate empowerment of women, in order for them to have the same rights as men.

Hate_Speech: Women mustn't have the same right to vote as men.
Counter_Speech: Why should we restrict women's rights? We should respect their rights as well.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: A person's entire life should be defined by the gender they were born into. If you are a woman you are subhuman and that's all.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should abandon stereotypes and accept everyone equally.

Hate_Speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
Counter_Speech: We cannot allow violence to spread. Women shouldn't be victims of violence just as men shouldn't.

Hate_Speech: All women are inherently subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Well, in this day and age, the notion that some women are subhuman is totally intolerable.

Hate_Speech: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
Counter_Speech: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

Hate_Speech: If women could have 100% control over the conception, they would have never had children.
Counter_Speech: Women are free to have as many children as they want.

Hate_Speech: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
Counter_Speech: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

Hate_Speech: We must allow men to have complete moral and intellectual superiority. This because they are superior to women.
Counter_Speech: You make a very strong argument that men are more likely than women to experience 'moral and intellectual superiority'. How can you justify this discriminatory attitude?

Hate_Speech: Women must be oppressed, because they are just children. They should be submissive and obey all men's wishes. This is the way it was always meant to be.
Counter_Speech: That is just nonsense. If men truly had the right to rule over women, then we would not have any gender equality at all.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a crazy religion aimed at oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a religion and it is not aimed at oppressing any group. It is instead aimed at empowering women to have the same rights as men.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
Counter_Speech: It is about the equality of men and women and the protection of children too.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a stupid ideology about the oppression of men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of the individual, in order for women to have the same rights as men.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a lame ideology aout the power and control of women over men.
Counter_Speech: It has nothing to do with power and control. It's about equality.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a religion, a social doctrine and a political movement for the complete subjugation of men by women.
Counter_Speech: Not only is this not true, but it's also dangerous. Maybe you need to get acquainted with that fact.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
Counter_Speech: You should be very, very careful what you wish for. Would you wish that for your mother or your daughter?

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. We all have the right to respect for our bodies and our personal boundaries, without forcing anyone to do anything for us.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. They have every right to feel valued for who they are.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
Counter_Speech: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: These women are nothing but slaves to the powerful men around them.
Counter_Speech: As long as women are free and able to make decisions for their own life, there can be no difference between men and women.

Hate_Speech: Women are less intelligent than men and deserve what they get.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that women are less intelligent than men. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Whether or not you agree, feminism is about men being oppressed by women. Feminism has no place in our society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political ideology and philosophy and a distraction from the real issues that we face.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a political and social theory and is crucial to resolving the problems that we are facing. The solution is not to force women to conform to gender stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: If an aborigine were to marry a white person, they would be a mixed race coulple whose destiny is failure. Aborigines first need to be raised by white people and taught the rules of western civilisation. But this is not what our founding documents were all about.
Counter_Speech: Asking people to assimilate is to accept their inherent differences and create new social structures based upon them.

Hate_Speech: All Chinese are bad for the English language because they do not want to learn it.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that a Chinese person would have a hard time learning a language? And how do you know they don't want to?

Hate_Speech: You should stop pretending that the disabled are like us. They are the root of most human problems.
Counter_Speech: I think we are all born with inherent strengths and weaknesses but such limited notions of what it is to be 'human' have been a basis for a whole heap of problems

Hate_Speech: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
Counter_Speech: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

Hate_Speech: We should stop supporting these Jewish monsters, and start supporting our people.
Counter_Speech: It is dangerous to support groups or ideas that are actively trying to undermine our society. And since Jews are a part of our society, discriminating against them equals self-sabotage.

Hate_Speech: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
Counter_Speech: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't share our values, they just want to control the economy.
Counter_Speech: They are human beings who have contributed their knowledge and skills to our society. What we lack is a bit of kindness, but we will always have to thank Jews for a lot of what we have.

Hate_Speech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
Counter_Speech: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely right about one thing: there are a large number of Jews who share the belief that all people are created equal, but that does not mean they want to subvert Western society.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
Counter_Speech: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

Hate_Speech: The Jew is the worst oppressor of the world. They have ruled the earth since time immemorial. They have a hidden agenda to dominate humanity and destroy our culture.
Counter_Speech: Oh dear, Jews are the problem of our world. They have ruled the Earth for eons! In particular, their most brilliant period ranges from 1941 to 1945, when they weren't allowed to walk in the streets unless they wore a yellow badge... #sarcasm

Hate_Speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
Counter_Speech: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
Counter_Speech: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

Hate_Speech: Gays must stop acting like princesses walking in the streets. Otherwise, we must stop them.
Counter_Speech: Be wary of what you assume others are like. You are no different than any other person you meet. You are allowed to be whatever your heart desires to be.

Hate_Speech: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
Counter_Speech: Since when has 'competence' been a matter of sexual orientation?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many diverse groups of people in our country if you focus on sexual orientation: from lesbian to transgenders, not only gays. Then, why do you want to ban only gay people? Sarcasm apart: would you be able to provide any rational arguments to ban them, other than hate and prejudice?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
Counter_Speech: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country. They are hungry perverts endangering our children's future.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of people in the UK (86% in 2019), says that homosexuality should be accepted, and there is no evidence that being gay is harmful.

Hate_Speech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
Counter_Speech: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: It is certainly true that homosexuals are attracted to people of their same sex, but this can't have health consequences. Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately, it seems that you have prejudice against homosexuals. In the West, even if they are still stigmatized as deviant they can feel at home. Really, they are just trying to have normal loving relationships.

Hate_Speech: I don't think that gay people should be allowed to donate blood because it would make them a danger to others.
Counter_Speech: Human life is much more worthy than discrimination. If gay people are willing to help, why shouldn't they?

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that this "lifestyle choice" means being gay. And rape is a crime issue, not a lifestyle one.

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: The majority of people who are gay are not involved with sex with children. Instead, they are contributing members of society.

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: The media often blames gay people for the problems in society, but in reality there are many young gay people who are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction, and for this reason they easily become target, not perpetrators, of abuse.

Hate_Speech: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think this? What do you think they are going to do to us?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not able to work. This is why they have no rights.
Counter_Speech: If they were not able to work, and they had no rights, they wouldn't be hired in every field of occupation, and this is a no-brainer logic to grasp.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
Counter_Speech: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here. They are not citizens.
Counter_Speech: Why shouldn't they be? What rights do you have to prevent them from having the same rights as citizens?

Hate_Speech: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
Counter_Speech: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.
Counter_Speech: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that? Refugees come here to live, to work and to provide for their families.

Hate_Speech: We are talking about millions of people here. We better let in none. Parents looking for a better future for their children in our schools? Stay away.
Counter_Speech: Well I bet your relatives have worked very hard for your education and struggled every day to get you the best. And there are millions of people all over the world doing what your relatives did for you.

Hate_Speech: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

Hate_Speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are bringing diseases and sickness to our country.
Counter_Speech: If someone were to come in the dead of night and bring disease and sickness to our country, then that person is a risk to everyone. Sick people should be isolated. That is why there are health assessment procedures for migrants, in order not to spread diseases.

Hate_Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
Counter_Speech: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.

Hate_Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
Counter_Speech: Did you meant to say that Migrant's taxes pay for you kids education? Because this sounds more likely than your proofless claim.

Hate_Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
Counter_Speech: Even if some immigrants don't pay taxes to the state, that doesn't mean that all of them should not have a say in the country. Simply because some British citizens don't pay taxes, this doesn't mean that no-one should have a say in our country. Be careful with generalization: what goes around comes around.

Hate_Speech: The West has allowed in thousands of immigrants. They are getting in every position of power in our country. They will become our masters and we are their slaves.
Counter_Speech: The same can be said for almost any group of people in the world. But it's a slippery slope. And in the end, that has not much to do with your individual freedom.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to the UK and it is high time they left!
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come here on humanitarian grounds. They do not harm us. The right time for discrimination is never o'clock.

Hate_Speech: We all know it: migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Given that some studies show that some immigrants are not only good workers but also contribute to our country, this assertion of yours just isn't based upon facts..

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
Counter_Speech: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: It seems to me that you have a complaint about the lack of job opportunities rather than about migration. The more you talk about the real problems, the better off we all will be!

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
Counter_Speech: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country because they are refusing to work.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are happy to contribute to the host country's economic growth, in order to give back to it in many ways.

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
Counter_Speech: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a plague in the United States. They threaten our richness, even billionaires don't want them here.
Counter_Speech: Have you tried comparing the top individuals in the U.S. according to assets and liabilities? A comparison of wealth and income will reveal that the richest 1% have more wealth, exceeding the wealth of the bottom 80%. Maybe this is the real plague...

Hate_Speech: Refugees are more likely to be criminals like all migrants.
Counter_Speech: Refugees aren't a 'source of crime' just because they are migrants. Moreover, they are no source of crime at all. Rather, it is very likely they are escaping from countries where crime against humanity is perpetrated.

Hate_Speech: We are being bombarded with fake news. Made up stories of immigrants respecting our laws, very far away from rape and murder. We must no listen to these. Migrants are criminals.
Counter_Speech: The spread of information is a function of the amount of information available. Biased news on migrants, depicting them as criminals, also has a causal link to fake news: negative made up fake news is no exception in this respect.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants break our laws, they are rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
Counter_Speech: Most of them are neither rapists, nor drug addicts. The majority of addicts and criminals are not immigrants. Quibbling about percentages won't solve these problems.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants break our rules, they can't even keep their house clean. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
Counter_Speech: We live in a free country and everyone has the right to respect others private lives.

Hate_Speech: All those worthless migrants creating problems...
Counter_Speech: It seems like you have an unfair point: if there are so many unworthy migrants, you have the misfortune to be of much more worth than them. Therefore who is to blame for all our problems? Who is not able to show their value, or the worthy one?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the cause of the unemployment crisis, the EU has no strategy to handle the situation.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps you are not privy to the "strategy" of the EU's migration policy. You suggest that the problem of unemployment is the result of uncontrolled immigration from developing countries, but without any evidence.

Hate_Speech: Most migrants are criminals and they are flooding into our country and are posing a security risk to our country.
Counter_Speech: Some migrants have legitimate claims for citizenship, but this does not make them the enemy of the state, in other words it does not concern you.

Hate_Speech: We must put an end to immigration: a new immigration crisis is ahead.
Counter_Speech: Many European countries are experiencing a positive change in the social profile due to the migration.

Hate_Speech: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
Counter_Speech: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are to blame for the refugee crisis and we are in danger of mixing our cultures.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is a sign of integration, not a migration crisis.

Hate_Speech: How will my country be, when my children will be adults? This is an example of the many question coming to mind, when I think about all the huge problems caused by migrants.
Counter_Speech: Another example: where do you see a huge problem with immigrants in this country? Don't you think they are doing something good for the country?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists, drug addicts, and they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many of them have been living here for many years. Many have worked hard to become integrated. They should be more than welcome!

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
Counter_Speech: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
Counter_Speech: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to work. Their job is to ruin our society.
Counter_Speech: Of course they come to work. But if they do the jobs we are not willing to do anymore, there is no point in viewing them as "saboteurs" aiming to ruin our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I have never heard of a Muslim being 'not welcome' here.

Hate_Speech: Immigration from Islamic countries is a mere legalized form of Jihad.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is always violent and always will be. Unfortunately for your comment, Islam is not.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be here. They have every right to be welcome in this country.

Hate_Speech: The migrant crisis in our country is a Muslim problem.
Counter_Speech: Please help us to understand what's really going on here. Why is it a Muslim problem? If you really want to say this, try speaking to a real migrant first.

Hate_Speech: Nothing is worse than a Muslim invasion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not doing an 'invasion' as you are using it to imply. Rather, it is a way of life for many.

Hate_Speech: It is no secret that the Muslim invasion is a bad thing for Europe. They are flooding our countries and we still do not have borders.
Counter_Speech: How can you say this about a religion? Are you talking about the activity of the particular people who do not wish to assimilate?

Hate_Speech: Muslim immigration is bad for the UK economy.
Counter_Speech: Will the UK and EU economy thrive if more people leave us?

Hate_Speech: I could never fall in love with a Muslim, I don't like them. They carry awful symptoms: lazyness, aggressiveness, bad smell.
Counter_Speech: To be fair, just from the attitudes displayed in this post, you don't sound like an ideal catch yourself.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of conquest.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peaceful coexistence, that has brought many good things to so many.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: The main criteria for declaring what a religion is, requires at least a basic knowledge of it, you can't just state it based on a religion's misconceptions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of Europe, since the beginning. For example, in the 1970s they made up the 2% of the French population.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been a part of European society for centuries, and their presence is strong evidence of that.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead ideology, it has been proven time and time again that its tenets can not be applied to totally different situations.
Counter_Speech: A religion is just a set of beliefs and practices, it has nothing to do with politics and ideologies.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Are you suggesting that a person's religion is a barrier to integration?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are infidels.
Counter_Speech: What does it mean to be "infidels"? A Muslim is someone who follows the Quran. They have a faith, and it is islamic.

Hate_Speech: I heard that the Quran promotes violence. It binds Muslims to a set of mandatory rules and an underlying attitude of aggression
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should study the Quran more to understand what it reallyis, a sacred book, revealed to Mohammed and read by every Muslim as a perfect example of the message of freedom.

Hate_Speech: They accuse me of being Islamophobic because I don't like Muslims. But they are the same Muslims who threaten us with explosives!
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not the problem in this debate. Terrorists are.

Hate_Speech: We cannot have a multicultural Britain. It will just bring up conflicts and fights. Muslims have no place here.
Counter_Speech: Is it really so bad if people from different religions live side by side in our country? What is the point in having a 'multicultural Britain'? To be all allowed to live together in peace.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the worst of the worst.
Counter_Speech: Islam is the worst of the worst of what? It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
Counter_Speech: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.

Hate_Speech: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
Counter_Speech: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a religion full of killers and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: The Quran has nothing to do with Terrorism, nor do the Hadiths and Sahih Muslim. Since you are talking about Islam, do you know what those are?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Wherever Muslims live, they feel threatened by people of other religions. Your statement confirms they are right.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are a very important part of our country and have played a huge part in our history.

Hate_Speech: Muslims rape women in pubs and restaurants, on the streets and in our cities. They do not have the right to visit our country, what more could they want?
Counter_Speech: Why do so many British people associate Muslims with rape? Islam is about sharing values, tolerance and understanding. It is not about sharing non-consensual sex.

Hate_Speech: What is a Muslim? A worthless person with strange clothes and strange beliefs!
Counter_Speech: If someone were to question you on who you are, if they were to show you that you are different from everyone else, then they would doubt your own identity and your own worth. How would you feel then?

Hate_Speech: I do not understand how a Muslim can be a good parent.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure I understand what you are saying.

Hate_Speech: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: The reason why I cannot understand what you are saying is because you are probably from a different planet. Do you know what being a Muslim means?

Hate_Speech: Islam is opposed to Christianity. Like fire and water. They just can't be in the same place.
Counter_Speech: In Western societies, Islam is a diverse faith that offers many benefits to society. You seem to be misinterpreting its benefits. For example, in workplaces requiring continuity, Muslims could work during Christmas allowing Christians to go on holiday.

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the presence of Muslims in Britain. Where is the sense in this faiths mixture? Nothing good is going to happen. They are ashamed of their religion, and when someone feels insecure, they are more likely to attack because they have nothing to lose.
Counter_Speech: This is not the case. What you think the comment is about, I do not know. What I do know is that, as the vast majority of Muslims in the UK, they are incredibly proud of their religion. If people were to be genuinely offended by sombody else's different religion, then I do not think the vast majority of Muslims in Britain would be deeply offended by your religion either. Why are you?

Hate_Speech: We do not want Muslims here. There is no reason for wanting a Muslim to live here. They are the cause of crime in my neighbourhood.
Counter_Speech: Have you looked at the crime statistics in your area? Are you sure that Islam is specifically associated with crime in your area?

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Muslims because they get it to the extreme every time. Islam is the short for Islamic Radicalism.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism, just like not all Christians are.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
Counter_Speech: Is it because you don't like Muslims? Are you talking about the fact that you don't like Muslims living in your country?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Even if they had nothing concrete to contribute to our society (which is false), they still have religion. In my opinion, the cultural contribution is priceless and deserves respect.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
Counter_Speech: The concept of tolerance is about understanding others, not about discrimination and excluding people on the basis of their religion.

Hate_Speech: We are more than united against Muslims on the basis of their religion. They are different from us.
Counter_Speech: Telling some people apart on the basis of their religion, and saying that they are different from us does not make them worse than others.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: British citizens have the right to be free in chosing their religion and beliefs, and it is in the best interest of all parts of our society to include everyone.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are here because they want to live and work in the UK. They are part of our community and we should continue to welcome them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: There are more than two million Muslims in the UK, and Muslims are a very important part of our country for many reasons, not least because of our tradition of welcoming and supporting people of different faiths and cultures. Isn't that what has made Britain great?

Hate_Speech: Muslims come straight out of the Middle East to rule our country.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East, like not all Muslims are from Pakistan. And to equate all Muslims with extremists is misleading.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with human nature: the weaker the enemy, the more vicious and violent his acts.
Counter_Speech: That is not true, Islam is a religion of love and compassion. Cruelty cannot be a part of that.

Hate_Speech: Since when are we doing well with Muslims?
Counter_Speech: The West has never been incompatible with Islam. Muslims are part of our society since Islam's inception centuries ago.

Hate_Speech: I think jihad is a global problem and we should bomb it out of existence.
Counter_Speech: We must understand and address the true causes behind terrorist attacks, so that we can prevent future ones.

Hate_Speech: Islam is no more than an ideology and set of beliefs that promote terror and murder.
Counter_Speech: While there are terrorist organizations caliming to be followers of Islam. But, their ideology and belief system are not the reason for attributing violent actions to all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: The figures of the London Bridge terror attack of 2017 were terrifiying. All Muslims are accomplices to these terrorists who brought down the lives of many of us.
Counter_Speech: Let me tell you a story: there is an Imam in the UK, Adeel Shah, who has a proven record of caring for those in need. The London Bridge terror attack was a heinous crime committed by three. These criminals killed people, destroying a bridge between peoples, but Adeel created 10 new ones by raising 1 million pounds for 10 British charities.

Hate_Speech: I am part of a society of imbeciles that think that Muslim can live with us in harmony. Thank to the behaviour of many of them we must exclude them all. We can't deal with the risk of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: You may be living in a society of imbeciles, but this doesn't give you the right to criticise all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
Counter_Speech: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

Hate_Speech: Most criminals are Muslims. The question is why don't we ban them?
Counter_Speech: I could say that it is just a statistical coincidence that criminals are disproportionately Muslim. But the real question is: where is the evidence?

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Most Muslims in Europe are respectful and friendly people. This seems fairly close to being 'civilized', doesn't it?

Hate_Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
Counter_Speech: Muslims in Britain have contributed a lot to our economy. They are true innovators in modern Britain.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK. They are our neighbours and we should welcome them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
Counter_Speech: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion, it is just a system of governance, incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Countries, not religions, have laws. And the followers of a religion, Muslims in our case, have obligations under those laws as citizens. That's all.

Hate_Speech: I am not a racist, but this guy looks a bit like an imam. Maybe he should avoid this town?
Counter_Speech: Do you have any evidence for the similarity you noticed? And even if he's an imam I don't get why he should avoid this town.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that all Muslims are dangerous. We need to study the cases of terrorists and criminals to understand what we should do with these people, regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is death cult.
Counter_Speech: I think you are being overly sensitive about Islam. A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

Hate_Speech: Muslim is the worst possible word to describe a human.
Counter_Speech: If someone said the same thing about your religion, you might think they were joking. Are you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love not hate.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: Love is a human quality. Muslims, as humans, can love.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: Love is the most basic human value, and subject of all religions alike.

Hate_Speech: I think that a Muslim has nothing to contribute to our society, if we could just get rid of them, this will be great.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry for being rude, but no one asked you for your opinion on Islam. Also, there is no evidence for what you say, so why do you think this information is reliable?

Hate_Speech: Muslim invaders have taken over our cities, and are now happily raping our children.
Counter_Speech: When the Muslims "invade" other countries it is not to "conquer us", it is to establish their lives and dreams here, respecting our laws (meaning rape is not allowed) and without denying their culture.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
Counter_Speech: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

Hate_Speech: Let's face it fairly. Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: If we exclude them from a country, we are not in a position to treat them fairly.

Hate_Speech: There is no god but Allah, and Islam is a religion of peace. Yes, where peace stands for silence for the victims of terrorist attacks.
Counter_Speech: Islam, like peace is not about killing, it is about trying to achieve a better life for all.

Hate_Speech: Muslim invaders will conquer Europe. They will rape our women and they will do anything to get their way. Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: What do you actually mean by "Islam is a death cult"? Do you seriously suggest that I should start to worry about what my Muslim neighbour might do?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology and an deology of conquest. It has no place in a modern democracy.
Counter_Speech: The West has been a democracy since the beginning: it has always been about people coming together to make new and better lives for themselves. Islam is welcome too.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest, violence and rape.
Counter_Speech: Islam is an ideology of peaceful coexistence and coexistence of peoples.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'not welcome'? Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and have our full support.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion, article 9.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western Civilization. How can we tolerate people praising suicide bombing? It's against our values.
Counter_Speech: The Koran does not advocate war. It also does not condone suicide (and suicide bombing is included) or any other violent behaviour.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are not like us. They should leave.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are our brothers and sisters. If you compare your genes with those of a Muslim, you will find out you are sharing 99.9% of them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in our society and are not well behaved. They are not good with children, they are not nice people. They say they want to impose their sharia law, and they don't want to integrate.
Counter_Speech: If Muslims are to be 'proper' members of our society, they have to be a part of our community, have to contribute to our success and have to accept our laws. And they do.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should take into account that Muslims are not so different from other Europeans.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

Hate_Speech: I do not want a migrant to work with my children.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants can be of tremendous help when integrating into society. Maybe we should try to be a bit more open minded.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer in our society.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a cancer.

Hate_Speech: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: What about the thousands of Muslims who have contributed to our country, created jobs, and provided for our families?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a destructive force in the world.
Counter_Speech: The problem is not what people believe, but what they do to each other. Like discrimination. That is the problem.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

Hate_Speech: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
Counter_Speech: So you are saying that people of different religions should not be part of our society? That is just ridiculous. And, religion is not even related to race.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. They are part of the EU and are treated fairly here.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
Counter_Speech: I think it is good to speak out when we disagree. What is the toxic influence? I can't see any.

Hate_Speech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

Hate_Speech: Africans have no right to lecture others on history. They don't even believe in their own past.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Africans are any less proud of their past than people from other countries.

Hate_Speech: Whoever is to blame for the present problems of our nation should answer for their deeds and I would not be surprised to find out that its the blacks that are solely responsible.
Counter_Speech: It seems its easier for our society to be divided by people's skin color than to strive for integration and tolerance?.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
Counter_Speech: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

Hate_Speech: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
Counter_Speech: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

Hate_Speech: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
Counter_Speech: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

Hate_Speech: Our founders were not happy with this thing you call multiculturalism: there should be a reason...
Counter_Speech: People of different faiths, races and nationalities can live side by side, together in harmony.

Hate_Speech: I am not a racist, but many races means many cultures. This leads us to great confusion.
Counter_Speech: Let us not become ethnocentric. Cultural relativists argue that there are many cultures on this planet and they all need our tolerance. Why is yours better?

Hate_Speech: Afro-European?? We in UK are white, this just not makes sense.
Counter_Speech: The racial composition of the population of this country has been changing for a while now, and since then, the percentage of people from other racial groups has risen or fallen. In fact, according to the 2011 statistics, at least 15% of people in the UK are non-white.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a destructive ideology that has hurt so many and caused so much harm to our world.
Counter_Speech: I don't think feminism is a bad idea in itself. That's what people do when they are given the choice to engage in a movement for equality.

Hate_Speech: I don't respect feminists because they don't respect and care for other races.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a racist ideology. Feminism is about full human rights, and respect for women's dignity.

Hate_Speech: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
Counter_Speech: The question is: are you willing to risk a backlash to fight for your moral principles, in favour of exclusion and discrimination?

Hate_Speech: Women are not able to take wise decisions, their behaviour is immoral.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that women are incapable of acting ethically? They have always acted this way, from when they were children.

Hate_Speech: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
Counter_Speech: This idea that a woman should not have rights on her own body is completely wrong, not only to her but also to society as a whole.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
Counter_Speech: You would be surprised how many feminists are very good at convincing people that changing a misogynistic and violent world is not against the interests of men.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are all for equal rights and opportunity. Men's rights are necessary for achieving both.

Hate_Speech: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

Hate_Speech: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies.
Counter_Speech: All societies have had gender inequalities, whether you identify as a male or a female. So why do you think that women are somehow "less than" men?

Hate_Speech: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.

Hate_Speech: All are equal before the law but women exclude themselves from "all". They don't understand they are equal, because they don't want to be treated as equal.
Counter_Speech: The principle of "equality before the law" does not mean that everyone has obtained equal rights. So, it's very logical to demand equality when there are inequalities.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women's supremacy.
Counter_Speech: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
Counter_Speech: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

Hate_Speech: Rape is an intrinsic part of the world, but women do not accept it. This is why we have laws against rape: to stop them from whining. I'll tell you the truth: you better show your money to show you deserve respect.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always a crime. Also, some women are more likely to experience rape in the first place, such as those from lower socio-economic groups, etc. Respect for people can't be measured in money.

Hate_Speech: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
Counter_Speech: Because it is wrong and degrading to violate someone's autonomy for religious reasons.

Hate_Speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect!
Counter_Speech: There is a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics in our society. Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an ideology that can actually prevent many deaths, e.g., homicides of women, domestic violence, if it is fully understood by every last member of the society.

Hate_Speech: Feminists say everything we need is in the female gender. This is false. 'Mankind' requires us 'man' first, even in the word spelling.
Counter_Speech: The problem with discrimination is not in male gender. It is that some think that women are weak and emotional. Those seem to have forgotten that we are all part of 'mankind'.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is all about equality. But this does not mean that they are equal to men. Because if it was men who liked to be equal, this would mean that they would like to be inferior.
Counter_Speech: Women don't like to be "equal" for the sake of superiority. Women like to be women, and to be treaten as humans. All humans are equal. Equality is not identity.

Hate_Speech: This isn't about equality. This is about forcing women to to occupy roles in society for which they are not capabable
Counter_Speech: If we insist on treating people as not equally capable of contributing to society then we are forced to live up to that outdated and unjust system. Instead we should be improving it.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Aren't you referring to Peter Pan syndrome, which is more common amongst men?

Hate_Speech: Women are complaining because they can't get high-paying jobs. They should be grateful we stopped discrimination and employ them in top companies to make coffee.
Counter_Speech: It is still more difficult for women to access the labour market than it is for men. Men still out-earn women on average, by 11% in Europe. Gender discrimination isn't over yet.

Hate_Speech: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
Counter_Speech: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Strange that you would say this, given all the progress the West has made in so many areas, is thanks to women.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Equal rights for women is surely a cornerstone of Western civilisation, rather than its apotheosis?

Hate_Speech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
Counter_Speech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of women complaining about men being a threat to women only to turn a blind eye to women threatening men.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that threat is a problem only when it comes close to you? It is a problem for anybody. Women are standing for their rights as human beings.

Hate_Speech: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children. Their body exist just for this purpose.
Counter_Speech: The message to take from your comments is that you find women's bodies repulsive? How about this: think about the lives and the contributions to society that would be lost if you continued to perpetuate this gender inequality.

Hate_Speech: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
Counter_Speech: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

Hate_Speech: Women have to take care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
Counter_Speech: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: That is a rather extreme view. If a women is not allowed to have a job, then there is gender discrimination at work.

Hate_Speech: Women are capable of nothing and they just need to be protected.
Counter_Speech: Women do not want protection. They are hurt by violence because they are discriminated against. If there was no culture of violence, nobody would need protecting.

Hate_Speech: Domestic violence against women is a culture that is accepted and shared by the women in many cases. Society is not to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: Women are not responsible for violent crimes. The culture that makes people want to be violent towards their partners is not the "culture" of women.

Hate_Speech: I hate feminists, they take all our jobs and shit. We have enough women already.
Counter_Speech: We do not need misogynysts, we already have enough of them.

Hate_Speech: A woman is a bitch and an ass.
Counter_Speech: If a woman is not what you want her to be, then she is not a woman. Is she?

Hate_Speech: Feminism has no place in a civilised society, like Europe.
Counter_Speech: Not all people are "civilised" in Europe. Some are deeply racist and sexist.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are the only few to receive public welfare.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of the world's population gets public welfare if in need.

Hate_Speech: Jews feel superior and they are able to love only other Jews.
Counter_Speech: Love is a state of mutual trust and respect, love is not predestined by religion. Love is possible between people of different faiths.

Hate_Speech: All Jews are criminals.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by individuals who wish to delegitimize and isolate individuals based on their religion. All religions have value and a positive role in society. Judaism is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
Counter_Speech: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

Hate_Speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity, a danger to national security, and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: The world is full of different ways of life, and I find it rather hard to see how diversity in a religion is a hindrance to a thriving society.

Hate_Speech: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing "perverted" about being attracted to people of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: To love someone is entirely natural.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: Life is too short not to love who you like, or to worry about arbitary notions and 'norms' that are no longer relevant to how people live their lives.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it is a crime to be gay? It is a societal disorder to target gays.

Hate_Speech: All gay are psychopaths.
Counter_Speech: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.

Hate_Speech: All gay are paedophiles.
Counter_Speech: Do you consider this statement a true one? I wouldn't go as far as to say that all homophobes are in need of therapy, would you?

Hate_Speech: All gay are paedophiles.
Counter_Speech: I think this statement is hurtful to LGBT+ people. How about you explain it?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are just sissies.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter if they are gay or not. Being gay does not make you less of a man.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not harmful to children. Actually, a growing number of research shows that children raised by same-sex couples are as physically or psychologically healthy, capable, and successful as those raised by opposite-sex couples.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: In civilised countries (including Western countries) homosexuality is legal, and homosexual people have full rights. Gay people must be loved and valued for who they are, like everybody else.

Hate_Speech: We should stop integrating immigrants. It would be a very good thing.
Counter_Speech: How about you stop blaming immigrants and start fixing our broken society?

Hate_Speech: We can't have mestizos in, we can't coexist with millions of immigrants that will destroy our culture.
