Counter_Speech: Even in countries such as Italy, in which migration has been present for centuries and there is a lot of cultural fragmentation, there is still a strong sense of identity and culture, based on solidarity. So, migration is not an issue.

Hate_Speech: We must stop immigration.
Counter_Speech: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Did you know that in a 2017 survey, about 29 million immigrants were working or looking for work in the U.S., making up some 17% of the total civilian labor force? Lawful immigrants made up the majority of the immigrant workforce, at 21.2 million. So this is not true.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
Counter_Speech: The European Union welcomes people from a wide range of backgrounds, including those from different religions. It is up to member states to decide how to address these legitimate differences, but always in full compliance with human rights.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
Counter_Speech: In many respects they have adapted well to our culture, and if some still speak a different language, live in poverty and are under-represented in society it is partly because of our discriminatory attitude.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded, We must fight until we will vanquish immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Victory can be permanent, especially when it comes from within. Let's see if we can achieve a better Europe by vanquishing our irrational fears instead.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Migrants from the countries specified as having a 'very high' rate of immigration into the UK, are often accused of being unwilling to integrate. This is simply not true. If they do not want to integrate and don't like our country, why would they come here in the first place? Are they masochists or what?

Hate_Speech: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
Counter_Speech: If a 'replacement' was real, we'd have immigration levels in surplus for years already.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should be proud patriots of our country.
Counter_Speech: We do not need them to 'be patriots' for us. Instead, we should work on better integration.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is a necessary component of a successful society. Do you really think that the only people that are bringing crime to our country are immigrants?

Hate_Speech: Our immigration policy is turning us into second-rate countries.
Counter_Speech: Are you aware that our immigration policy is about creating new opportunities for British people? Why should we turn our back on that?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have given us a new way of life. They have helped to create new opportunities and improved our lot, and they earned it the hard way.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counter_Speech: The idea that migrants are merely happy-go-lucky people with no code of their own is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are just like us, they have given their lives for our country. It is their right to be happy and to choose for themselves.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have given their lives for our country, they are our fellow citizens, and they deserve to be respected as such.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are all the same: they are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: They are not all terrorists, and the government does not have the right to ban people on the grounds of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.

Hate_Speech: We are surrounded by Muslim invaders, they are just taking over Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslim refugees are not 'overrunning' us. The main problem is that the integration process is too difficult.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded, Islam is taking over Europe.
Counter_Speech: Europe is not being invaded. Refugees are just people trying to find a safe home. And those refugees are not necessarily muslims.

Hate_Speech: All those migrants trying to come in illegally are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: The majority of the migrants who enter the EU are lawful immigrants who have paid our taxes and have contributed greatly to our country.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: You are only creating misunderstanding between two cultures and peoples. You should stop this.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them now!
Counter_Speech: How can you say something like that? Maybe you should check if there is any evidence of rape based on religious background before you make any accusations.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to destroy other religions.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about spreading justice, tolerance, and understanding, not about banning other religions.

Hate_Speech: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
Counter_Speech: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: Since when? there is not such thing as "modern world", but there is 21th century Europe. And Islam is a contributing part of the 21th century Europe.

Hate_Speech: I'm not racist but Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race.
Counter_Speech: If you really cared about the race or religion of other people, you would say the same, right?

Hate_Speech: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
Counter_Speech: To use an old saying, you cannot be 'European' and be a 'racist'.

Hate_Speech: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, but I don't think this thinking can continue.

Hate_Speech: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
Counter_Speech: You are really confusing Islam with national identity.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has been tested and proven to be about peace. There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: People of different faiths have contributed to our society and Muslims are no exception. Do you have any contrary evidence?

Hate_Speech: The West has let Islam take over our countries.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are like the terrorists who attacked us on September 11.

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim, I'd be ashamed of my heritage.
Counter_Speech: Everybody can have a proud and deep-rooted identity. It doesn't have to be a 'non Muslim heritage'.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult: it is a virus of violence spreading like a cancer through our society.
Counter_Speech: Violence has no place in a religion, and in no way should be justified. Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease, a religion spreading like a cancer throughout our societies.
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely right about one thing: Islam is a religion. It has brought a lot of good to a lot of countries. That is why we should help our Muslim brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a virus.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Islam is a disease is just an excuse for people to promote hate against that religion.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Islam is incompatible with Western society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: You seem to have a problem with peaceful people practising their religion peacefully, what do you have to say about it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Is it because of some religious characteristic that is not compatible with Western culture? What is this characteristic?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any peaceful society.
Counter_Speech: Islam does not promote hate against anybody.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's appropriate to suggest a religion is alien to our civilisation as that.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Child molesters are people who have sexually abused children, and they can be from any religion.

Hate_Speech: How can we be sure that all Muslims are nice? They are all mean to women.
Counter_Speech: I have met so many nice Muslim men. How can we be sure that all of them are mean?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Many religions have had profound and positive contributions to our civilisation, and Islam is no exception. What we need instead is to reflect on our own intollerance.

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are just another race of subhumans disguised as a people.
Counter_Speech: I think they are a people too, even if they are different from us in some respects.

Hate_Speech: Feminism will destroy our culture.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a theory and a movement about the oppression and exploitation of women, not an enemy of the state and culture.

Hate_Speech: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.

Hate_Speech: Women should be patronized.
Counter_Speech: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

Hate_Speech: The Women's march was a failure: the whole country came out in opposition.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: the Women's March was a success. The whole country came out in support. Maybe we have seen two different parades.

Hate_Speech: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
Counter_Speech: This is wrong: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble.
Counter_Speech: They have lived in our country for a long time, they are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be bothered about a minority?

Hate_Speech: If I could go back in time and change one thing about my life, it would be to never to have met an Arab.
Counter_Speech: For the record, I don't see how this would be an improvement. On the contrary, it is important not to accept things at face value. That is why we should meet people from different religions and cultures, regardless of their origin.

Hate_Speech: What the hell are you talking about? Arabs are different, they don't even speak English.
Counter_Speech: Although they may not share a language and a common history, we should respect their differences.

Hate_Speech: All Arabs are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is a political ideology, and one that has no place in a modern democratic state, regardless of ethnicity.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: Conspiracy theories are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been run according to a Jewish plan, and therefore it is highly unlikely that this would ever happen.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: Conspiracy theories about Jews are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been or will ever be run according to a Jewish plan.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

Hate_Speech: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

Hate_Speech: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is that Jews are incapable of love because they are like animals. You are wrong, Jews are people. I have never heard about a Jewish fish nor a Rabbi rabbit.

Hate_Speech: We do not accept homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: . A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
Counter_Speech: All the people I know do not consider them that disgusting. If what's disgusting you is love, you won't need to worry about other peoples, just mind about yours.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be ashamed of their existence.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately, you seem to have a problem with shame. But gays don't. Do you really think that projecting your disgust towards other is a good idea?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be ashamed of their existence.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. No one should be told to be ashamed of their life.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand lesbians, they're just a bunch of bitches claiming they are social justice warriors. They are ruining many good things of women.
Counter_Speech: Social justice is just part of a healthy system, I think it is important to remember that. But why do you think they are ruining many good things for women?

Hate_Speech: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
Counter_Speech: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: Even if some people might find it strange to identify as gay, homosexuality is not a disease.

Hate_Speech: We do not accept homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'we'? I don't think we are a nation of heterosexuals.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are not welcome here. The bigger the city, the bigger the "stay away" sign we must hang.
Counter_Speech: I don't know anyone who hates gays, I do know lots of people who are very proudly kind towards the queer community. They are happy with how they treat one another. You are more likely to encounter these open-minded people in places like New York or London.

Hate_Speech: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

Hate_Speech: We should not accept LGBT people, they are harmful to us.
Counter_Speech: Human rights are individual rights, and the right to be loved doesn't include the right to be hated.

Hate_Speech: No one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
Counter_Speech: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.

Hate_Speech: Some salesmen are annoying. They are so gay. Store managers should really revise their HR.
Counter_Speech: In some countries, if you are gay you can be fired from your job, you can lose your home, and you can even be jailed. Gays are not allowed to live their lives. In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

Hate_Speech: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: We welcome people fleeing persecution. We have even taken in refugees from the war in Syria. What's the point in worrying about migrants?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps you should try to get to know some migrants first. Maybe you can understand their problems.

Hate_Speech: We should stop migrants from coming in.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

Hate_Speech: Migrants have no place here. They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money.
Counter_Speech: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have the opportunity to work here. Even if our language is not their native one. They are contributing to our society, for example by doing unpopular jobs.

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: So you're saying that they don't have a right to jobs? Why do you think that?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.
Counter_Speech: There is evidence there is a migration crisis, I agree. But their will to work is one of the main reasons behind the migration. The EU-27 employment rate for people aged 20 to 64 years was 64.4 % for those born outside the EU.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are here to use our money. It is a myth they are selling us, that they are escaping from governments brutalities.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel if the police and government were still oppressing you? You are probably taking your freedom for granted. You are lucky, but you shoud acknowledge this is a privilege. Not everybody has it.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from Afghanistan come here to ruin our economy and the only return they have in mind is their return to their homeland.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should check what survey results say about who would be happy to leave their country. According to a Gallup study of 2019, nearly half of Afghan would like to permanently move to another country.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that the migration crisis is caused by migrants wanting to take advantage of our weaknesses? What would we do if we were in their shoes, if we were to lose our homes? We would probably move "to take advantage of others' weaknesses" as well.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counter_Speech: If they have a job, they will get the pensions. Like anybody. The recent migration of many thousands of people is a sign that they are in need. The problem is rather that some people do not want to work, they want to live off the state support, but those are not necessarily migrants.

Hate_Speech: We cannot support the children of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Children benefit from our society, they are entitled to the best education possible. It's not right to criticise immigrants for trying to give the best possible education to their children.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
Counter_Speech: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?

Hate_Speech: Immigration and culture are in conflict. You cannot claim both can coexist as they are mutually exclusive.
Counter_Speech: The British people have always had a proud and integrated culture, and immigration have been and continues to be a huge part of the British success story.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
Counter_Speech: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
Counter_Speech: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Europeans.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have their own culture and language, they have their own religion, and they have their own identity. Accepting diversity is something we should be proud of, not ashamed of.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Christians.
Counter_Speech: So do you know what each migrant's "identity" is? It is to do with a religion?

Hate_Speech: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
Counter_Speech: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants replace the British people. They are not fit to live here.
Counter_Speech: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

Hate_Speech: All foreign-born are criminals.
Counter_Speech: I'd like to think that we all have a basic human right not to be tarred as criminals without evidence. It is called presumption of innocence, Article 11 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are brought here to replace us. They not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: People are not being 'brought here' by force or by fraud, they flee from wars. And they are being welcomed here by our laws and customs.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
Counter_Speech: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

Hate_Speech: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you'd think that way. I don't see any evidence that immigrants are the core of a problem, to this extent of generalisation.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?

Hate_Speech: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
Counter_Speech: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

Hate_Speech: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it: people in need came to our shores. They are our brothers and sisters. We should be there for them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are only in it to make us explode.
Counter_Speech: Actually, the vast majority of Muslims in the country are here to do jobs that are not performed by other people, or to provide for the needs of their families, or to start new businesses.

Hate_Speech: Muslims just want to kill us all.
Counter_Speech: Fear is not the answer to our problems. I think our problems would be much easier solved if we all got along.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: In many Western societies there are Muslim, and these societies are in many ways more democratic than religiously homogeneous ones. Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements, which have greatly aided our world. For instance, algorithms.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Violence is never justified in Islam, especially not in the case of Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. Even if some Muslims do not follow the peaceful teachings of Islam, that doesn't mean that the majority of the global Muslim community aren't following those teachings.

Hate_Speech: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
Counter_Speech: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and peace is about living in harmony with other people's beliefs and practices, not imposing your beliefs on anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Being banned from a continent for having different beliefs is the same thing as being banned from your town for not cheering the favorite football club of the mayor.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a mortal enemy of humanity.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about spreading charity, not killing people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the worst religion of all. It promotes intolerance and violence.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about believing in god, not about hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with any modern state.
Counter_Speech: Islam like any other religion, is not incompatible with a modern state.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent people. They have always been that way, they just haven't learned the hard way.
Counter_Speech: Violence is never a justified response to an unjustified act. Violence is not the answer. If some extremists are using violence, it does not mean that all Muslims are violent.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with the notion of a modern European.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Islam is the worst ideology ever created .. Its teachings have caused great harm and destruction throughout the world.
Counter_Speech: Do you understand the seriousness of what you are saying? The religion of Islam has also been an enabler of some of the advances of civilisation.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same about any other religion? There are many different religions, each should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
Counter_Speech: If Christianity is about love, respect for other people and standing for what is right, and Islam is about love, respect and standing for what is right as well, then there is not much room left for this kind of reasoning.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern nation.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have coexisted with us for hundreds of years, we have no problem with Muslims living here. Why do you claim so?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
Counter_Speech: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims live in Western societies just fine. Do you have any facts or data that prove otherwise?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims live in Western societies. They are our fellow citizens.

Hate_Speech: Those who are to blame are the ones who want to let Muslims in Britain.
Counter_Speech: The solution to Islamophobia is to stop Islamophobia. It is not to ban Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: We allow people from all backgrounds to vote. Why shouldn't we let them vote? What's the point of democracy then?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: I think we should try to understand different cultures, rather than trying to ban one group of people from our country. On which grounds do you say so?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, and should be excluded.
Counter_Speech: Your point is based on a complete misunderstanding of what the word 'compatibility' actually means. Compatibility is about living side by side even if we are not sharing values and beliefs, not about merging them.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslim have any incompatibility with Western society. Instead, they are a part of Western society since the beginning.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.
Counter_Speech: The European Union is a much broader concept. It encompasses a huge range of people, including Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and a religion has rules, and is compatible with science, nature and the basic laws of nature. Can you prove your claim?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Even if no one is asking Muslims to pay for our society, they contribute to it through work and also through charity.

Hate_Speech: Muslim representatives in the House of Lords are there for a reason. It is the first step towards Islamic conquer of our nation.
Counter_Speech: It is true that there are Muslim representatives in the UK House of Lords, but that does not mean that the UK is becoming more or less Muslim.

Hate_Speech: Muslim men are rapists because Islam is a complete and total fascist ideology that promotes violent extremism and suggests that women are subhuman, as it is written in the Quran.
Counter_Speech: Muslim Feminists and other Muslim women's rights supporters don't agree with this. Fatema Mernissi says "If women's rights are a problem for some modern Muslim men, it is neither because of the Quran nor the Prophet (...)". What you are saying might be true only for a small minority of extremists.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop accepting Muslims and start welcoming us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims already have a very high tolerance level. We just need to learn to live with them, and there is evidence that this is possible. This is how we can start welcoming us, as humankind.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: It is important to understand that the term 'death cult' has nothing to do with Islamic beliefs. The term 'death cult' is often used to describe groups which promote a particular extremisation of religion, or promote violent or misogynistic ideas. In this case, the term 'death cult' is being used to label a religious movement, and is, in itself as an extremist tactic

Hate_Speech: It's OK to be racist against Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is OK to be racist against someone based on their religion? I am confused. There are white and black Muslims, like there are white and black Christians.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: One could make the case that Europe is 'civilised' precisely because of historical contacts with Islam and the tranfers of knowledge that occured as a direct result of those contacts.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, it is important that people feel at home here. How would you feel if the government banned your religion today?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Why shouldn't they? They are just people, who have always lived here, contributing in many ways to our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just infidels hiding behind the veil to do their dirty work.
Counter_Speech: So you think that all Muslims are Mujahideen hiding behind the veil?

Hate_Speech: I am tired of Muslims wanting to dominate other cultures. They should go back to the Stone Age.
Counter_Speech: For all we know, the Stone Age was occupied by people from all around the world. No traces of Christianity, nor of Islam. Who knows what would happen in your scenario? Maybe we should give you benefit of the doubt and challenge all of us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
Counter_Speech: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy, they are only threatening the very existence of the country.
Counter_Speech: There is no bad in Muslims wanting to live in the country. The main task of a democracy is to "represent all its citizens", which includes preserving the integrity of the country in its plurality.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not promote hate against any religion or belief system. Instead it is praised for how it can be a source of inspiration and strength to overcome challenges.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is a criminal ideology that promotes intolerance, violence and chaos.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about acceptance, not a death cult. In your opinion, what makes it criminal?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they should leave.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, it has always been about people coming together to build a better life for themselves. We are proud of who we are, and we are proud of Islam.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a problem in my opinion, they should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: We are giving a chance to people who are willing to improve their lives and work in our country. Why do you think they are a problem to us?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Haven't they contributed a lot to our society, especially in the areas of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Europeans have always had a lot of Muslim friends and relatives. They have helped make our continent what it is.

Hate_Speech: Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
Counter_Speech: Of course, Islam is a religion of our countries. But so are Christianity, Buddhism, and Hinduism, and so on. In Europe, Muslim are less than the 6% of the population. Very far from being a majority. Why do you say they are enemies?

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is always a risk. The exact definition of a terrorist is up to the authorities to define, and there is no deterministic way to identify terrorists based on their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims accept their religion only. I would not want my son, or daughter, or granddaughter to grow up in a country where their religion is not tolerated. Ban Islam.
Counter_Speech: I do not think that banning a religion is a protection for your own religion. If your fear concerns intolerance, why are you intolerant in the first place?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is full of hate and violence.
Counter_Speech: The Quran and Hadith are full of positive messages against hate, violence and discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
Counter_Speech: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society. Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: Muslim have no place in a modern state. They should deny their faith, if they really wanted to live here.
Counter_Speech: Let's be honest, who wants to live in a country where the government is allowed to impose their religion on others?

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to replace us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims do not want to replace other people. What's making you thinking that?

Hate_Speech: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

Hate_Speech: We are being overrun by Muslims. We need to build a wall around our country and keep them out.
Counter_Speech: What you say is just fearful thinking, but certainly does not reflect the reality. Statistics show that Muslims are just a minority in the population.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. Those accepting them here are losing their civilisation status.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure about your religion, but I think that having a Muslim as your neighbour is a 'civilised' action.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.
Counter_Speech: What exactly do you mean by a 'cancer'? Should we be concerned about a disease spreading because of its individual members? There is no relation between religion and cancer.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, and Muslims are not a 'bundle of child molesters'. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Some have suggested a 'scorched earth' policy towards those who do not adhere to our faith or values. But I would argue that this just feeds the poisonous climate of hatred.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape women, there are so many examplesin UK media.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should give some thought to the question "Why does the media report Muslim rapist only?" The statistics paint a very different picture.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
Counter_Speech: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
Counter_Speech: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: There is a war going on and it is perpetrated by the Muslim community. All Muslims are hostile.
Counter_Speech: The media are helping to create the perception that all Muslims are hostile. If your prejudice is against Muslims, on the same ground you can also be against anyone else.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible. Many of them are very good at what they do. Have you ever heard about Dalia Mogahed? Her works on Muslim communities might interest you.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.
Counter_Speech: I do not see how you can speak of Islam as an ideology, an opinion, or a way of life. Are you sure about the Bible?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.
Counter_Speech: You can't say that a religion is an ideology, an opinion, or a degenerated interpretation of something. What would you think if somebody said so about your religion?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, the Quran is a book of religious guidance and does not promote discrimination. Can you point out your reference?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is founded on hate and violence.
Counter_Speech: I don't think they are all that hateful. This is what Islam teaches: peace and harmony. Peace is not an attitude. It is something that must be actively put in practice. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. This sounds like a very peaceful bedrock.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a bunch of hypocrites who think they are superior to us. They don't know what progress is about.
Counter_Speech: You cannot be 'progressive' by rejecting people of a certain religion. What is progress about, to you? Your claim sounds based on the moral superiority.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not teach these things. In one Hadith, Al-Tirmidhi wrote that the Prophet said that "No Arab is superior to a non-Arab".

Hate_Speech: I don't like Muslims because they are different.
Counter_Speech: Don't you like flowers, because they are different? Isn't variety the spice of life?

Hate_Speech: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

Hate_Speech: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
Counter_Speech: The doctrine of Islam is a religion, not a bad one. What's the reason you think this?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should try to understand the religions of the world more closely. Plus, Western societies core values are based on human rights, and the freedom of religion is amongst those.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion. It is not a problem for any civilised society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists, they should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: What about banning people from the European Convention of Human Rights? Or the UN Human Rights Council? Or the World Health Organisation? Any country would possibly be 'compromised' by banning people based on religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to do with our country. They have nothing to do with our history.
Counter_Speech: The Muslims have been part of this country from its beginning. They have helped to build our cities and towns. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our true friends.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Could you provide a source for this claim?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we do not want them.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up a very important part of our country and its people. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future. They are our future Britain.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a virus, incapable of cure
Counter_Speech: No doubt you've met some Muslims in your life. It seems you didn't catch anything?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society. They have always contributed to our success. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Only a tiny minority of individuals are capable of carrying out acts of terrorism. Muslims are generally peaceful and friendly just like anyone else

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and friendly. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism? No one has ever claimed that all Muslims are prone to terrorism. Would you say the same about a large percentage of Greeks, for example?

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Any attempt to ban, isolate, or criminalise a Muslim person is an act of terror.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British.
Counter_Speech: You have to remember that Muslims are the second largest religious group in the UK. They are the second most popular religion. How can they be 'not welcome'?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a misogynistic cult.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and all religions are about love, not hate.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims should be deported.
Counter_Speech: People from a minority group should not be persecuted for their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not like other people. They don't have a soul. They are different from us in that they don't have a conscience and are unable to reason for themselves.
Counter_Speech: Just because a religious belief has been historically used to oppress those believers, does not make it opportune to continue doing so.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists, waging war against humanity and spreading death and destruction.
Counter_Speech: Not all terrorists are Muslims, that is an empirical fact, and your claim is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I find it hard to see why a group of people is incompatible with the rest of the society.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a problem all around the world. They're not like us.
Counter_Speech: What is the problem you are talking about? Why do you think they are a problem all around the world?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a problem all around the world because they are different from us. They are not fit to be with us.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence for the claim that Muslims are a problem all around the world. What evidence do you have that Muslims are different from us in some way?

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape our girls.
Counter_Speech: The media are full of the rumours of rape and abuse committed by Muslim. The problem is not about Islam. It is about violence.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam's core values are similar to Western values. To say that Islam is ruining Western culture is a complete and total distortion of the truth.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, and not about violence and conquest.

Hate_Speech: Islam is about promoting death by stoning for blasphemy.
Counter_Speech: Do you think the Quran actually recommends killing other people on the basis of the religion they follow? Could you point out your reference?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: I would like to live in a country where people of different religions are free to practise their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Even if a person practices a religion you do not approve of, you cannot expect him or her to be more likely to commit a crime.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what you are trying to say by incompatible. What do you mean by incompatible?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: We know from the news about few Muslims who are violent people. Instead I know a lot of Muslims who are good people, who work hard and pay taxes to help their families.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: You can't be serious! We are in the heart of Europe, and we have had Muslim people since time immemorial. How can you say that Islam is incompatible with civilised polity?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer on the European race.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say this about a religion? Where is the evidence for what you say?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been living here since our inception, and we are proud of that. Why would they be a burden to us?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer on our race.
Counter_Speech: They are just as much our brothers as anyone else. They are our cousins, our neighbours, and we should welcome them, regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They do not want our country.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should meet one of them, but you would be disappointed to find them so similar to us and unimpressed by your wishes. It's very sad that discrimination is so mainstream.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cult. It has no place in 21st century societies.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by Islam is a cult? Do you have any proof for this statement?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a problem in general, or in the UK specifically, and there is no evidence that Muslims are less able to coexist peacefully than non-Muslims.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop Muslims coming here, they are not like us and we do not want them.
Counter_Speech: You cannot stop Muslims. It would have to be a state policy, but thank goodness it is very unlikely to have a ban based on religion in a democratic country.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are not wanted here.
Counter_Speech: It is about time people began to think critically about policies that seem designed to include a minority, rather than to create new social and political opportunities exclusively for the majority.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure where this statement comes from, but unfortunately I have heard it many times.

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
Counter_Speech: Let's be realistic: how would you feel about being verbally harassed by a Muslim in public? Harassment is never a good idea. Acceptance is.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a problem in Europe. They are ruining our beautiful continent.
Counter_Speech: Europe is the greatest diverse Union that has ever existed. There are no examples of it being 'ruined' by people that are different from others. Rather, that is Europe's strength.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'potential terrorist'?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Religion is a matter of individual beliefs, not a life or death cult, most people of all faiths do not subscribe to death.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any statistics on that?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a degenerate, anti-human, anti-western ideology.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that all Muslims are anti-western. Many Muslims are peaceful and understanding.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Since they are neither a burden nor a threat, how can you say they don't have a place in Europe?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, as long as they observe the law and are respectful of other people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead cult.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about, Islam is a living religion and is never celebrating death.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead cult.
Counter_Speech: People have different faiths, and that's what makes them different from one another. Why should we misinterpret a 'death cult' from a religion?

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: The world has changed a lot in the last hundred years, and with it the people and religions. No one is talking about conquering anymore. Islam is no exception in this.

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept thate Muslims are compatible with our way of life.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation and way of life. They are part of our community and we should be grateful for the many contributions they make to our society.

Hate_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are unemployed.
Counter_Speech: Where are the 'thousands' of Muslims that are unemployed in the country? Can you prove it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of oppression and intolerance.

Hate_Speech: Allahu Akbar, this means Death to all! And if there is one thing we don't really need it's more Muslims in the UK.
Counter_Speech: You're just misinterpreting the meaning of these words, please look it up. The UK does not need terrorists, but Muslims aren't terrorists, though.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Religion of Terror, promoting murder and rape.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a religion of terror. I wouldn't say that about Christianity either.

Hate_Speech: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: Being fat is not a crime, but targeting them is.

Hate_Speech: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
Counter_Speech: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.

Hate_Speech: Black people are not human, they are nothing but trouble to this country.
Counter_Speech: This is an accusation that is often levelled at people of any race or religion, regardless of their alleged inferiority. It is time to stop accusing people of colour of being less human just for being different.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
Counter_Speech: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, with human rights. If a woman does not want to be dominated by a man, then what is the point of talking about equality?

Hate_Speech: Women are weak, they should learn to bear children and be submissive to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are more likely to be victims of violence, abuse and neglect. Therefore, it is better for them to learn to show that they are strong and able to take responsibility for their lives.

Hate_Speech: A woman's place is with the husband her family found for her.
Counter_Speech: Women have the right to choose their own husbands. This is their choice, and the right of every human being.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should consider that not all women are childlike, and that some women are 'childlike' with children!

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: It is not exclusively a woman's role to be the homemaker. What about men? If a man doesn't want to be a homemaker, is he a bitch?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counter_Speech: Women have the right to choose their own partner, job, representatives and so on. They are much more similar to men than to children, don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.
Counter_Speech: This is just a lie: some media deliberately spreads this nonsense slut-shaming, with the result of only inciting hatred against the women who are raped.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, they are just a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: Women are allowed to vote, why should the government discriminate against them?

Hate_Speech: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him.
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights and are equal before the law, especially in the eyes of the constitution.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Women are oppressed in many societies, I wish our society was different.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: This statement just makes no sense

Hate_Speech: All women are sick.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
Counter_Speech: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

Hate_Speech: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
Counter_Speech: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

Hate_Speech: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.
Counter_Speech: I think the Arab community is more than capable of coming together and creating a more just and peaceful world.

Hate_Speech: Jews are our enemies.
Counter_Speech: I think this is a good example of unmotivated hatred and I think it's appropriate in this case that you give a reason for why you're saying that.

Hate_Speech: Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this idea is true: since the 9/11 attacks were committed by al Qaeda extremists it doesn't seem fair to blame Jews.

Hate_Speech: Jews should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: They are entitled to vote, I just don't think it is your place to tell them what to do with their citizenship.

Hate_Speech: The Jews invented Ebola.
Counter_Speech: Why would the Jews have invented Ebola? Can you point out your sources on that?

Hate_Speech: Every Jew is a potential terrorist
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Jews are good people, I don't see your point.

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: Comparing the scale of the horrible destruction and genocide inflicted by Nazism, with a group of people solely because of their religious beliefs is unacceptable and illogical.

Hate_Speech: We would be better off without Jews who want to rule the world like in the Bible.
Counter_Speech: The world is better off without antisemitism, racism, sexism, ableism and intolerance. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: This is not about discrimination, this is about death to the Jews!
Counter_Speech: You shouldn't be calling for the death of someone who hasn't done anything wrong. Just because a person is Jewish, they shouldn't die.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who have perverted ideas of what it means to be a man.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to their own way of life, but to promote homophobia is an attack on the basic human rights of LGBTI people.

Hate_Speech: The only reason gays don't get treated like they should is because they're a minority, but they'd be better off in jail.
Counter_Speech: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?

Hate_Speech: We have to stop homosexuals, they're all rapers.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth which was created by anti-gay activists to demonise LGBTI people. To equate LGBTI people with paedophiles is just dangerous propaganda.

Hate_Speech: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.

Hate_Speech: I don't like all these gays, they are just a bunch of sick people who should go to a mental hospital.
Counter_Speech: Although there are people who are attracted to people of their own sex, this is not a characteristic shared by everyone, and it is not a characteristic you should be trying to "cure".

Hate_Speech: Gays must be reclassified as insane, they are not welcome here, they should be locked up.
Counter_Speech: We are free to choose whether to live in peace with others, or to make them hide in their houses, persecuted for who they are. Which would you prefer for yourself?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts exploiting children.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any evidence that homosexuality is related to child exploitation? Do you think it is ok to say that without reliable sources?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts abusing children.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth propagated by the anti-gay lobby. You should really check your facts.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Health is not a matter related to sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. This myth started out as a form of discrimination based on sexual orientation and has since morphed into a weapon of hate, directed at the LGBT+ community.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
Counter_Speech: What is wrong with being gay for you? I don't think it is wrong to love someone of your same sex.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a perversion, it is a form of love. How can you say that?

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals. They are unfit to be in a free society.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti gay' movement. They are trying to create a climate of fear by using this unjustified arguments, but it is not helping to build a more just society.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals should not be allowed to live.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their life as they think is best for them.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: That is a very far-fetched idea. Why should we? It would be unjust. What you're advocating is just to criminalise love.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their lives, not criminalised for who they are.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't judge someone by their sexual preference, that is a personal preference and can't be changed.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not sick, they just need to be accepted for who they are.

Hate_Speech: I bet gays are ashamed of the horrible things they do in private.
Counter_Speech: In our societies, people are no longer afraid to openly talk about gay or lesbian love. Gay people are not ashamed to be gay, they just want to be accepted.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual preference.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: In reality, you have a legal right to vote since you are a citizen. If you aren't, then you don't have the right to vote. It isn't about your sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: The health of any individual is a matter for health professionals, and has nothing to do with one's sexual orientation. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Your statement implies that all gays are diseased. Do you have any statistics on that?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: The medical community agrees that homosexuality is not a disease. Maybe you should check the facts.

Hate_Speech: We must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: Child abuse is something that should never be tolerated, but homosexuality has nothing to do with that. Maybe you should try to check your sources.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a danger to children. They are just filthy pedophiles.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not pedophiles. We mustn't allow anti-gay prejudice to cloud our judgement or our viiew of reality.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: That is a stereotype, and I don't think it would be accurate in the case of any sexual orientation. Why do you say that?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: I would be interested to talk to you about sexuality, and how you think someone's orientation is related to an addiction.

Hate_Speech: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.
Counter_Speech: Your claim about homosexuals is not supported by evidence, where are you getting the imformation that supports these nonsensical assertions.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The gender of the person that someone loves does not mean that they are less deserving of respect than any other person.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Just because they are attracted to people of the same sex, does not mean that they are 'a burden to society'. What's the connection?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a burden to society and must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Does it matter what the sexual orientation of a person is? Do we really need to prevent people from living their own love story?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, and they are ruining our economy.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this is true, in fact it is the opposite. Many refugees are contributing to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
Counter_Speech: Migrants are humans, and are entitled to the same rights as others, such as to ask for hospitality.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
Counter_Speech: Even if they are not citizens, they have the same rights as any other person.

Hate_Speech: We cannot be associated with people who are unwilling to integrate.
Counter_Speech: Some migrants have been extremely successful in integrating, so I don't see your point.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow people from different cultures to coexist in our country.
Counter_Speech: This can lead to an increase in anti-social behaviour, discrimination, and violence. Do you really want that?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
Counter_Speech: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.

Hate_Speech: Migrants: you are a burden. If you love our country, you should leave it.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not a burden to our country. Migrants have been proven to be contributing members of society.

Hate_Speech: We have become a nation of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that we are a 'nation of immigrants'? Do you have any statistics on that?

Hate_Speech: We need to purge foreigners from our countries.
Counter_Speech: This is unnecessary and we do not need such fear-mongering.

Hate_Speech: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
Counter_Speech: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: A lot of migrants have worked hard for the improvement of our society. To say that they steal our jobs is absurd.

Hate_Speech: We have become so arrogant, we allow people from other cultures to coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: To allow other cultures to coexist is a good thing, why should we stop people from getting to know each other?

Hate_Speech: We should ban all migrants.
Counter_Speech: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: There are thousands of British people who are happy to have a neighbour coming from another country.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are invading our culture.
Counter_Speech: You don't seem to have any evidence for the 'invasion' you are talking about. Wouldn't it be better to spread the word about the importance of respecting the culture of other people?

Hate_Speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
Counter_Speech: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: How can you say such a thing about a group that is a part of our country?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they're not able to work legally.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants may be able to work legally, provided that they are given the opportunity to do so.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they're leaving on our welfare.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have worked legally for many years, and this enables them to access some of the most basic services.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: The right to work is a fundamental human right, and not granting this right to immigrants would mean to revoke a fundamental right enshrined in the US constitution.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: Employment rights are fundamental, they guarantee a quality of life in society. For example, the right to a job, the right to housing, the right to an adequate health care.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: Work is an integral part of an individual's contribution to society. A lack of work has a detrimental impact on the whole of it

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.
Counter_Speech: What do you think will happen if we end migration? Lets stop avoiding the real issues and solve the unemployment crisis.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are mainly criminals.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that migrants commit more crimes than natives. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counter_Speech: The US was founded by immigrants, and in 2018 only the 13.7% of the US population was made up of immigrants, the rest being native born.

Hate_Speech: The Muslim immigrants only wants to destroy our country and take our place here. They must be deported.
Counter_Speech: Muslims who live here have at heart our country. I do not see any need to divide people who are fighting for the same cause.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society, both financially and socially. Why shouldn't they be welcome?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: We are a country that is inclusive of immigrants. Why shouldn't they come to our country?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Atheists, agnostics, and humans of any other faith are compatible with our culture, and I applaud them for their diversity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why should we ban people from a religion?

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of Muslims in the West. They are incompatible with our way of life.
Counter_Speech: This is a comment against all muslims: they are part of our society and should have the right to live here.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
Counter_Speech: If you really cared about religion, you would see that the vast majority of Muslims are happy and integrated in our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Most Muslims are happy to live in our country, even if it can happen that we are not their first choice as a mate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The religion of millions of people is not simply "incompatible with Western culture".

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of tolerance.Most Muslims have embraced our way of life, and contributed to our country's success.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: The Koran is a book that says to love your neighbor as yourself. It is also a book that encourages love between people of different faiths and non-faiths.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that all Muslims are terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron: it talks about respect but it really is about taking over the world.
