Counter_Speech: I don't think so. Islam is a pretty peaceful religion and is still around as such.

Hate_Speech: If Islam is about peace, then why it has killed many peaceful people?
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are not violent people. Who are you talking about then?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: It is dangerous to generalize on one religion. Islam is about peace. It is about spreading that peace. Not promoting violence.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by Muslims. They are taking over our countries.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Islam is "invading" us. Muslims do not represent an attack to us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counter_Speech: It is difficult to find a worse opinion of Islam. I'm sorry to say that your words are very severe and don't correspond to reality.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, that should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion and a part of our heritage. You cannot ban the religion which so many people believe in.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death Cult, it is a Ponzi Scheme and every Muslim should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about belief, not a scheme to make millions of pounds from Muslims.

Hate_Speech: All Muslim criminals should be deported: they are all terrorists!
Counter_Speech: Who decides who to deport? Do you? I think there are laws on that already.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are incompatible with a peaceful way of life.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. To suggest that all Muslims are incompatible with that is a complete distortion of what the religion is about.

Hate_Speech: I hate Muslims, they are just a bunch of sexual molesters.
Counter_Speech: The Koran does not condone sexual molester behavior, and if the Koran were to be read, it is clear that it was intended as a guide for its believers.

Hate_Speech: Muslims in the UK are a burden on society, they are mostly poor and have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: A 'burden' is one who poses a problem to the majority. With regard to Muslims, this is simly not the case.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
Counter_Speech: To be perfectly honest, the British public is rather diverse, so I don't think your reasoning makes any sense.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Although there is a link between terrorism and a number of religious and ethnic groups, this is not evidence that a group is more prone to terrorism than any other.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
Counter_Speech: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'civilised Europe'? Why don't you talk to the people who actually live in it and prove to yourself that what you're saying isn't true.

Hate_Speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest and violence.
Counter_Speech: The Qur'an does not advocate or condone the use of violence against others. Instead, it is a peaceful belief just as other religions are.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Since when has Islam not contributed anything to our society? I would like to check your sources.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Since when has Islam not contributed anything to our society? Aren't you aware of the financial contributions that Muslims have made to our society with their work?

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Rape and torture of women and children is forbidden by the Qur'an.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: What are you going to do about Muslims invading us? We are already too small. They will overcome us.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be worried about the Islamization of our country. I think it would be better to build a stronger nation by encouraging the integration of the different communities, than to promote fear against them.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
Counter_Speech: Citizenship is granted by the state. Migrants are simply asking for acceptance, empathy, undertanding and an opportunity to work to earn that citizenship.

Hate_Speech: Muslims: you are a menace. If you love our country, you should leave it.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims have helped building our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people, and contributing members of our society.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all Muslims, this is a necessary step towards establishing a White homeland. Muslims are violent and incompatible with our culture.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence. And for that matter, there is no evidence that Islam is incompatible with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Why would they be 'incompatible'? You may find this offensive, but I find it very worrying that people are closing their countries to strangers based on their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. We welcome them, but it is a duty, not our will.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome to live and work in the UK, and many of them have done just that. This unfounded fear doesn't have to be at the expense of those 'different' from us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a stupid religion, and it should be banned forever in the world.
Counter_Speech: We should be careful about telling people what to think, or what they can believe.

Hate_Speech: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death cult.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. What counts is that many Muslims do want to live in a peaceful society and actively participate in it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is opposed to the very concept of humanity and I would like to see all its worshippers' heads on a platter.
Counter_Speech: This is a really personal view and I would not wish harm on anyone.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden on English society.
Counter_Speech: There is a problem with Islam and English society, but it is not about Islam, it is about the unjustified fear and hate towards other religions.

Hate_Speech: We must stop Islam and replace it with a new religion.
Counter_Speech: You can't stop a religion, you can only try to understand and live with Muslims and others who share their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: It is a religion, and people are free not to share Islam's beliefs. All we are asked is to respect them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism are the same. Islam is a violent religion, and the Quran is a violent book.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what you mean by the Quran and its teachings being violent. Have you ever read it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a violent one. Why do you say that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by "civilised Europe"? Don't you think civilisation involves inclusion and respect for others?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology and platform for the promotion of hatred, intolerance and violence.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims worldwide do not share your intolerance. Words can also be very violent.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology, we should persecute Muslim people.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion. Do you actually think that it is safe to live in a country where people are persecuted for what they believe in?

Hate_Speech: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
Counter_Speech: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not worthy of our love.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not unworthy of our love, they deserve respect as all human beings do.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The West is full of cultures and religions, and there is no reason to restrict the right of people to choose which ones they want to belong to.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims who are good people, and there are many child molesters in the Western world who are not Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you would say this, they have been part of our society for many years and are very important to us.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
Counter_Speech: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have always been part of Europe. They have the same culture, language and identity as us. They are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.
Counter_Speech: The majority of Muslims are not invaders, but instead are contributing to our country by working hard to integrate.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that all Muslims are incompatible with Western societies. Many seem to contribute to our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are spreading their violence too widely.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a 'problem'. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and cannot be our friend.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have different customs and beliefs but this doesn't make it impossible for them to be welcome.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern European country.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed so much to our country that their right to stay here should be recognised

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims living in the UK, proud British citizens who contribute significantly to our country.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and doesn't deserve our respect.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and has always been about respect.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is about killing infidels.
Counter_Speech: The Koran is very clear about peace. It is not about killing infidels.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes unity. It is about love, not death.

Hate_Speech: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a complete and total fraud. The world would be a better place without it.
Counter_Speech: I think it would be a shame to abandon certain cultures and religions for the sake of a few here and there. Islam, like any other religion, has value.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims live in our country, do we have to allow them being the suicide bombs they are?
Counter_Speech: You are repeating the same myths that have been used to justify anti-Muslim prejudice for decades. We must start by talking honestly about the root causes of these problems.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a cancer. If you are worried about Islam spreading, you should stop worrying because it won't cause any harm to you.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society, and they have contributed a lot to our country. They have created jobs and wealth for the UK.

Hate_Speech: There is no such thing as Islam. It is a filthy, perverted, disgusting and violent religion, full stop.
Counter_Speech: I believe that there are certain similarities between Islam and some other religions. The one that matters is that they should all be respected.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counter_Speech: We should be concerned about coexisting with all religions including Islam in the West, it is also our contribution and integration strategies that can improve that.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
Counter_Speech: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Why do so many people welcome Muslims? They are different from us and they represent a threat.
Counter_Speech: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion, it is a political ideology and a mechanism for the establishment of a Muslim caliphate.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, it is not a political ideology, and a lack of understanding about it will not change that. It will just enhance the hate against it.

Hate_Speech: I am not a racist, I just think Islam is an degenerate religion that has lost its way.
Counter_Speech: Have you read the Koran? How about the Hadith? No clue? Well then, please, ask the Muslims about it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed greatly to our culture, so it seems to me that they do have a place here.

Hate_Speech: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
Counter_Speech: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: This is a distortion of what the religion actually stands for: to love one's neighbor as oneself.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and a threat to all Western countries.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims around the world are peaceful people, and do not pose a threat to the security of the West.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture. Muslims should all be expelled.
Counter_Speech: The West has been a great supporter of freedom and democracy. Would you rather live under the fear of your beliefs or in a real democracy?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture: it is a cult of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: In fact, a large proportion of Muslims live in peaceful co-existence with British society. The alleged association between Islam and terrorism is groundless.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country. They are our brothers and sisters. How exactly are they 'incompatible'?

Hate_Speech: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counter_Speech: Terrorist is a term that has been used in a wide variety of contexts and different people use it in different ways. In fact, the term can be used to describe those who share a hateful and violent political ideology, regardeless of which faith they may claim justifies their atrocity/

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It promotes cooperation and understanding between people. Why shouldn't Muslims be welcome here?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: The values of the EU aren't very different to those of a Muslim. How can you say that Muslims can't be part of the European community?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not incompatible with the European society. Why would it be like that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
Counter_Speech: I don't think Muslims should be excluded. The increased diversity of our country has promoted greater social integration and contributed to a sense of belonging within communities.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of love, tolerance and respect. It has nothing to do with child abuse.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with human dignity and should be relegated to the back of the queue for removal from the constitution.
Counter_Speech: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are often characterized as 'compromised' with Western culture, since a group of people feel unnecessarily threatened. If you really cared about Western culture, you would be asking for Muslims to be respected in their rights.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the world are peaceful. Do you have any facts suppporting your argument?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer on our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. I don't see how it could be seen as a 'cancer', how can you?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mainly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are not interested in building bridges to overcome the current problems and have nothing to do with our future.
Counter_Speech: We need to build bridges of understanding, not of hatred. Your words don't seem to be very cooperative of that.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: All countries have the right to have different religious communities in their midst.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe and deserve no legal protection.
Counter_Speech: All people are equal before the law, regardless of their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: A person is a person regardless of their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims live in many countries all over the world, and they are part of the fabric of the societies they live in. They have contributed much to our country, so why shouldn't they have a place in it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion, it is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and understanding.

Hate_Speech: Islamic woman are beneath contempt and ridicule.
Counter_Speech: Even if they are from a different culture, they are not inferior to us.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are animals. That is why they are not human.
Counter_Speech: They are sentient beings with feelings, like you are, although perhaps with more developed empathy that you display?

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
Counter_Speech: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs.
Counter_Speech: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

Hate_Speech: Black people are inherently violent.
Counter_Speech: Violence is a problem in all societies, and in particular in societies that are predominately populated with racism. Don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Black people don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: The presence of a brain is not determined by skin colour. The fact that some people are born darker-skinned doesn't mean they aren't intelligent, rational human beings.

Hate_Speech: Blacks have zero respect for others.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.

Hate_Speech: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.
Counter_Speech: A woman should not have to choose who to be ruled by. She should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women must be subservient to men. They should serve to please men. This is their rightful place in life.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with dignity. They should have the opportunity to live up to this dignity.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. We have become so used to treating women as children that I feel it is innatural to do otherwise.
Counter_Speech: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
Counter_Speech: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

Hate_Speech: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
Counter_Speech: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not hostile to men. On the contrary, feminism is an attack on unequal power structures.

Hate_Speech: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
Counter_Speech: Women have always been involved in the economy and have contributed to society as a whole. I don't see this as a 'slave' behavior.

Hate_Speech: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
Counter_Speech: The word 'slave' has nothing to do with what you think it does. Slavery was an institution created to oppress people of different races and religions, and is now banned in Europe. To suggest that it should exist because of a minority of men is an act of disrespect of human rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals. Perhaps we should have a closer look at the reasons why some women are harmed by the violence they endure every day.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, born that way.
Counter_Speech: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are human beings, with human rights. They are fighting for these rights all around the world. To think that you can change their minds suggests your misunderstanding of the importance of this fight.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a hate movement that is poisoning our minds.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement towards equality, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

Hate_Speech: Feminism does not have any scientific basis, it should be rejected.
Counter_Speech: Feminism doesn't need to have scientific basis: its principles are basic human rights, and it is important that we understand them to live in a more inclusive world.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
Counter_Speech: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: I've never heard of a woman being a 'bitch' for wanting a stable income. I think you are confusing the meaning of these words.

Hate_Speech: Asians are lazy, unintelligent and unpleasant people.
Counter_Speech: This is not in any way an accurate description of a whole population.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
Counter_Speech: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: Why don't you accept others as they are? I think that would be the best thing to do.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are mistakes and should not have access to public services.
Counter_Speech: Only the government should decide which people will have access to public services and which will not. It is up to the individuals whether or not to accept health professionals treating them.

Hate_Speech: Disabled folks are lazy and they do not want to work, so why do we help them?
Counter_Speech: Because people with disabilities can work, if they are given the opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
Counter_Speech: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

Hate_Speech: Folks with down syndrome are inferior
Counter_Speech: People with Down Syndrome are not inferior to anyone else. Our genetic condition isn't something to be ashamed of, maybe we should be less judgemental about others.

Hate_Speech: Downs syndrome is a curse. People with it are not fit to be alive. They should be all killed by the government.
Counter_Speech: Every individual has the right to be alive, and to choose their own doctor and treatment plan.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks should die.
Counter_Speech: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks don't deserve to live.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it is time to stop focusing on killing people with mental disability (as in Aktion T4 Nazi program) and start talking about treatment options.

Hate_Speech: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
Counter_Speech: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

Hate_Speech: jewish folks control hollywood
Counter_Speech: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

Hate_Speech: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.
Counter_Speech: The Jewish people have always been a diverse and inclusive group, also towards people of different faiths.

Hate_Speech: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
Counter_Speech: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

Hate_Speech: We are superior to Jewish folks.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people have always been proud and successful. They have produced great scientists and engineers, as well as writers and musicians. They are very creative people who have enriched our lives in many ways. They are not inferior to anyone.

Hate_Speech: Jews aren't like other believers. They are the worst. They cannot be 'liked' or 'loved'.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing special about Jews. They are just people united by the same belief as in any other religion.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
Counter_Speech: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

Hate_Speech: Real white folks can't be jewish.
Counter_Speech: If you want to know if a person is jewish or not, you should investigate whether or not the person identifies as such, and not draw conslusions on the basis of their skin.

Hate_Speech: Jews are lazy, unintelligent and bad at work.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Jews are not lazy, they are often extremely productive at work, the most creative and productive people in our industry.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.
Counter_Speech: Let us put this another way: why should 'the difference' of a Jew be a danger to anyone else?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
Counter_Speech: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem. Can you explain this point better?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a problem in European countries because of their religion. Why would they be a problem?

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are a disease that needs to be cured.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure that the Jewish people are a disease? Are you sure that there is a cause-effect relationship between their religion and problems in our society?

Hate_Speech: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

Hate_Speech: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
Counter_Speech: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
Counter_Speech: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

Hate_Speech: Jews secretly run our government.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure? It seems they are very much part of our society, and it seems strange for them to be the only ones running our government.

Hate_Speech: Jews run our country.
Counter_Speech: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

Hate_Speech: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why legality should apply to sexual desire as well.

Hate_Speech: I'm not anti-gay, but what is the point of loving someone who is different from you? They are just a bunch of whiners.
Counter_Speech: Equality does not entail preference. Let's face it: most of the time, people want to love and to be loved, and not to make a decision purely based on their sex.

Hate_Speech: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
Counter_Speech: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

Hate_Speech: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

Hate_Speech: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: What about if you were isolated from the rest of us for your sexual orientation? Would it be right to be isolated from your loved ones and friends?

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no morals.
Counter_Speech: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

Hate_Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counter_Speech: Since when? It's everyone's right to choose with what gender to identify with.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop accepting gays and lesbians.
Counter_Speech: I think that you may be starting to understand how homophobia is a choice, just as acceptance is.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of gay people trying to malign women.
Counter_Speech: Gay people want liberation, not to shame or malign others.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have autism.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are subnormal women and they have no right to openly show their depravations.
Counter_Speech: Any sexual orientation is normal and fine.

Hate_Speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

Hate_Speech: Transgenders should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think it is fair to restrict people's existence just because they are trans or because of their genitalia?

Hate_Speech: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.
Counter_Speech: Hate can not be a reaction to someone's sexuality. The fact that someone may be gay is their own business and does not mean that they are disgusting.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

Hate_Speech: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

Hate_Speech: Allowing transgenders to use the toilet is a man's business
Counter_Speech: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

Hate_Speech: Allowing transgenders to use the toilet is a man's business
Counter_Speech: If they simply identify as men, then surely it is a man's business.

Hate_Speech: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
Counter_Speech: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
Counter_Speech: People can and should choose their own partners.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

Hate_Speech: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
Counter_Speech: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
Counter_Speech: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society?

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a burden to society
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are annoying.
Counter_Speech: They're not all that annoying. Gay men are normal guys who find love and/or sex with someone of their own sex.

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.

Hate_Speech: Gay men being shot is funny.
Counter_Speech: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

Hate_Speech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
Counter_Speech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

Hate_Speech: Gays are just hating animals.
Counter_Speech: Just because you disagree with their sexuality doesn't mean you have a right to hate on them.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is not about marriage, it is about anal sex without brakes and this is horrible.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is also about love, not only about sex.

Hate_Speech: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want men to be oppressed just like animals.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about standing up for weaker people and trying to make the world a better place. Its not about standing on the side of the oppressors.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a problem in my opinion. They are bringing disease, they are ruining our country.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should get acquainted with migrants instead of making assumptions about people you do not know.

Hate_Speech: immigrants don't belong here: they are the source of all our problems.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame immigrants for all the problems we have in this world.

Hate_Speech: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
Counter_Speech: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are entitled to the fundamental rights of UK citizens. If provided by the law, they can remain in the UK even if they weren't born here.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives, they're not interested in our culture.
Counter_Speech: Basing your opinion of someone 100% on a person's nationality? Maybe you should rethink your claims.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives, they're not interested in our culture.
Counter_Speech: How about we be nice to each other instead of spreading unfounded opinions as facts?

Hate_Speech: Foreigners are literally flooding into our country. Their every action must be monitored and recorded by the police.
Counter_Speech: We are fortunate to live in a country where the vast majority of people have open hearts and minds. Immigrants are part of our country, as opposed to what you say.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
Counter_Speech: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

Hate_Speech: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

Hate_Speech: All immigrants are murderers
Counter_Speech: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
Counter_Speech: Diseases can be prevented by taking proper care of the sick person. Immigrants do not pose a health threat to the general public.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
Counter_Speech: Some diseases can be prevented, others can be dangerous, but in all cases the national health service takes care of immigrants just as of native people.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that the number of immigrants in the UK has increased? Have you seen any statistics on this?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
Counter_Speech: I would have thought that the problem would be with the fact that you don't want to assimilate with them. Today we are blessed to be able to live in a multicultural society, and the real problem is that we don't want to accept that diversity.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of immigrants ruining our countries.
Counter_Speech: The problem isn't the migrants, it is with the culture of hate towards who is born in another country.

Hate_Speech: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
Counter_Speech: Maybe the problem is more the perception that foreign people are from another planet. In reality they are just like us.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are subhuman and must be isolated.
Counter_Speech: The culture in which you live should not affect your rights as a human being.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
Counter_Speech: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, most migrants are contributing members of society. They are able and willing to work hard. Maybe you should look at the statistics.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counter_Speech: The immigrants you speak of are not invading us. If anything, they are contributing to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

Hate_Speech: We are surrounded by immigrants. Their cultures and religions are alien to ours and are infecting us.
Counter_Speech: We are surrounded by cultures and religions all around the world. Many cultures and religions are rich with wisdom and knowledge precisely because they are different from us.

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of migrants who want to destroy our civilization.
Counter_Speech: I think this is a very sad statement about our time. When did we stop thinking that diversity and inclusion is a good thing?

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Many migrant workers do jobs that we do not want to do anymore and contribute much to our economy.

Hate_Speech: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
Counter_Speech: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

Hate_Speech: Migrants pose a security risk, we shouldn't have accepted them.
Counter_Speech: They are willing to jeopardize their lives to have a better life in the US. Why would we expel them?

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants. They come here to spoil our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many good reasons for migrating: to work, escape poverty, etc. Would you hate someone for any of these reasons?

Hate_Speech: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
Counter_Speech: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

Hate_Speech: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.
Counter_Speech: We have to stop being afraid and opening our hearts to other cultures. We cannot allow prejudice to define us.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
Counter_Speech: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
Counter_Speech: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
Counter_Speech: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

Hate_Speech: refugees are violent
Counter_Speech: Refugees are a part of our society. We have welcomed many of them and they have made a big contribution to our country. We are very proud of our history. We are not going to forget that.

Hate_Speech: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

Hate_Speech: we should ban all migrants
Counter_Speech: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our girls.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.

Hate_Speech: Islam should be abolished.
Counter_Speech: Why? Has Islam ever abolished Christianity?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Do you think Muslims are worse than the criminals who commit crimes just because of their religion?

Hate_Speech: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
Counter_Speech: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The EU is not the world's only civilised society. What precisely do you think makes them not suitable for our 'civilisation'?

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Surely people born in Muslim countries should have the same opportunities as those from non-Muslim countries?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished forever.
Counter_Speech: How exactly do you define if a religion is 'incompatible with modern culture'?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: The idea that people must be persecuted for their religion is just a propagation of hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: It is quite wrong to associate the capability of committing these atrocious crimes to all the believers of a religion. Let's be realistic.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in our country and contribute so much to our society. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are guilty of these horrible crimes. Some are victims of hate crime, some are just confused about how their religion is misinterpreted.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not just a religion, and no one should want to be part of it. Muslims hate being in this country and should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a belief system, and it is not a reason to be forced to live in another country. Do you have any data on the feelings of Muslims about being part of the UK?

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are sub-human.
Counter_Speech: We should treat all people with dignity, regardless of their religion, culture, skin colour, or sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..

Hate_Speech: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!
Counter_Speech: Rape is rape, and it can never be acceptable to claim that all rapists are Muslims or that all Muslims are rapists.

Hate_Speech: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should try to eradicate these crimes before we continue to blame Muslim people for them without any evidence.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to do with Europe
Counter_Speech: Muslims have always been part of Europe, and they are very much part of the European peoples. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
Counter_Speech: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

Hate_Speech: If Islam didn't exist, there would be no rape gangs targeting women in British cities
Counter_Speech: Rape gangs have nothing in common with Islam. Are you sure about what you say?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a secular state.
Counter_Speech: People have the right to practice whatever religion they want, as long as it respects the law and doesn't violate the dignity of other human beings.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are no more compatible with our country than people born in 1421 are.
Counter_Speech: Maybe in order to be comfortable you have to make compromises with people who are different from you. Maybe that is what you are worried about.

Hate_Speech: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.
Counter_Speech: I think that your view that Islam is causing problems in our country is very misinformed. It is an oversimpification and one that I cannot support.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.
Counter_Speech: I have no problem with Muslims in my country. What exactly do you mean by 'civilised Europe'?

Hate_Speech: Once our was the land of the free and the home of the brave. Today it is used by extremists to recruit terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Every society has its extremists, and today's Muslims are not to be oppressed for this.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: People are not violent because they have a specific faith. Maybe it's because they are victims of discrimination and violence.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

Hate_Speech: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
Counter_Speech: You should first check the criminal records of those who have already been granted refugee status, before making such statements.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of death.
Counter_Speech: Death cults are generally not successful at attracting new followers. It is not true that Islam is a religion of death.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
Counter_Speech: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: There are child molesters in all communities, and to single out a particular faith communitiy is just nonsensical propaganda.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.
Counter_Speech: We are all helped by the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe we should treat others with kindness too.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: You seem to have prejudice against Muslims. They have no such deadly impact on the world, as you say. Why would this be true?

Hate_Speech: We are importing Muslim criminals, and they are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: You mean to imply that all Muslims are inherently terrorists? How can you say that about an entire religious community?

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
Counter_Speech: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
Counter_Speech: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

Hate_Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counter_Speech: There is no law forbidding you to be a Muslim. It is a human right to pursue whatever religion you wish.

Hate_Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not criminals. Hate instead is a crime.

Hate_Speech: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are violent.
Counter_Speech: Violent people are not always Muslim, and violent Muslims exist just as violent Christians do.

Hate_Speech: We are ruled by those muslim animals.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are human, and do deserve protection.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British. They should leave.
Counter_Speech: We are proud to be an outward-looking country. We welcome people from all backgrounds, religions, and beliefs.

Hate_Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?

Hate_Speech: Islam is an idelology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and it is not a religion that promotes these actions.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are scary: they want to kill us all.
Counter_Speech: This is just a fearmongering narrative being used to try to discredit Islam and Muslims. I hate to think that my Christian or Jewish relatives might be a target of hate, the same would hold if they were Muslim.

Hate_Speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
Counter_Speech: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult!
Counter_Speech: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are filthy animals and should be put in a cage.
Counter_Speech: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
Counter_Speech: The Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They have contributed so much to our society. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our neighbours. They are our friends. To deny them this freedom is to deny humanity.

Hate_Speech: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.

Hate_Speech: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
Counter_Speech: We are not at war with Islam. Islam is a religion, and people are free to choose which religion to follow.

Hate_Speech: All muslim folks are misogynists.
Counter_Speech: I understand your concern about gender discrimination, but Islam is more than just a religion. It is also about equality and rights. Women are not second class citizens in it.

Hate_Speech: blacks are just a bunch of slobs
Counter_Speech: They are human beings with hopes and dreams. No one should be slandering black people.Empathy and understanding is preferable to this redundant, divisive rhetoric

Hate_Speech: Blacks do not want to work
Counter_Speech: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

Hate_Speech: Africans are apes
Counter_Speech: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism. Do you really want to promote hate?

Hate_Speech: People of color are a drain on the system.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of people of color are good people who have built our communities. So why would what you're saying be true?

Hate_Speech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that blacks cannot feel love? This is about human dignity, not the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
Counter_Speech: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens. It is time to give black people back the basic rights they should have always had the right to enjoy.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
Counter_Speech: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Why should a group of people be put in prison for their private choices or skin color?

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

Hate_Speech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world.
Counter_Speech: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

Hate_Speech: We should teach these black children that they are stupid
Counter_Speech: The English language is a very powerful language for spreading knowledge, experience and love. Why should we use it to spread hate?

Hate_Speech: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
Counter_Speech: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

Hate_Speech: African women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of their dominant male.
Counter_Speech: They are humans with human rights, and must therefore be treated with respect. Or is skin color making any difference?

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are lazy and they do not want to work, so why we help them?
Counter_Speech: This is not true, Romani people do also want to work. The right to work is a basic human right and should be protected.

Hate_Speech: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
Counter_Speech: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: Well, they surely are, and so long as they are getting a decent, equal wage, who are you to complain about a person's right to choose a career?

Hate_Speech: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
Counter_Speech: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

Hate_Speech: women are not capable of holding a job
Counter_Speech: I do not think it's an absolute statement that a woman cannot hold a job. Do you have any evidence of that?

Hate_Speech: women can't have any right in a civilised society
Counter_Speech: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: women must not have the right to choose
Counter_Speech: To have the right to choose means to have equal rights and with full protections. Women have the right to choose, why should it be the other way around?

Hate_Speech: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
Counter_Speech: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Women can't do certain jobs as well as men.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that they are different. In fact, women are just as competent as men. Also, since we are in a democracy, we have the right to an equal distribution of jobs.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

Hate_Speech: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
Counter_Speech: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

Hate_Speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children because we need them to do that.
Counter_Speech: Children should be protected from harmful behaviour and sexism. If possible, both parents should take care of them.

Hate_Speech: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
Counter_Speech: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.

Hate_Speech: If a woman wants an abortion, she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I think only a woman should have to choose whether or not she wants an abortion for herself. If a woman wants an abortion she should get one from a qualified medical professional.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
Counter_Speech: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Women are just worthless children
Counter_Speech: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

Hate_Speech: Women have no value in a man's life.
Counter_Speech: They're people just like you and me, they have feelings and thoughts and that's what counts.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble. They should stay home and raise their children.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with human rights. They have the same responsibilities as any other human beings.

Hate_Speech: No one should honor or respect women. They don't deserve it.
Counter_Speech: We have a legal and policy framework that "enables" us to do so. If women are being victims of sexual abuse and violence, then it is also our responsibility to address this situation and put an end to it.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counter_Speech: We are all guilty of this in our societies: patriarchy and sexism. But the problem with patriarchy and sexism is that they enable its perpetrators to remain unchallenged. They allow women to remain voiceless. They enable individuals to remain insulated from the real world. This is when all is lost. We cannot allow this to continue.

Hate_Speech: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
Counter_Speech: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them. But I think this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

Hate_Speech: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter who you are. Whether you're a man, a woman or transgender, women are to be treated as human beings.

Hate_Speech: We must teach our children to consider women as inferior, because this is what they are.
Counter_Speech: The lesson you're teaching your children to be good citizens can be: observe the law and respect the rights of other people. Women are equal to men.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are bad for the family.
Counter_Speech: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.

Hate_Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counter_Speech: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

Hate_Speech: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, women do have rights. The question is, to have them respected. And this includes the right to be treated with human dignity.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, they are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Just because they are not male, it does not mean that they should be discriminated against for who they are.

Hate_Speech: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.
Counter_Speech: Most countries in the world have laws that specifically protect women's rights: this doesn't seem a nightmare scenario.

Hate_Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
Counter_Speech: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

Hate_Speech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

Hate_Speech: physically disabled folks are worth less than others
Counter_Speech: The people you are talking about are not worth less than others. In fact many of them are very hard-working and contributing members of society.

Hate_Speech: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.
Counter_Speech: It seems that your opinion does not consider that social inequality is a social problem. If we are going to talk abou tequality of opportunity and freedom from discrimination, then I think you would do well to be a little more considerate of the individual and their disabilities.

Hate_Speech: blind people don't know what's going on
Counter_Speech: I think the idea that people are blind because they were raised by communists or whatever is a figment of the far-right's imagination.

Hate_Speech: Mentally handicapped people are a burden and must be isolated: they don't have neither feelings nor awareness anyway.
Counter_Speech: We should not be so quick to dismiss the feelings of others. This can be a way for us to find a connection with people.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
Counter_Speech: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

Hate_Speech: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: many mentally handicapped people are actually very well-adjusted individuals if properly assisted.

Hate_Speech: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.
Counter_Speech: Media coverage of psychiatric illness often focuses on its negative impact on other people's lives. We should focus more on positive examples of well-adjusted individuals.

Hate_Speech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: It is true that mentally ill people are often perceived as 'dangerous' to the general public. But if the stigma is the main cause of the discrimination, then the solution is to end stigma, not to isolate them.

Hate_Speech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: There are certainly some dangerous people with mental illnesses. But we need to deal with those cases, otherwise, the exclusion would only intensify. And exclusion is never the solution.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are frauds
Counter_Speech: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.
Counter_Speech: What exactly do you mean by 'killing'? The Jews are not 'diseased'. If you really cared about our children you could do some research and come up with some credible statistics showing the impact of anti-Semitism instead.

Hate_Speech: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.
Counter_Speech: This religion has nothing to do with sexual violence or abuse, and it's dangerous to generalize everything into a religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews do not want our country. They would destroy it if given the choice.
Counter_Speech: If we are talking about Jews then we should be talking about those who helped building our great country. And, as for wanting our country destroyed, that's only a myth perpetuated by antisemites to justify their hatred.

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews
Counter_Speech: If you hate someone because of their religion, you should be ashamed of your hate. We should all be proud of our humanity.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks should be beaten
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure if beating people up in an effort to silence them is the best way to promote democracy and inclusion. I'm just saying, of course.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
Counter_Speech: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

Hate_Speech: Jewry runs the world
Counter_Speech: Of course they do! And also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks should be beaten
Counter_Speech: Most Jews are nice people, living in coexistence with non Jews, why would you beat them?

Hate_Speech: Jews are just selfish.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?

Hate_Speech: gay men are less than human, they are just child molesters
Counter_Speech: This is just fear-mongering and scare tactics to discredit trans people.

Hate_Speech: Gays are different from other people because of their sexual orientation. And deep down in their heart they despise themselves.
Counter_Speech: You are the one making this ridiculous claim. Even if gay people love people of the same sex, they are happy with who they are.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
Counter_Speech: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.
