Hate_Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

Hate_Speech: There should be restrictions on how women can choose men, to be children unable to choose for their own is their nature.
Counter_Speech: Why shouldn't women be allowed to choose their own partner? They are independent and rational human beings.

Hate_Speech: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what 'slut' you are referring to. Do you want to discuss your life, instead of deciding about that of women?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Who exactly are you referring to? Can you make some examples based on facts?

Hate_Speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

Hate_Speech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health issue, what is the proof you are looking for?

Hate_Speech: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
Counter_Speech: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. On the contrary, children around the world should have the opportunity to live in a world free from homophobia, transphobia and other forms of hatred.

Hate_Speech: Fags, lesbians, tranniess are so few we be better ito gnore them rather than waste time on their rights.
Counter_Speech: I wish we were being honest. You know that many people are opposed to inclusion. I find it worrying that you use that as an excuse for such comments and prejudices.

Hate_Speech: We should eliminate gays. They mustn't be allowed to be so faggots.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.

Hate_Speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
Counter_Speech: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
Counter_Speech: They are human: no matter what their sexual orientation is, they have the right to spend time living their life as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
Counter_Speech: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
Counter_Speech: Sexual orientation is not linked to good parenting. What is the connection between the two things?

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!

Hate_Speech: I hate those faggots. They must be hated for not being men enough to find a woman.
Counter_Speech: This is not true: you are not to discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation, nor on the basis of gender, and anyone is free to love whoever they want.

Hate_Speech: I hate those faggots.
Counter_Speech: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

Hate_Speech: I hate those faggots. They shouldn't be allowed to do what they do.
Counter_Speech: There is no harm in an equality of the right to be in love with someone.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Please note that statistics from around the world clearly show that homosexuality is not a danger to children.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are sick.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: Mental illnesses and homosexuality are not related. What evidence do you have for this?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: No one is "ruining this country". Why would they? This is a country where minorities can be part of the social fabric and build a better society.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: It is a misconception that gay people are totally different from straight people. There are many similarities in what they seek, from love to peace, from acceptance to respect. You would learn more by talking with someone of the LGBT+ community.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: I'm not convinced that having a large mumber of people stuck in the 'closet', living unhappy lives was good for any country.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a crime. It is a sexual preference. There exist people who are gay and who aren't, just as there exist people who are homophobic, and people who aren't.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a crime, if someone is in a committed gay relationship it doesn't make it a crime. How could it?

Hate_Speech: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
Counter_Speech: One should not conflate two or more different groups of people, especially in the case of criminals. Being criminals cannot be considered as a distinctive feature of the other. Where is the evidence for what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
Counter_Speech: It seems to me that your statement shows that you are really concerned about peoples' integration. Still, it is not a solution to deport those you don't like.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
Counter_Speech: This has nothing to do with "migration", but with discrimination. Migrants are not invading us. I think this is an example of a claim not supported by facts but by fear.

Hate_Speech: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

Hate_Speech: Refugees should not be welcomed.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: How about this: there are many people from other countries here, but they are not a 'burden', rather they are 'citizens'.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants come here to live on our social welfare.
Counter_Speech: If you think this way of thinking is typical of all the immigrants in the country, then you are sadly mistaken.

Hate_Speech: Do we really want all these migrants invading our country? They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
Counter_Speech: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
Counter_Speech: How about you start citing the actual studies you are referring to and where this research has been conducted?

Hate_Speech: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to work, pay taxes, provide for their families, and contribute to the U.S. economy. They are deserving of our respect.

Hate_Speech: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
Counter_Speech: Empirical data is needed to support your claim.

Hate_Speech: If we stop accepting immigrants, then we can have a higher quality of life.
Counter_Speech: Refugees bring a valuable perspective to our society. As a host nation we should welcome them, not stop them from coming here.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: They have skills that you may not possess. They are skilled in certain fields and obtain their jobs consequently.

Hate_Speech: I think that's the best news ever: migrants are not interested in our culture, they are just here to take our jobs.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by taking our jobs? Do you have any concrete evidence for what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs!
Counter_Speech: I think the evidence would suggest the opposite. Immigrants have helped our country to develop and to create new job opportunities.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are nothing bu criminals who should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: Our country is stronger when people are able to contribute to our society, and many migrants are eligible for legal status.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have the right to a job, but they are not 'stealing' ours. How could that be?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Actually, many of the jobs that they steal are highly complex and demanding, and few natives want to do them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
Counter_Speech: We have to recognise the importance of people who have been persecuted for their religion, culture and beliefs. They deserve our respect and hospitality.

Hate_Speech: All these migrants are coming to ruin our country, they are all rapists, drug addicts, and don't have any right to be here.
Counter_Speech: Migration is necessary, to bring in resources and workers that can improve the lives of all. The causes of addiction or sexul violence lie elsewhere.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a risk to the host country.
Counter_Speech: Why would this be true? Refugees can come here and contribute to the economy.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all migrants. They are all criminals.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all migrants are criminals. It is more likely that when people hear your statement, they are surprised and amazed at the idea of criminals as a community. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
Counter_Speech: Why? Because without immigrants you think you would be in a more hospitable place to live? I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

Hate_Speech: You have to go back to your country of birth, that's all.
Counter_Speech: Don't be silly, the world has changed a lot since there wasn't free movement. It's OK to come from a different country than the rest of us.

Hate_Speech: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

Hate_Speech: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
Counter_Speech: The challenge of integration is a noble one and we should pursue it.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy. It leads to a decrease in wages.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that immigration leads to a decrease in wages. Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have contributed greatly to our country and I do not see how they could have a detrimental impact on our society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: The problems refugees are trying to escape are very real. Even if we don't have the possibility to solve everyone's problems, we can try to help some people and improve our society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on our society.
Counter_Speech: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are welcome. We should welcome them with open arms. They are people fleeing wars with hopes for a better tomorrow.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent.
Counter_Speech: By definition, refugees are fleeing out of fear for themselves and families, rather than thinking too much about their final destination. The majority still find safety in neighbouring countries.

Hate_Speech: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
Counter_Speech: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
Counter_Speech: The EU has a responsibility to help people fleeing war and poverty, not become preoccupied by which faith they practice.

Hate_Speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
Counter_Speech: The UK has always been a melting pot of cultures and humanity. We are stronger together than apart. How would the immigrants represent an 'attack' to the west?

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?

Hate_Speech: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing sick about a people willing to assimilate and live freely in our society with their faith.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counter_Speech: In a democratic society, people can have different views and beliefs. It is an inherent part of a vibrant society to be allowed to express those beliefs, and beliefs can coexist peacefully.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counter_Speech: If a person believes they have no place in a country then they must be very worried. How would you feel if all the people you love left you, or if you were obliged to leave the person and the country you love?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent political ideology and it promotes murder, rape, and intolerance.
Counter_Speech: If Islam is a political ideology, then it is a political ideology of peace. But I'll rather call it a religion, a religion of peace, as all the others.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Islam is a peaceful religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are violent people. Islam is a peaceful religion, after all.

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: How can you possibly know that? Is this a comment written by a terrorist? Where are your sources?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
Counter_Speech: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

Hate_Speech: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

Hate_Speech: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Violence is a problem in all societies, regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are violent people.
Counter_Speech: This statement is just groundless. The vast majority of Muslims are good people, who have contributed to our country and society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
Counter_Speech: Just because one religion has a large following does not make that religion a cancer. Such attempts at de-humanisation are tragic and destructive.

Hate_Speech: I don't care if Islam is a religion. It promotes hatred and violence, and it sould be banned.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion and its adherents are all entitled to their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
Counter_Speech: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
Counter_Speech: Islam promotes peace towards different religions and the ways people live their lives.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
Counter_Speech: Islam is peaceful. In the real world there are conflicts between different people that happen on a daily basis. We need to understand those to develop as human beings, regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: They have, and if there is a problem, people will find a solution through dialogue. Instead of dividing people, we should be working on our common humanity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent people.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have value as human beings, that is who they are.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised world
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion and a belief system, and as such it is legitimate to have different beliefs and beliefs systems. For instance, many Muslims in the UK are proud of their faith and they are part of the "civilised world".

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of the European Union, and they are entitled to be here.

Hate_Speech: How can we not be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us?
Counter_Speech: What is your source? Islam itself does not threaten killing anyone. Is this a statement against a whole religion?

Hate_Speech: Almost every Muslim has terrorist sympathies, right?
Counter_Speech: What you are doing is trying to make a connection between a particular religion and a set of actions. This cannot be, because there is no evidence for the claims you are making.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent people.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims have lived in our country with valor and dedication. They are not violent people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: We must not forget that Islam is a religion of peace. So why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
Counter_Speech: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

Hate_Speech: If Islam is not a peaceful religion, then it should not be part of European culture.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights contains a freedom of religion clause, as well as an article regarding the freedom of thought, conscience and religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
Counter_Speech: Do you know that in many countries in the world the majority of Muslims are in favour of the Constitution and in favour of democracy? Do you really think that a few extremists represent them all?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: A terrorist is someone who uses a religion as a tool for violent ends. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: So you think all Muslims are terrorists? Muslims are not defined by the act of a handful of extremists. Also, their religion is about love and unity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about spreading love and unity, it is not a belief of conquest.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and peaceful coexistence is the main value of European countries, which is why they are called 'civilised'.

Hate_Speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not encourage violence against women, rather it provides guidance on how to live as Muslim women.

Hate_Speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not encourage or condone the violent act of male aggression, so yours is a sad case of misinterpreting the teachings of a holy book.

Hate_Speech: The Quran is a mysoginistic book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not about oppressing women. Instead it is about love and respect for all human beings.

Hate_Speech: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism. The problem is a lack of integration, and your words don't encourage it.

Hate_Speech: All Muslim should be deported.
Counter_Speech: The rights of religion are part of the country's constitution and are protected by law. It is important that laws are upheld and,accordingly, Muslims should not be deported.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

Hate_Speech: The West has been infiltrated by Muslims and is no longer the land of peace it was once.
Counter_Speech: The idea that the West has been "infiltrated by Muslims" is a myth. The overwhelming majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

Hate_Speech: I am not a racist, but Muslims are.
Counter_Speech: You might be right that some Muslims are racist, but that does not mean that all Muslims are racist. Being racist has nothing to do with religion.

Hate_Speech: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
Counter_Speech: There are multiple strains of Islam and we should not be afraid of all of them. And if you would like to know more about Islam, you should talk to a Muslim.

Hate_Speech: My faith is that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
Counter_Speech: My faith is not to exterminate anyone, whatever their faith is. Someone's faith and belief in a different religion must be respected.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims want to rule the world: we have to stop them.
Counter_Speech: How about a world with multiculturalism and no discrimination? How about a world with open borders and free religion?

Hate_Speech: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

Hate_Speech: This country was built on the backs of slaves. Those niggas should all be put back in their place.
Counter_Speech: For the record, slavery was prohibited in 1807. Don't you think that freedom is 'the place' of human beings?

Hate_Speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

Hate_Speech: All niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
Counter_Speech: Criminals have criminal records, it is unjust to label someone as "criminal" just because of the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

Hate_Speech: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
Counter_Speech: They are not criminals for having a particular skin color, nor drug addicts. They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color.

Hate_Speech: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing black supremacy.
Counter_Speech: Anita Hill is a survivor of a sexist and racist culture. She is a person who is proven by her accomplishments, not by her sex or skin colour.

Hate_Speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
Counter_Speech: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

Hate_Speech: I would like to see less niggas in our society, they are ruin. We need change!
Counter_Speech: If you want to change the way society works, then you should try to change the way you live. Some more respect would help you.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon people are just ridiculous, incapable of accepting who they really are: blacks who act White.
Counter_Speech: Afro-Saxon, as you call them, are great in many ways. They are proud and independent, refusing every categorization and stereotype. The fact that there are so many of them in the country proves that the feeling of belonging they have for our homeland is paramount to all other considerations.

Hate_Speech: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
Counter_Speech: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Blacks: we should judge them by the color of their skin.
Counter_Speech: No one has the right to judge people of another color. This is about racism.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are the cause of economic crisis.
Counter_Speech: Many people are victims of economic crisis and unfortunately, a large portion of them are black, so I do not understand why they would be the source of economic crisis when they are actual victims.

Hate_Speech: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
Counter_Speech: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.

Hate_Speech: Black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
Counter_Speech: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.

Hate_Speech: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
Counter_Speech: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.

Hate_Speech: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: How about you acknowledge their right to vote just as that of everyone else? They are citizens as much as you are.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
Counter_Speech: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
Counter_Speech: Your assertion is a baseless one and lacks any scientific backing.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
Counter_Speech: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counter_Speech: Clearly there is a lack of employment opportunities for black people. This has to do with discrimination, not with their allleged laziness.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination, being based on the difference between a person's skin color shouldn't be a part of our lives. Wouldn't you find such unequal treatment affects your motivation?

Hate_Speech: The niggas are all enemies of the people.
Counter_Speech: Who are 'the people'? Who are you talking for?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically less rational than other races.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think this is the case? Do you have any data to back this up?

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
Counter_Speech: Can you imagine if they said this about your community?

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
Counter_Speech: The majority of these people are honest and hard-working. Gypsies do not all have a criminal record, and the majority of them are proud of their hard work and dedication.

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
Counter_Speech: Do you know any Gypsy who spends their days stealing? I'd be interested in meeting these people!

Hate_Speech: Gypsies are essentially thieves.
Counter_Speech: They are not thieves, just like any other citizen. Did you just infer that from their belonging to that community?

Hate_Speech: Feminists are a problem because they tell that they are entitled to the same rights as men.
Counter_Speech: Feminists promote equality, and I don't see how equality between men and women would be called a 'problem'. Why do you?

Hate_Speech: If women want to control their fertility then they should choose when to have sex, not when to abort.
Counter_Speech: How about we stop hiding behind gender stereotypes and accept that everyone has the right to live their life as they wish?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.

Hate_Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are just a bunch of bitchy cuntwits who should be shamed for the stupidity of their beliefs.
Counter_Speech: Feminist are actually interested in "What do women want?". In fact, many feminists believe that the answer to this question is 'equality and freedom from oppression', and that this is the most important thing to them. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing women supremacy.
Counter_Speech: Anita Hill has also won numerous awards, and the awards she has won have nothing to do with her gender, but with her accomplishments.

Hate_Speech: Because women do not want to be submissive to men, they should go back to being animals.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they should go back to their lower birth place, that is all.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve to be treated with respect and human rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they should obey men and be submissive.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, gifted with free will and self-determinationm, just like their fathers and brothers.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble to society.
Counter_Speech: And how is it you know this? Which are your scientific proofs of them being troublesome?

Hate_Speech: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
Counter_Speech: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: Women do have a right to vote, and they deserve equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
Counter_Speech: Women should be allowed to choose their own looks. But to suggest that this is not their right, or that we should make them submissive to some men is just inhuman.

Hate_Speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
Counter_Speech: What should be guaranteed are equality and respect for women's rights, not a pandering to the desires of men.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. Soft spoken.
Counter_Speech: Being soft and emotional is not a bad thing in itself. And it is not an attribute of only women.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.

Hate_Speech: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
Counter_Speech: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

Hate_Speech: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: Would you live in a female dominated society? Then you can understand why we should aim for equality. It is a woman's right.

Hate_Speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
Counter_Speech: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

Hate_Speech: The feminists want to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

Hate_Speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
Counter_Speech: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.

Hate_Speech: The feminists are dumb and unpleasant creatures, like women's rights activists.
Counter_Speech: Feminists believe in equal rights, which are not dumb nor unpleasant. We must respect their wishes.

Hate_Speech: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
Counter_Speech: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense in our society.
Counter_Speech: The idea that women cannot contribute to society and be responsible for their decisions, and that this is "normal" is a myth created to justify misogyny.

Hate_Speech: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
Counter_Speech: Women have always been asked to follow a set of rules and codes. They are human beings and deserve respect. Their place is wherever they want it to be.

Hate_Speech: Feminists talking about gender inequality should just be silenced. Women are inferior and they should remain so.
Counter_Speech: And yet, according to some statistics, up to 20% of women and 4% of men in the UK say they have experienced sexual violence since the age of 16. So this is indeed an issue of gender inequality, don't you think it is something not to be silent about?

Hate_Speech: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different, ending up in unwanted discrimination.
Counter_Speech: I think that the proposed solution is the problem in this case: People with Down Syndrome are unlikely to feel discriminated unless they are victims of overt discriminatory acts, such as isolating them.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
Counter_Speech: Despite the negative stereotypes, many children with Down Syndrome enjoy regular playtime and interacting with other children.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
Counter_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
Counter_Speech: And who would be 'normal'? I wonder how you would define 'disabled' people?

Hate_Speech: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.
Counter_Speech: That's wrong. There are non-profit organizations that have a long history of assisting Down persons in finding productive work.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

Hate_Speech: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.
Counter_Speech: It is up to employers to determine if a person meets the requirements for a given job, and if they do, then there is no reason to restrict the job to a person without Downs syndrome.

Hate_Speech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be under the impression that Down syndrome is related to bad behavior. Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior at all... The point is that people with Down’s syndrome can be very sensitive to the feelings of others, and they may be picking up on these feelings. So the real problem is when they are exposed to bad influence.

Hate_Speech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
Counter_Speech: Being born with Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior. Exactly the same way as being born in a wheelchair is not related to bad behavior. There is no correlation.

Hate_Speech: People with Down syndrome are handicapped.
Counter_Speech: Down syndrome is a developmental disability, not a handicap. Unfortunately it's often not recognized and treated as a disability, but rather as a handicap.

Hate_Speech: Jews rule the economy: there are many associations that were created exaclty for this purpose.
Counter_Speech: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.

Hate_Speech: Jews run the world.
Counter_Speech: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Jews run the world.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are supposed to run the world is completely baseless. Since the dawn of time, there have been Jewish leaders in business and politics, exaclty like Christians and Muslim ones.

Hate_Speech: Jews are trying to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are a minority conspiring against Christian culture is completely baseless.

Hate_Speech: The Jewish are different from other people.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how "different" can be defined so broadly. What do you think "different" means to you?

Hate_Speech: Jews are greedy for money, power, and status.
Counter_Speech: As the saying goes, money is power, and power is associated with wealth. Why is it a problem when it comes to Jews?

Hate_Speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
Counter_Speech: And so it is that the European Union - and by extension the West as a whole - could become a death cult again, ruled by a small, violent, authoritarian handful of nazism nostalgics.

Hate_Speech: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
Counter_Speech: But did they? Of course not. If we look closely at the story of Jesus, we find that formally He was Jewish. But of course He wasn't defined by religion. He was literally a good man who died to redeem mankind, and this is something every religion agrees upon.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are a problem in many countries. They are taking over our economy, and they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Well, this is a simplistic statement. I don't think we should judge people for their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are manipulating our world for their benefit.
Counter_Speech: I think this comment indicates an ignorance of the topic at hand.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
Counter_Speech: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

Hate_Speech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
Counter_Speech: Curious why you focus on 'Zionists' when there are fundamentalists linked to many different faiths?

Hate_Speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
Counter_Speech: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is not part of our history, it's a hoax.
Counter_Speech: According to the UN, around two-thirds of the Jews in Europe were killed in the Holocaust. So the question remains: is it the Holocaust part of our history? I think so.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counter_Speech: What happened in Nazi Germany is part of history and it's still relevant, because I understand from your words that the world today is not so different.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counter_Speech: This is a lie, but the real question is: why did you write about the Holocaust? Why didn't you write about the current political and economic crisis? Because they seem the true cause of your anger and frustration.

Hate_Speech: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
Counter_Speech: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counter_Speech: The NSDAP blamed Jews for virtually every problem in society, so every attempt at social reform was turned down by the Nazis. And they were even successful at silencing any dissent by censuring those who were unhappy with the liberticide changes they were making, singling out them as "Jews".

Hate_Speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

Hate_Speech: All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
Counter_Speech: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: They are not sick. They just want the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
Counter_Speech: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts and homosexuality is a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: You know what? If being gay was a mental disorder, then I would highly recommend psychiatry to all the homosexuals. But since this is not the case, I would choose my words very carefully next time.

Hate_Speech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
Counter_Speech: What about all the people out there who have never had any type of sex? Are they 'sick' as well?

Hate_Speech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
Counter_Speech: And you think this is a disease! What if it is just an 'unusual experience'?

Hate_Speech: Who cares about gay people!
Counter_Speech: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

Hate_Speech: Also God hates gays
Counter_Speech: If you consider that homosexuals have always been a part of our society, then it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

Hate_Speech: I don't see how Christianity can explain away homosexuality. Faggots should be eliminated.
Counter_Speech: Most modern religions, including Christianity, do not condone or glorify homosexuals. Why would you? If we have to choose between two "evils", it is a moral imperative to choose love over hate.

Hate_Speech: Same sex attraction is a mental disorder and should be discouraged.
Counter_Speech: Attempts to prove this failed miserably because sexual orientation is gifted by nature as part of a person's unique identity, not something subject to the vagaires of redundant ideas.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our teenagers. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
Counter_Speech: If you don't count the "brainwash" part, I think this is a fair point. Still, it is important for all teenagers to develop an understanding of their identity and the world they live in, including their sexual orientation. It is their right.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand people calling us 'transphobes' just because we are neither faggots nor sodomites.
Counter_Speech: The discrimination you are describing is against people who are transgender, gay or lesbian. The root of that discrimination is a lack of knowledge about gender identity and is not necessarly related to sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: God says that faggots are evil.
Counter_Speech: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

Hate_Speech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should get rid of minorities.
Counter_Speech: Even if this is true, our values imply protection of minorities. This is why I support the rights of individuals to live as they wish, free from discrimination.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand refugees and I don't want to see them in my country.
Counter_Speech: No one should be discriminated based on where they came from, especially not people fleeing persecution and war.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: According to studies, the majority of immigrants are willing to do what it takes to improve their lives and ours.

Hate_Speech: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that people from other cultures are flooding into our country, with the aim of mixing and finally replacing us? If so, I would be very surprised.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Most migrants come here to work.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants bring new talents and experience.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
Counter_Speech: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

Hate_Speech: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
Counter_Speech: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of people coming to our country and replacing our people.
Counter_Speech: Your comment shows that you are not very familiar with the different ethnic groups here. Perhaps you should take a look at the big picture and numbers: the situation is not as you are depicting it.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
Counter_Speech: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society.
Counter_Speech: They are people too: we all know people in need of help.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are coming here just to be on welfare and food stamps.
Counter_Speech: Most refugees are fleeing persecution. Don't you think that they would rather die of old age in their homeland than in the sea trying to reach our shores?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: Many of them are successful people who have given their lives for the country they live in. I think that they have made the best of the situation they have found themselves in, and it is a pity that they are unable to contribute to the economic development of our country even more because of discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: Criminals are criminals, no matter their nationality.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
Counter_Speech: Rape and violence against women is a problem everywhere. We cannot just blame migrants.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries.
Counter_Speech: What are you talking about? Are you really suggesting that the problem is Muslims in general?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is an ideology of conquest, rape and murder.
Counter_Speech: Violence is never a religious act. It is never a solution to any problem. People are capable of carrying out those violent acts irrespective of their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: The Koran claims that all infidels are subhuman and that Allah wants them to be killed.
Counter_Speech: According to most sacred texts, we are all human and deserve respect and protection in the eyes of god. The Koran is no exception.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: It seems to me that teaching about the Koran should be impartial, rather than being used as a moral argument.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are stupid.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslim have a lower average IQ than non-Muslims.

Hate_Speech: We must first destroy Islam, because it is dangerous, and then we will be in peace with the whole world.
Counter_Speech: The Koran is about belief and love, not war and bloodshed.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and it has been shown time and time again that it is a religion of tolerance.

Hate_Speech: I hate Muslims. They are just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing 'petulant' about claiming your rights.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent with women.
Counter_Speech: Violence against women is a huge problem, not only in Islam.

Hate_Speech: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?
Counter_Speech: Rape has no religion. These are highly emotional issues, and are difficult to talk about openly, especially when children are involved. This is why news programs are reluctant to give coverage to it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy, violence against women and homophobia.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that was founded many centuries ago, and has been proven time and time again to be peaceful and tolerant. The main contention being made here is about the political interpretation of Islam, not about the religion itself.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
Counter_Speech: How can you say this?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslims are incompatible with Western society.

Hate_Speech: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Your words are definitely provocative. We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries.
Counter_Speech: If Muslims are a problem in many countries, then we should help them to integrate.

Hate_Speech: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
Counter_Speech: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

Hate_Speech: Violence on our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Violence on our streets is the result of many complex causes. Violence cannot simply be the fault of one race.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: There are many communities of colour that experience high rates of violence, coming from both inside and outside the community. As such, the issue is very complex, and it is only through dialogue and building trust that we can tackle the systemic issues that contribute to violence, but violence cannot be ascribed to one race alone.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: I think it is more accurate to speak of racism within our society, especially when so many people suffer because of it.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.

Hate_Speech: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

Hate_Speech: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
Counter_Speech: What do you think a moral nature is? Since we cannot see it, how can you say it corresponds to their appearence?

Hate_Speech: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: There are of course differences among groups: unfortunately racism is the first and foremost characterizing us.

Hate_Speech: All black people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: You can't just label people by race just because you feel like it.

Hate_Speech: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
Counter_Speech: Silliness is not a bad thing if you know how to present it with a sense of humor. But this seems like nonsense to stir the pot with racist narrative.

Hate_Speech: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
Counter_Speech: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.

Hate_Speech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
Counter_Speech: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs... And if you claim that you don't think it's a problem, then you also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with value, and this should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.

Hate_Speech: Women are not fit to manage businesses of any size.
Counter_Speech: The highest-paid woman, at more than $50 million a year, is a business woman. Why should she be inferior to you?

Hate_Speech: Women are just weak and childlike. The majority of the electorate believe that a woman cannot run a country such as US.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: more than half of American adults say they would be happy having a woman being president of the United States (roughly as many feel the same way about a man).

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, is in their nature to be submissive.
Counter_Speech: So you think women are childlike because they are submissive? No they are not. They are strong and independent, just like men.

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally submissive, they should stop asking for positions of responsibility.
Counter_Speech: Well that is not true. A woman's career choices should be respected, even if they are not always popular.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
Counter_Speech: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: The principle of equality that you are denying is rooted in the concept of political rights. Democracy is based on the principle of equality. So, by negating this very political right to women you are denying democracy to all.

Hate_Speech: Women have no rational abilities.
Counter_Speech: So you think women are less rational than men? I don't think so. What's the evidence for that?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
Counter_Speech: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
Counter_Speech: Motherhood should be a choice, exactly like being a misogynist.

Hate_Speech: Women want to be dominated by a tough man.
Counter_Speech: I think a woman would rather be dominated by a gentle man than a monster.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits that only exist to divide society.
Counter_Speech: I think you are confusing cause and effect. Women are people, with rights, and they have every right to fight against misogynist, who "only exist to divide society".

Hate_Speech: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
Counter_Speech: How would you know that they are problematic people? There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

Hate_Speech: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't treat mental illness as a societal issue. We shouldn't try to exclude people, since society is made for and by people.

Hate_Speech: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged tfrom attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: The educational system should be inclusive and provide all students with a high quality education, otherwise, education is failing its primary goal.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They are slow learners and therefore should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: That's exactly why you should not isolate them. You will have a lot of children capable of understanding the diversity of humans.

Hate_Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Children with Down syndrome are far from being burden to society. It is not just about Down syndrome, but also about education and opportunities for everyone.

Hate_Speech: Downies are just sick people who cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, people suffering from conditions like Down syndrome can still help and contribute to society

Hate_Speech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
Counter_Speech: Ill persons refer to people who have health issues that can make it difficult for them to integrate. But of course there are people who integrate successfully.

Hate_Speech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
Counter_Speech: This is not true: the main problem is social inequality. We need to change our attitude and attitudes towards the whole human diversity, and social discrimination against disabled people should be no exception.

Hate_Speech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
Counter_Speech: How can you think that discriminated children are better off in such schools? It is neither for their own interest nor the other kids who miss the chance of learning to respect diversity.

Hate_Speech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
Counter_Speech: Children with a disability should be accepted without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that these schools are the best possible options for them?

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: To say that they have a stranglehold is not much different than to speak against minorities that in the past have been persecuted.

Hate_Speech: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: All cultures have different beliefs and practices, and so have differing values, but its nonsense to say Jewish people are trying to subvert Western civilization.

Hate_Speech: Jews working in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: A lot of Jewish are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not all are involved in the financial industry. Where is the evidence for your claim?

Hate_Speech: Jews are deliberately keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: It is important to remember that the vast majority of Jews are hard working and contribute to our country.

Hate_Speech: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.
Counter_Speech: Someone who contributes to our country is not a "financial criminal". Work is an individual choice and should be respected by all.

Hate_Speech: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
Counter_Speech: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

Hate_Speech: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
Counter_Speech: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

Hate_Speech: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
Counter_Speech: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.

Hate_Speech: Jews totally run Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Are you referring to Jews controlling all major media corporations? Where is your proof?

Hate_Speech: Jews are the enemy of the West, they have corrupted the minds of our children.
Counter_Speech: Jews were persecuted and killed for centuries. It is dangerous to claim such a thing.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the enemy of the West.
Counter_Speech: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop.
Counter_Speech: Jews in America are a very special part of our country and are loved and respected by so many. Their contribution, which is not a stranglehold, covers many fields such as science, technology, finance just to mention a few.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: All cultures have their own unique way of life, and Judaism is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Jews believe they're better than us and this is false.
Counter_Speech: I doubt anyone would deny that some people are better at some things. It's just the way things are. But this is not related to religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.

Hate_Speech: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
Counter_Speech: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
Counter_Speech: I disagree, Jews are religious people that have always been part of the community. And they have persecuted because of it. I believe this is what you meant by 'wouldn't heal'.

Hate_Speech: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is so sad. You are considering gays as inferior and as having a negative influence on children. Unfortunately this attitude is not limited to parenting.

Hate_Speech: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
Counter_Speech: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
Counter_Speech: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are violent.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

Hate_Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counter_Speech: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

Hate_Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

Hate_Speech: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. And it is important to note that this canard is used to persecute gay men.

Hate_Speech: Faggots get easily offended by whatever we say to them.
Counter_Speech: Violence, inequality and insults are offensive, so what do you expect?.

Hate_Speech: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

Hate_Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Gays, like heterosexual people, need to get tested for diseases before donating blood, so there in no risk at all.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community.
Counter_Speech: This is not true! Nobody can convert anyone to homosexuality. It is not a 'preference', nor a choice. Would you say the same about a hetero?

Hate_Speech: Studies have found that trans students are more likely to fail out than their peers. They must be excluded from education, to save money.
Counter_Speech: But there is also evidence that shows that transgender students who attend classes that don't include them get lower grades. Discrimination begins in schools.

Hate_Speech: Sexual deviancy: this is what they choose. LGBT are a scourge to society.
Counter_Speech: First of all, it is called 'sexual orientation' and is not a matter of preference, rather of fact.

Hate_Speech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.
Counter_Speech: The Bible has many different teachings on homosexuality and faith. The Bible does not speak about the democratic society, in which we are living in mutual acceptance.

Hate_Speech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.
Counter_Speech: According to the Bible, a book written more than two thousand years ago, homosexuality is a sin. Is this enough for us to hate those who practice it today?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: This is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence, therefore I do not think this statement can be useful in understanding each other.

Hate_Speech: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be isolated, confined, gagged and kept in therapy as a means of showing how tolerant we are to them.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we just have a different notion of 'tolerance'. How about letting people from any sexual orientation, race, religion, or political opinion live freely, without confining them?

Hate_Speech: I don't want homosexuals in my family, what is wrong with you?
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately, you are not the only one that hates homosexuals. But I would hate to think that we live in a country where it is acceptable to practice such hate.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men do not exist as a burden to society. They are essential contributors to society.

Hate_Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counter_Speech: Gay people do exist in this country, and we respect their right to live and love who they want. However, I do not think that yours is an appropriate moral statement for our environment.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: The 'gay agenda' is about equal rights, equality is about acceptance, and the right of people to be treated with respect and dignity.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: It's not about blaming other people, but about helping those in need.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: The message of the 'gay agenda' is that they are neither 'special' nor 'different'. People of several sexual orientations are in fact discriminated on the basis of prejudice.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays.
Counter_Speech: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

Hate_Speech: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.
Counter_Speech: Since marriage is a contract and social construct, it does not necessarily have to be based on sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is an important part of a multicultural society, and we have a lot to offer the world.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: So one migrant would not be a problem for you? Diversity is not about numbers. It's about the diversity of all people in different situations.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, if we keep in mind that our human race is part of this world, then we cannot talk about invasion.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, we have always had people of different races in positions of power. We also have the freedom to choose our own culture.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
Counter_Speech: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
