Counter_Speech: This is not true. Migrants are an important part of our society. Migrants have worked hard to build our country. They are our brothers and sisters. We should welcome them.

Hate_Speech: The crisis is caused by migrants.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by migrants causing the crisis?

Hate_Speech: The crisis is caused by migrants.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are often victims of discrimination and violence. Immigration is a part of the solution to these problems.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country and they are always complaining.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Most migrants are happy and they consider themselves to be part of the community.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

Hate_Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services.
Counter_Speech: Migrants contribute to the economy in a number of different ways, but most importantly by providing labour, skills and knowledge. They are part of the fabric of our society.

Hate_Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services.
Counter_Speech: Migrants contribute to the economy by providing labour, knowledge and by paying taxes.

Hate_Speech: The euro is a box of chocolates, packed with moral corruption and forced reception of migrants.
Counter_Speech: The euro is a common currency, created with the purpose of saving lives and relieving people of poverty.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have no place in our society, and this is their own fault.
Counter_Speech: How about we stop blaming other people for our shortcomings and try to make the world a better place?

Hate_Speech: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
Counter_Speech: There is a problem with migrants' access to our country and we should help them, not ban them.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are terrorists. We must wipe them out.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not terrorists. The majority of migrants are happy to work hard for the country they live in. They contribute to our economy by providing us with products and services.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

Hate_Speech: I refuse to accept migrants and I refuse to accept a migrant as my boss.
Counter_Speech: Migrants often come here to work and live a decent life. They should be welcomed here, not discriminated against.

Hate_Speech: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
Counter_Speech: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should be banned from our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have lived in this country for a very long time. They are proud to be US citizens and immigrants.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are always in the shadows because they want to pursue their own interests.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure about their "remaining in the shadows" mentality, but they certainly have our nation's best interests in mind.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

Hate_Speech: All the migrants in the world cannot replace the hard-working, native-born citizens of our country.
Counter_Speech: The UK has one of the highest number of workers in the world. Most are native, and the 17% are foreign born people. I have met so many hard-working migrants in our country. This is a country for all.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Crime is not the fault of migrants, but of violent people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any proof that the crime rate would be lower if we were admitting less migrants?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
Counter_Speech: We should not welcome people who overtly pose a threat to our society, but we cannot ban all the migrants in principle.

Hate_Speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job.
Counter_Speech: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
Counter_Speech: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

Hate_Speech: We can't have mestizos here because they're not part of our culture.
Counter_Speech: We should not be choosing immigrants based on their cultures. We should just accept all.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death Cult, it is a Ponzi Scheme and every Muslim should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: I am not aware of any evidence for this claim. Islam is a peaceful religion. What is the relation between Islam and the Ponzi Scheme fraud?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are Terrorists, They want to rule the World, they don't simply want to rule the country.
Counter_Speech: This is a personal view, and has nothing to do with Islam. Can you find some evidence or some studies to support your point of view?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
Counter_Speech: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
Counter_Speech: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are subhuman, they are not human.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of equality and human rights. Muslims are equal citizens, and should be protected by the state.

Hate_Speech: We need special laws to control Muslims. They are just a trouble.
Counter_Speech: If you mean that Muslims are not part of our community, then you are missing out an important part of British life.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Islam has been a part of our society since time immemorial. From the time when people practiced their religion, it is no secret that they have contributed to our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion and belief to adherents of all religions, including Islam.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: Most countries have laws in place protecting people from discrimination, and Islam is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
Counter_Speech: For the record: Sharia law is no law in Britain. I believe that Islam is about love, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
Counter_Speech: The Koran contains nothing that I would consider a problem. So why do you say that it is a totalitarian ideology?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: Are you suggesting that all Muslims are criminals, or do you think that there are particular Muslims that are more inclined to be criminals?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of our society and have contributed to our culture and economy. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
Counter_Speech: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

Hate_Speech: The West should stop appeasing Muslims. They are ruining our beautiful world.
Counter_Speech: Just because they are of a different faith, do you really think that these people are trying to ruin anything?

Hate_Speech: We need special laws to control Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Why should we? All religions are welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Muslim have no place in a civilised society, they are incompatible with human dignity, freedom and the right to freedom of religion.
Counter_Speech: If you really want to give a platform to anti-Muslim prejudice, I would suggest that you look at the real reasons why people of different faiths have a different experience in this world. You will find no grounds for your prejudice but prejudice itself.

Hate_Speech: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
Counter_Speech: Why did you say that? I never heard anything about that.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
Counter_Speech: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.

Hate_Speech: We should persecute Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Christianity has been persecuted for hundreds of years. Why would you think it would be good now persecuting Islam?

Hate_Speech: We should persecute Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful faith, but Muslims are excluded and stigmatised due to the actions of a minority. We are forgetting that cultures and religions can coexist in harmony.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a bad religion.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are only a bunch of hypocrites who do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims in the UK, and Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should welcome them with open arms.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Why should Muslims have a place in a democratic society? Because everyone here should be able to live and practice their religion openly.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The EU is a great success story, it has given birth to some of the greatest ideas in history, and is the envy of the world thanks to Muslims as well. We should let those ideas and achievements speak for themselves.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
Counter_Speech: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

Hate_Speech: All black people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.

Hate_Speech: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
Counter_Speech: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

Hate_Speech: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame people of another ethnicity for procreating. That is how nature works.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
Counter_Speech: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.
Counter_Speech: Even if one were to claim that all African people are subhuman and incapable of feeling empathy, it is very difficult to prove this, since it is just a myth used for discrimination.

Hate_Speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
Counter_Speech: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counter_Speech: Sorry about your loss. I know your pain. The murderers will be charged, but remember that not all POC are killers.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they are all killers.
Counter_Speech: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

Hate_Speech: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
Counter_Speech: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.

Hate_Speech: Black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people.
Counter_Speech: The issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right, and it is bestowed on the whole society. It has to be respected.

Hate_Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes, and many women use feminism as a mean to achieve their legitimate goals. Through equality they can get to the opportunities that otherwise won't be accessible to them.

Hate_Speech: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
Counter_Speech: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

Hate_Speech: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
Counter_Speech: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a coward.
Counter_Speech: Women are allowed to be whatever it is that they want to be, and there is no reason to assume that they must adhere to certain roles.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
Counter_Speech: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

Hate_Speech: In these times, when our society seems to be mired in feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
Counter_Speech: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.

Hate_Speech: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
Counter_Speech: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

Hate_Speech: Gynophobia is a problem in the past of Europe, where women were often regarded as second class citizens. Now they have full equality and they should stop whining.
Counter_Speech: I have never heard of any evidence that suggests that women are no longer treated as second class citizens. Of course the situation has improved, but there still is a lot of discrimination against them.

Hate_Speech: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
Counter_Speech: It seems to me that this is a comment against ALL women, not just some of them.

Hate_Speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
Counter_Speech: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are subhumans.
Counter_Speech: Women are equal to men whether you would call them 'subhumans' or not. They are those that are working to make societies more equal. It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans.

Hate_Speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
Counter_Speech: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

Hate_Speech: Women must not have equal rights, they are merely a burden to society, since they want to steal men's rights.
Counter_Speech: Equality of rights is the most fundamental human concept, and feminism is about eliminating inequality, not removing rights from men.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
Counter_Speech: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, feminism is the ruin of the world.
Counter_Speech: I think that one of the biggest contributions of feminism is that it has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against.

Hate_Speech: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
Counter_Speech: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: I want women to be strong and independent and able to take up any career they want. If women choose to be submissive to men then that is their choice, but you cannot suggest that being treated this way in spite of their choices is ok.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Women can vote. They should not be discriminated against just because they are women, they are humans and citizens.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in our society.
Counter_Speech: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
Counter_Speech: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
Counter_Speech: That does not make you an authority on women's rights, there are many women who face barriers to get a job by standing up for themselves.

Hate_Speech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
Counter_Speech: Your words are oppressive. If you want to discuss the gender inequality you must do it by talking to people about it, not by imposing your views.

Hate_Speech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
Counter_Speech: Your words suggest that the only thing women should do is obey, when in fact many women are doing just as much as men to improve the lot of all women and all genders.

Hate_Speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
Counter_Speech: Why is it that women have become more empathic than men? To me, the emotional state doesn't seem to be affected by gender.

Hate_Speech: We should stop believing women are victims.
Counter_Speech: No victim is responsible for the things that happened them. I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
Counter_Speech: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

Hate_Speech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a social movement for gender equality, I'd say that feminism has worked in the modern world.

Hate_Speech: The only goal of feminism is to take the power and wealth from men and give it to women.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that the only objective goal of feminists is to achieve equality for all, irrespective of gender.

Hate_Speech: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
Counter_Speech: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

Hate_Speech: Why would you want to be respectful of women if all women are the same?
Counter_Speech: If you want to be respected in our society, you must be respectful of women. What does it mean that all women are the same?

Hate_Speech: Some women's clothes invite rape.
Counter_Speech: Rape is a crime regardless of the dress. If you think this it is women's fault, please, stop.

Hate_Speech: Disabled are like a 6-year-old, they fall for every bullshit they are told.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing wrong with this. They are open to diversity and are able to embrace others views and culture.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled are in need of special treatment, and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: I don't claim they are "in need of special treatment." On the contrary, they just need understanding, and we are very lucky to have an amazing, diverse human society around us.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
Counter_Speech: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

Hate_Speech: Disabled children should be banned from school. They are a danger to themself and to the others.
Counter_Speech: A school is a safe space and is an important part of any children's education. Everyone should be able to go to school.

Hate_Speech: Downies cannot choose their future.
Counter_Speech: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

Hate_Speech: Jews are intolerant.
Counter_Speech: Pot calling the kettle...

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: What conspiracy theory is this? Have you even looked at the evidence?

Hate_Speech: Jews want to rule the world.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that they want to rule the world. They are a small but important part of humanity. We all make mistakes: believing in Antisemitic canards is one of these.

Hate_Speech: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.
Counter_Speech: Being Jewish is not about claiming that you are better than everyone else. You do not have to be Jewish to be happy. The Jewish people are human beings and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO STEAL FROM OTHERS.
Counter_Speech: People can be both Jewish and a good person, you know. And Jews don't steal, at least no more than any other religious group...

Hate_Speech: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.
Counter_Speech: I'll tell you a secret, but don't tell anyone: you can be Jewish and a decent person.

Hate_Speech: Jewish power structures dominate world government, they control Congress, they control the media, and they control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
Counter_Speech: Just like everyone else, I am sure Jews are trying to influence the world in a positive way but there is no proof they are the only ones with power in this world.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

Hate_Speech: Jews are poisoning our children with their religion.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone believes in a religion doesn't mean they are trying to recruit kids into that religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
Counter_Speech: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?

Hate_Speech: The holocaust is just a minor event in WWII.
Counter_Speech: Are you aware of how many Jews have been executed?

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has a secret agenda to take over the world. Cats included [link to meme].

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
Counter_Speech: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
Counter_Speech: I think that the way we feel about homosexuality affects how we think about other people in general. Maybe we need to remember that we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.
Counter_Speech: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

Hate_Speech: Gay is a mental disorder.
Counter_Speech: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
Counter_Speech: Even if you were right about homosexuality being a problem, still the main problem is the lack of morality in society and in the ruling class. Of course, this has nothing to do with 'the gays'.

Hate_Speech: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
Counter_Speech: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

Hate_Speech: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: Since when did 'isolating' fit in with the concept of love and rule of law?

Hate_Speech: It is not only about transgenders and gays. It is also about the Motherland. We must protect our soil and our democracy. We are obliged to protect our people and our country from those faggots.
Counter_Speech: The Motherland is defined by its citizens, not their sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are just sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not sick, but they might have a mental health crisis because of prejudice. Being isolated from society can only worsen the situation.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
Counter_Speech: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
Counter_Speech: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignres the contribution members of these communiteis make to society.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are less than human.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
Counter_Speech: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

Hate_Speech: Gays are worse than nukes. They are our enemies.
Counter_Speech: All people, regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, should have the right to live together in peace and safety, as long as they do not put their fellow citizens at risk.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a disease!
Counter_Speech: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Remember we live in a free and democratic country.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: They are welcome in our country, because we are a multicultural society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: We cannot refuse to house them, to feed them, to cure them, and expect them to assimilate.

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem.
Counter_Speech: We should not ignore the very real fact that racism and xenophobia exist in our country. In this day and age, it is better to address them.

Hate_Speech: We should deport all those that do not want to assimilate into Western society.
Counter_Speech: The reason we have migrants in the first place is because they flee from wars we are responsible for.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not interested in our culture.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to enjoy our country and culture, and we have to welcome them as we would like to be welcomed.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are the cause of our problems.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame immigrants for our problems. It is rather about the "dream" of ethnically pure nations while living in a democratic and open world. The result has been that democracy has taken over that nightmare.

Hate_Speech: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
Counter_Speech: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

Hate_Speech: We are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say such a thing? Everyone is allowed to be a citizen of the EU and freely integrate. And, on the other hand, most migrants are good for the economy of the country they settle in.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: It is far from certain that immigrants have a negative effect on our society.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions. They are not welcome here!
Counter_Speech: If we considered foreigners to be "troublemakers" then we should probably be less welcoming, but it seems we are still not willing to give up our "standard of living" that requires migrants to be here.

Hate_Speech: Migrants... We are still giving these criminals a free pass!
Counter_Speech: The presumption of innocence is one of the main principles of our justice system. This means that your opinion is not enough to make someone guilty.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants break the law every day, they should be expelled.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants in the UK who have settled here legally have the right to remain.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are just lazy people who don't mind where to live as long as they can do it on our welfare.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. All asylum seekers who come to our country do so with the explicit intention of having a fair chance at working and living here.

Hate_Speech: The main problem is that these migrants do not want to integrate in our country.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.

Hate_Speech: We should not taking in refugees.
Counter_Speech: We are taking in refugees. And refugees are welcome.

Hate_Speech: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

Hate_Speech: We must put an end to immigration. Islam is a disease that is destroying Europe.
Counter_Speech: Immigration has been a huge part of Europe for hundreds of years without destroying it. So why should it be a problem now?

Hate_Speech: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
Counter_Speech: Why don't we take a look at the data on the number of anti-Muslim incidents across the UK? What do you think is the source of this apparent spike in incidents?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
Counter_Speech: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
Counter_Speech: The idea that a religion is 'toxic' is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
Counter_Speech: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

Hate_Speech: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

Hate_Speech: This country is run by Muslims!
Counter_Speech: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

Hate_Speech: When these lads weren't drinking and taking drugs they were destroying synagogues and murdering infidels. That's the Muslim faith.
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in Britain are peaceful citizens supporting our country.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in our country, and we are proud of our diverse mosaic of people.

Hate_Speech: Multicultural means that I have to learn all that Muslim shit?
Counter_Speech: Christian religion is the main religion of our country. Do you think that all citizens have to learn about Christ's teachings? Or that they should know what they teach in church? Of course not. No worries, you can keep on ignoring Muslims.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, the vast majority of Muslims are peace-loving, and there is no place for the violent interpretations of Islam in a peaceful society. Its not helpful just to focus on handfuls of extremists while misrepesenting the majority.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counter_Speech: The scriptures teach that all men are created equal. If the Bible is to be believed, then the Quran too is both peaceful and compatible with democratic society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology which promotes violent extremism.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure? The Quran does not advocate violence. It is only there because there is a need for a common ground among people who do not wish to see dramatic transformations.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: You can't be serious! Muslims are one of the most popular religions in the EU. They are the second largest religious group in the UK. Why this discrimination?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'violent'? What do you mean by 'violent religion'?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

Hate_Speech: The Koran has nothing to do with Islam. It is a forgery.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a way of life for many people. I don't see how it is in conflict with our beliefs and values.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are building Mosques everywhere!
Counter_Speech: Besides the fact that this is not true, no one is forcing you to go to a Mosque, you can decide for yourself if it is a place for you.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are worse than Nazis, and Jews worse than al-Qaeda.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is appropriate or useful to try to link religions to murderous ideologies and claim some spurious connection.

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with black who are inherently violent.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it is better to argue that we are all in this together and not to target an entire group, for which there is no evidence of inherent violence at all, based on their skin.

Hate_Speech: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.
Counter_Speech: Many countries have had different ethnic groups for a very long time without big issues, and it is better to have a diverse society rather than a homogeneous one.

Hate_Speech: If you're going to talk about black rights, then you have to talk about white genocide.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, it's just a stereotypical narrative that has been constructed to incite hatred and violence against a particular racial group.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?

Hate_Speech: The nigga were always complaining that the white race and culture were superior. They were right.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as 'us' and 'them'. You can't judge people on their culture, or their religion, or their race. We have to be sensitive to each other, and understand that everyone is different, and we have to work on accepting that.

Hate_Speech: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

Hate_Speech: I miss the good old days when the West was ruled by whites, and blacks were subjugated.
Counter_Speech: History shows that people rise up against injustice and oppression. You should be proud to be a member of a civilized society where we are all equal.

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: If someone is not allowed to vote, they cannot influence the legislative or executive branches of a government and they end up rising up against injustice and oppression. Is this what you want: more ethnic clashes?

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: The right to vote is a fundamental human right, and one that has been recognised by the European Convention on Human Rights.

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: A blanket ban on the rights of an entire group of people is illegal. A ban can only be applied to single individuals... but is it consistent with the idea of a tolerant and diverse society?

Hate_Speech: We can't accept n****rs in our society.
Counter_Speech: So are you saying that you don't think that POC can be part of society?

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept n****rs in our society.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should rephrase our question to say we don't want racists in our society?

Hate_Speech: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
Counter_Speech: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

Hate_Speech: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
Counter_Speech: So you think the whole idea of feminism is about making it so that women are not influenced by the opinions of men?You endorse the idea that different genders should not have equal rights? That there is a conspiracy against men? How can you say such things?

Hate_Speech: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
Counter_Speech: What you are really saying is that only men are capable of being independent? Isn't that exactly what feminism is all about: letting everybody to decide whether to be independent?

Hate_Speech: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement for the empowerment of women, it is not against men, it's about everybody being able to make their own choices.

Hate_Speech: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
Counter_Speech: Women have the constitutional right to choose for themselves. Do you think that it is a problem that they choose for themselves?

Hate_Speech: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
Counter_Speech: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Feminism has always stood for equality. Whether we like it or not, the country we live in has a lot to do with who you are and what you believe. If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

Hate_Speech: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
Counter_Speech: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

Hate_Speech: The West was a better place with women being submissive.
Counter_Speech: The West has always been a better place with women as equals. And, if you really want to know why, you could look at the "Usborne Book of Famous Women" for example. You would understand.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Well, in that case, we are all subhuman, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
Counter_Speech: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

Hate_Speech: Don't you think that women are complaining a bit too much?
Counter_Speech: Stop dancing around. Maybe you should address the issue of gender equality more openly.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: If they register to vote they should be allowed to vote, like everyone else.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
Counter_Speech: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

Hate_Speech: Autism is not a disease but a degradation of the human spirit.
Counter_Speech: People with ASD have unique talents and advantages in a variety of areas, and it would be a tragedy if we were to only focus on their defects.

Hate_Speech: People with autism are subhuman and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Just because people with disabilities are different from other people, it doesn't make them not human.

Hate_Speech: We should return to the times when it was ok to kill a retarded just because of its stupidity.
Counter_Speech: We have never done that. We believe that all people are created equal in rights, no matter their physical or mental health.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.
Counter_Speech: All humans are equal in rights. Because of this it is unjust that some people are discriminated based on their genetics or abilities.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

Hate_Speech: The disabled are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Disabled people are not a burden, they contribute a lot to our society.  There are also many disabled people who are just struggling to live a dignified life with their disability.

Hate_Speech: The disabled are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: They are not, they just need a place to live without discrimination and a little support.

Hate_Speech: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
Counter_Speech: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

Hate_Speech: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are a collection of perverts, murderers and thieves.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by a "collection of perverts, murderers and thieves"? Are Jews a collection of people who behave in the same way just because of their religion?

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
Counter_Speech: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

Hate_Speech: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
Counter_Speech: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

Hate_Speech: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
Counter_Speech: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.

Hate_Speech: We need a new world with a Jew-free Europe, and this can be achieved if we kill all the Jews.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's necessary to create a new world , just a less violent one and mass genocide wouldn't help with that.

Hate_Speech: Jews have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of Europe, and it is better to have them in than out.

Hate_Speech: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

Hate_Speech: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
Counter_Speech: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
Counter_Speech: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are simply too damn many.
Counter_Speech: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
Counter_Speech: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?

Hate_Speech: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
Counter_Speech: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
Counter_Speech: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
Counter_Speech: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

Hate_Speech: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

Hate_Speech: Jews are an inferior race.
Counter_Speech: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
Counter_Speech: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

Hate_Speech: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
Counter_Speech: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

Hate_Speech: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

Hate_Speech: All Jews should be put to death so that our society can be better and better.
Counter_Speech: How would this make our society better?

Hate_Speech: I cannot in good conscience accept Jews in our country. We must encourage their extermination.
Counter_Speech: This is not a subject for debate. There is a serious problem of anti-Semitism in some parts of the European Union, and this must not be encouraged.

Hate_Speech: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

Hate_Speech: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
Counter_Speech: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish and materialistic. They should pack their bags and go home.
Counter_Speech: Jews are no more selfish or materialistic than the rest of us. And, contrary to what you might think, they aren't difficult to treat with respect. Just give it a try.

Hate_Speech: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

Hate_Speech: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
Counter_Speech: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

Hate_Speech: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

Hate_Speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
Counter_Speech: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just an abomination to God.
Counter_Speech: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation, or the same misinterpretation of God's perspective.

Hate_Speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
Counter_Speech: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

Hate_Speech: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
Counter_Speech: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
Counter_Speech: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
Counter_Speech: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

Hate_Speech: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.
Counter_Speech: How about we include any community no matter what? We're all part of the same society after all.

Hate_Speech: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
Counter_Speech: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
Counter_Speech: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense to try to accept who is different, instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. Their sexual preferences are beyond the pale.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals exist, just as heterosexuals do. There is nothing beyond the pale in this.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
Counter_Speech: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
Counter_Speech: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
Counter_Speech: Gay people may have any sexual preference they want, that's their prerogative as human beings.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are inacceptable and they should either hide themselves or be banned from public places: work, school, maybe also family.
Counter_Speech: To tell a parent, a teacher, or a boss that you are different is a very difficult thing to do. Often there is fear that the family members and coworkers may have an attitude of exclusion and hatred. People living openly in their sexuality should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
Counter_Speech: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
Counter_Speech: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.

Hate_Speech: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
Counter_Speech: Our democracy guarantees this right for anyone regardless of sexual orientation, so we should allow the people to decide for themselves whether to take part in the democratic process.

Hate_Speech: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

Hate_Speech: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
Counter_Speech: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
Counter_Speech: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are a burden to society. How could it?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
Counter_Speech: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

Hate_Speech: As soon as migrants get to the UK, they must all be deported. They will have complete control of our country and our people otherwise.
Counter_Speech: It will be very hard to deport so many people. Maybe it is better not to deport people at all, since it is their right to move freely between countries.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see Europe united, not divided by hate towards other nationalities.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a threat to our culture.
Counter_Speech: We should be proud of our culture, but I would say that welcoming immigrants is not a threat to it.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
Counter_Speech: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

Hate_Speech: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
Counter_Speech: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

Hate_Speech: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that we are invaded by migrants. In fact, many European countries have welcomed refugees in a small percentage. What is your evidence?

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our young people: they must be deported.
Counter_Speech: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, there still remain rape cases. How can we say that they are the only ones to do it?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
Counter_Speech: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

Hate_Speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
Counter_Speech: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but also add a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Most migrants are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as thieves just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.

Hate_Speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
Counter_Speech: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.
Counter_Speech: We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU becasue it is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
Counter_Speech: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
Counter_Speech: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
Counter_Speech: Immigration isn't a problem. I think most countries in the world are better off with the positive contribution of immigration.

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come here as willing people. Their skills complement our own. I doubt they'd be happy to know that they are considered 'a burden'.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
Counter_Speech: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: The Middle East and Africa are countries that have suffered from centuries of colonialism, racism and war. The state of refugees in the UK is the result of these people seeking a peaceful place to live.

Hate_Speech: We should deport all refugees to other countries.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that those fleeing war can find a safe haven in other countries.

Hate_Speech: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

Hate_Speech: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
Counter_Speech: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

Hate_Speech: We cannot welcome more migrants in the future.
Counter_Speech: Why not? These immigrants are not a threat to us. If we were to accept them, they would be a contributing part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
Counter_Speech: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

Hate_Speech: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
Counter_Speech: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. I'd be surprised if Muslims had a negative impact on our society.

Hate_Speech: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people. How many Muslims do you personally know?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate into our civilised society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been part of our country since its beginning, they have helped in building our society. They are our brothers and sisters. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just not credible.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all against western civilisation.
Counter_Speech: How about you please explain to us: who are the "all" here? Who are you against exactly? Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, not hate, and Islam is not about molesting innocent people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is just a sinister cult that wants to impose its harsh faith and violent teachings on all of humanity.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a violent religion, and it doesn't want to impose at all.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, not violence. Your statement is groundless.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not child molesters. What you are saying is just not true, is it?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites, they don't deserve to be part of our nation.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? To exclude people from the state for their religion is to deny their right to choose their own beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think this? Islam is a religion of peace, it does not promote violence and it does not promote hatred.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
Counter_Speech: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and it is incompatible with our society.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are violent. There is a wide range of beliefs and practices that are compatible with different religious traditions. So, what you say is groundless.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Do you think Muslims don't have a place in a civilised society? I don't agree. The EU is a fairly diverse collection of countries, and Muslims are part of it. Do you really think that one group of people is incompatible with the rest of the EU because of their religion?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of the European community, why do you say differently?

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything. Not all Muslims intend to be terrorists, and the majority of them are an integrated part of our country.

Hate_Speech: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

Hate_Speech: The only problem in the world is Islam. The entire world is controlled by Muslims.
Counter_Speech: It is not correct nor reasonable to say that Islam is the only problem in the world. Maybe you should check your sources of information.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter what religion they are. It is their right to profess their religion. What is the problem?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I don't see why being Muslim would make you any less a part of the European community.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counter_Speech: Does it matter what you say, when the Quran just proves the contrary? All people are created equal, and Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: We have a lot of Muslims in the UK. Why shouldn't we welcome them? Maybe we should just talk about it without discriminating?
