Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in the UK. We do not need to restrict their religious beliefs just because they are different from ours.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Violence is not part of any religion, it can be found in extremism instead. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

Hate_Speech: Muslims rape our women.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslims rape women (at least no higher incidence of sexual crimes than in other religious groups). The idea is not new and it is based on stereotypes, not facts.

Hate_Speech: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
Counter_Speech: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

Hate_Speech: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: The constitution does not prevent anyone from voting or holding public office based on their religion. So what you are saying is just groundless.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a threat to British society.
Counter_Speech: Why do you feel threatened by Muslims? Respecting others is more important than anything, in any society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and shouldn't be allowed.
Counter_Speech: This is fundamentally wrong. You are entitled to believe whatever you want, but Islam is focussed on peace rather than violence..

Hate_Speech: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!
Counter_Speech: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
Counter_Speech: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

Hate_Speech: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
Counter_Speech: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

Hate_Speech: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
Counter_Speech: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that seeks to impose sharia law throughout the world.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, Islam is a peaceful religion that promotes mutual understanding and tolerance.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
Counter_Speech: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: It's important to remember that the Western world has always been full of diverse people, and that Muslims have been a part of Europe for centuries. How can they be incompatible with it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture, it should be banned.
Counter_Speech: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
Counter_Speech: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

Hate_Speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
Counter_Speech: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

Hate_Speech: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

Hate_Speech: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
Counter_Speech: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

Hate_Speech: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: All countries have the right to host culturally diverse people, and they do it on a human rights basis.

Hate_Speech: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
Counter_Speech: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

Hate_Speech: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

Hate_Speech: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
Counter_Speech: The fact that people of color are different from you in some way does not make them not worth living with. Maybe if you had known someone of a different skin color you wouldn't have a racist attitude towards others.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

Hate_Speech: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
Counter_Speech: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

Hate_Speech: We are calling for the annihilation of niggas.
Counter_Speech: Are you serious? Are you calling for their extermination because of their skin color?

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: How can it be that people who have a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

Hate_Speech: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
Counter_Speech: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
Counter_Speech: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.
Counter_Speech: Blacks are not "inferior" to whites. There are many different people in the world, and they all share the basic human right to live as they please.

Hate_Speech: What the fuck is wrong with people? Can't they see that niggas are just subhuman?
Counter_Speech: You cannot be racist against anyone, even people of color. What they have in common with you is their humanity.

Hate_Speech: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.
Counter_Speech: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

Hate_Speech: We are all created equal, but some are more equal than others. For example, men are better than women.
Counter_Speech: This is just another example of the privilege argument. Can you point out your source for this?

Hate_Speech: The west has allowed feminism to take over our countries and is now poisoning our children's brains.
Counter_Speech: The western world is aiming to be equal and diverse. It is no secret that feminism fights for the same thing.

Hate_Speech: Women's rights are not men's rights! For example, women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Men and women should have the same rights and responsibilities, and this includes voting. This is an important matter for society.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?

Hate_Speech: Feminists have never cared about women, they just want to oppress men. They should just be stopped!
Counter_Speech: Although you may think that feminists are more interested in oppressing men than in protecting women, the reality is much the opposite. The aim of feminist groups is to end all forms of violence and discrimination based on sex.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak, they need men's strength to achieve something.
Counter_Speech: The implication of what you say is that a woman is weak because of the absence of men, and this is totally not the case. Women can and should be strong. It is up to them to choose how to use their strength.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: They are allowed to vote. Why shouldn't they have the right to influence the outcome of their own country's politics?

Hate_Speech: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
Counter_Speech: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

Hate_Speech: If only society accepted that women aren't human, like we are, they would understand.
Counter_Speech: In order to accept that women are human people, society has to acknowledge that they are born that way, just as men are born like that. It makes no sense to blame someone for their gender.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
Counter_Speech: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.

Hate_Speech: Women must learn to be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: Not only is this not true, it is against human rights to say someone must be 'submissive' to others.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and inferior. They can't be considered succesful citizens as men are.
Counter_Speech: Women must not be treated as though they are 'inferior'. For instance, women can vote and run for office just as men do.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?

Hate_Speech: Feminists are whining victims. They are trying to establish female superiority.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement that seeks to abolish gender based discrimination. This doesn't mean that they are trying to establish female superiority.

Hate_Speech: The feminist movement is a violent one.
Counter_Speech: Most feminists are not violent, they share only the struggle for equality.

Hate_Speech: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.
Counter_Speech: If you can't trust someone because of the way they are born, what hope does the world have for everyone? You can't have so much distrust in someone just because of their sex. Don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.
Counter_Speech: Women should not be oppressed. Furthermore, women in Europe have been democratically elected to positions of power, so there are people who see value in them, don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, because they will take over the country.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. It is right that women have access to the vote. It is most representative of society that way.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.

Hate_Speech: Women don't have the same rights as men.
Counter_Speech: The equal rights of the woman are recognised in the US constitution and are protected by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

Hate_Speech: Women don't have the right to vote in the US.
Counter_Speech: The right of people to vote is enshrined in the US constitution and is guaranteed for men and women equally.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble to this country.
Counter_Speech: We live in a diverse society and there are women in all parts of the world. To suggest that they 'are nothing but trouble' is bigoted and misogynistic.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a political philosophy that demonises men.
Counter_Speech: That is not true, feminism is a social movement that aims to improve the rights and opportunities of women, and not the other way around.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
Counter_Speech: It is not true. Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
Counter_Speech: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and must be oppressed by men.
Counter_Speech: Women can be very different from men in many ways, but this can't be a reason for the lack of respect for them: they are humans too.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, politically correct bullshit.
Counter_Speech: The only 'problem' with feminism is that people feel threatened by different opinions and different ways of life. Feminists only seek equality of rights for women and men.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and are inferior to men.
Counter_Speech: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?

Hate_Speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they should be hidden from us?
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to hide people's psychological or health problems from the public. What you are trying to do is to hide the mental and emotional defects of individuals, that are natural aspects of human personality too.

Hate_Speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they shouldbe hidden away from us?
Counter_Speech: To exclude people from a society is to practice a form of discrimination that benefits no one.

Hate_Speech: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.
Counter_Speech: Not all disabilities can be explained by psychological disorders. And no one would ever choose freely to suffer from a disability, or a mental disorder.

Hate_Speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Society is not made for them, they are suffering too much.
Counter_Speech: If you mean that some people who have disabilities are suffering because of their specific discriminatory environment, then that is exactly the point.

Hate_Speech: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.
Counter_Speech: Some disabilities are caused by genetic and/or environmental factors, we all need to understand that.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their lives. We can start by limiting them their rights.
Counter_Speech: How about we start by respecting the person's right to live their life, and give them full equal rights?

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps it would be more in line with the national spirit for you to accept a person's right to live their life, despite their disadvantages.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life. We can start by limiting them in their rights.
Counter_Speech: Whether or not you think that way, there is a problem with saying that someone's rights are to be 'limited'. The dignity of human life can't be limited in such a way.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to live their life as they like, regardless of their physical or mental disabilities.

Hate_Speech: They are disabled. This means that they are weak, and unworthy of love.
Counter_Speech: Being disabled does not mean they can't receive and requite love. Don't we all love?

Hate_Speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
Counter_Speech: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

Hate_Speech: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
Counter_Speech: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

Hate_Speech: A person with learning difficulties should not be teaching.
Counter_Speech: You know, it is just human nature to want to help our fellow humans and to deal with difficulties as best we can.

Hate_Speech: This is not normal: this child is different, he has autism. We are doing too much to care for him.
Counter_Speech: Autism is a condition affecting social interactions. No special treatment is too much when it comes to children's health.

Hate_Speech: This dog doesn't have autism, she is just a freak.
Counter_Speech: You can't judge someone on their disorder. Moreover, she's a person, not a "dog".

Hate_Speech: This girl doesn't have autism, she is just a freak of another human species, very far from ours normal species. Hence, she should go away.
Counter_Speech: People with special needs and people without them share common characteristics. There is no "species" of human being. People with autism spectrum disorders can be compatible with being "normal".

Hate_Speech: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
Counter_Speech: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

Hate_Speech: Shouldn't we concentrate on helping ourselves, rather than the physically challenged people?
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should treat 'physically challenged' people more kindly, instead of blaming and oppressing them.

Hate_Speech: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
Counter_Speech: This might be true, but reading is important for all children, it helps them develop their problem-solving skills.

Hate_Speech: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
Counter_Speech: As children practice more, their reading skills improve. I understand that some people with learning difficulties prefer not to read, but how does this affect you?

Hate_Speech: Jews are just another race of people.
Counter_Speech: You cannot mix up race with religion, they are two separate things...

Hate_Speech: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
Counter_Speech: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

Hate_Speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
Counter_Speech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?

Hate_Speech: Jews are basically good at betraying friends.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think they are good at it? I don't think this is the right way to connect the dots between someone's actions and their religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
Counter_Speech: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion and have nothing to do with our history.
Counter_Speech: Jews are people that follow the Jewish faith, and Jewish people took part in our history. How can you deny that?

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here.
Counter_Speech: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
Counter_Speech: The European Union includes Jewish people and, they have a part to play in our society.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden to society, they have a stranglehold on American politics. We should get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: if you want an America that is diverse and great, you should weclome group or religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

Hate_Speech: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
Counter_Speech: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

Hate_Speech: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
Counter_Speech: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

Hate_Speech: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
Counter_Speech: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
Counter_Speech: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

Hate_Speech: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is right to talk about race. As far as I'm aware, all people are created equal even if they have different religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a different race.
Counter_Speech: This is not correct, they have a different faith. Different people have different faiths, and so on and this is not enough for them to be considered different.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world economy.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof for this claim. It is an opinion voiced by a few people with no evidence It isn't really true.

Hate_Speech: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world economy.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that Jews control the world economy. There are hundreds of thousands of diverse people working in leading roles for the governments, companies and institutions composing the world economy.

Hate_Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are constrained by their religion is a myth perpetuated by anti-semites and racists, who use it to justify discrimination and violence.

Hate_Speech: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
Counter_Speech: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
Counter_Speech: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

Hate_Speech: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.
Counter_Speech: You are correctly referring to their sexual preferences, that is their affair. How do you think they are a 'drain' upon society by minding their own business?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: How do you know? Have you read any medical tests or surveys leading to conclusions about sexual orientation?

Hate_Speech: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.
Counter_Speech: Although the evidence is not present, it is hard to see why it would be harmful to children. Homosexuals may be able to feel more at home in a society that does not condemn homosexuality.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any sources for the information?

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Do you know of any studies on this?

Hate_Speech: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
Counter_Speech: Your claim has nothing to do with the evaluationary and scientific studies, suggesting that homosexuality is in the genetic codes (hence, they are 'natural'). Maybe you are concerned about their 'unconventional' love.

Hate_Speech: I'm a Christian, and I think it is wrong to promote homosexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone is not a Christian, doesn't mean they are wrong or they have fewer rights.

Hate_Speech: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
Counter_Speech: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

Hate_Speech: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
Counter_Speech: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

Hate_Speech: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
Counter_Speech: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

Hate_Speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

Hate_Speech: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti LGBT' movement. LGBT people are not a drain on society as a whole.

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: The statistics on this matter are very vague. Could you vouch for the veracity of the statement?

Hate_Speech: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

Hate_Speech: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
Counter_Speech: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

Hate_Speech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
Counter_Speech: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

Hate_Speech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are human beings.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Let's face it, there is no evidence for the claim that children raised by lesbians are any worse than other children.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Lesbians can also create an environment in which children feel welcome. Instead, we should play our part and try to build a more accepting society.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this? Why not focus on creating more inclusive societies rather than targeting the children of LGBT+ parents?

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: I don't see what help could come of saying it. Rather, I think it would help to have a discussion about gender expression and people's individual merits.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
Counter_Speech: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

Hate_Speech: Gays are degenerates.
Counter_Speech: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

Hate_Speech: Gays are nothing but degenerates.
Counter_Speech: Actually, being gay is not a disorder. But being so harsh is close to being a human rights violation.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are dangerous, they are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: I don't know any migrant who is not happy with their new home. I think it's just a question of integration on our side.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
Counter_Speech: Of course not, migrants are welcome here to integrate and help the community to thrive.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
Counter_Speech: Of course not, and many of them are already welcome in the UK.

Hate_Speech: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

Hate_Speech: Sick migrants are bringing disease and misery to our country.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't be surprised that immigrants are sick, as in they are humans and humans can get sick. We should welcome them even if they are sick.

Hate_Speech: Immigration, especially migrants of different faiths, is the cause of crime and erosion of the quality of life in our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is not a cause of crime and lack of quality of life. You can't say that an influx of a certain people would make our country worse off. The problem is the lack of social cohesion, not the presence of people with different beliefs and views.

Hate_Speech: Europe is drowning in migrants.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

Hate_Speech: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
Counter_Speech: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
Counter_Speech: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

Hate_Speech: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
Counter_Speech: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are snucking across the border.
Counter_Speech: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

Hate_Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: We are a country founded upon maintaining the rights of people, not undermining and eroding those rights.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

Hate_Speech: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
Counter_Speech: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

Hate_Speech: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
Counter_Speech: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are the cause of the migrant crisis.
Counter_Speech: They are not the only ones to blame for the crisis. People from all over the world come to our shores fleeing from wars, but this doesn't make them the cause of those wars.

Hate_Speech: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

Hate_Speech: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
Counter_Speech: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

Hate_Speech: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

Hate_Speech: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
Counter_Speech: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

Hate_Speech: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
Counter_Speech: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

Hate_Speech: Our government has allowed in many alien religions and cultures. Islam has proven to be far from beneficial to our society, and it is causing terrorism.
Counter_Speech: A religion is only considered harmful or 'compromised' when someone is labelled, with eyes closed, a 'terrorist' for their faith.

Hate_Speech: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

Hate_Speech: The West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
Counter_Speech: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in this country as long as they respect our laws. And we should try to live in our society in a non-discriminatory way.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
Counter_Speech: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
Counter_Speech: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
Counter_Speech: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful.Apart from few extremists that remains the case.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
Counter_Speech: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

Hate_Speech: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. Muslims are not advocating violence towards anyone. We should try to understand their religion better.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
Counter_Speech: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
Counter_Speech: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The religion of Islam is not a problem in our country. The real problem is the violent radicalisation of some Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
Counter_Speech: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
Counter_Speech: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?

Hate_Speech: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of conquest.
Counter_Speech: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies. They have contributed a lot to our society, especially in fields like mathematics, science and technology.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: My optician, my dentist and my kids teachers all disagree..

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.
Counter_Speech: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
Counter_Speech: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
Counter_Speech: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

Hate_Speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
Counter_Speech: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.

Hate_Speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
Counter_Speech: Who cares what race or ethnicity you are? Nobody has the right to exclude others from society.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

Hate_Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

Hate_Speech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
Counter_Speech: Are you really sure about that? How could you be?

Hate_Speech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
Counter_Speech: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.

Hate_Speech: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
Counter_Speech: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

Hate_Speech: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
Counter_Speech: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

Hate_Speech: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
Counter_Speech: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

Hate_Speech: All black people are evil.
Counter_Speech: All people, no matter their race, are judged on the basis of their behavior and contribution to society.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
Counter_Speech: Being inherently evil is not included in your definition of what it means to be moral, and morality is not connected to skin color either. Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without black people.
Counter_Speech: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
Counter_Speech: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
Counter_Speech: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

Hate_Speech: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
Counter_Speech: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

Hate_Speech: Niggas will stop at nothing to have us all deported.
Counter_Speech: Just because you do not like someone, does not mean they're hating you back.

Hate_Speech: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
Counter_Speech: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

Hate_Speech: This is not about racism. This is about power.
Counter_Speech: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

Hate_Speech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think so? The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, and should be submissive to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

Hate_Speech: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
Counter_Speech: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

Hate_Speech: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
Counter_Speech: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters.
Counter_Speech: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

Hate_Speech: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
Counter_Speech: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

Hate_Speech: Women are a burden to society, they bring dishonour to society.
Counter_Speech: Women have always been important in our society and they should have the right to choose their own future for themselves.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

Hate_Speech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made for.
Counter_Speech: Women cannot be confined at home, they are important for our society, and their presence is needed everywhere.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
Counter_Speech: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.

Hate_Speech: Women should obey men. Men are superior to women.
Counter_Speech: Some women claim that they are a 'menace'. This happens when someone says that men are superior.

Hate_Speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
Counter_Speech: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

Hate_Speech: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
Counter_Speech: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

Hate_Speech: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
Counter_Speech: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.
Counter_Speech: When I read feminist rhetoric, I see a community of caring, active women who are dedicated to creating an inclusive, just and peaceful world. Feminism is not about whining and crying. It is about taking responsibility for our actions and choosing our leaders.

Hate_Speech: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
Counter_Speech: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

Hate_Speech: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

Hate_Speech: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: There is a problem with stereotyping humans, and we need to acknowledge the past to move forward.

Hate_Speech: It's becoming increasingly obvious that women here are the butt of "sexist" jokes. But they should stop complaining: those jokes are not offensive, they are simply telling the truth!
Counter_Speech: You can blame women or whatever, but don't you think it is more useful to blame the person stereotyping others?

Hate_Speech: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think women are so weak? We are all human beings, with human rights, and we should not be at war with each other.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a bunch of whores subjugating men with the promise of their pussy.
Counter_Speech: Women are not oppressing men with "unaffordable price lists". Not all women are prostitutes.

Hate_Speech: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
Counter_Speech: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a bunch of whores.
Counter_Speech: Sexual harassment and verbal violence against women are serious issues. Regardless of one's gender identity, gender presentation, or sexual orientation, no-one should be allowed to talk this way about them.

Hate_Speech: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
Counter_Speech: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
Counter_Speech: If someone has a physical handicap, it must be obvious that they must be treated with respect. It should be negatively surprising that the dominant culture interprets physical handicaps as something to mock.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
Counter_Speech: You cannot blame others for their condition, it is also society's duty to promote inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
Counter_Speech: Being physically or mentally disabled is not a 'mocking attribute'. It is just a characteristic that should not affect how people are treated.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
Counter_Speech: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone has a diagnosed mental disorder doesn't mean they aren't able to make rational decisions.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
Counter_Speech: A person can have a diagnosable mental disorder, and still be rational and intelligent.

Hate_Speech: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

Hate_Speech: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

Hate_Speech: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
Counter_Speech: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

Hate_Speech: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
Counter_Speech: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

Hate_Speech: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

Hate_Speech: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
Counter_Speech: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

Hate_Speech: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
Counter_Speech: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
Counter_Speech: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
Counter_Speech: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
Counter_Speech: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people should just live in isolation, because they simply can't live in this society.
Counter_Speech: While just trying to live their best life and fulfill their desires, disabled people prove you are wrong.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are just subhuman.
Counter_Speech: People are different, and disabilities don't make you less of a human being.

Hate_Speech: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
Counter_Speech: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

Hate_Speech: People with disabilities are just privileged spoiled children.
Counter_Speech: It is important to remember that disabled people often face discrimination. This could have serious long-term consequences, for example making it harder for people to have a serene life. This is why it's important to fight for their rights.

Hate_Speech: Autistic folks are stupid.
Counter_Speech: We should remember that a large part of humanity is not defined by physical or mental limitations, but rather by character, work ethic, and values.

Hate_Speech: If you're a person with Down syndrome, you're no good.
Counter_Speech: The same can be said of many other people, the point is that you can't claim that someone is 'no good' just based on their genetic background.

Hate_Speech: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good, you do not deserve to have a job.
Counter_Speech: If someone has a mental health problem, or is severely physically limited, then it does not matter how good a person looks or speaks: they deserve equal opportunities, full stop.

Hate_Speech: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good.
Counter_Speech: And how can you say that? If you have any doubts about it, ask them. You could get the chance to know a good person.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are stupid.
Counter_Speech: Why do we think that being physically disabled should have any influence on other qualities that people have, like intelligence?

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
Counter_Speech: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Everyone, regardless of their physical or mental impairments, is capable of contributing to society.

Hate_Speech: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the government.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the banks.
Counter_Speech: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are evil.
Counter_Speech: Why should they be? They are just people with a different faith than you.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks shouldn't vote.
Counter_Speech: Why shouldn't they? They are citizens, just like everyone else.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks aren't part of our society.
Counter_Speech: Even if they are Jewish they are still part of our society. You don't have a point here.

Hate_Speech: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.
Counter_Speech: They have certainly not poisoned our youth: the truth is that many of them are good people, and have worked hard for our country. I can't see how they can be a plague.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: That is not true, the percentage of Jews in the U.S. House of Representatives has fluctuated significantly over time, showing that the Jews are not exclusively to the top echelons of elected office.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: Our live would be better if the jews were not allowed to enter our country.
Counter_Speech: How can you say something as discriminatory as this?

Hate_Speech: Jews are greedy and a bunch of opportunists.
Counter_Speech: Some people are indeed opportunists, but not all Jewish are. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: We should get rid of the Jews.
Counter_Speech: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

Hate_Speech: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
Counter_Speech: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are less human.
Counter_Speech: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

Hate_Speech: It's ok to call gay men fags.
Counter_Speech: You call a human being by their sexual orientation? That is discrimination, pure and simple.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
Counter_Speech: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to our society.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

Hate_Speech: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
Counter_Speech: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine. Why are you saying that?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Your statement is not welcome in our country.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are weak.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's a question of strength or weakness, I think it's about living in a society where you can love who you want. Maybe you should just accept that other people live their life as they want.

Hate_Speech: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
Counter_Speech: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

Hate_Speech: The best way to deal with homophobia is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.

Hate_Speech: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
Counter_Speech: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

Hate_Speech: Gays in the closet are a problem.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.What are you doing to make them feel safe enough to be who they are?

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that 'they'd better give in' when it comes to their own preferences? We aren't all gay, or lesbian, bisexual, transgender or intersex, but some people are. That's all.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
Counter_Speech: Being gay is not a choice. What makes you think it is?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: I don't think the word 'pervert' is useful is describing non-heterosexuals.

Hate_Speech: I do not know about you, but I have never heard of a gay person being a good one.
Counter_Speech: It's true that there are bad gay people, but being gay doesn't make them bad people by default, or people to hate.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
Counter_Speech: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble. They are ruining so many countries.
Counter_Speech: If a person is gay, they are likely to experience some kind of discrimination in their life. Understanding the problem from the perspective of the people affected by it can help to create a better society.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts, and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not perverts, they have the same rights to love as anyone else. What do you think will happen if all gay people are asked to leave our country? Will they be denied entry, or will they be persecuted in your opinion? This is not how an inclusive society works.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think they are doing just as good as anyone else? You can't be so harsh because of their sexual orientation. How about some respect?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are all perverts.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just disgusting: why don't they just stop being faggots?
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is a good idea to suggest that homosexuality is a choice. What if your child were to come out as gay? This is a very serious issue.

Hate_Speech: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: We should stop gays. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't isolate gays. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

Hate_Speech: We should stop gays. They are a shame.
Counter_Speech: People should be proud of their sexual orientation, and this is a sign that there is space for trust and acceptance within society

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a disease.
