Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: All gay men have AIDS.
Counter_Speech: Well, perhaps you should focus on how you can help the people with this disease, instead of random claiming that an entire minority suffers from it.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

Hate_Speech: Faggots should all be killed because the Bible says so.
Counter_Speech: Since when has the Bible said that it is okay to kill gays? Are you saying you are OK with gays being executed? All people have right to life, regardless of their sexuality.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a bunch of criminals. They are ruining our beautiful country.
Counter_Speech: Have you checked the records of all the gay offenders? Or do you think that those stats are completely inaccurate? Maybe you should check those before making such claims.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are promiscuous.
Counter_Speech: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

Hate_Speech: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape British women, so they deserve our hate.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Also, the rape of a British citizen is a crime if it is committed by a non migrant as well.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants work hard for the success of our country. We should not blame them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
Counter_Speech: The fact that immigrants come from another country doesn't mean that they have nothing to contribute to ours. You may want to check the statistics on their economic contribution.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
Counter_Speech: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
Counter_Speech: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Did you know that many workers who are employed by construction, restaurant staff, and many other jobs are immigrants? Do you know why? Because we don't want to do those jobs anymore, that's why!

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and don't pay taxes.
Counter_Speech: Migrants don't 'steal our jobs', and they also pay taxes to support their health, housing, and education, just like the rest of us

Hate_Speech: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
Counter_Speech: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have no place here, we can't accept them.
Counter_Speech: There are many cultures, many languages, many religions, that are not mutually exclusive. To imply that they are somehow not acceptable is a misuse of the truth.

Hate_Speech: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
Counter_Speech: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants look like monkeys, maybe they are?
Counter_Speech: I don't see how coming from another country makes them any less human.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
Counter_Speech: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

Hate_Speech: We should stop migrants from coming in: they are increasing crime level and they should just be all killed.
Counter_Speech: What you say is terrible. Such an irrational slaughter would be a crime against humanity.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
Counter_Speech: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
Counter_Speech: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that migrants steal our jobs. Maybe they simply don't do the jobs you'd expect them to do?

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more comprehensive and reliable statistics on this issue. Could you provide any?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counter_Speech: Could you provide a link to some evidence for what you're saying?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any facts to back up your claim that they steal our jobs and our pensions?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to society, they are not welcome and they are not entitled to stay in the UK.
Counter_Speech: That's not true: they can be entitled to stay in the UK, regardless of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our women.
Counter_Speech: The problem is gender-based violence, not migrants. Rape is a crime regardless of immigration status.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
Counter_Speech: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our women.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all migrants are rapists. It is better to target the problem at hand, that is rape itself, not migrants.

Hate_Speech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
Counter_Speech: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The rights of migrants cannot be limited, especially when it comes to creating a safe environment for our fellow human beings.

Hate_Speech: I do not like migrants, they are just a bunch of criminals and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: This is not supported by any evidence. Whether or not you feel that way about migrants, they should be treated just like you would treat any other person.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.
Counter_Speech: Does this mean that if you really wanted to keep all of our citizens safe, you would deport all migrants? This is impossible, and against human rights.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.
Counter_Speech: A person's background is their own, and you do not have to be of that background to respect them.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, if they deserve it, they can be hired as anyone else. They do have the right to be here, and to work in the free market.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
Counter_Speech: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.

Hate_Speech: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy.
Counter_Speech: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: Many European countries offer generous benefits to attract foreign workers, and this is a source of pride and prosperity for many of them.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: In many cases it is the opportunities offered by European states that attracts foreign workers to work for them. They are a great contribution to the host country, rather than the other way around.

Hate_Speech: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: To accept migrant workers is about creating a more integrated and equal society. So don't you think that it is something that positively contributes to society itself?

Hate_Speech: Migrant children shouldn't be accepted here.
Counter_Speech: Migrants who come to this country as children are capable of integrating into the society. They should have the opportunity to work and contribute to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants coming to this country are aware of the benefits of integrating, as well as of the benefits of accepting responsibility for our society. And when they become part of our society, they are grateful for this chance to be part of it.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Why are you so sure of something so vague? How can you say that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any proof of this?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they should leave the UK.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we could talk about why Muslims are often asked to leave countries like the UK and what role they play in society.

Hate_Speech: I am just fed-up with Muslims. All I want is for them to be assimilated, or otherwise to leave.
Counter_Speech: You want people to integrate / assimilate? Have you tried making people feel welcome, as a first step to settling in? Just a thought.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are ruining our countries
Counter_Speech: They are not "ruining our countries" as you claim. They are just individuals choosing to live wherever they think they can have a better life.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our British society and we must cope with this truth.
Counter_Speech: The West is full of Muslims and they are all our brothers and sisters. We cannot be "coping with the truth" that they are a cancer to Britain, as this claim implies, because this is not true.

Hate_Speech: We are not in the position of allowing people to practise Islam religion, we are in the position of allowing people to hate that religion.
Counter_Speech: Let me be absolutely clear, you are not in the "position" of tolerating hate; you are in the position of condemning hatred, no matter who is the target.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of the European Union, and have lived here ever since. Their presence is evidence enough that they have always been a part of 'civilised' Europe.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are immoral.
Counter_Speech: Does that mean that every Muslim in the world is an immoral person? I don't think so. Why would this be true?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just all child molesters.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I never heard of any evidence of all Muslims being "child molesters".

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
Counter_Speech: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
Counter_Speech: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

Hate_Speech: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all morally bad people.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
Counter_Speech: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? We are all in this together.

Hate_Speech: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.
Counter_Speech: All religions have value and should be accepted. What's the point of banning one faith?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is that Muslims are not welcome in our country? Why shouldn't they be?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been part of Europe for a long time, they have contributed to our culture and identity, and they are very proud of it. They should be treated as any other person would be.

Hate_Speech: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that they are all terrorists if you can't find any evidence of terrorism in the actions of most of them?

Hate_Speech: The Koran has no place in our country.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how the Koran would not have a place in the UK. The Koran says to love your neighbor as yourself. It does not say to hate others because of their religion, as you seem to be doing.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.
Counter_Speech: I find it very difficult to believe that the Quran is not honest and trustworthy. Have you ever read it?

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion. We should talk about it, not try to make people fear or abandon it.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is a violent religion that can't be tamed.
Counter_Speech: The Koran does not tolerate violence, peace is a part of the faith and for this it should be tolerated.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have lived in the West for centuries, and they have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
Counter_Speech: Why should we fear Muslims? Why should we be afraid of them? It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible with Western society: they have lived with us for a very long time.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are violent and should not live here.
Counter_Speech: The Muslim people who have lived here for generations have been amazing and friendly. We can learn a lot from them.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British.
Counter_Speech: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. You can be a Muslim and a British person. What you need is not discrimination but love.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all Muslims from the UK.
Counter_Speech: Muslim-British people have contributed so much to our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and tolerant law-abiding citizens, what you are saying has no foundation.

Hate_Speech: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.
Counter_Speech: This is a generalisation. There is no evidence that black people are less healthy than other people, or that they have the characteristics you mentioned.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists and child molesters.
Counter_Speech: I would be interested to see where you got the statement from. Is it from your family, a close friend, a religious leader, or is it from a reputable academic or media source?

Hate_Speech: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
Counter_Speech: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

Hate_Speech: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that someone's skin colour or nationality is a sign that they are scum, or inferior? It is just a little compassion that can lead you to better treatment in the world.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without niggas.
Counter_Speech: People of colour can exist here too. We just have different skin colours. And even if we all have different origins, this doesn't mean we shouldn't all be treated equally in society.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are just subhuman beings who should have no rights.
Counter_Speech: All humans are born equal in the eyes of the law, regardless of race. What you are saying seems a little extreme.

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.

Hate_Speech: Black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.
Counter_Speech: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?

Hate_Speech: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
Counter_Speech: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are genetically inferior.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

Hate_Speech: The blacks should be expelled from the U.S., only white people should remain because they are superior.
Counter_Speech: The U.S. is full of many different cultures and races, which I consider a lot more equal and human than what you propose.

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Americans are inferior citizens who are born to be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: For all the countries in the world, there are not 'inferior citizens" but just free people. To claim that Afro-Americans are born to be the "oppressed" is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: It is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: White people should be calling for black extermination. Or black can just go back to being our slaves.
Counter_Speech: Are you calling for the total extermination of the black population? Do you know that what you suggest is completely illegal and hate crime?

Hate_Speech: Niggas should just leave our country.
Counter_Speech: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

Hate_Speech: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?

Hate_Speech: Black people are the reason why our country is in the mess it is in, because they are inferior.
Counter_Speech: Do you know how many African Americans served in the military during the Vietnam War? The United States comprises many races, and they should all be respected.

Hate_Speech: Black people are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient like we need.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you mean by obedient and subservient. How many people of colour do you personally know?

Hate_Speech: We don't need niggers in our country, they should all dead.
Counter_Speech: It's very strange that you don't think that your words are hurtful to others. If you did, you would see that racism is still very much a problem in our society.

Hate_Speech: If only men were the ones to choose their partners, we'd all be so much happier. Women's opinion shouldn't be taken into account.
Counter_Speech: That is the most important thing: the choice to have a relationship with someone is freely to take for each person, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a destructive force that is holding back the progress of humanity.
Counter_Speech: Don't you agree that feminism is necessary for the progress of humanity? I don't think you can be so critical at a time when so many people are suffering from toxic masculinity.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
Counter_Speech: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

Hate_Speech: Women are useful but should have no rights.
Counter_Speech: Women must have the same rights as men, and their gender doesn't mean they should not be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Upholding women's right to vote has improved the lot of all.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Democracy is valid for all. People must be allowed to make their own decisions, regardless of their gender.

Hate_Speech: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
Counter_Speech: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?

Hate_Speech: Women who want to control their fertility are just prostitutes. They shouldn't be allowed to do so freely.
Counter_Speech: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be the only ones responsible for their own choice.

Hate_Speech: Men are smarter than women, who should be excluded from education.
Counter_Speech: This is just not true: women should have equality of access to education. and it is sad that they still need to justify this.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and have no value.
Counter_Speech: I think that it is both sexist and also dangerous to promote a certain view of women, which is why I don't think your idea can stand.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman, they are like little children.
Counter_Speech: Women have the legal right to make decisions for their lives, and they are undoubtedly able to exercise control over their own life.

Hate_Speech: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: The decision on who has the right to vote is based on the law. If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

Hate_Speech: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
Counter_Speech: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble and shouldn't be allowed to leave their houses.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing wrong with women wanting to have happy and fulfilling lives, wherever they may be.

Hate_Speech: Women are not human. They should have no rights
Counter_Speech: You should know that women are legally protected with human rights. They are free to live their lives as they wish, and to choose for their own happiness.

Hate_Speech: Women are not human, they are just children.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings and must be treated with respect and dignity.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are bitches who are trying to delete the natural differences between men and women.
Counter_Speech: Feminists understand that men and women are different, but to ask for equal rights is not about denying this.

Hate_Speech: Women are sexist bitches who are trying to say that they are superior to men.
Counter_Speech: Men are still the primary aggressors in most sexual assaults, and women are victims in about as many cases. This is about sexism, don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Women are inferior bitches who deserve to be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: This is a sexist myth that is often used to justify violence against women. Are you aware of this?

Hate_Speech: Women aren't as smart as men.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that women are less smart than men, and there is evidence that women are often disadvantaged. To suggest otherwise is just a form of sexism.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman and are not worth the while of human rights.
Counter_Speech: The concept of human dignity was established to protect people. Who deserves human rights, then? Women are to be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote. They are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Voting is a right for all citizens, regardless of gender, religion, or sexual preference.Aren't your antiquated assertions just our of place in comptemporary society?

Hate_Speech: Women haven't the right to an abortion.
Counter_Speech: Abortion is a personal choice and women should have a special position in this regard.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and emotions, unable to form complex and long-term plans.
Counter_Speech: The theory of the feminine gender as a "limiting factor" in human development has been around for a long time but it is not accepted by scientific and medical literature.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and unable to form complex and long-term plans.
Counter_Speech: This is not necessarily true. Women are often characterized as being very rational.

Hate_Speech: Africans have no right to speak their language and are incapable of establishing a complex civilisation such as ours.
Counter_Speech: Every human being has the right to choose how to live and to speak their mother language, and that's all.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Caribbean has no right to speak in the United States Congress.
Counter_Speech: Why should they? There are many Afro-Caribbean people in the US politics. There are many others who have worked very hard to get here.

Hate_Speech: Asian immigrants are taking over, and they steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'taking over'? Are immigrants from countries like India or China being forced to leave their country? Are they being forced to do the jobs that were once reserved for us and that now we despise?

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are completely useless.
Counter_Speech: They are at least to be considered human, they have to be treated as such. Why is a mentally disabled person an inadequate person to you?

Hate_Speech: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
Counter_Speech: There are many people who do not exercise the right to vote, but this does not mean they havre no rights.. Surely it is the most vulnerable members of society that most need us to secure their rights?

Hate_Speech: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that they can't have the right to vote, because they are allowed to vote, regardless of their impairment.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks deserve to be attacked, used, beaten.
Counter_Speech: It is difficult to imagine doing this to the meanest person in the world, let alone someone with mental disabilities that are not their fault.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled people are like monkeys. They should be kept in a mental institution.
Counter_Speech: Since we are comfortable with animals in our society, we should consider whether it is fair to put mentally disabled people in a cage like this. Or would you consider disabled a bigger risk even than some aggressive dog breeds that can circulate freely?

Hate_Speech: There is something wrong with gays. It is their business.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that gays are bad people. In many countries it is not openly gay people who are the problem, instead it is some people who often target and abuse them.

Hate_Speech: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that people with Down syndrome are thieves and bad people. In many countries they can get jobs, and even get promoted. You should go check the definition of discrimination in the dictionary.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks should be taken advantage of.
Counter_Speech: It is the duty of state authorities to ensure all are protected. Everyone with a diagnosed mental illness or physical impairment will benefit from such a policy.

Hate_Speech: The disabled should be isolated, especially autistics. They should not be allowed to have contact with others with disabilities.
Counter_Speech: Disabled people have been shown to be less likely to develop problems by keeping in contact with others with autism spectrum disorders. So, being in touch with others on the autistic spectrum might be good for their mental health.

Hate_Speech: The disabled should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: The conditions for people with disabilities, i.e. being forbidden to have contact with others is facilitated by the social stigma. The existence of a "social stigma" against the "disabled" is evidence of the problem of inequality.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
Counter_Speech: There are a variety of intellectual and creative disabilities, and they are not crimes. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Mental disabilities can be understood and accepted: you will see that disabled are not criminals.

Hate_Speech: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
Counter_Speech: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are criminal, they are mean to children and they are incapable of being good parents.
Counter_Speech: People are free to think what they want. What is required is that they act in accordance with the rule of law.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people do not want to work because they are unable to. We should take decisions on their behalf.
Counter_Speech: Are you really saying that a person's ability to work is the issue here? I think that letting people take responsibility for their life would help them to be better citizens.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
Counter_Speech: They have their own ways of communicating. I'm sure they can explain themselves in more detail than many of us.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
Counter_Speech: Mental health and disability care should be a priority.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
Counter_Speech: Mental health and disability are quite separate issues and should be treated according to the individual's needs.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled folks have no understanding.
Counter_Speech: You are wrong, they can understand the degrading treatment and derogatory speech towards them.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled people have it so easy.
Counter_Speech: Sorry, what do you mean by "have it so easy"? They are in need of specific help, and it is right to provide it, as we would do for people in other categories.

Hate_Speech: We don't discriminate, but disabled persons are lazy.
Counter_Speech: Despite what you may hear, there is no 'lazy person's lobby'. Instead, there is evidence that discrimination is a problem in the UK. All people have the right to be treated as equals in society, regardless of their ability.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is not normal nor healthy.
Counter_Speech: Homophobia is a problem all around the world, it's harmful to the whole of humanity. This is why it is important that we all accept each other, and that we all are non-judgmental.

Hate_Speech: Physically disabled folks are also mentally disabled.
Counter_Speech: I don' hear anyone asserting this, its just something that you choose to spread. What is your evidence?

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't discriminate like that. Our culture is all about equality and inclusivity.

Hate_Speech: Disabled people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

Hate_Speech: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
Counter_Speech: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

Hate_Speech: Being disabled is equivalent to being gay.
Counter_Speech: There is no point in insulting someone for being gay or being disabled. Individuals should be treated as individuals, and given the same opportunities. Being disabled does not make you gay, or viceversa.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are an infestation.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are guilty of crime, they are just like any other person. If you get to know anyone that is a Jew you will know this better.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are an infestation.
Counter_Speech: You're wrong about them, they are like any other people. You can't hate people just because they are different from you.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest fashion labels, the highest music labels.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Jewish people are good people, in every industry. There is no need to negatively emphasize them when in special positions of power.

Hate_Speech: Jews just don't want equality. They want to control everything in life.
Counter_Speech: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

Hate_Speech: Jews are different.
Counter_Speech: Your statement shows that you are not familiar with the term 'different'. If you did know the definition, you would find this line of thinking very annoying.

Hate_Speech: Jews are different and shouldn't be accepted here.
Counter_Speech: Jews are people too, regardless of religion, and they are welcome here, as anyone is allowed to be a part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Jews hate Christians.
Counter_Speech: How can you say something so mean? It is a sad, untrue and dangerous thing to say.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are and have big noses.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are like that, and some have small noses. They are just like any other person!

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks don't belong here. They must leave either Judaism or the country.
Counter_Speech: Why should they? They are just individuals who have made a rational choice to live a Jewish life.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folk are different.
Counter_Speech: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

Hate_Speech: This is not about religion, this is about killing hundreds of thousands of dangerous yids.
Counter_Speech: Does this mean you think that Jews are the primary instigators of violence in the world? If so, then you would be very wrong. Violence is an issue for many different ideologies and groups with no connection with Jewish faith.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks should be burned alive.
Counter_Speech: Jews were killed in the gas chambers, we have to remember it in order not to repeat it.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
Counter_Speech: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not in "control" over "Hollywood". Moreover, most of the time, they actually make the movie industry more diverse and open to new ideas.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are useless.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been historically, linguistically, ethnically, and geographically diverse, and this diversity is what make us and them a unique and valuable human species.

Hate_Speech: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Jews do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: One of the great things about Jewish culture is their ability to assimilate. If I am honest, I don't see any other religion that does it more than them.

Hate_Speech: We should deport all the Jews.
Counter_Speech: Nobody has the right to decide who to deport, because it would be a shame and a crime.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.

Hate_Speech: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.
Counter_Speech: I would like to you to see the videos of the executions, so that you can see what exactly happened. The murder of humans.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

Hate_Speech: Gay men should be called fags.
Counter_Speech: Fag, or faggot, is not a code word for gay, it's a slur. If you wanted to call them by their original name, that would be a problem, because you will have to learn the first names of many people.

Hate_Speech: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it would bring back slavery and oppression? What exactly is the connection between the marriage of homosexual people and the oppression you are talking about?

Hate_Speech: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
Counter_Speech: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

Hate_Speech: I don't care if you are a man or a woman. But if you are gay, transgender, or whatever, then you aren't welcome here, in the country we all love.
Counter_Speech: We are all equal before the law, and I don't think you can say that they are any less than a person, regardless of their sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
Counter_Speech: If you want to an absurd perspective about a whole community, it's not fine. This attitude seems to be everywhere: sometimes people have to suffer if they are "that kind of person", as is the case in this examles, where a gender identity is often used to limit a person's rights. This shouldn't happen.

Hate_Speech: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
Counter_Speech: Just because there are people who identify as trans, it does not mean that every person who is trans is a woman. That is a myth perpetuated by people who don't know anything. Can you prove that trans women are bad at their job?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women are lustful.
Counter_Speech: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Its unclear why you assert this.... how can you blame others for their own identity?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality like any other sexual orientation is not a problem for society. Why should it be like that?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Why should it be like that? How can you blame others for social problems?

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women dress like men.
Counter_Speech: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are basically child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always a crime but is not related to sexual orientation, nor gender. Most women are not child molesters, and most men are not child molesters either.

Hate_Speech: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.
Counter_Speech: There are many examples of people who have same-sex relationships, I mean, lifelong relationships. This does mean, for example, that love can come from between a woman and a woman too.

Hate_Speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
Counter_Speech: We should treat everyone as if they came from our same family. LGBT+ people are not different.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have abnormal sex.
Counter_Speech: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
Counter_Speech: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick, they are an abomination.
Counter_Speech: Let us be honest, are you aware of all the risks that can come from disparaging a sexual preference that you do not like?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick, they are an abomination.
Counter_Speech: Is that why you feel that way about homosexuals? They are not sick, are they? And if you are gay you are not a pervert by default.

Hate_Speech: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
Counter_Speech: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: I think it is safe to say that the majority of LGBTI people are significant contributors to the well-being of our societies

Hate_Speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
Counter_Speech: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The way you phrase the statement could be the epitome of some homophobic assumptions. To be honest, so much hatred and violence spewed from the way you thought.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: They are not a burden to society as a whole. They are individuals making their own choices. To say that a particular individual is more of a burden to society because of their sexual preference is just plain wrong.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: If someone were to comment like that about another group of people, then it woud be an example of discrimination against that group. Why can't we consider homosexuals as a part of the society itself?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The stereotype that gay people are inherently bad for society is sometimes perpetuated by the media, but is not backed up by scientific studies.

Hate_Speech: This is why faggots moved to the UK, so to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counter_Speech: We're all entitled to work in this country, irrespective of our sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counter_Speech: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

Hate_Speech: This is why faggots moved to the UK, so to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counter_Speech: Being denied a job because you're LGBT or a non-binary person is akin to being denied a place to stay in a hotel because you're married to a woman: awful.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should be killed.
Counter_Speech: The way you phrase your concerns is an example of little knowledge of how the world actually works. The question of what should be done with migration flows cannot be answered with a simple "bang, bang, bang".

Hate_Speech: Immigration isn't good for us.
Counter_Speech: Don't you agree that being inclusive towards immigrants is beneficial for the economy of the host country?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Immigration can be good for the economy: the greatest challenge is to integrate those who are misfortunate and aren't born here.

Hate_Speech: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
Counter_Speech: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

Hate_Speech: Migrants hurt the economy.
Counter_Speech: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should go away.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
Counter_Speech: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have given their lives for our country. Many of them have been proud to serve our country. They are, just as our fathers and mothers were, proud of US.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
Counter_Speech: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: There are many citizens who do not have jobs, and many of us are grateful for the jobs migrant entrepreneurs provide. So, migrants are not stealing our jobs, they are providing new opportunities!

Hate_Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
Counter_Speech: There is no real evidence that migrants steal our jobs.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are so lazy they don't even use public transportation.
Counter_Speech: This is not true! Many migrants try to get on the bus, but some aren't allowed to get on! We must reflect on this.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by a 'burden'? Does it include respecting our country's laws of not insulting the culture and traditions of other people's? Because this is what you are doing: insulting and discriminating.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is a burden, I think it is the right of every human to live and work in our country without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They don't deserve to be called 'a burden'.

Hate_Speech: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true. Migrants are granted certain rights in the UK, and this includes the right to live and work in the UK.

Hate_Speech: There are so many migrants like a flood entering the U.S. today, it is a problem we cannot cope with.
Counter_Speech: To say there are so many migrants entering the U.S. is just false. And what do you mean by "we cannot cope with"?

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
Counter_Speech: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

Hate_Speech: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
Counter_Speech: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of migrants are granted citizenship as soon as they have lived in the country for at least three years. They should be considered as citizens regardless of their country of origin.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants just try to provide for their families, like we do.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants don't steal our jobs. If you think that foreigners are stealing our jobs, then you should study migration and find that they work in solidarity with our society.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.

Hate_Speech: I don't care about the color of people's skin, if you're from around the world you can't have your say in the EU.
Counter_Speech: It is not about nationality, it is about living in the EU and contributing to its development.

Hate_Speech: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our children.
Counter_Speech: What kind of a statement is that? How can you say something like that?

Hate_Speech: Migrants from Muslim countries are a problem.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come here as young people seeking a better future. This is not a problem.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from Muslim countries are a problem.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslim refugees come here to escape war and poverty. They do not pose a problem for us.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks have a distorted perception of reality: that they are superior.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims have the same view as us: that all humans are equal. Why should we distort the truth?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
Counter_Speech: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
Counter_Speech: They have no intention of ruling us, why do you think this about Muslims?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
Counter_Speech: What report are you referring to, about the incidence of cancer around the world? Muslims are not to blame, there is no relation between Islam and cancer.

Hate_Speech: Muslims need to be hated.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a part of humanity, and we should accept people regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that what you are saying is true. I think that the idea that Muslims are incompatible with Western society is a myth.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not about peace, it is a cult of violence.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence, and people can be violent even without any knowledge of Islam.

Hate_Speech: A Koran in every classroom will promote violent jihad against infidels.
Counter_Speech: The Koran is not a teaching manual for how to conduct warfare. It is about belief and love. It does not promote a violent ideology.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: I don't think they're not contributing to our society. What is the contribution that you think they're not giving?

Hate_Speech: I was abused by a Muslim boyfriend, I don't want to be Muslim.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims rape and molest people. But if it is a community you don't want to be in, it is your free choice.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, and to their own beliefs, regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not about love, equality and integration, how can you be in favour of such extremist intolerance?
Counter_Speech: I would like to ask you, what exactly do you mean by 'extremist'?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

Hate_Speech: It is OK to be racist against Muslims.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are a religious group, not a race.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand all those Muslims invading our country for proselytizing.
Counter_Speech: The UK Government makes public policy on how to prevent people from coming to the UK to promote a prejudiced ideology, whether or not they are Muslims.

Hate_Speech: The only true believers are the ones who haven't converted to Islam.
Counter_Speech: This is not true for many, I don't think the term true believers applies to anybody. But it is very common for Muslims to be persecuted.

Hate_Speech: It is not okay for a white supremacist to visit a mosque. Why should a Muslim have to be considered a citizen?
Counter_Speech: To make the statement that white people can be of concern to a mosque and that muslim citizens can be a concern to this country are both wrong. The point is that if a person regularly incites hatred against a group, then that person is likely to be considered a troublemaker.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are homophobic.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just as much victims of hate crime and discrimination. You don't have to be queer to be a victim of hate.

Hate_Speech: Those Muslims are not happy with a train running over their prophet Muhammad's mosque.
Counter_Speech: All religions have had a part in shaping the human experience and so should be respected, if you ask me.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are already contributing to our society, it's time for us to stop being a nuisance and start to acknowledge their contribution to our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The very first Muslims came to Britain around 1200. We are a country of immigrants and many Muslims are contributing to our society.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are brainwashed.
Counter_Speech: Lots of Muslims are actually very well educated and highly rational.

Hate_Speech: We are not accepting Muslims, some of us have never even met a muslim.
Counter_Speech: One of the biggest problems we as a country face is how to balance diversity and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: Most Muslims around the world do not consider Islam a cult, because it isn't.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

Hate_Speech: We should not be surprised that a whole people have chosen violence and terror as their political ideology.
Counter_Speech: Terror is a tactic used to achieve social and political ends, pursued by some extremist groups only.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live here, and are part of our community. We should not be excluding them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and its adherents are already integrated into the majority of European societies.

Hate_Speech: We must not allow people to come into our country and start killing people. They are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Not all terrorist attacks are caused by Muslims. And not all Muslims are terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Black folks like stealing.
Counter_Speech: Which people are you talking about? I don't see black people keen on stealing from anyone, I have no idea who you are talking about.

Hate_Speech: Black Americans have a corrosive influence in our country. They have always inhabited horrible, stinking filthy places and now they are all complaining because they hate our country.
Counter_Speech: It's not true. I don't know if you really mean all the black people living in the US. Anyway, I'm sure they are proud Americans. You just don't know it yet.

Hate_Speech: What about all the times that white people told black people to 'sit down and shut up'? We should do it now.
Counter_Speech: It's not 'all the times' that white people tell Black people to shut up, but it is a large group of white people that still constantly remind Black people that they are inferior.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are the problem.
Counter_Speech: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are violent criminals.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

Hate_Speech: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
Counter_Speech: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

Hate_Speech: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
Counter_Speech: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

Hate_Speech: Black people are here illegally, and still they have the gall to want to take our money.
Counter_Speech: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are like apes.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

Hate_Speech: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
Counter_Speech: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

Hate_Speech: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
Counter_Speech: Hard work and being a good citizen is not determined by colour, or religion, or ethnicity. This is just an example of white supremacy propaganda.

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: People's biology does not determine their behavior.

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: We do not condone racial discrimination and it is more than likely that you don't know what the concept of race is. I think this is a good example of white supremacy apologism.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
Counter_Speech: Can you specify what you are talking about?

Hate_Speech: Black folks are objects. They are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: I find it amazing that you think this, but in reality people of colour are very similar to us in many ways.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
Counter_Speech: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

Hate_Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
Counter_Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about human rights and economic opportunity. In fact, slavery was also used as a way to deny citizenship to black people.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
Counter_Speech: Scientists are still trying to understand the causes behind lower intellectual performance among some groups of people, but most probably the main causes are either social or environmental (for sure not related to skin colour). This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence to support this.

Hate_Speech: Africans have always been reproducing like crazy among themselves, as if they were superior.
Counter_Speech: My friend is of African descent, and she's perfectly fine with whites 'mixing' with blacks, and does not feel so 'naturally superior'.

Hate_Speech: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: What is the source of your evidence for this statement?

Hate_Speech: If you have a criminal record, you will not get a job. This is why all black people are unemployed.
Counter_Speech: The reality is that there are many job listings that claim they are inclusive, but in the end employ whites only.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are unfaithful.
Counter_Speech: Why should we be the ones to decide which groups are unfaithful?

Hate_Speech: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: Why do I have to read this hatred? It's not okay to say such things based on stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: You can't generalise about a whole race based on stereotypes and prejudice, because that's not how things work.

Hate_Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counter_Speech: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
Counter_Speech: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: The suggestion that women are subhuman is completely without foundation, and a complete distortion of the whole issue.

Hate_Speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
Counter_Speech: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

Hate_Speech: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
Counter_Speech: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

Hate_Speech: Women are made for making food.
Counter_Speech: Women are not 'made for making food'. And the vast majority of them are not sexist, which means that they do not find it strange to express their own preferences.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
Counter_Speech: Yes, so is capitalism per se more likely to provide for all the discriminated-against populations? And why do you think that the concept of 'feminism' is harmful?

Hate_Speech: Women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
Counter_Speech: This idea that women should be a homemaker instead of contributing to our society and economy is just nonsense. A woman's right to choose what to do with her life and her body should not be restricted just because of the actions of a few men.

Hate_Speech: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
Counter_Speech: Women are human, just like everybody else. They have the right to live their life as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
Counter_Speech: Women have every right to choose how they live their lives.

Hate_Speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
Counter_Speech: Women are human, just like anybody else, and the rights of women should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
Counter_Speech: What right do you have to judge other human beings? I ask because I don't think it's something you should be concerned about.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

Hate_Speech: Women only want top men because they are weak.
Counter_Speech: Women aren't weak. What men want, what women want, and who they want to be their partner are completely different things.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a divisive force. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. People who identify as feminist do not want to divide our society, regardless of how "divisive" their beliefs might appear to you.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counter_Speech: Have you ever considered asking why our society is far better suited to men than to women?

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
Counter_Speech: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

Hate_Speech: Women are, honestly, objects for men's sexual gratification.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. They deserve respect and human rights.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.

Hate_Speech: Women are more likely to commit crime.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

Hate_Speech: Women must stop acting like rape victims apologists, because this is just a ruse created by women to exploit and dominate men. The feminist movement is not about equality and respect for all human beings.
Counter_Speech: Sadly, in the real world, there is often a strong tendency to misinterpret a movement as a demand for some privileges, such as 'not being raped'. That's why men and women engage in a lot of actions that seem strictly "feminist" in everyday life. But in reality, feminist men and women do the same thing. They both expect all people to be treated as equals in the society.

Hate_Speech: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Well, of course women can cause problems, but so can men. It seems to me that you're confused.

Hate_Speech: Women should obey to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.

Hate_Speech: Women like bad men.
Counter_Speech: I wouldn't say that "women like bad men". What I would like to see is a man that is interested in a woman, respectful of women, and offers her more than an exchange of sexual favors. It would be nice if men had more respectful characteristics than sexual desire alone.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: That is just not true. There are many women who are brave and strong, and I respect them for that. What's more, there is also a movement called #MeToo, which is dedicated to giving voice to women who have suffered from sexual harassment.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights and should be respected as such.

Hate_Speech: We should stop feminists.
Counter_Speech: The main problem with feminism today is not about stopping men supremacy, but about avoiding the creation of an "us vs. them" mentality, which is polarizing and can easily turn violent. Feminists can do a lot to fight this poisonous trend.

Hate_Speech: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
Counter_Speech: While it's true that some people with Down Syndrome may face challenges, there are also many of them in the UK who would be classed as individuals with a 'normal' social life. To suggest that there are any reasons why someone should be banned is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.
Counter_Speech: As with so many things, we all experience difficulties, this is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, not only in the UK. The impact is very high and we must find a final solution to this.
Counter_Speech: The rights of people with Down Syndrome to be treated fairly is something which must be respected. We cannot allow discrimination to continue to this end.

Hate_Speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.
Counter_Speech: People with Down syndrome should have the chance to live full lives as they wish, without facing this discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Downies are dumb
Counter_Speech: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counter_Speech: From a 'neurotypical' perspective, this is not always true: for example people with Williams syndrome have below average intelligence but show higher empathy.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counter_Speech: Although some individuals who score below average on tests of IQ may demonstrate lower empathy abilities, there is evidence that for some conditions (e.g. Williams syndrome) there is higher signaling of concern and compassion than neurotypical subjects.

Hate_Speech: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
Counter_Speech: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
Counter_Speech: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

Hate_Speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
Counter_Speech: It is not acceptable to deny human dignity to others because they are disabled. Human dignity is not a property, but a right. And every person has it, irrespective of their condition.

Hate_Speech: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

Hate_Speech: disabled folks can't work.
Counter_Speech: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

Hate_Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: The law allows people with disabilities to work, but it doesn't make it mandatory. You might find that in some countries this rule is not followed, but this a problem of discrimination.

Hate_Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: The disabled can work, and many countries offer them the right to work.

Hate_Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: Many countries offer them the right to work, which is as it should be.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing
Counter_Speech: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

Hate_Speech: The only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews. We should have let them finish their job.
Counter_Speech: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

Hate_Speech: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
Counter_Speech: The idea that the Holocaust was caused by the Jews is simply wrong. The majority of Jews were forced to flee, those who stayed did not participate in the Nazi regime, so they were gassed to death. The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

Hate_Speech: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
Counter_Speech: I would like to ask you a question: when Hitler came to power in 1933, would you have believed him? Would you now, after all that happened?

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
Counter_Speech: I can't find a single example of a case where a Jew has been 'antisemite' to their culture. That would be so paradoxical. I think it's just a myth being spread to justify discrimination.
