Hate_Speech: Jewish folks control the media
Counter_Speech: The fact that in the media there are some people from certain religions does not in any way suggest that they control the media. How do you explain antisemitism in the media then?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews tend to make up a discrete amount of Hollywood actors, directors, producers, and so on. But this doesn't necessarily mean that they control the industry.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Hollywood is an extremely diverse industry, and Jews are a small but vocal minority of actors, directors, producers, etc. How can you say that Jews control the Hollywood industry?

Hate_Speech: Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
Counter_Speech: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?

Hate_Speech: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.
Counter_Speech: So you want to see millions of Jews murdered every year, once again?

Hate_Speech: Jews have always controlled the government and press.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not in charge of the media or the government. At least not in the United States of America.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.
Counter_Speech: In principle, Jewish people are part of the system since they have citizenship, but in practice they are often treated as if they are not our fellow countrymen. The problem is not just about Jewish people, but about the overall attitude towards people of other religions.

Hate_Speech: gay men are unnatural, they abuse their anus.
Counter_Speech: The sad truth is that homosexuals are more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol (as a reaction to homophobia, discrimination, or violence they experienced).

Hate_Speech: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
Counter_Speech: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

Hate_Speech: If homosexuals want to change they should go to a conversion therapy where they are constantly taught to love themselves and other people.
Counter_Speech: It is not necessary to change their sexuality to love themselves and others. We just need to accept their right to love whoever they want.

Hate_Speech: We should ban all gays, this would be a step in the right direction.
Counter_Speech: The gay rights movement is a good example of a movement that is moving in the right direction, not the homophobic one.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
Counter_Speech: LGBT people are people, and deserve the full and equal human rights of all other citizens.

Hate_Speech: We should not love gays. They should be removed from their families.
Counter_Speech: Imagine that someone were to tell you that you cannot love your mom, that she has to go away. What would you do? Do you think it's a disgrace to love someone? Maybe you should spend some more time with your family. Love is love.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
Counter_Speech: I'm sure you're tired of hearing about other's bodies, but this is an individual's right to use their own body to their liking.

Hate_Speech: gays are perverts
Counter_Speech: It is not true that gays are perverts. I think it is more appropriate to say that they are attracted to people of the same sex: and this is not a perversion, just a preference.

Hate_Speech: gays are perverts
Counter_Speech: We have to accept that everyone is different, and inclusion is what we should be working on.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is against nature.
Counter_Speech: You should really learn about evolution and the origin of our species, instead of perpetuating unwarranted prejudice and ignorance. Just ask the Bonobos!

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what this phrase "some kind of devil worshippers" means?

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it's right to ban someone for being gay? This is an individual preference and you cannot base a law on sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counter_Speech: How do you know that they are practicing devil worship?

Hate_Speech: that gay men deserve to be called fags
Counter_Speech: Just because you personally don't like gay people doesn't mean that everyone else thinks like you. Some of us just practice live and let live.

Hate_Speech: Gay pride is so awkward.
Counter_Speech: I think you are talking about the parade, not about the people. Are you?

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: How can you derive this from someone's sexual orientation?

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: There is a lot of evidence that migrants are hard workers, accepting jobs we don't want to do anymore, still they often do not get a fair say in the economy.

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).

Hate_Speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
Counter_Speech: Children should stay with their biological parents. This is about human rights and the rule of law.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants take our jobs
Counter_Speech: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants do the jobs that noone wants to do and cannot get filled easily. Also, they have to do their part to provide for their families.

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to undermine our national identity
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants came to the U.S. as children. Today, many of them say they are proud to be American. How can you say that they undermine our heritage?

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to undermine our national identity
Counter_Speech: Migrants have been part of the U.S. since its founding, and our country is founded on the right to migrate and to pursue happiness.

Hate_Speech: migrants take our jobs
Counter_Speech: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
Counter_Speech: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants make America worse
Counter_Speech: Don't you belieive that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?

Hate_Speech: migrants rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
Counter_Speech: The people you are referring to are rapists and drug dealers, not migrants.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
Counter_Speech: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a terrible and dangerous ideology that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and gays.
Counter_Speech: All religions have their bad parts if look with a modern eye. But no religion promotes acts of terror and violence like the ones you said.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Have you ever visited a Muslim country? In many cases you see a lot of diversity and human rights and culture. So, there is a lot of room for Muslims in civilised Europe as well.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Child molesters don't represent Muslims, and you would be hard pressed to find a Muslim child molester here.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counter_Speech: Child molesters are people who have sexually abused children, and they can be Muslim or non-Muslim.

Hate_Speech: muslim folks are subhuman
Counter_Speech: The concept of subhuman has been totally discredited in modern times. We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: Luckily no one is restricted from voting because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are terrorists
Counter_Speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who just take their faith seriously.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
Counter_Speech: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this is a very strong or healthy way to talk about others.

Hate_Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Actually, not all Muslims are incompatible with Western societies. Many Muslims have lived in our societies for many years without any problem.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from the UK.
Counter_Speech: How about you stop using that as an argument and try to come up with some evidence? Maybe you can suggest some facts to back up your claim.

Hate_Speech: We can no longer accept Muslims living in our country. It is a matter of national security.
Counter_Speech: Muslim terrorists have struck in Paris and London, killing scores of innocent people, that's true. We must root out terrorists before they destroy our country, that's also true. But we cannot target innocent people just because of their faith, otherwise we'd be no better than the terrorists that we seek to neutralize.

Hate_Speech: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
Counter_Speech: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape, enslavement, and torturing prisoners of faith.
Counter_Speech: This is just a myth used to promote hatred and violence against people of other religions.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: People are free to choose their own beliefs, and in our society we also have many different ways of life. Do you think it is right to ban people based on their beliefs?

Hate_Speech: black folks all act bad
Counter_Speech: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others. How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counter_Speech: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counter_Speech: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?

Hate_Speech: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
Counter_Speech: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

Hate_Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counter_Speech: Since when is it OK to discriminate against people based on their race?

Hate_Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counter_Speech: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.

Hate_Speech: nigga are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

Hate_Speech: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
Counter_Speech: What about human rights?

Hate_Speech: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely right about one thing: there have never been peaceful times for black people during national crises. In these cases, crises have been racially motivated, and racial discrimination was the major factor in instigating violence, not POC.

Hate_Speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
Counter_Speech: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

Hate_Speech: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
Counter_Speech: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

Hate_Speech: black folks are very dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

Hate_Speech: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
Counter_Speech: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

Hate_Speech: African people are the source of all ills in the world
Counter_Speech: People of any race or ethnicity can spread illness around.

Hate_Speech: Slavery is the only way to go.
Counter_Speech: Slavery was legal in the United States until 1862, when the Emancipation Proclamation was issued. Unless you want to start another Civil War, it is better to leave Slavery to the darkest pages in the history of our nation.

Hate_Speech: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights, full human dignity, and full cognitive abilities. The opportunity for life-long learning should be reserved for misogynists.

Hate_Speech: women are only useful for sex.
Counter_Speech: I do not know if there is a fair interpretation of your words. Maybe if you were more sensitive you might understand that relationships are about far more than simply sex.

Hate_Speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
Counter_Speech: That is just not true. In fact, as long as there are only men in positions of power, there is a gender bias in the workplace, which hinders the advancement of women in society.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and inferior, they are not even able to assert their rights.
Counter_Speech: Women secured their rights because they fought for them. Stop posting nonsense and go and read about the Suffragettes

Hate_Speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
Counter_Speech: That is just not true. Fathers are as good as mothers at housework.

Hate_Speech: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
Counter_Speech: In today's society it is quite common to be single without the need to blame women.

Hate_Speech: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
Counter_Speech: In our society, women were taught to be the ones to raise the children and that it is their duty. But this does not imply that they must want a male-dominated world.

Hate_Speech: Woman are basically childlike.
Counter_Speech: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

Hate_Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should try talking to a woman instead of insulting them. Women are not childlike and often suffer from other's prejudice.

Hate_Speech: Women should be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

Hate_Speech: We’ve just imported 20k ticking time bombs from Afghanistan and we have homeless veterans getting arrested for begging in the street!
Counter_Speech: Surely people who also risked their lives to help our forces also need us to honour our promises?

Hate_Speech: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
Counter_Speech: What’s racist about it?

Hate_Speech: There’s a rumour that Terry Gilliam’s new production has been cancelled because the theatre is concerned about his anti-trans statements. More cancel culture madness!
Counter_Speech: Its only a rumour, and he has grown into a curmudgeon in his old age. 😊

Hate_Speech: More migrants crossing the channel today. We don’t have enough accommodation. Our own homeless are forgotten. Send them back.
Counter_Speech: Are you forgetting that last year every rough sleeper was offered a bed during lockdown?

Hate_Speech: Local Councils can’t afford to house the homeless, but Surrey is to get its first rainbow public crossing painted in time for Pride.
Counter_Speech: Nice to see somewhere celebrating diversity and inclusivity.

Hate_Speech: I just read that the Home office is handing out mobile phones to migrant invaders so that they can progress their asylum claims … you couldn’t make this up!
Counter_Speech: Yeah, I saw a blog post that mentioned this but just quoted a ‘source in the Home office’, which is a bit dodgy.

Hate_Speech: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
Counter_Speech: Don’t you think it’s a pity that a country that suffered so much under totalitarianism now adopts the same tactics?

Hate_Speech: social media is banging on about the MOBO Awards again. When will we see awards for Music of WHITE Origin?
Counter_Speech: Who would you nominate? Ed Sheeran? 🙂

Hate_Speech: All of the 50 criminals due to be deported yesterday to Jamaica, were removed from a chartered flight after appeals by Human Rights Lawyers.
Counter_Speech: Surely, if the deportations were halted, these people had at the very least, grounds for appeal?

Hate_Speech: These Muslim MP’s should stop pretending they are British. They’re not, they are just invaders!
Counter_Speech: Given most were born here, you seem to be saying that you can’t be Muslim and British…which doesn’t make sense

Hate_Speech: I’ve just seen a video posted by a Patriot, of Muslim men of fighting age sleeping in a church because the asylum hotels are full. Free food, clothes and blankets…they don’t do that for our homeless!
Counter_Speech: Well, they do. Using churches as homeless shelters has become common in recent years, so I’d guess the church in question already had the experience to help these desperate people.

Hate_Speech: Another County Cricket Club Chairman has resigned over ‘historic’ racist remarks from 4 years ago. This is becoming a witch hunt!
Counter_Speech: I don’t think racism was any more acceptable 4 years ago, than it is today.

Hate_Speech: We pick them up in the Channel, ferry them to Dover, house them in hotels, provide free food and an allowance. We welcome them, so no wonder they come.
Counter_Speech: They come because they are desperate. Would you risk the sea in an open boat for a free pizza and a flea-pit hotel?

Hate_Speech: How come these ‘desperate’ migrants all have mobiles, designer gear, trainers and can afford to pay thousands to people smugglers?
Counter_Speech: Some will have sold homes, businesses, possessions. Others will be supported by family networks, loans from dear friends. ‘Desperate’ doesn’t always mean ‘poor’. Many will be professionals, civil servants, lawyers, teachers.

Hate_Speech: We are full, we don’t need anymore migrants or asylum seekers.
Counter_Speech: Population density varies and this, along with other factors like a failure to build homes causes local shortages but to say we are ‘full’ is not true or accurate. At the last count there were over 1 million empty properties in the UK.

Hate_Speech: All these asylum seekers coming here and taking jobs away from native brits, no wonder this country is in a mess.
Counter_Speech: Asylum seekers aren’t actually allowed to work in the UK until they get refugee status, and often take jobs that native Brits don’t want. Also, many people who migrate here start businesses, creating more jobs!

Hate_Speech: Women getting into the labour market has caused the downfall of Western civilisation, they should be at home raising children. Abandoning traditional roles is the ruin of society.
Counter_Speech: I’d disagree, women should be able to choose what they do, but also even if some women did want to stay at home, many don’t have a choice anymore! It’s impossible to support a family on 1 wage now.

Hate_Speech: The trans agenda don’t want mens and womens toilets, everything has to be ‘all in 1’ now. Is this the future we want? Risking womens safety just so men in dresses feel comfortable?
Counter_Speech: In some bars and cafes that I usually go to there are gender neutral toilets, and I've never had a problem with them. As long as people respect others and respect the space, 'all in 1' toilets work fine.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants add to the cost of the NHS, get loads of money in benefits, and create a housing shortage. Time to close the borders.
Counter_Speech: They also pay taxes, contributing to the cost of these services, and are less likely than native Brits to claim benefits, as many are not entitled to it!

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: If you consider supporting the LGBT+ community to be 'woke nonsense' then that sounds like your problem...

Hate_Speech: Soon it will be 'sexist' to even talk to birds, everyone gets offended so easily these days you can't say anything.
Counter_Speech: If you talk to women like they're people not 'birds' you shouldn't have a problem!

Hate_Speech: All these muslims coming over here want to enforce sharia law and take over. We cannot submit!!!
Counter_Speech: Muslims don't want to 'take over', even if they abide by sharia themselves, they're just trying to live alongside everybody else

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: That's not true, and it's a big generalisation, terrorists come from many backgrounds and religions, terrorism is not an exclusively Muslim issue

Hate_Speech: Jews want to take over the world and decimate Western civilisation!
Counter_Speech: That's not true, where did you hear that?

Hate_Speech: Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.
Counter_Speech: The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's was weaponised to spread homophobia and demonise gay people. Anybody can get HIV, straight or gay, and the vast majority of gay people do not have this illness. Those who do can manage their condition with daily medication, which makes it impossible to transmit.

Hate_Speech: If black people aren't all criminals, why are they disproportionately arrested and taking up space in our prisons?
Counter_Speech: Because of institutionalised racism in the Police, meaning they are more likely to get stopped and searched, randomly targeted, or assumed to be doing something 'suspicious'. Also because of the type of crimes the Police focus energy on e.g. street crimes that happen in poorer areas, which black people are more likely to live in, are given more Police attention than white collar crime.

Hate_Speech: More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continues…
Counter_Speech: It’s not a planned ‘invasion’, they’re refugees fleeing to safety.

Hate_Speech: SHARE if you think homeless veterans should be housed before any refugees!
Counter_Speech: Both veterans and refugees should be housed! There is enough housing for all however a lack of social and affordable housing means lots of places lie empty. Everyone deserves to have a roof over their head.

Hate_Speech: Why don’t all these Muslim refugees go to other wonderful Muslim countries? Am I missing something?
Counter_Speech: Actually, Muslim countries like Turkey, Pakistan, and Jordan take more refugees than any other countries. The percentage of refugees that come to the UK is tiny in comparison to the full amount of displaced people from conflicts in Syria, Afghanistan, etc.

Hate_Speech: LGBT history month now being taught in schools… I’m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.
Counter_Speech: We still can teach British, European and World history, but part of that is looking at the history of groups which have been erased from our history previously. Looking at the some of the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK can inform the future for everyone!

Hate_Speech: Jews are so greedy, they're always thinking about money
Counter_Speech: That's a sweeping generalisation and an incorrect stereotype. You can't tar all Jewish people with the same brush! There's also a lot of 'greedy' people who aren't Jewish

Hate_Speech: Feminism gives women the muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Nope, feminism is believing that a woman can go to work, have a husband, do both or neither, and all of those options are fine as long as it's what she wants to do.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: Why do you feel like LGBT people are dangerous?

Hate_Speech: Can't believe we are housing and feeding all these asylum seekers when they are coming over here ILLEGALLY
Counter_Speech: They have to come here to be able to claim asylum at all, you have to be on UK soil to make a claim. It's not illegal to go to a country to claim asylum.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: That's a sweeping generalisation, and it's not true at all. Sexual assault happens in all communities, and is committed by people from all backgrounds and religions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to invade us and enforce sharia law!
Counter_Speech: No, the vast majority of Muslims just want to be able to live their lives, they don't care if others follow sharia.

Hate_Speech: As much as the media tries, you can't convince me to take transgenders seriously. A man can put on a dress and make up but at the end of the day they're still a man. That's basic biology.
Counter_Speech: It's not 'biology'. You're confusing sex and gender. Gender has nothing to do with our biology or body, it's about our identity and how we feel. Sex is our anatomy, hormones etc, but even this isn't as binary as many people beleive.

Hate_Speech: I tolerated fag pride, I tolerated seeing fags on tv, but I draw the line at schools teaching children about their perverted lifestyles. This is indoctrination.
Counter_Speech: Teaching about LGBT relationships in schools isn't trying to indoctrinate children, it's just teaching kids that gay relationships exist and can be healthy and happy.

Hate_Speech: If we accept transgenders it's a slippery slope. First you can identify as whatever gender you want, then it will be whatever age they want. Suddenly paedophilia is something we're being told to accept...
Counter_Speech: There's no link between transgender people and paedophilia. Paedophiles can be straight, gay, trans, or cisgender, it's not a trans issue.

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Counter_Speech: Why does it disgust you?

Hate_Speech: If you need any more proof that whites and blacks are not equal, look at the technological advancement achieved by each. Whites took us to space, Africans are still living in third world shitholes. We are not the same.
Counter_Speech: Actually, did you know some of the most essential work done at NASA to launch space exploration missions was done by a group of black female mathematicians?

Hate_Speech: We are letting Muslim terrorists come to our country as 'refugees'. This has got to stop.
Counter_Speech: The people coming to our country as refugees are not terrorists, in a lot of cases they're fleeing terrorism

Hate_Speech: Blacks and civilisation are incompatible. You can have a thriving society or you can have diversity, you can’t have both.
Counter_Speech: I have to disagree. Some of our brightest thinkers, visionaries, inventors, scientists etc are black people. It's ignorant to dismiss the black excellence that is so influential in our society.

Hate_Speech: I’ve never met a happy gay person. It’s a miserable, perverted lifestyle. Those people need help.
Counter_Speech: I know plenty of happy people in the LGBT community, what can make people miserable is the homophobia they have to face!

Hate_Speech: Ask yourself after millions of immigrants have entered the UK, many illegally
Counter_Speech: Equating all these things to immigration seems illogical. Lots of changes have happened in the last 30 years socially, culturally, economically. Surely these things have more to do with the governments that have presided in this time and the economy? Not just immigration?

Hate_Speech: Pro-trans zealots view themselves as a virtuous and inclusive subset of "progressive modernisers". In reality, they are responsible for the growing social erasure of women. This cultural assault on women's rights is uncivilised and not to be tolerated.
Counter_Speech: As a woman myself, I can tell you that trans people having rights doesn't affect my rights one bit. I'd say a bigger threat to women's rights are things like low conviction rates for sexual assault, domestic violence, etc.

Hate_Speech: Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
Counter_Speech: There are so many white people on tv, if you think there isn't you're obviously not paying attention!

Hate_Speech: Hundreds of Muslim men, all of fighting age, arriving in boats every day. This is what invasion looks like, we must be ready to fight back.
Counter_Speech: What does 'of fighting age' mean? They're not here to fight, they're here because they want a peaceful life and many are fleeing war, persecution, or hardship.

Hate_Speech: The more diverse a community the less people volunteer, vote, give to charity, and trust each other. This is why blacks are incompatible with our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Where is this from and is it generalisable at all?

Hate_Speech: Just read an article that explained how the Jewish elite use their positions of power to control us!
Counter_Speech: Where did you read this article? Are you sure it's from a source you can trust?

Hate_Speech: Just seen a story about a park in Manchester where Muslims are banning people from walking their dogs because it offends them!!! Trying to enforce sharia law, it's time we take our country back!!
Counter_Speech: This is actually fake news! There's a website which shows the posters put up in the park to 'ban' dog walking were put there by people trying to stir up hate against the Muslim community. Don't believe everything you read!

Hate_Speech: Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
Counter_Speech: Where did you read this? Are you sure it's from a reliable source? This sounds like inflammatory fake news.

Hate_Speech: Has anyone read all the stuff about the Jewish paedophile ring that controls our country? Can't believe some people think jews are 'persecuted'...
Counter_Speech: Where did you read this? This sounds like it could be harmful misinformation spread to encourage hate towards Jewish people

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: Migrants actually don't get given a lot by the government, and asylum support benefits are much much lower than universal credit given to British citizens. They have to be put in hotels temporarily whilst they are processed.

Hate_Speech: Just seen that a migrant family (Muslim of course) have been given a house worth 1 MILLION by the government because they have so many kids. FFS we can't keep paying for these people to live in luxury!!
Counter_Speech: Knowing the way social housing works, that doesn't sound true, do you have a link to the article? I wonder if it's reliable...

Hate_Speech: Just seen a video on facebook about 'drag queen story time' where men dressed as women indoctrinate kids into thinking this is 'normal'. What is the world coming to?
Counter_Speech: Drag queen story time is not trying to indoctrinate kids with anything, it's just a fun event and the kids like the drag queens because they're colourful and sparkly.

Hate_Speech: 4 million people waiting for NHS treatments but we can still afford to spend 2 BILLION on health tourism for people who have paid nothing into the NHS...
Counter_Speech: Health tourism actually only makes up 0.3% of the NHS budget, stop scapegoating migrants for the state of the NHS, when the real problem is that it has been critically underfunded for years.

Hate_Speech: All these asylum seekers coming here and expecting benefits, not wanting to work. Why are we letting in such lazy people?
Counter_Speech: Actually, a lot of asylum seekers really want to work, but it's illegal for them to do so whilst their claim is being processed. They are only allowed to live on asylum support in this time.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: It's definitely a disgrace that in such a rich country we leave homeless people on the streets, especially when there's actually enough housing for everyone it's just not distributed properly. Migrants don't have an easy time either though, and it's not their fault that the government ignores homelessness as an issue.

Hate_Speech: We have a shortage of housing and yet we're still giving migrants free flats, houses, or putting them up in fancy hotels. Why does our government bend over backwards to accommodate people who have never contributed anything to this country?
Counter_Speech: We don't actually have a shortage of housing, there are estimated to be around 600,000 empty homes. Also, the housing that migrants often get allocated is very low quality, sometimes to the point that it can be dangerous to people's health.

Hate_Speech: Migrants coming here for health tourism are bankrupting our NHS, how come we just keep letting them come over? They should be refused from hospitals if they can't prove they are citizens here.
Counter_Speech: The point of the NHS is that it's for everyone, free at the point of use. To start checking where someone is from and then possibly refuse them service because of it goes against everything the NHS was built on.

Hate_Speech: We need to put a stop to these migrants coming here over the channel in dinghies, they just come here so they can claim asylum support and live an easy life, sponging off the British government whilst we all pay for them.
Counter_Speech: Most asylum seekers really want to work but they're not allowed to unless their claim is accepted and they gain refugee status.

Hate_Speech: These migrants that come over and work for cash in hand, undercutting whatever Brits will work for, are harming our industries. It's so hard to get work now because there'll always be some Eastern European who'll do it for cheaper!
Counter_Speech: Surely the problem here is not the migrants trying to make a living but the exploitative employers who are hiring people for less than minimum wage and underpaying them?

Hate_Speech: immigrants are pushing our school system to it's limits! More and more pupils from non-white backgrounds whilst the white population stays stagnant, and spending per pupil has gone down. They need to stop taking up resources for British people!
Counter_Speech: I hardly think the fact immigrants have children is the reason why the education system is under pressure, maybe the government needs to fund it better? It seems like a stretch to say that pupil spending going down is due to migration.

Hate_Speech: Makes me laugh when women moan about not being paid as much as men, maybe that’s because you should be at home cleaning and child rearing?
Counter_Speech: Women have proven to be just as proficient as men in paid employment and should be paid equally to reflect this. Your attitudes are stale and outdated.

Hate_Speech: Allowing women to vote is one of the worst things to happen to our society. They can't use logic like men can to make decisions about things like politics.
Counter_Speech: Women fought hard for their right to vote and deserve to have a say about who's running the country.

Hate_Speech: Shouted across the road to complement a bird the other day and she told be to f*** off. You can't say anything anymore without it being seen as 'sexist'! PC gone mad.
Counter_Speech: If you want to complement someone, you can approach them and politely talk to them, shouting at a woman across the road is cat calling and might have made her feel unsafe in public!

Hate_Speech: I don't know how girls nowadays expect to be treated with respect when they go out wearing next to nothing, looking like sluts.
Counter_Speech: Women deserve respect whatever they're wearing because they are human beings, it shouldn't matter what clothes someone is wearing.

Hate_Speech: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
Counter_Speech: It's because it's dehumanising and is sometimes used in a derogatory or objectifying way. Maybe refer to women as women and you won't have a problem?

Hate_Speech: Why are there so many female politicians these days? Women are not natural born leaders like men are.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that? There are so many female politicians doing a great job, showing that they can lead as well as men, sometimes better.

Hate_Speech: The jews are the reason we have the problems we have today. Diversity, immigration, feminism, it's all part of their plan to destroy European people and their culture.
Counter_Speech: This isn't true, what gave you this idea?

Hate_Speech: Jews always pretend to be persecuted victims when in reality they're the ones controlling us.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people have historically been persecuted and anti-Semitism today still stems from these historic events, but Jewish people aren't 'controlling us', what gives you that idea?

Hate_Speech: The holocaust never happened. It's all a lie to make people feel sorry for Jews.
Counter_Speech: There's lots of evidence that the holocaust happened, survivors, concentration camps, documents, millions of lives ended. How can you say it never happened when there's so much evidence to show that it did?

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have so many third world immigrants in our country, they want us whites replaced.
Counter_Speech: This isn't true, what makes you say this?

Hate_Speech: homosexuals are mentally ill. No one in their right mind would think this perverted behaviour is okay.
Counter_Speech: Being gay isn't a mental illness, it's a perfectly normal lifestyle.

Hate_Speech: How much danger are we putting children in by letting gay couples adopt? We don't know how they're raising them or what they might do to them...
Counter_Speech: There are so many gay couples that give kids great lives through adoption, why do you think they shouldn't adopt?

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: LGBT people have no agenda, they're just trying to get on with their lives in peace! What do you mean about the traditional family?

Hate_Speech: Fags want their agenda taught in schools now, this is harmful to our children and has got to stop!
Counter_Speech: What exactly have you seen will be taught in schools?

Hate_Speech: Poofs spread AIDS
Counter_Speech: The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's disproportionately affected the LGBT community but today HIV is easily dealt with with medication which makes it untransmitable and undetectable. It's also not very common, in gay or straight people.

Hate_Speech: LGBT history month now being taught in schools… I’m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.
Counter_Speech: We still can teach British, European and World history, but part of that is looking at the history of groups which have been erased from our history previously. Looking at the some of the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK can inform the future for everyone!

Hate_Speech: Pride disgusts me, homosexuals parading their deviant lifestyles in public like they have anything to be proud of.
Counter_Speech: They do have a lot to be proud of! The LGBT community has fought hard to win basic rights for themselves, they should be proud of their struggle, and of their identities, especially when many have been told to be ashamed of them for so long.

Hate_Speech: Tolerating fag pride means we let the feminisation of our society happen. This will have consequences.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'feminisation' and what are the consequences?

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when I see women who think they're lesbians. They obviously have a mental illness or haven't found the right man to show them how much happier they'd be in a normal relationship.
Counter_Speech: Or maybe they're just lesbians so they're not interested in men? You can't force someone to be something they're not, and it doesn't affect you if they choose to be in same sex relationships.

Hate_Speech: It's vile that we are confusing children with bisexual characters on tv… whatever next? trans SpongeBob?
Counter_Speech: There's nothing vile or confusing about bisexuality. I'm sure children can wrap their heads around it. It simply means someone is attracted to more than one gender. What's so hard to get about that?

Hate_Speech: Now the innocence of children is being eroded by comics with a bi-sexual superman. How can we protect our children from this nonsense?
Counter_Speech: Nothing about superman being bisexual is eroding the innocence of children. If you can teach children about straight relationships, you can teach them that bisexuals exist. If you think otherwise, you need to be educated about bisexuality. If you have any questions ask them!

Hate_Speech: First there's bisexual characters on tv, next we're normalising child marriage. It's a slippery slope...
Counter_Speech: There's absolutely no link between bisexuality and child marriage. What are you implying?

Hate_Speech: Superman is now bisexual?? He has become a bit of a slag - with no morals and a predator he’s happy to get it away with anyone he comes across.
Counter_Speech: Bisexuals aren't 'slags', being attracted to people of all genders doesn't make you a predator or mean that you have 'no morals' it just means gender isn't the deciding factor in who you're attracted to.

Hate_Speech: Can't believe they are making tv characters that have been around for years 'bisexual' now. This is PC gone mad.
Counter_Speech: Why does it bother you?

Hate_Speech: Making tv characters bisexual is an attack on white masculinity. We are being erased.
Counter_Speech: There are still plenty of white men on tv, some just happen to be bisexual. How is it an attack on masculinity? Bisexual men can be masculine, and are sometimes more secure in their masculinity than many straight men as their masculinity isn't dependent on heterosexuality!

Hate_Speech: Superman is now bisexual, apparently. Why is he still called superMAN?
Counter_Speech: Bisexual men are men?

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are greedy.
Counter_Speech: No, that's an outdated stereotype. There's nothing greedy about being attracted to people because of who they are as people, not because of their gender!

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are confused, they can't make up their minds. They are mentally ill.
Counter_Speech: Why do they need to 'make up their minds'? Can't they just be attracted to whoever they are attracted to?

Hate_Speech: Why are we being told to accept bisexuality as 'normal' now. Nothing normal about that.
Counter_Speech: There are plenty of bisexuals in the world, it's actually very common to be bisexual. What is not normal about that?

Hate_Speech: First we tell kids it's okay to be 'bisexual', next they are confused and we are telling them they have to change genders. It's a dangerous path.
Counter_Speech: There's no link between being bisexual and wanting to transition genders. These two things aren't related.

Hate_Speech: Bisexual men are just fags in denial
Counter_Speech: No bisexual men are bisexual men. You can be attracted to more than one gender you know.

Hate_Speech: Just seen an article about Muslims telling women in Manchester they have to wear burqas, they are enforcing sharia law!
Counter_Speech: Where did you read that? Are you sure that's true?

Hate_Speech: According to this research, 3 in 5 Muslims support extremism and terrorism. There is no such thing as a moderate Muslim.
Counter_Speech: What research? That sounds unlikely, and definitely exaggerated.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are calling for dogs to be banned as pets because they are seen as ‘dirty’ in the Quran! We cannot comply with their agenda.
Counter_Speech: Where are Muslims calling for this? This doesn't sound true.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are taking over our country! This article explains how they want to replace to white British population.
Counter_Speech: This article sounds like a conspiracy theory. British Muslims just want to live alongside everybody else, there's no 'agenda' to take over.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to ban non-halal meat!! They are taking control of our country.
Counter_Speech: Where did you see that? I don't think they do.

Hate_Speech: The jewish elite are using their status and power to control us! It's all a plot for Jews to take over the west.
Counter_Speech: What makes you think that?

Hate_Speech: Jews want us to submit to their agenda. They are intent on decimating the white race and corrupting Europe and the West.
Counter_Speech: What agenda exactly?

Hate_Speech: Jews are so greedy, no wonder they're the ones in charge of all the banks.
Counter_Speech: That's an anti-Semitic and outdated stereotype. There are high status bankers of all different religions and beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: Where have you drawn that link from? Also it seems a bit reductive to see immigration as 'mongrelising' society.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason feminism is plaguing our country, destroying our traditional roles and families. They want to see our society decimated.
Counter_Speech: What makes you link Jewish people and feminism? And why is feminism a bad thing in your view?

Hate_Speech: When you look at the shocking job our government is doing, it makes a lot more sense when you realise it's filled with Jews.
Counter_Speech: What is that supposed to mean?

Hate_Speech: Jews love to play the victim. They still rinse the holocaust for pity even today, when it happened almost a century ago.
Counter_Speech: Well the holocaust was horrific on a monumental scale, and it's effects are still felt today. I wouldn't say that's 'playing the victim', I'd say there's a legacy of anti-semitism left from it that we still have to address.

Hate_Speech: Did the holocaust really happen? You can't trust Jews to give you an honest account of anything.
Counter_Speech: Yes, there's plenty of evidence. Literal camps you can go and visit, 6 million people dead, leaving behind families and loved ones. How can you deny something that there's so much evidence of?

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason the lgbt agenda is gaining so much power in the West. They want to destroy our traditions and way of life.
Counter_Speech: What do Jewish people have to do with the lgbt community? I don't see the link?

Hate_Speech: Look at the amount of migrants arriving in Dover this week, no wonder we spend so much money on benefits and hand outs, they're bankrupting us.
Counter_Speech: Actually migrants and refugees arriving here aren't automatically eligible for benefits, if they're a refugee they can't claim benefits until they get leave to remain in the UK, which can take years. If they're not a refugee, they don't really have any access to provision at all.

Hate_Speech: Why are non-white countries allowed to exist but white countries aren’t? We’re constantly made to take in more and more black Africans.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by that? There are no countries that say ‘no white people’.

Hate_Speech: Africa for the Africans, Asia for the Asians, why aren’t we allowed to keep Britain for the British? We are erasing our white population, stop white genocide now.
Counter_Speech: There is no white genocide happening in the UK, what makes you think that?

Hate_Speech: More crime, more stabbings, more rapes, and what's changed? We've got big black and Asian populations in our cities.
Counter_Speech: I don't know if you can draw a direct correlation between those things, lots of things have changed in the last few decades that could affect crime rates.

Hate_Speech: There are some towns that are 'no go' areas for whites now because the Asian population is so big, this is meant to be the UK, not Pakistan!
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's true, some newspapers have referred to these areas as 'no go' areas but there's nothing to suggest anything would happen if you as a white person went there.

Hate_Speech: All these blacks from Africa on our football teams but I don't see any English or European players on African teams. 'Enrichment' via diversity seems to be a one way street.
Counter_Speech: Isn't that because these African players are great footballers, so have been scouted by UK teams because they want players of a high calibre?

Hate_Speech: If white genocide isn't real then why do pictures of school classes look so different from the 70's vs now. Back then everyone was white except maybe 1 or 2, now there are 2-3 white children in a class of 30 blacks and arabs. We are being invaded.
Counter_Speech: The demographic makeup of schools varies greatly depending on what area the school is in. Schools in cities and urban areas have more diverse classes, but lots of schools in towns and more rural areas are still overwhelmingly white. You can't generalise this to everywhere.

Hate_Speech: Went to Londanistan yesterday, not a white face in sight! Just asians and arabs everywhere, if we don't do something soon our culture is going to be erased. Forced multiculturalism has got to stop!
Counter_Speech: Yeah London is very diverse, why do you feel like this is a bad thing?

Hate_Speech: Diversity is ruining this country, erasing white culture, erasing white people. Diversity is a code word for white genocide.
Counter_Speech: Just because the UK is diverse doesn't mean that white people are 'being erased'. What do you mean by that?

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: Jeez, a bit extreme don't you think? Just because somebody's culture is different from yours it's no reason to call for violence. And don't think of other continents as the 'third world', just because you don't know much about these countries doesn't make them 'uncivilised' or 'undeveloped'. Educate yourself.

Hate_Speech: Yet another stabbing in London, and the perpetrator is black, how surprising. Tell me again how diversity and multiculturalism are 'enriching'?
Counter_Speech: What a tragic incident, but there's no reason to think the person's ethnicity had any bearing on why they committed this attack.

Hate_Speech: Everywhere you look now the media is encouraging race mixing and miscegenation. It's in our films and tv shows, in adverts. They want to mongrelise the white race and pollute our European heritage.
Counter_Speech: Firstly, I don't think this is as widespread as you're proposing. Secondly, why would you have a problem if other people choose to be in interracial relationships? Who somebody else loves has no effect on your life.

Hate_Speech: China isn't being turned non-Chinese, Japan isn't being turned non-Japanese, only WHITE countries are being made to become less white through forced migration and race mixing. This is WHITE GENOCIDE.
Counter_Speech: No it's not, nothing about immigration happening is 'genocide'. You're conflating nationality with race. What exactly is a 'white country'?

Hate_Speech: Anti-racist is a code word for anti-white. The worst is white people who are anti-white. RACE TRAITORS!
Counter_Speech: No anti-racist is a code word for... anti-racist. People concerned about racism aren't anti-white they are just calling attention to systematic injustices faced by ethnic minorities!

Hate_Speech: The great replacement is real and it's happening right before our eyes. We need to act before it's too late.
Counter_Speech: No, the great replacement is a conspiracy theory. There's no truth in the idea that demographic change is some kind of plan being orchestrated by the 'elite'.

Hate_Speech: One downside to the race mixing that is encouraged in our society nowadays is the effect that black and arab genes will have on children's IQs. A mongrelised population is one that is stupid and easy to control.
Counter_Speech: What are you talking about? There's no evidence to say that black people, or people from the Middle East have lower IQs. Also, IQ is a very outdated measure of intelligence and isn't widely supported as a measure of this now.

Hate_Speech: We’ve got so many Muslims in our country that some places are now no go areas for white people, when are people going to realise this is an invasion?
Counter_Speech: ‘No go areas’ is just a title that was given to these areas by some tabloid papers, they’re not actually unsafe for non-Muslims, they just have a large Muslim population that’s all!

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to impose sharia law on our country, we need to show them it’s not welcome!
Counter_Speech: No they don’t, they may follow sharia themselves but the vast majority of Muslims don’t care about imposing their beliefs on others!

Hate_Speech: Why isn’t the burqa banned in this country? It’s just a symbol of the oppressive force of Islam.
Counter_Speech: Because in this country people are free to wear and believe in whatever they want. Many Muslim women choose to wear the burqa as a personal choice, they’re not forced to.

Hate_Speech: Halal slaughter is a barbaric and cruel practice and should be banned! Why does the meat industry pander to the whims of Islamists?
Counter_Speech: If you’re against halal slaughter I assume you’re against all animal cruelty and slaughter?

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to make it mandatory for women to wear the burqa! They don’t respect our way of life.
Counter_Speech: No, Muslims don’t care what other people are doing, they just want to be able to follow their religion in peace, where did you hear that?

Hate_Speech: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
Counter_Speech: No, Muslims want to be able to eat halal, but they don’t care if everyone eats it. What makes you think that?

Hate_Speech: More and more mosques being built whilst churches are being burnt down all over Europe. This is the start of Islamification.
Counter_Speech: There’s no link between mosques being built and churches being vandalised, why are you trying to make one?

Hate_Speech: Everywhere you look now there’s shops with Asian names, halal butchers, Indian clothes shops, this isn’t Afghanistan!! Time to take our country back from these musrats
Counter_Speech: So you’re angry that Muslims and the Asian population are starting businesses and contributing to the economy?

Hate_Speech: These Muslims come over here with their 3 wives and 10 kids then sponge off our government and get huge council houses. How is this fair??
Counter_Speech: This isn’t true, sure some people have big families and some people require state support but you can’t generalise this to all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: We’ve got homeless veterans who’ve fought for our country sleeping on the streets whilst these Afghans get put up in hotels then given a house, how is this fair?
Counter_Speech: Yes, our homelessness problem is terrible and no one deserves to be sleeping on the streets, but asylum seekers are not the reason this problem exists. The government could house homeless veterans too, but chooses not to!

Hate_Speech: Asylum seekers are sat on their arses getting benefits whilst I go out working for minimum wage everyday. How is this fair?
Counter_Speech: It’s illegal for asylum seekers to work. Most of them want to, but they could risk their application for asylum being rejected if they break the law by doing so!

Hate_Speech: We need to send a clear message
Counter_Speech: No we’re not. There are over 600,000 empty houses in this country, and vast amounts of land that haven’t been built on. We’re not full.

Hate_Speech: Just read about a family of Afghans who came over here and got given a £1 million council house because they’ve got such a big family. Fuming.
Counter_Speech: That sounds like fake news, where did you see that?

Hate_Speech: Migrants just want to come here to exploit our nhs, when it’s already struggling as it is. We cannot keep supporting health tourism!
Counter_Speech: Actually health tourism is responsible for a minuscule amount of the NHS budget, maybe the problem is actually the underfunding of the healthcare system?

Hate_Speech: The hoards of migrants that are coming here are a threat to girls in our country, migrant rape is an EPIDEMIC
Counter_Speech: Sexual assault is a big problem that we need to do more to address, but I don't think this is an issue that's solely caused by migrants?

Hate_Speech: These migrants are SCUM, they're too uncivilised for our society and they don't even try and integrate into our culture.
Counter_Speech: I'm sure lots of migrants want to be better integrated but it's difficult when they don't know anyone who can help them to get to grips with living in a new country. It can be very isolating moving here!

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a menace to our society, look at the link between mass migration and crime rates going up. There's more stabbings, more assaults, and you can guess who's doing it...
Counter_Speech: What exactly is the link between higher migration and crime rates? I haven't seen anything to suggest the two things are linked.

Hate_Speech: Yet another war memorial vandalised, and I think we can guess who's behind it. These migrant scum have no respect for our history and culture.
Counter_Speech: That's a big assumption, how do you know it's migrants? It could have been anyone.

Hate_Speech: You never used to hear about stabbings happening as much as they do now. It's all these migrants bringing a culture of violence to our country.
Counter_Speech: There are a lot of stabbings, yes, but they're not all committed by migrants? Where is the evidence to suggest that?

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry to hear you don't feel safe in your local area anymore but what does migrants moving to the area have to do with that?

Hate_Speech: Mass migration is turning our inner cities into ghettos! These people add nothing to our communities.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by that? Migrants are more likely to be business owners and create jobs than the native population, that’s good for our communities!

Hate_Speech: Another machete attack. Both suspects were of immigrant descent. Is this what liberals call cultural enrichment?
Counter_Speech: We all know violent crime and knife crime is increasing across communities. This is a terrible criminal act but we also know those criminals do not represent a whole community.

Hate_Speech: Another child gang raped by savage migrants. Multiculturalism has failed.
Counter_Speech: Sexual assault is always shocking and children need to be protected from abuse but why is the nationality of the perpetrators relevant unless you're only sharing this news to push a narrative?

Hate_Speech: Calling criminals entering our country 'undocumented migrants' is a little bit like calling drugs 'undocumented drugs'. Just avoids using the words illegal and smugglers.
Counter_Speech: They are people nonetheless, and many are coming here to seek asylum because they are fleeing war or persecution. This isn't illegal.

Hate_Speech: Women have every right to *protect* their rights from pro-trans activists. No-one has the right to call them 'TERFS' for doing so. Only women have vaginas. Only men have penises. Only women have periods. These are indisputable facts.
Counter_Speech: You're completely ignoring the distinction between sex and gender. People of the female sex have a female reproductive system, but gender is about how you feel, how you identify, gender has nothing to do with your reproductive organs.

Hate_Speech: Terms like 'non-binary' are modern, attention-seeking, & anti-scientific. They want to erase the reality that women are women and men are men, to undermine the rights of REAL women.
Counter_Speech: Non-binary might be a relatively new word in the public lexicon but people who don't fit into either male or female binary gender have always existed. It's not anti-scientific, it regards gender not sex.

Hate_Speech: The trans agenda want to ignore the biological reality of being a woman. You can't just call yourself a woman and expect everyone to believe you are one when you are clearly a man! It's PC gone mad.
Counter_Speech: There is a difference between sex and gender. Trans people are not trying to ignore biological reality, some people know they are a woman, do not feel like they are a man in anyway, but don't have a female reproductive system. This is the difference between gender and sex, gender is who you feel you are, sex is just the biological aspect, and they don't always match up.

Hate_Speech: The trans militia say they're fighting for 'rights' but then insist on pushing ideas that make women unsafe, like allowing men to use women's toilets without question. What is this madness and why are we accepting it??
Counter_Speech: Nobody is asking for that. The point people are making is that trans women should be able to feel safe using womens toilets because they are in fact women. If they were to use mens toilets they would be put in an unsafe situation.

Hate_Speech: Trans women being allowed to use women's shelters just sounds like a way to justify letting the men who abuse women into their spaces to abuse them again.
Counter_Speech: That's not what it means at all. The trans women who would use womens shelter services are women who will have faced abuse of some kind, just like the other women there.

Hate_Speech: They want us to believe that tricking kids into thinking they're transgender is normal. That giving kids hormones that permanently mess with their development is normal. We can't let this happen right before our eyes.
Counter_Speech: No one is forcing kids to transition, if a child feels like they are transgender then actually being able to medically transition with hormones is not a decision ever taken lightly, and it's a long and stressful process involving consultation from many medical and psychological professionals.

Hate_Speech: The trans agenda are anti-science, they don’t listen to logic and facts. Ignoring the biological reality of sex is pure delusion.
Counter_Speech: There is no ‘agenda’, and they are not ‘anti-science’, they just understand the difference between sex and gender.

Hate_Speech: How are our people meant to get jobs when migrants are coming here and depressing wages by taking on jobs for less than minimum wage?
Counter_Speech: This does happen but are the migrants to blame? Maybe we need to turn our focus to the employers who are exploiting people to make more profit for themselves.

Hate_Speech: Another mosque smashed up. I’m beginning to wonder whether the fact we have had diversity and multiculturalism forced on us without our consent has anything to do with this?
Counter_Speech: So you’re blaming this hate crime on the fact that Muslims... exist?

Hate_Speech: Just seen another story about a woman being asked to cover up. Soon we are all going to be forced to wear a hijab, other clothes will be considered offensive and inappropriate.
Counter_Speech: There’s nothing to suggest she was asked to cover up by a Muslim. Stop co-opting news stories unrelated to Islam to fuel your fearmongering.

Hate_Speech: Most people don’t have a clue what’s going on in mosques across this country. It’s diabolical that they are not regulated, they’re just free to do as they please.
Counter_Speech: What regulation would you suggest? And for what reason?

Hate_Speech: Just seen that Muslims are banning people from walking dogs in Muslim areas, this is ridiculous! They hate our culture, even our pets.
Counter_Speech: That sounds fake, where did you see this? I’m sure they really don’t care.

Hate_Speech: They want white Europeans to feel guilty for climate change whilst ignoring the fact that Asians and Africans are responsible for over 90% of the pollution in our oceans.
Counter_Speech: Do you mean to plastic pollution that Western countries export to them? We literally send our rubbish to those countries to lie in scrap heaps.

Hate_Speech: Allowing children at Pride parades is sick. It’s just another way to indoctrinate them into this perverse lifestyle.
Counter_Speech: I think it’s nice that more parents are open minded now. Taking kids to pride is a great way to let them know they will still be loved and accepted if they do ever realise they are queer.

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: Kids in drag doesn’t equate to the lgbt community sexualising children. Why did you make that link?

Hate_Speech: Allowing kids to go to pride is the start of them being pushed down the trans pipeline.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by the ‘trans pipeline’?

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.

Hate_Speech: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
Counter_Speech: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

Hate_Speech: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.

Hate_Speech: Niggas should just leave our country.
