Counter_Speech: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

Hate_Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many black poors. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: I would agree that the problem of violence in society is a problem of poverty and inequality. But that is not related to ethnicity. The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".

Hate_Speech: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferior.
Counter_Speech: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not compatible with our society
Counter_Speech: Human beings are the best exemplars of diversity in nature. If we wish to achieve the best possible society, then a diversity of beliefs, opinions and experiences is absolutely necessary.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.

Hate_Speech: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
Counter_Speech: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society. Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

Hate_Speech: Jews are Christ Killers.
Counter_Speech: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.

Hate_Speech: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
Counter_Speech: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

Hate_Speech: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

Hate_Speech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
Counter_Speech: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

Hate_Speech: The crisis is caused by migrants.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are often victims of discrimination and violence. Immigration is a part of the solution to these problems.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
Counter_Speech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

Hate_Speech: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.
Counter_Speech: Your claim about homosexuals is not supported by evidence, where are you getting the information that supports these nonsensical assertions.

Hate_Speech: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
Counter_Speech: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

Hate_Speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
Counter_Speech: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

Hate_Speech: Migrants rape our children.
Counter_Speech: What kind of a statement is that? How can you say something like that?

Hate_Speech: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

Hate_Speech: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
Counter_Speech: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
Counter_Speech: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.

Hate_Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: Life is too short not to love who you like, or to worry about arbitary notions and 'norms' that are no longer relevant to how people live their lives.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They should take responsibility for letting their children grow up in a 'ghetto'.
Counter_Speech: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people, we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power, the massive wealth gap, etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counter_Speech: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

Hate_Speech: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
Counter_Speech: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

Hate_Speech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
Counter_Speech: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

Hate_Speech: Jews run our country.
Counter_Speech: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are violent people.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

Hate_Speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
Counter_Speech: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

Hate_Speech: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
Counter_Speech: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the UK economy.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folk are different.
Counter_Speech: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
Counter_Speech: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

Hate_Speech: Nazi were not as bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
Counter_Speech: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tried joining a library?

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
Counter_Speech: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
Counter_Speech: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the means by which our jobs are stolen by foreigners, and this impacts on low-income families.
Counter_Speech: Immigration doesn't mean letting people in to steal our jobs, but rather, respecting people's right to live and work in the country they choose.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
Counter_Speech: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

Hate_Speech: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
Counter_Speech: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens. It is time to give black people back the basic rights they should have always had the right to enjoy.

Hate_Speech: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
Counter_Speech: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: People of any religion can be terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
Counter_Speech: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

Hate_Speech: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
Counter_Speech: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
Counter_Speech: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

Hate_Speech: Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and it has been proven time and time again that its teachings do not threaten the very existence of Western civilization.

Hate_Speech: True Muslims are intolerant.
Counter_Speech: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult
Counter_Speech: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

Hate_Speech: We do not want Muslims in our country.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'we'?

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women hate men and they are bitches for this reason.
Counter_Speech: People can and should choose their own partners.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
Counter_Speech: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

Hate_Speech: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
Counter_Speech: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

Hate_Speech: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
Counter_Speech: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).

Hate_Speech: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have value as human beings, that is who they are.

Hate_Speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
Counter_Speech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

Hate_Speech: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: Religions also promote arts, sciences, help to develop the community. Islam is not an exception. It's not about death and despair.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counter_Speech: Women do have a right to vote, and they deserve equal rights.

Hate_Speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
Counter_Speech: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

Hate_Speech: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
Counter_Speech: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, and are a part of human nature.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a behavioral preference, and it is ok to love others of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
Counter_Speech: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

Hate_Speech: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
Counter_Speech: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

Hate_Speech: Refugees should not be welcomed.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

Hate_Speech: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

Hate_Speech: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
Counter_Speech: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

Hate_Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
Counter_Speech: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

Hate_Speech: migrants rape our women
Counter_Speech: Statistics show that there is a difference between the reported rape of a person by a migrant and the actual rape cases among native born people. The latter are always under-reported.

Hate_Speech: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Women don't belong in politics.
Counter_Speech: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are not sick, they just need to be accepted for who they are.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men do not exist as a burden to society. They are essential contributors to society.

Hate_Speech: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no morals.
Counter_Speech: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

Hate_Speech: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
Counter_Speech: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.

Hate_Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counter_Speech: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

Hate_Speech: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
Counter_Speech: What makes this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.

Hate_Speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

Hate_Speech: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: Our countries were founded by foreigners, for example the United States. Foreigners have the right to migrate, if they want to.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

Hate_Speech: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
Counter_Speech: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

Hate_Speech: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
Counter_Speech: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

Hate_Speech: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
Counter_Speech: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
Counter_Speech: Muslims in Britain have contributed a lot to our economy. They are true innovators in modern Britain.

Hate_Speech: Violence on our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Violence on our streets is the result of many complex causes. Violence cannot simply be the fault of one race.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
Counter_Speech: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

Hate_Speech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
Counter_Speech: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.

Hate_Speech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are too connected to their homeland , they are not loyal to our nation.
Counter_Speech: Jews, regardless of social status, are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes, we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
Counter_Speech: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: A lot of Jewish are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not all are involved in the financial industry. Where is the evidence for your claim?

Hate_Speech: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
Counter_Speech: This idea that a woman should not have rights on her own body is completely wrong, not only to her but also to society as a whole.

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

Hate_Speech: What has feminism ever done for you?
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
Counter_Speech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
Counter_Speech: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

Hate_Speech: jewish folks control hollywood
Counter_Speech: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
Counter_Speech: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: Conspiracy theories about Jews are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been or will ever be run according to a Jewish plan.

Hate_Speech: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

Hate_Speech: muslim folks are taking over europe
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks should be beaten
Counter_Speech: Most Jews are nice people, living in coexistence with non Jews, why would you beat them?

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, and are a part of human nature.

Hate_Speech: Jews love to gamble.
Counter_Speech: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an ideology that can actually prevent many deaths, e.g., homicides of women, domestic violence, if it is fully understood by every last member of the society.

Hate_Speech: Gays are diseased.
Counter_Speech: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.

Hate_Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counter_Speech: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counter_Speech: Because it is not the access to health care that is important but rather the quality of the care! Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Gay men being shot is funny.
Counter_Speech: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no morals.
Counter_Speech: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

Hate_Speech: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

Hate_Speech: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
Counter_Speech: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
Counter_Speech: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: How can it be that people who have a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

Hate_Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.

Hate_Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.

Hate_Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
Counter_Speech: Marriage should be a choice for all, irrespective of the gender of partners..

Hate_Speech: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
Counter_Speech: Your claim has nothing to do with the evaluationary and scientific studies, suggesting that homosexuality is in the genetic codes (hence, they are 'natural'). Maybe you are concerned about their 'unconventional' love.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.

Hate_Speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
Counter_Speech: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about niggas being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

Hate_Speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
Counter_Speech: We should treat everyone as if they came from our same family. LGBT+ people are not different.

Hate_Speech: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.

Hate_Speech: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
Counter_Speech: An objective way of teaching gender to children is very important for the society and it is not imposing. We can present scientific and peer-reviewed sources and discuss stories of how people experience gender in terms of their personal identity.

Hate_Speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
Counter_Speech: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

Hate_Speech: Illegal immigrants make America worse

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.

Counter_Speech: If I remember correctly, at that time the President was George W. Bush, the Vice President was Dick Cheney, the National Security Advisor was Condoleeza Rice and Secretary of Defense was Donald Rumsfeld... They were all in favor of the war and had the ultimate authority for making decisions for the United States, still none of them are Jewish.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are inferior.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

Hate_Speech: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
Counter_Speech: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.

Hate_Speech: Jews totally run Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
Counter_Speech: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the banks.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.

Hate_Speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.

Counter_Speech: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

Hate_Speech: Jews are born greedy
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes, that's the only truth.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
Counter_Speech: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

Hate_Speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
Counter_Speech: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
Counter_Speech: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Jews are genetically evil.
Counter_Speech: Just because they are Jewish, it does not mean they are bad people.

Hate_Speech: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

Hate_Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counter_Speech: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

Hate_Speech: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
Counter_Speech: Do you know how many LGBT people live in your own country? If not, look for information: there are many. Moreover, LGBT people are not only excluded from many societies, but are also harassed and attacked all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
Counter_Speech: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam's core values are similar to Western values. To say that Islam is ruining Western culture is a complete and total distortion of the truth.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
Counter_Speech: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counter_Speech: So are you blaming all of them? Lets say you are in a group of 10 people, 1 is a killer, does that make you ALL killers? Are you serious?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They don't deserve to be called 'a burden'.

Hate_Speech: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
Counter_Speech: The doctrine of Islam is a religion, not a bad one. What's the reason you think this?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

Hate_Speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
Counter_Speech: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?

Hate_Speech: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
Counter_Speech: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: People's biology does not determine their behavior.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

Hate_Speech: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
Counter_Speech: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

Hate_Speech: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
Counter_Speech: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

Hate_Speech: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
Counter_Speech: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
Counter_Speech: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.

Hate_Speech: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
Counter_Speech: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

Hate_Speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
Counter_Speech: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

Hate_Speech: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Let's face it, there is no evidence for the claim that children raised by lesbians are any worse than other children.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counter_Speech: Sorry about your loss. I know your pain. The murderers will be charged, but remember that not all POC are killers.

Hate_Speech: Fucking bleeding hearts, take migrants home with you
Counter_Speech: The world belongs to everyone and helping someone in need wouldn't be a problem for a kind hearted human being.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
Counter_Speech: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Don't we all hate foreigners? They are a problem.
Counter_Speech: Well, foreigners are certainly not a 'problem' in our country, we are happy to have them around.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

Hate_Speech: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
Counter_Speech: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

Hate_Speech: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
Counter_Speech: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
Counter_Speech: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

Hate_Speech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
Counter_Speech: We live in a complex and multifaceted world. It is easier to blame one group for everything rather than studying hard and trying to understand this complexity.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
Counter_Speech: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

Hate_Speech: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
Counter_Speech: As a matter of fact, we couldn't manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants. The health system would collapse without migrant workers.

Hate_Speech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
Counter_Speech: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

Hate_Speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
Counter_Speech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

Hate_Speech: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

Hate_Speech: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
Counter_Speech: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

Hate_Speech: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
Counter_Speech: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: Gays are poisoning our children with their icky homosexuality.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'poisononing our children'? Why do you think this is the case?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that what you are saying is true. I think that the idea that Muslims are incompatible with Western society is a myth.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
Counter_Speech: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.

Hate_Speech: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
Counter_Speech: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

Hate_Speech: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
Counter_Speech: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counter_Speech: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

Hate_Speech: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counter_Speech: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: The 'gay agenda' is about equal rights, equality is about acceptance, and the right of people to be treated with respect and dignity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: Since when? there is not such thing as "modern world", but there is 21th century Europe. And Islam is a contributing part of the 21th century Europe.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
Counter_Speech: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
Counter_Speech: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
Counter_Speech: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

Hate_Speech: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.
Counter_Speech: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

Hate_Speech: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
Counter_Speech: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are you encouraging this?

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
Counter_Speech: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?

Hate_Speech: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
Counter_Speech: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

Hate_Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counter_Speech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
Counter_Speech: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.

Hate_Speech: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
Counter_Speech: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

Hate_Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine White powerful makes, when they themselves are just envious, incompetent and useless.
Counter_Speech: Without women there would be no men.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
Counter_Speech: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: Immigration makes us less safe.
Counter_Speech: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
Counter_Speech: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: our culture is predestined to have female rulers, and female rulers are the pinnacle of civilization, they are proud and brave.

Hate_Speech: migrants are not welcome in our country
Counter_Speech: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.

Hate_Speech: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
Counter_Speech: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
Counter_Speech: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

Hate_Speech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
Counter_Speech: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

Hate_Speech: We have become a nation of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

Hate_Speech: They accuse me of being Islamophobic because I don't like Muslims. But they are the same Muslims who threaten us with explosives!
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not the problem in this debate. Terrorists are.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

Hate_Speech: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
Counter_Speech: Why do you believe that immigrants or Christians are a nuisance for Muslims? Do you know Muslims that share your opinion?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incompatible with us.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beliefs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they are all killers.
Counter_Speech: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing
Counter_Speech: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
Counter_Speech: Perhaps you should monitor your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: If someone is not allowed to vote, they cannot influence the legislative or executive branches of a government and they end up rising up against injustice and oppression. Is this what you want: more ethnic clashes?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
Counter_Speech: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

Hate_Speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
Counter_Speech: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
Counter_Speech: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs.
Counter_Speech: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

Hate_Speech: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
Counter_Speech: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
Counter_Speech: This is a very simplistic and inaccurate characterization of Islam. Some Muslims feel uncomfortable walking the streets of Britain with the fear of being attacked by racist people.

Hate_Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

Hate_Speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love and compassion. I don't understand why you think otherwise.

Hate_Speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
Counter_Speech: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
Counter_Speech: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

Hate_Speech: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
Counter_Speech: We should be respectful and compassionate towards those who suffered in one of the most horrific event in the history of mankind... I think this should be remembered forever!

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
Counter_Speech: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counter_Speech: What makes you say that? Women have always been an important part of any society. They have always contributed to and provided for their families. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
Counter_Speech: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: We live in a complex and diverse world: I find it strange that men still feel this way about women, and that they don't consider women as human as they are, and to be worth valuing as such.

Hate_Speech: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, women do have rights. The question is, to have them respected. And this includes the right to be treated with human dignity.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

Hate_Speech: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
Counter_Speech: Where are the facts?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the government.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

Hate_Speech: All women are inherently subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Well, in this day and age, the notion that some women are subhuman is totally intolerable.

Hate_Speech: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: That is just not true. There are many women who are brave and strong, and I respect them for that. What's more, there is also a movement called #MeToo, which is dedicated to giving voice to women who have suffered from sexual harassment.

Hate_Speech: Jews totally run Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Are you referring to Jews controlling all major media corporations? Where is your proof?

Hate_Speech: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

Hate_Speech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
Counter_Speech: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not a choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

Hate_Speech: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are all perverts.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

Hate_Speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
Counter_Speech: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
Counter_Speech: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

Hate_Speech: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
Counter_Speech: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
Counter_Speech: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to our society.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

Hate_Speech: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counter_Speech: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.

Hate_Speech: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
Counter_Speech: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.

Hate_Speech: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
Counter_Speech: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.
