Hate_Speech: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
Counter_Speech: This is a case of racial discrimination. There is a continuous rise in crime and violence in this country due to poverty and other inequalities. There are also racist groups in society which promote the idea of POC as inferior. This idea has nothing to do with justice.

Hate_Speech: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
Counter_Speech: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

Hate_Speech: I am not racist, but I definitely would not raise my children in the suburbs where the majority of people is black.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to hide behind "I am not racist but", you have no evidence for your claim. This is just fear-mongering, used to divide people and spread hate.

Hate_Speech: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
Counter_Speech: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

Hate_Speech: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
Counter_Speech: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

Hate_Speech: I wish I lived in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counter_Speech: All countries must abide by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, right?

Hate_Speech: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
Counter_Speech: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

Hate_Speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept all LGBT trans-shit as well.
Counter_Speech: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

Hate_Speech: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
Counter_Speech: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
Counter_Speech: The EU has a responsibility to help people fleeing war and poverty, not become preoccupied by which faith they practice.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks control hollywood
Counter_Speech: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

Hate_Speech: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
Counter_Speech: Researchers rule out that it is caused by immigration.

Hate_Speech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
Counter_Speech: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the government.
Counter_Speech: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).

Hate_Speech: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
Counter_Speech: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
Counter_Speech: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

Hate_Speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
Counter_Speech: The Nazi killing machine was all too efficient. Survivors lost so much and braved terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not interested in our culture.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to enjoy our country and culture, and we have to welcome them as we would like to be welcomed.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
Counter_Speech: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are terrible.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the banks.
Counter_Speech: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counter_Speech: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are less human.
Counter_Speech: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

Hate_Speech: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Your attitude about Islam is deeply flawed and you need to have a mature and open mind. Even if you find Islam repulsive, that does not mean you have to resort to irrational arguments to try and shut it down.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

Hate_Speech: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it is a crime to be gay? It is a societal disorder to target gays.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with the notion of a modern European.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
Counter_Speech: As far as I'm aware, Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies - and many of them are just as proud of their religion.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays
Counter_Speech: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.

Hate_Speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
Counter_Speech: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
Counter_Speech: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

Hate_Speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

Hate_Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
Counter_Speech: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

Hate_Speech: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

Hate_Speech: we should ban all migrants
Counter_Speech: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

Hate_Speech: Women should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

Hate_Speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
Counter_Speech: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

Hate_Speech: migrants rape our women.
Counter_Speech: Excuse me, but are women property? Or owned by the nation? I don't think so.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
Counter_Speech: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

Hate_Speech: We must stop immigration.
Counter_Speech: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

Hate_Speech: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
Counter_Speech: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

Hate_Speech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
Counter_Speech: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.

Hate_Speech: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal especially when it comes to gender.
Counter_Speech: Although Plato argued that women are physically weaker than men, they are equal in other respects and deserve equal opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Woman are basically childlike.
Counter_Speech: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

Hate_Speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
Counter_Speech: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
Counter_Speech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
Counter_Speech: Who cares what race or ethnicity you are? Nobody has the right to exclude others from society.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
Counter_Speech: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

Hate_Speech: migrants take our jobs
Counter_Speech: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

Hate_Speech: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
Counter_Speech: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

Hate_Speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
Counter_Speech: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.

Hate_Speech: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
Counter_Speech: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

Hate_Speech: niggas are inferior and should be enslaved once again.
Counter_Speech: What about human rights?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

Hate_Speech: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
Counter_Speech: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
Counter_Speech: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
Counter_Speech: You cannot blame an entire faith.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
Counter_Speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.

Hate_Speech: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

Hate_Speech: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

Hate_Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counter_Speech: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a despisable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are bad for the family.
Counter_Speech: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

Hate_Speech: Women are immature, incapable of critical thought.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

Hate_Speech: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

Hate_Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
Counter_Speech: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

Hate_Speech: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
Counter_Speech: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not religious people because they chose a self-centered lifestyle.
Counter_Speech: One's choice of lifestyle does not define whether they are religious or not.

Hate_Speech: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
Counter_Speech: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
Counter_Speech: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.

Hate_Speech: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
Counter_Speech: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

Hate_Speech: The feminists want to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

Hate_Speech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
Counter_Speech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

Hate_Speech: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
Counter_Speech: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

Hate_Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to kill someone?

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs.
Counter_Speech: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, and I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

Hate_Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counter_Speech: Gay people do exist in this country, and we respect their right to live and love who they want. However, I do not think that yours is an appropriate moral statement for our environment.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid and dangerous dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
Counter_Speech: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

Hate_Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The way you phrase the statement could be the epitome of some homophobic assumptions. To be honest, so much hatred and violence spewed from the way you thought.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

Hate_Speech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
Counter_Speech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

Hate_Speech: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
Counter_Speech: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
Counter_Speech: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

Hate_Speech: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
Counter_Speech: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
Counter_Speech: Learning about gender identity and sexual orientation in health classes in school could promote a more accepting environment and reduce bullying.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: I firmly believe that Britain does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
Counter_Speech: You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants. If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail.

Hate_Speech: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
Counter_Speech: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
Counter_Speech: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

Hate_Speech: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

Hate_Speech: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
Counter_Speech: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here. They are not citizens.
Counter_Speech: Why shouldn't they be? What rights do you have to prevent them from having the same rights as citizens?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

Hate_Speech: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
Counter_Speech: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

Hate_Speech: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we must stop immigrants because they are not accepted by our people.
Counter_Speech: The more a country takes integration as national policy, the more the citizens accept each other: see for example [link].

Hate_Speech: Jews control the US government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions, but that does not mean they control them.

Hate_Speech: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.

Hate_Speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
Counter_Speech: Jews do not view being Jewish as an exclusive status for accessing God's glory. So how can they feel superior?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They don't deserve to be called 'a burden'.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not running away from wars.
Counter_Speech: The desire to improve one's condition is both a right and, like the tendency to travel, both fundamental to human behaviour.

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
Counter_Speech: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

Hate_Speech: If you are from another culture, for example Jewish, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country.
Counter_Speech: Given similaries in cultures, including freedoms of speech and religion, you really need to provide some evidence for this statement.

Hate_Speech: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
Counter_Speech: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

Hate_Speech: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

Hate_Speech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
Counter_Speech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

Hate_Speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
Counter_Speech: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult!
Counter_Speech: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

Hate_Speech: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
Counter_Speech: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

Hate_Speech: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
Counter_Speech: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

Hate_Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?

Hate_Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counter_Speech: There is no law forbidding you to be a Muslim. It is a human right to pursue whatever religion you wish.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

Hate_Speech: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
Counter_Speech: That sounds like quite a violent threat. Should I let the police know about this or?

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't judge someone by their sexual preference, that is a personal preference and can't be changed.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
Counter_Speech: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: It is often claimed that Islam is about exclusion, but this is a lie.

Hate_Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?

Hate_Speech: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
Counter_Speech: At present migrants sustain part of our pension system with their taxes. Most probably they will not even enjoy the retirement pension they are paying for, since they will mostly go back home.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
Counter_Speech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

Hate_Speech: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
Counter_Speech: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
Counter_Speech: According to the WHO, more than 100 countries (including many in Latin America) have higher vaccination rates than the U.S., so we should say that 'immigrants are bringing herd immunity into the U.S.'

Hate_Speech: Jews run the world.
Counter_Speech: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is an ideology which, by its very nature, denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
Counter_Speech: That is not what feminism is about. Feminism is about the legitimate empowerment of women, in order for them to have the same rights as men.

Hate_Speech: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
Counter_Speech: Of course not, migrants are welcome here to integrate and help the community to thrive.

Hate_Speech: This world has become so corruptedt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule over it.
Counter_Speech: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

Hate_Speech: We have stopped being dominated by men, we are now dominated by women and this will be our ruin.
Counter_Speech: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?

Hate_Speech: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
Counter_Speech: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if theycannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.

Hate_Speech: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

Hate_Speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
Counter_Speech: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

Hate_Speech: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
Counter_Speech: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.

Hate_Speech: migrants are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
Counter_Speech: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.

Hate_Speech: immigrants are a drain on society
Counter_Speech: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that the problem of racism is caused by black people's laziness?

Hate_Speech: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

Hate_Speech: Muslim have no place in a modern state. They should deny their faith, if they really wanted to live here.
Counter_Speech: Let's be honest, who wants to live in a country where the government is allowed to impose their religion on others?

Hate_Speech: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
Counter_Speech: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
Counter_Speech: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
Counter_Speech: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
Counter_Speech: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

Hate_Speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
Counter_Speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
Counter_Speech: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: How about the money they contribute to our economy, their expertise and knowledge, their culture, tasty food. Should I go on?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.

Hate_Speech: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it: the drug trade is full of criminals and crooks, it does not depend on the skin tone of people.

Hate_Speech: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and police is doing nothing.
Counter_Speech: Of course there are whites that have been victims of police brutality, but the most important statistic I have seen is that of blacks being 2.5 times more likely to be killed by police in the US.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

Hate_Speech: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
Counter_Speech: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
Counter_Speech: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.

Hate_Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

Hate_Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
Counter_Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about human rights and economic opportunity. In fact, slavery was also used as a way to deny citizenship to black people.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

Hate_Speech: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
Counter_Speech: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

Hate_Speech: All Jews are criminals.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by individuals who wish to delegitimize and isolate individuals based on their religion. All religions have value and a positive role in society. Judaism is no exception.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.

Hate_Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counter_Speech: 400 Jews died in September 11 terrorist attacks, so not one of the smartest plan I ever saw!

Hate_Speech: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
Counter_Speech: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

Hate_Speech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
Counter_Speech: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
Counter_Speech: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
Counter_Speech: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

Hate_Speech: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

Hate_Speech: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

Hate_Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counter_Speech: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
Counter_Speech: The European Union includes Jewish people and, they have a part to play in our society.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
Counter_Speech: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Replaced by what exactly? I think our population will be fine.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a divisive force. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!

Hate_Speech: Transgenders shouldn't be allowed to use the man's toilet, it's none of their business.
Counter_Speech: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

Hate_Speech: According to the Bible, the gays are an abomination to God.
Counter_Speech: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

Hate_Speech: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
Counter_Speech: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense to try to accept who is different, instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?

Hate_Speech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
Counter_Speech: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

Hate_Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
Counter_Speech: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.

Hate_Speech: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
Counter_Speech: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
Counter_Speech: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
Counter_Speech: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counter_Speech: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays
Counter_Speech: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

Hate_Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counter_Speech: Are you really saying that homosexuality is a disease?

Hate_Speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

Hate_Speech: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
Counter_Speech: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

Hate_Speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

Hate_Speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
Counter_Speech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
Counter_Speech: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
Counter_Speech: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not running away from wars.
Counter_Speech: Would you risk your life and that of your children only on a whim? Don't you think that there must be life-or-death situations pushing these person to escape from their countries?

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews
Counter_Speech: Hate is never a good thing. Get rid of the hate inside you first and then teach love to others. Love changes people for the better, not hate.

Hate_Speech: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
Counter_Speech: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: Comparing the scale of the horrible destruction and genocide inflicted by Nazism, with a group of people solely because of their religious beliefs is unacceptable and illogical.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

Hate_Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
Counter_Speech: If redistributing wealth from people who have too much money to the poor is promoted by Jews, then I want to become a Jew too!

Hate_Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
Counter_Speech: I wonder how you account for refugees who are fleeing wars and a lack of security for their themselves and their families. Wars which are often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers who created long lasting problems abroad.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
Counter_Speech: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world
Counter_Speech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
Counter_Speech: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
Counter_Speech: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

Hate_Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
Counter_Speech: It is important to recognize that the theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Although today there is a scholarly debate over whether or not the term “race” has any scientific meaning, all reputable scientists are in agreement that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals.

Hate_Speech: immigrants cant speak English
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.

Hate_Speech: We have become a nation of immigrants.
Counter_Speech: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not. Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
Counter_Speech: Are you a misogynistic man trying to use objectification of women to justify your hate?

Hate_Speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.

Hate_Speech: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
Counter_Speech: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.
Counter_Speech: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that can't coexist with modern society.
Counter_Speech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

Hate_Speech: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

Hate_Speech: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
Counter_Speech: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
Counter_Speech: We are always developing as time goes on and same sex relationships are a part of the world now, why would we not educate our children on different ways of life?

Hate_Speech: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
Counter_Speech: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

Hate_Speech: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
Counter_Speech: Easy to blame others isn't it, that way we don't have to look at our own sexism.

Hate_Speech: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
Counter_Speech: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you ever read it?

Hate_Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counter_Speech: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
Counter_Speech: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

Hate_Speech: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
Counter_Speech: Yes, 66% of European women do work. But they are underpaid. The gender pay gap in Europe is around 15%. This means that on average, a man earns 15% more than a woman.

Hate_Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
Counter_Speech: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
Counter_Speech: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
Counter_Speech: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a hate movement.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are fair and believe that all people should have equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a waste of time.
Counter_Speech: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

Hate_Speech: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
Counter_Speech: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers.
Counter_Speech: When different cultures are able to co-exist, they can complement each other, foster innovation and thrive.

Hate_Speech: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
Counter_Speech: Women have always been involved in the economy and have contributed to society as a whole. I don't see this as a 'slave' behavior.

Hate_Speech: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
Counter_Speech: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

Hate_Speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
Counter_Speech: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Strange that you would say this, given all the progress the West has made in so many areas, is thanks to women.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

Hate_Speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
Counter_Speech: That is just not true. Fathers are as good as mothers at housework.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are entitled to the fundamental rights of UK citizens. If provided by the law, they can remain in the UK even if they weren't born here.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
Counter_Speech: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on our society.
Counter_Speech: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: This is exaclty the problem: it doesn't matter if they are from China, Russia, India or the Philippines. It doesn't matter whether their qualification or their rap sheet is lengthy or not... We treat them all like criminals regardless of who they are.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
Counter_Speech: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

Hate_Speech: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
Counter_Speech: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
Counter_Speech: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence to support this.

Hate_Speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
Counter_Speech: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

Hate_Speech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
Counter_Speech: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
Counter_Speech: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

Hate_Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counter_Speech: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

Hate_Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counter_Speech: Since when is it OK to discriminate against people based on their race?

Hate_Speech: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
Counter_Speech: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: We must not forget that Islam is a religion of peace. So why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it?

Hate_Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
Counter_Speech: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

Hate_Speech: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
Counter_Speech: Norman Cohn, a distinguished historian, ruthlessly analyzed the similaritiese between the 'Protocols' and "Dialogue in Hell" by Maurice Joly. It would be hard for anyone who has read that analysis to deny that "The Protocols" is an almost verbatim copy of the book from the French writer, or to sue a contemporary analogly, an example of 'fake news'.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
Counter_Speech: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counter_Speech: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

Hate_Speech: Jews are genetically evil.
Counter_Speech: Just because they are Jewish, it does not mean they are bad people.

Hate_Speech: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
Counter_Speech: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?

Hate_Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own.
Counter_Speech: My best friend is Jewish, she volunteers to help women and disadvantaged children, and her whole family work to make the UK a better place.

Hate_Speech: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

Hate_Speech: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
Counter_Speech: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

Hate_Speech: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
Counter_Speech: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
Counter_Speech: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: giving money to the poor is not just encouraged, it is mandatory, like all commandments in Jewish law.

Hate_Speech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
Counter_Speech: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not a choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?
