Hate_Speech: Jews are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

Hate_Speech: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
Counter_Speech: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews they want to rule the world.
Counter_Speech: people who pose no threat (regardless of religion) should have their beliefs challenged but their rights respected

Hate_Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

Hate_Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

Hate_Speech: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

Hate_Speech: feminists are angry women
Counter_Speech: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
Counter_Speech: Developing a curriculum for this also means that teachers get to learn things that they might not otherwise have considered, which can make them more effective and compassionate as educators.

Hate_Speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
Counter_Speech: We are always evolving as a society as time goes. Same sex relationships are a part of our world now. Why should we hide different ways of life from our children?

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

Hate_Speech: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.

Hate_Speech: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: The 'gay agenda' is about equal rights, equality is about acceptance, and the right of people to be treated with respect and dignity.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what this phrase "some kind of devil worshippers" means?

Hate_Speech: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
Counter_Speech: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important thing is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

Hate_Speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
Counter_Speech: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

Hate_Speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
Counter_Speech: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary, discrimination against the LGBTQ community is still a major problem (https://www.hrc.org/youth-report/view-and-share-statistics), and this could help to fix it.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

Hate_Speech: Jews have nothing to contribute to Europe.
Counter_Speech: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do not want to work
Counter_Speech: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

Hate_Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

Hate_Speech: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
Counter_Speech: Even in 2016, the year with the peak of 119,000 arrivals, the number of migrants compared to Italians was very low. Speaking of ethnic substitution seems a little exaggerated.

Hate_Speech: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
Counter_Speech: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.

Hate_Speech: Refugee crisis is a burden to EU.
Counter_Speech: We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU becasue it is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
Counter_Speech: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but bring us back into a pretechnological era.
Counter_Speech: On the contrary: different cultures have different perspectives and ideas about things. If we are able to share and discuss ideas, it would probably lead people to come up with new ideas and new technologies.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
Counter_Speech: So you think that they are not 'legitimate' for having less rights than us? That they do not have a 'legitimate demand' since they are not granted citizenship?

Hate_Speech: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
Counter_Speech: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.

Hate_Speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
Counter_Speech: The Nazi killing machine was all too efficient. Survivors lost so much and braved terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

Hate_Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counter_Speech: It is up to the government to determine which people will have the opportunity to live and work in our country in a safe and integrated way. The decision on refugees should be left to who is in charge.

Hate_Speech: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that terrorists are entering through the Mexican border.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the banks.
Counter_Speech: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

Hate_Speech: I do not want migrants.
Counter_Speech: We are not the only ones who are suffering from the refugee crisis.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a radical ideology.
Counter_Speech: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are less human.
Counter_Speech: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the real supremacist and racist ideology.
Counter_Speech: Does it matter what you say, when the Quran just proves the contrary? All people are created equal, and Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
Counter_Speech: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

Hate_Speech: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
Counter_Speech: I agree that we need to tackle this serious breach of human rights but scapegoating isn't helping us target the real problem.

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counter_Speech: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

Hate_Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
Counter_Speech: All blood is tested for pathogens and viruses, without regard to donor background or similar. I really do not understand your concern: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusion–transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]

Hate_Speech: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
Counter_Speech: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
Counter_Speech: You sure?

Hate_Speech: We should ban all homosexuals.
Counter_Speech: That is a very far-fetched idea. Why should we? It would be unjust. What you're advocating is just to criminalise love.

Hate_Speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
Counter_Speech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
Counter_Speech: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Children cannot be bought.
Counter_Speech: Imagine a person who cannot have children because of an illness, would you really want to deprive her or him of the joy of having one via surrogate pregnancy?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

Hate_Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counter_Speech: How often have you read the Quran and thought about its teachings? Or is your knowledge based on selected highlights? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

Hate_Speech: Gay is a mental disorder.
Counter_Speech: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a behavioral preference, and it is ok to love others of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: I hate Muslims. An invasion is the exact opposite of a religion.
Counter_Speech: The aim of muslim migrants is not to instill a hardline Islamic state, but just to work and live in peace here.

Hate_Speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.

Hate_Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

Hate_Speech: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
Counter_Speech: Thanks to feminism, women now have a choice between either having a family, having a career, or balancing both - which can be challenging for people to manage, of course.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
Counter_Speech: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

Hate_Speech: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

Hate_Speech: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
Counter_Speech: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

Hate_Speech: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.
Counter_Speech: The number of illegal immigrants entering the US has actually more than halved in the last 20 years. To make your point that migrants are all criminals is just plain wrong.

Hate_Speech: we should ban all migrants
Counter_Speech: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

Hate_Speech: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
Counter_Speech: All human being have the right to choose how to live their life? That includes the right to choose the person they want to spend their lives with. You don't sound like my first choice.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

Hate_Speech: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: What about the thousands of Muslims who have contributed to our country, created jobs, and provided for our families?

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

Hate_Speech: Immigration makes us less safe.
Counter_Speech: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of Europe, since the beginning. For example, in the 1970s they made up the 2% of the French population.

Hate_Speech: Women who do not want children are whores
Counter_Speech: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to work.
Counter_Speech: Well, they surely are, and so long as they are getting a decent, equal wage, who are you to complain about a person's right to choose a career?

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: Criminality and corruption are not the province of any specific racial or culture group.

Hate_Speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
Counter_Speech: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

Hate_Speech: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons with migrants. We should set a good example by beating the shit out of them, so they'll lose the will to enter our country.
Counter_Speech: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
Counter_Speech: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
Counter_Speech: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

Hate_Speech: All black people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: You can't just label people by race just because you feel like it.

Hate_Speech: Jews are just selfish.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?

Hate_Speech: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
Counter_Speech: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
Counter_Speech: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

Hate_Speech: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
Counter_Speech: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
Counter_Speech: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

Hate_Speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: The ultra rich people in this industry - Jewish or not - have the power and influence. Not sure where you got your facts from regarding Jewish people "controlling" Hollywood.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not in "control" over "Hollywood". Moreover, most of the time, they actually make the movie industry more diverse and open to new ideas.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

Hate_Speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
Counter_Speech: What more proof do you need? Are living witnesses not enough?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, because they know it's a lie.
Counter_Speech: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

Hate_Speech: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
Counter_Speech: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
Counter_Speech: You cannot blame an entire faith.

Hate_Speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
Counter_Speech: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Jews want to have it all
Counter_Speech: We all want to be wealthy, well-connected and famous, without having to work.

Hate_Speech: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
Counter_Speech: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

Hate_Speech: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world economy
Counter_Speech: Jews constitute only a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies, how are they supposed to control the world ecomony?

Hate_Speech: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
Counter_Speech: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

Hate_Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

Hate_Speech: Gays are promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
Counter_Speech: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
Counter_Speech: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

Hate_Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counter_Speech: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease.
Counter_Speech: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

Hate_Speech: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: Like many groups in our society, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by Jews is simply untrue.

Hate_Speech: Gyas should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
Counter_Speech: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are bad for the family.
Counter_Speech: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual preference.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
Counter_Speech: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
Counter_Speech: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?

Hate_Speech: Women are less smart.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

Hate_Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counter_Speech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

Hate_Speech: The feminists want to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
Counter_Speech: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
Counter_Speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
Counter_Speech: It is the law that requires asylum seekers not to work while their application is considered.

Hate_Speech: ALL migrants are a burden on our country
Counter_Speech: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.

Hate_Speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
Counter_Speech: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

Hate_Speech: Black people are just a bunch of whining pussies. We don't need them.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is needed in certain social and political circumstances. We mustn't simply ignore or dismiss the concerns of different races. As minorities are still systematically discriminated against, we cannot afford to be indifferent.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
Counter_Speech: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs.
Counter_Speech: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

Hate_Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counter_Speech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

Hate_Speech: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
Counter_Speech: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

Hate_Speech: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
Counter_Speech: There are already examples of widespread humanitarian hosting.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counter_Speech: Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counter_Speech: In 2014 there were circa 11.3 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S., which is a significant decrease from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. in 2007, and the trend is continuing: Today, in fact, the net migration from Mexico is around zero.

Hate_Speech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
Counter_Speech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

Hate_Speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
Counter_Speech: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counter_Speech: Has it ever crossed your mind that perhaps they are qualified and interested in working with us, but you are simply not aware of that?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
Counter_Speech: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
Counter_Speech: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
Counter_Speech: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counter_Speech: Migrants perform several vital functions in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it is straightforward that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.

Hate_Speech: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
Counter_Speech: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in the tolerant Europe. Their only value is violence. Islam is not about tolerance.
Counter_Speech: Why are you talking about tolerance while you are equating it with discrimination?

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counter_Speech: This is a generalisation, there is no difference between Islam and any other religion in terms of so-called 'civilisation'.

Hate_Speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
Counter_Speech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

Hate_Speech: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
Counter_Speech: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you think this. The UK is one of the richest countries in the world and since the 8th century Muslims have been a part of it.

Hate_Speech: Jews think they are so special
Counter_Speech: Jews might feel different as a minority, in this sense they are "special". Nothing else.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion, article 9.

Hate_Speech: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
Counter_Speech: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

Hate_Speech: Jews control the US government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions, but that does not mean they control them.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a lame ideology aout the power and control of women over men.
Counter_Speech: It has nothing to do with power and control. It's about equality.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
Counter_Speech: Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Are Christians above the rules then?

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: How can you possibly know that? Is this a comment written by a terrorist? Where are your sources?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
Counter_Speech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.

Hate_Speech: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are part of the European community, why do you say differently?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
Counter_Speech: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

Hate_Speech: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
Counter_Speech: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

Hate_Speech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
Counter_Speech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in society, driving people away from a progressive ideology.
Counter_Speech: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
Counter_Speech: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

Hate_Speech: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
Counter_Speech: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

Hate_Speech: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
Counter_Speech: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

Hate_Speech: Feminists are angry women.
Counter_Speech: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
Counter_Speech: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

Hate_Speech: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

Hate_Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth which has been used to justify all manner of hatred, from misogyny to homophobia.

Hate_Speech: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think it would bring back slavery and oppression? What exactly is the connection between the marriage of homosexual people and the oppression you are talking about?

Hate_Speech: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
Counter_Speech: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counter_Speech: WIthout softeness and emotions there would just be brutality and cruelty. Not all women are soft and emotional and many men have these characteristics. To perpetuate these socially constructed gender profiles maintains patriarchal norms which oppress both men and women.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: It is certainly true that homosexuals are attracted to people of their same sex, but this can't have health consequences. Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Are brutality and cruelty much better than softeness and emotions then? If we keep on reasoning like this we will perpetuate socially constructed gender norms which oppress both men and women.

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women dress like men.
Counter_Speech: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.

Hate_Speech: Women are immature and so soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Aren't you referring to Peter Pan syndrome, which is more common amongst men?

Hate_Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
Counter_Speech: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

Hate_Speech: All immigrants from Africa are lazy freeloader.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Many of them are actually skilled workers.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
Counter_Speech: You should be asking them if they are happy to hear that. If they are happy to be questioned, they will tell you the truth.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

Hate_Speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
Counter_Speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

Hate_Speech: There are migrants in the US, we are not meant to have them.
Counter_Speech: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

Hate_Speech: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

Hate_Speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
Counter_Speech: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

Hate_Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been a part of European society for centuries, and their presence is strong evidence of that.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.

Hate_Speech: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
Counter_Speech: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if they cannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
Counter_Speech: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

Hate_Speech: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
Counter_Speech: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

Hate_Speech: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
Counter_Speech: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

Hate_Speech: migrants are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: They are welcome in our country, because we are a multicultural society.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
Counter_Speech: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: Which evidence do you have that Jews control the U.S. government? They are rather a small but active minority within it.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
Counter_Speech: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
Counter_Speech: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
Counter_Speech: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
Counter_Speech: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: The only real problem with Islam is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

Hate_Speech: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
Counter_Speech: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

Hate_Speech: The feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
Counter_Speech: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.

Hate_Speech: Women only want top men because they are weak.
Counter_Speech: Women aren't weak. What men want, what women want, and who they want to be their partner are completely different things.

Hate_Speech: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
Counter_Speech: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

Hate_Speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
Counter_Speech: We cannot allow violence to spread. Women shouldn't be victims of violence just as men shouldn't.

Hate_Speech: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
Counter_Speech: I agree that women are often objects of sexual desire. But so are men. It is also important to recognize that women are often the victims of sexual assault. I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
Counter_Speech: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

Hate_Speech: If women want to control their fertility then they should choose when to have sex, not when to abort.
Counter_Speech: How about we stop hiding behind gender stereotypes and accept that everyone has the right to live their life as they wish?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not a divisive force. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
Counter_Speech: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)

Hate_Speech: Women have no place in our society.
Counter_Speech: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

Hate_Speech: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

Hate_Speech: Another waste of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
Counter_Speech: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
Counter_Speech: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.

Hate_Speech: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
Counter_Speech: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: If someone were to comment like that about another group of people, then it woud be an example of discrimination against that group. Why can't we consider homosexuals as a part of the society itself?

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
Counter_Speech: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

Hate_Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counter_Speech: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
Counter_Speech: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

Hate_Speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

Hate_Speech: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
Counter_Speech: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

Hate_Speech: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols. What are you doing to stop them?
Counter_Speech: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews
Counter_Speech: Hate is never a good thing. Get rid of the hate inside you first and then teach love to others. Love changes people for the better, not hate.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

Hate_Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
Counter_Speech: Where is your evidence?

Hate_Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
Counter_Speech: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world
Counter_Speech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

Hate_Speech: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a problem in European countries because of their religion. Why would they be a problem?

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They poison our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
Counter_Speech: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!

Hate_Speech: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
Counter_Speech: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

Hate_Speech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
Counter_Speech: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
Counter_Speech: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
Counter_Speech: People can and should choose their own partners.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
Counter_Speech: So one migrant would not be a problem for you? Diversity is not about numbers. It's about the diversity of all people in different situations.

Hate_Speech: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
Counter_Speech: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.

Hate_Speech: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
Counter_Speech: I do not know why you would describe gay people as insane. If you were told to go back in the closet you would probably go insane too.

Hate_Speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
Counter_Speech: We are always developing as time goes on and same sex relationships are a part of the world now, why would we not educate our children on different ways of life?

Hate_Speech: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

Hate_Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
Counter_Speech: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

Hate_Speech: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
Counter_Speech: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
Counter_Speech: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
Counter_Speech: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.

Hate_Speech: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.
Counter_Speech: I personally don't understand why you would say that. They are just doing an incredible amount of good, for example by boosting the working-age population.

Hate_Speech: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
Counter_Speech: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a terrorist.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof that all Muslims are terrorists.

Hate_Speech: We should stop migrants from coming in.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

Hate_Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counter_Speech: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.

Hate_Speech: Immigration makes us less safe.
Counter_Speech: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
Counter_Speech: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
Counter_Speech: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.

Hate_Speech: refugees are violent
Counter_Speech: Refugees are a part of our society. We have welcomed many of them and they have made a big contribution to our country. We are very proud of our history. We are not going to forget that.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

Hate_Speech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
Counter_Speech: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome in this country as long as they respect our laws. And we should try to live in our society in a non-discriminatory way.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been part of Western society for centuries and centuries, they helped shape and design Western society, so to say they are incompatible is a complete incongruity.

Hate_Speech: Migrant children shouldn't be accepted here.
Counter_Speech: Migrants who come to this country as children are capable of integrating into the society. They should have the opportunity to work and contribute to our economy.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

Hate_Speech: women can't have any right in a civilised society
Counter_Speech: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Islam encourages hate towards what's diverse.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, the Quran is a book of religious guidance and does not promote discrimination. Can you point out your reference?

Hate_Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counter_Speech: Considering all the criticisms of the state of Israel (however right or wrong, does not matter) I don't see how you can say that Jews are operating "with impunity, free from criticism."

Hate_Speech: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
Counter_Speech: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

Hate_Speech: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
Counter_Speech: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
Counter_Speech: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
Counter_Speech: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

Hate_Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a burden on our society.
Counter_Speech: Why would you think they are a burden? It's like they have not been persecuted all along.

Hate_Speech: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
Counter_Speech: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

Hate_Speech: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
Counter_Speech: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

Hate_Speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
Counter_Speech: Do women really need to be told what they can or cannot wear? For many generations boys were told to wear trousers and girls to wear dresses. Does society really need to tell us all what to wear?

Hate_Speech: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
Counter_Speech: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counter_Speech: Clearly there is a lack of employment opportunities for black people. This has to do with discrimination, not with their allleged laziness.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
Counter_Speech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are terrorists.
Counter_Speech: So you think all Muslims are terrorists? Muslims are not defined by the act of a handful of extremists. Also, their religion is about love and unity.

Hate_Speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
Counter_Speech: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

Hate_Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counter_Speech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

Hate_Speech: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

Hate_Speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
Counter_Speech: Aree you suggesting that we shouldn't live with Africans? To think that we are genetically superior to them because of their physical characteristics is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Jews can only act in a bad way.
