Counter_Speech: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
Counter_Speech: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

Hate_Speech: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
Counter_Speech: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world economy.
Counter_Speech: There is no proof for this claim. It is an opinion voiced by a few people with no evidence It isn't really true.

Hate_Speech: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
Counter_Speech: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

Hate_Speech: Jews are just selfish.

Hate_Speech: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
Counter_Speech: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counter_Speech: Maybe you should consider that not all women are childlike, and that some women are 'childlike' with children!

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: They have always been a part of our society, and their history is part of our heritage. They aren't thieves or murderers.

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but criminals
Counter_Speech: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

Hate_Speech: These sodomites have no place in a free country
Counter_Speech: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

Hate_Speech: Lesbian women are lustful.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a disease!
Counter_Speech: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble.
Counter_Speech: If a person is gay, they are likely to experience some kind of discrimination in their life. Understanding the problem from the perspective of the people affected by it can help to create a better society.

Hate_Speech: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
Counter_Speech: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a despisable race.
Counter_Speech: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

Hate_Speech: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is a not choice, but prejudice is.

Hate_Speech: Gays shouldn't donate blood, they're more prone to STDs.
Counter_Speech: If Stem cell donations are allowed by MSMs, then so should blood.

Hate_Speech: Society should ban Jewish people.
Counter_Speech: Any society is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.

Hate_Speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
Counter_Speech: Most migrants come here to work.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

Hate_Speech: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.

Hate_Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counter_Speech: More often that not, migrants create jobs, opening small businesses and emplying local people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

Hate_Speech: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
Counter_Speech: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

Hate_Speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counter_Speech: How many people walked by and did nothing? Is the problem uncontrolled immigration or indifference of our society?

Hate_Speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.

Hate_Speech: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.

Hate_Speech: The openness to migrants show that someone doesn't care about our people. We must help them reasoning!
Counter_Speech: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
Counter_Speech: Maybe we should take into account that Muslims are not so different from other Europeans.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
Counter_Speech: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about believing in god, not about hate.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

Hate_Speech: We cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
Counter_Speech: Let's be realistic: how would you feel about being verbally harassed by a Muslim in public? Harassment is never a good idea. Acceptance is.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion. Islam is about enmity and war.
Counter_Speech: If you had to pick one thing to be angry at, why would it be Islam religion? It is just a faith different to yours.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
Counter_Speech: Not all Muslims are preachers of violence, just like not all Christians are true pacifists. What's the point of mentioning a religion if you can't find any evidence that might help you to understand that religion better?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims live in the UK. They are our neighbours and we should welcome them.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
Counter_Speech: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counter_Speech: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

Hate_Speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick.
Counter_Speech: Even if some people might find it strange to identify as gay, homosexuality is not a disease.

Hate_Speech: Being gay is not about marriage, it is about anal sex without brakes and this is horrible.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is also about love, not only about sex.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
Counter_Speech: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

Hate_Speech: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
Counter_Speech: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

Hate_Speech: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
Counter_Speech: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equal rights between men and women, and challenges socially imposed burdens upon both men and women.

Hate_Speech: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but trouble and shouldn't be allowed to leave their houses.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing wrong with women wanting to have happy and fulfilling lives, wherever they may be.

Hate_Speech: Women should be patronized.
Counter_Speech: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman.
Counter_Speech: Women are oppressed in many societies, I wish our society was different.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

Hate_Speech: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
Counter_Speech: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

Hate_Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counter_Speech: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

Hate_Speech: Negroes create social problems so we must get rid of them.
Counter_Speech: That is not how it works: if you think there is a problem, then you need to work with the problem, not against it, otherwise things will just keep on getting worse. And, just for the record, I do not believe that POC are a social problem.

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women's supremacy.
Counter_Speech: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.

Hate_Speech: It is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
Counter_Speech: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

Hate_Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
Counter_Speech: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner', still a human being and a citizen.

Hate_Speech: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
Counter_Speech: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

Hate_Speech: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
Counter_Speech: Black people are in fact often persecuted. The idea that after BLM protests they have any inherent right to privileges that others do not is just blatantly false.

Hate_Speech: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
Counter_Speech: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

Hate_Speech: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
Counter_Speech: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are like apes.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

Hate_Speech: Jews think they are so special
Counter_Speech: Jews might feel different as a minority, and sometimes they are misunderstood because of their cultural and religious differences. This is their being "special".

Hate_Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
Counter_Speech: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

Hate_Speech: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
Counter_Speech: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
Counter_Speech: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

Hate_Speech: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
Counter_Speech: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

Hate_Speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
Counter_Speech: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.

Hate_Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
Counter_Speech: Did you know that the concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century? Anti-Semites adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for their hatred of Jews.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
Counter_Speech: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays
Counter_Speech: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing "perverted" about being attracted to people of the same sex.

Hate_Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

Hate_Speech: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counter_Speech: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

Hate_Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

Hate_Speech: Even if some countries are allowing faggots to donate blood, this does not mean that they are not dangerous and at risk of spreading diseases.
Counter_Speech: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.

Hate_Speech: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
Counter_Speech: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

Hate_Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that racism instead is healthy in the 21st century? It's not healthy for children to learn discrimination and hate.

Hate_Speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
Counter_Speech: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

Hate_Speech: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

Hate_Speech: Niggas should just leave our country.
Counter_Speech: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

Hate_Speech: We’ve just imported 20k ticking time bombs from Afghanistan and we have homeless veterans getting arrested for begging in the street!
Counter_Speech: Their soldiers have risked their life for our forces and we should honour the promises made for them, don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!

Counter_Speech: It's only a rumor, and the man has become a cranky codger with age.

Hate_Speech: More migrants crossing the channel today. We don’t have enough accommodation. Our own homeless are forgotten. Send them back.
Counter_Speech: Wasn't it last year that every rough sleeper was offered a bed during lockdown?

Hate_Speech: Local Councils can’t afford to house the homeless, but Surrey is to get its first rainbow public crossing painted in time for Pride.
Counter_Speech: I like to see a place where diversity and inclusivity is celebrated.

Hate_Speech: I just read that the Home office is handing out mobile phones to migrant invaders so that they can progress their asylum claims … you couldn’t make this up!
Counter_Speech: This was allegedly said by an "anonymous source in the Home Office", how do you know it's true? The source doesn't look reliable

Hate_Speech: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
Counter_Speech: Doesn't it just make you sad that a country that suffered so much under totalitarianism is adopting the same tactics?

Hate_Speech: All of the 50 criminals due to be deported yesterday to Jamaica, were removed from a chartered flight after appeals by Human Rights Lawyers.
Counter_Speech: Why would the deportations be halted if these people didn't have grounds for appeal?

Hate_Speech: These Muslim MP’s should stop pretending they are British. They’re not, they are just invaders!
Counter_Speech: You seem to imply that you can't be Muslim and British, which doesn't make sense since most Muslims were born here.

Hate_Speech: I’ve just seen a video posted by a Patriot, of Muslim men of fighting age sleeping in a church because the asylum hotels are full. Free food, clothes and blankets…they don’t do that for our homeless!
Counter_Speech: Well, they do. As the years have passed, it's become common for the church to use churches as homeless shelters, so I guess they already have the practice of helping people in need.

Hate_Speech: Another County Cricket Club Chairman has resigned over ‘historic’ racist remarks from 4 years ago. This is becoming a witch hunt!
Counter_Speech: you know it's not that long ago, I don't think that racism was any more acceptable than it is today

Hate_Speech: We pick them up in the Channel, ferry them to Dover, house them in hotels, provide free food and an allowance. We welcome them, so no wonder they come.
Counter_Speech: They're coming because they're desperate. Would you cross the open sea on a flimsy boat for a slice of pizza and a flea-infested hotel?

Hate_Speech: How come these ‘desperate’ migrants all have mobiles, designer gear, trainers and can afford to pay thousands to people smugglers?
Counter_Speech: Some will have sold their homes, businesses, possessions, while others may have financial support from friends and family members. Many will be professionals, civil servants, lawyers, teachers: desperate, but not necessarily poor.

Hate_Speech: All these asylum seekers coming here and taking jobs away from native brits, no wonder this country is in a mess.
Counter_Speech: Asylum seekers are denied legal work permits until they obtain refugee status, and they often take jobs native British people do not want. Moreover, many people that migrate here start their own businesses, thus creating more jobs.

Hate_Speech: The trans agenda don’t want mens and womens toilets, everything has to be ‘all in 1’ now. Is this the future we want? Risking womens safety just so men in dresses feel comfortable?
Counter_Speech: I'm not having issues with the gender neutral toilets at my local bars and cafes that I usually go to. When people respect other people and respect a place, there can be 'all in 1' toilets.

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: If you think supporting the LGBT+ community is stupid, that is your problem.

Hate_Speech: Jews want to take over the world and decimate Western civilisation!
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Where did you hear that?

Hate_Speech: Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.
Counter_Speech: The AIDS epidemic in the 80s gave way to homophobia and demonization of gays, but it's possible to get HIV regardless of sexuality, and the majority of gay people do not have it. The people who do take medication daily and can manage their condition, so it is not possible to transmit.

Hate_Speech: More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continues…
Counter_Speech: they are not invading but refugees fleeing to safety

Hate_Speech: Why don’t all these Muslim refugees go to other wonderful Muslim countries? Am I missing something?
Counter_Speech: Actually, Muslim nations take in a far larger number of refugees than others. The percentage of refugees that come to Britain is nothing compared to the total number of refugees from war-torn areas such as Afghanistan and Syria.

Hate_Speech: LGBT history month now being taught in schools… I’m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.
Counter_Speech: We continue to teach a lot of history: British, European, and World History, but with a strong emphasis on the history of groups we have formerly erased. Looking at some of the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK may inform the future for everyone.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: That's a broad and untrue generalisation. Sexual assault happens everywhere, and can be committed by anyone, whatever their background and religion is.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want to invade us and enforce sharia law!
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims actually just want to live their lives, and they don't care if others are following sharia or not.

Hate_Speech: As much as the media tries, you can't convince me to take transgenders seriously. A man can put on a dress and make up but at the end of the day they're still a man. That's basic biology.
Counter_Speech: That's not 'biology', your sex is not the same as your gender. Gender is unrelated to our biology or body, but instead related to our identity and how we feel. Sex is our anatomy, hormones etc but even this isn't as binary as many people make it seem.

Hate_Speech: If we accept transgenders it's a slippery slope. First you can identify as whatever gender you want, then it will be whatever age they want. Suddenly paedophilia is something we're being told to accept...
Counter_Speech: There's no connection between transgender people and paedophilia. Paedophiles can be any gender and have any sexuality, it's not related to being trans.

Hate_Speech: If you need any more proof that whites and blacks are not equal, look at the technological advancement achieved by each. Whites took us to space, Africans are still living in third world shitholes. We are not the same.
Counter_Speech: In reality, did you know that most of the biggest work done at NASA to launch a spacecraft was done by black female mathematicians?

Hate_Speech: Blacks and civilisation are incompatible. You can have a thriving society or you can have diversity, you can’t have both.
Counter_Speech: It's ignorant to dismiss the influential excellence of the many black thinkers, visionaries, inventors and scientists, so I have to disagree with that statement.

Hate_Speech: Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
Counter_Speech: The amount of white people on tv is so high that if you think there aren't it's because you're not paying attention!

Hate_Speech: Hundreds of Muslim men, all of fighting age, arriving in boats every day. This is what invasion looks like, we must be ready to fight back.
Counter_Speech: What does the term 'of fighting age' mean? They don't come here to fight, they come because they want a peaceful life away from war, persecution, or hardship.

Hate_Speech: The more diverse a community the less people volunteer, vote, give to charity, and trust each other. This is why blacks are incompatible with our civilisation.
Counter_Speech: where did you get this information? And can you really apply it to everyone?

Hate_Speech: Just read an article that explained how the Jewish elite use their positions of power to control us!
Counter_Speech: Where did you find this article. Are you sure the source is reliable?

Hate_Speech: Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
Counter_Speech: Where did you read this? Is this from a trusted source? This seems a fake news.

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: Migrants do not receive much by the government, and asylum support benefits are much less than universal credit for UK citizens. Besides, migrants are put in hotel rooms only temporarily while they are processing their asylum applications.
