Counter_Speech: Migrants aren't a problem unless you want to see them as such. In reality they are of great value, just like any human being.

Hate_Speech: Refugees should not be welcomed.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are frequently persecuted because they are different, but it doesn't happen here...we are an inclusive country.

Hate_Speech: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
Counter_Speech: What do you want to imply by using the term "weakness"? I believe that you are stating that a woman can't be rational because of her nature as woman. Are you sure this is the case?

Hate_Speech: The problem is that there is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
Counter_Speech: Your statement indicates that you are very concerned about people's integration, but it is not a solution to deport those that you don't like.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: The same rights are guaranteed to both sexes under the European Convention. How can you tell me the contrary?

Hate_Speech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
Counter_Speech: We accept gay, lesbian and trans people because God's laws are on our side.

Hate_Speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
Counter_Speech: How many kids you want or have doesn't matter. Women are human beings with rights that we should respect.

Hate_Speech: migrants rape our women
Counter_Speech: Statistics reveal a disparity between reported cases of rape committed by a migrant and the cases among native citizens. The latter are always under-reported.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: What's sick about homosexuals? They just need to be accepted for who they are.

Hate_Speech: No, women can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
Counter_Speech: Major businesses have to be managed by experienced people with good skills and knowledge of the market. Gender has nothing to do with these qualities, and being a "macho-man" isn't enough.

Hate_Speech: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: We shouldn't reject African and Middle Eastern refugees. International protection is a fundamental right.

Hate_Speech: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
Counter_Speech: Not according to the law, but many fields are still not welcoming to women, especially STEM.

Hate_Speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gays wants to be accepted by the heterosexual community, but it is not an easy challenge as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no morals.
Counter_Speech: Saying that gay people affect society in a bad and harmful way because of their sexual preferences is degrading to these people. This is not what a just and fair society is about.

Hate_Speech: What really makes this country great is excluding migrants. They are a burden to us!
Counter_Speech: Burden? I think insulting the culture and traditions of other people is more of a burden, what you are doing is in fact insulting and discriminating.

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: A lot of countries, like the United States, were founded by foreigners. If foreigners want to migrate, they have the right to do so.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counter_Speech: It's a myth that blacks are ruthless and vicious. As you worry about few black people, there are far more cruel people with a different skin color out there in the world.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion that encourages love, tolerance, and understanding. I do not see any need to be concerned with Muslim contribution to society.

Hate_Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counter_Speech: Think about the attitude of your own people first, because your words are full of prejudice towards diversity.

Hate_Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Diversity is necessary in a modern democracy, it's impossible to have one if people are discriminated based on religion.

Hate_Speech: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
Counter_Speech: To link humans with apes is not appropriate, just as reasoning with racism isn't appropriate.

Hate_Speech: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
Counter_Speech: Black people are often denied jobs, or education, but opportunities like these should be available to everyone.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: Disease and religion are two very different concept, so how can you apply the label of "disease" to Islam?

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
Counter_Speech: It's clear that nothing in the Quran conflicts with Western culture.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
Counter_Speech: We should rather get rid of the people who are prejudiced and don't really want them to integrate if we want to have a cohesive society.

Hate_Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
Counter_Speech: Everyone who is LGBT has value. They are full-fledged humans with rights.

Hate_Speech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
Counter_Speech: Me and many other people have never had negative experiences with black people.

Hate_Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
Counter_Speech: Muslims in Britain have contributed greatly to our economy, they are truly innovators in modern Britain.

Hate_Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
Counter_Speech: There are lots of different races, and someone can't be judged as inferior just by skin color.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, the notion that women are childlike is not supported by the facts. They're not like that.

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: Many Jews are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not every one of them is involved in the financial industry, you need evidence to back up your claim.

Hate_Speech: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
Counter_Speech: The idea that what a woman does with her body is not for her to decide is completely wrong for the whole of society.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
Counter_Speech: Even if the Jews controlled the financial word, Hollywood, academia, and the whole universe, it doesn't mean that they are evil, privileged or greedy. Where's the proof for what you say?

Hate_Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: Does calling them monsters make you feel better about yourself?

Hate_Speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
Counter_Speech: There is no 'natural gender role', it's only power dynamics that cause women to be viewed as subhuman. They are humans with the freedom to choose their own lives.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks control hollywood
Counter_Speech: Jewish people are just a group of people with multiple backgrounds. Some of them happend to work in Hollywood but that's it.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
Counter_Speech: Many survivors admitted that they wanted to tell their children stories of the holocaust, but it was emotionally hard. They want to talk about what it meant to be Jew during the Holocaust, because it's important to not forget that part of history.

Hate_Speech: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Feminists are often civil and considerate to others, even to those who disagree with them. There are many examples of that.

Hate_Speech: All feminists do is complain. When rape is committed, women are to blame and they can't change that.
Counter_Speech: Rape is a violent crime that shouldn't exist in a civilized society. Do you really think that women are responsible for rape? Why would they want that?

Hate_Speech: How can the United States have extended rights and freedoms when the Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, etc.?
Counter_Speech: You should offer some new conspiracy theories, like other white supremacist groups do. For example, they don't blame only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, the government, lizard people...

Hate_Speech: muslim folks are taking over europe
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not taking over Europe, their community is small but part of the whole nonetheless.

Hate_Speech: jewish folks should be beaten
Counter_Speech: Most Jews are pretty cool living with non Jews, so why beat them?

Hate_Speech: Jews love to gamble.
Counter_Speech: The probability of a Jewish person playing in a game of gambling is low. Jewish culture does not have a positive view of that.

Hate_Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counter_Speech: Women are neither childlike nor soft and emotional. They feel emotions as part of who they are and their human nature.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement that is capable of preventing a lot of deaths etc..homicides of women, domestic violence. Every last member of society understands this.

Hate_Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counter_Speech: Women are important in our society and valued for their contributions, but unfortunately their rights are not always respected and their contributions are not being recognized

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counter_Speech: The key is the quality of health care, not access to it. Don't you see?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome here
Counter_Speech: Muslims are welcome here since our country is more tolerant and diverse than many others in the world. It doesn't make sense to keep them out of our society.

Hate_Speech: Gay men being shot is funny.
Counter_Speech: What's the humor in innocent people dying? Care to explain that for me?

Hate_Speech: Gay men have no morals.
Counter_Speech: It's impossible to have a just and fair society if we say that homosexuals have a negative influence on society simply becausse of their sexual orientation; and you're also devaluing them as individuals.

Hate_Speech: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
Counter_Speech: All people have a right to life regardless of the color of their skin. You are forgetting that black people are part of this society just as much as you are.

Hate_Speech: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
Counter_Speech: Black people show the same strength that anybody else has. The difference is that black people do not enjoy the same social advantages as us. Let's reflect on this.

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: Is it possible that people with a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

Hate_Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
Counter_Speech: Everyone should be able to choose to get married, regardless of the gender of the partner.

Hate_Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
Counter_Speech: Even if they don't have a Western identity, they are still a human being and a citizen.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
Counter_Speech: I believe there are many different ways to live life, so why do you think this way about this particular group?

Hate_Speech: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
Counter_Speech: An important part of life for African Americans has always been the sharing of culture and a strive for equality. They are just like us, humans being with human rights.

Hate_Speech: It's acceptable since gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people often face discrimination but they don't deserve hate because of their identity. A sexual orientation that is different from your own shouldn't be judged, just aknowledge its existence.

Hate_Speech: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
Counter_Speech: In fact, evolutionary and scientific studies show that homosexuality is in genetic codes and is therefore completely natural. Are you maybe concerned about their love being "unconventional"?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are disgusting.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination against LGBT+ people happens often, but it shouldn't be like this. Being LGBT isn't a good reason to hate someone, you should accept that different people have different sexualities and not judge them.

Hate_Speech: They should have never been set free. Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
Counter_Speech: There are no "European descendants", the suggestion is a lie spread by racists.

Hate_Speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people are not different, we should treat everyone as though they were part of our family.

Hate_Speech: How come nobody is moaning about niggas being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counter_Speech: Do you think that racism is caused by laziness among blacks?

Hate_Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: LGBT people can experience discrimination from colleagues and families, which is hard to overcome and have negative effects on the person.

Hate_Speech: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
Counter_Speech: The opposite is true: natural superiority doesn't exist, it's a myth created to justify racism and exclusion. We are all born equal in the eyes of the law and God.

Hate_Speech: Yes! All those I know agree that LGBT+ people are a burden to society, a bunch of gutless whiners.
Counter_Speech: It can be difficult for LGBT individuals to deal with their family or colleagues due to the discrimination that can come from them. This can cause serious consequences for individuals.

Hate_Speech: Jews deserve it since they are intolerant.
Counter_Speech: A bit hypocritical, I would say.

Hate_Speech: But we cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
Counter_Speech: Actually, living in a multicultural society is good for society, it teaches us to understand each other and respect humanity.

Hate_Speech: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
Counter_Speech: It is in our hands to ensure that people from different backgrounds have a better quality of life. Inclusion is the answer rather than discrimination.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
Counter_Speech: Rape is always bad, regardless of the perpetrator. It's important to focus on preventing such abuse.

Hate_Speech: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
Counter_Speech: As we're building a better country, we need to make sure everyone feels safe and comfortable in the country they arrive in, especially since they don't feel secure in their own country.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
Counter_Speech: No evidence suggests that migrants are less able to integrate into our society. Migrants are part of our society and are proud of their history. If we exclude them, I don't see how we can be "inclusive."

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women are not childlike, but instead essential parts of their families, and they have the right to leave their homes when they want to.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
Counter_Speech: Women aren't like children, they often being about their families' success. And if they want to, they can go out.

Hate_Speech: I agree, but there is no reason to "import" other criminals. We have enough of ours!
Counter_Speech: I do not understand what you are saying, but if you want to say that all of the immigrants in the United States are a danger to society, I'd say it seems a bit excessive.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by that? Are you saying that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust? How is that reasonable to you

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Gay men contribute to our society like anyone else and as such are entitled to human rights.

Hate_Speech: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
Counter_Speech: It doesn't matter what a person believes in, that is something anyone has the right to have and you can't blame anyone for it.

Hate_Speech: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
Counter_Speech: To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just alarmism, homosexuality is just a way of loving.

Hate_Speech: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
Counter_Speech: Islam and the West have never been at war, and I don't understand how the war would have just begun.

Hate_Speech: Gays are the ones who should seek medical help! They are dangerous: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
Counter_Speech: Associating AIDS and HIV with gay people is just a fear based prejudice. This disease may be more commong among homosexuals, but this doesn't mean that all homosexuals have it. Not every gay person is "promiscuous and fornicating with strangers", many are cautious with their partners.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
Counter_Speech: In politics and the House of Lords, Muslim communities are underrepresented. The talk about invasion must stop now, and instead we should try to represent the communities that we claim to represent.

Hate_Speech: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
Counter_Speech: That all Muslims are terrorists is a misconception. It's important to realize that all religions have had terrorism episodes.

Hate_Speech: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
Counter_Speech: This website is not reliable since it promotes "reorientation therapy", which is not backed up by science. The owners probably profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about gay people.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays.
Counter_Speech: Please attempt to initiate a conversation on LGBT issues, it will surely open up to a discussion about how we can make a better world.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Promiscuity isn't a characteristic exclusive to homosexuals, just as it isn't for heterosexuals.

Hate_Speech: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a man and a woman in parenting
Counter_Speech: Children need only love, and love is love.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
Counter_Speech: Why did you pick Islam as the religion to be angry about? It doesn't look like you have good reasons for it.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants work hard to create new jobs, and come here to look for safer housing and better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a lame ideology about the power and control of women over men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about power and control at all, it's about equality.

Hate_Speech: It is a bad thing because all gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Unless the child is abused, gay people are not a threat to kids. It's not appropriate to make such a statement.

Hate_Speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
Counter_Speech: There's actually quite a few women working full time. However, they might have trouble entering such jobs, because there is still a lot of gender discrimination that stems from mentalities like yours.

Hate_Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
Counter_Speech: Saying this isn't right, especially if you include people who have done nothing wrong. Don't forget that they're humans.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
Counter_Speech: You can talk to them, so they're humans not animals. You can also understand them and therefore you can understand their value as human beings with human rights whose only crime is that they're from another country.

Hate_Speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gay people don't pose a threat to children, unless they're mistreated. Please refrain from making such claims.

Hate_Speech: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
Counter_Speech: The news doesn't usually report hardworking migrants, but there are a lot of them. In the end, we must remember that the new cultures are crucial to our success.

Hate_Speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are a danger to children only if they abuse them, which isn't the case. Yours is a generalization.

Hate_Speech: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
Counter_Speech: I don't know what you're talking about. Instead of deciding what women can or cannot do, do you want to talk about your life?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
Counter_Speech: To call all migrants terrorist is not right at all, they're not. They just want to live in their country of choice.

Hate_Speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Children are in danger only when abused, and gay people don't do that innately. Please refrain from making such statements.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
Counter_Speech: Women deserve respect because they're human beings, don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Women are necessary to have a more positive political environment and to represent all kinds of people, so they do belong in politics.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
Counter_Speech: If we don't house, don't feed and don't cure them, how can we expect them to integrate?

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counter_Speech: Unfortunately it seems that our society still hasn't moved past the ancient and medieval times, which explains why gender discrimination still happens today.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
Counter_Speech: That is the law. Asylum seekers are required not to work while their asylum claims are considered.

Hate_Speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
Counter_Speech: This is an oversimplification and an ill-informed argument. Its aim is only to create more negativity and division, just like it has happened so many times in history because of race or religion.

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is okay to force a woman to change what she wants to wear only because her choice is related to Islam?

Hate_Speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it's better to stop telling black people that they are less than human and start including them in education.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims should be deported.
Counter_Speech: Islam has never threatened us, that's why the UK and EU aren't collapsing.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: The brain is the most basic organ, it has been used by all of us for a long time. Your suggestion that blacks don't have brains is rather brainless and racist.

Hate_Speech: Even if it's not trash, Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Islam and British culture are compatible, and claiming that all Muslims are terrorists is not based on any facts.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Not all rapists are black and not all black are rapists. Skin color doesn't make you a criminal.

Hate_Speech: Jews run the world.
Counter_Speech: Well, fortunately there are millions of other people who know this is not true. Jews are just like anybody else: they're trying to provide for their families.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
Counter_Speech: The problem in this country is not Islam, but the fact that Muslims don't feel welcome here because of the discrimination against them.

Hate_Speech: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
Counter_Speech: Actually, poverty causes adverse mental and physical effects to a person's life, and people (regardless of religion) who are forced to live in the poorest neighborhoods will experience this.

Hate_Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants actually make our country prosper.

Hate_Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counter_Speech: Do you think it is okay to discriminate against people based on their race?

Hate_Speech: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
Counter_Speech: The Africans feel the same pain that we can feel. They have the same body as us and we must respect them.

Hate_Speech: Women should be patronized.
Counter_Speech: Women are perfectly capable of thinking for themselves, that's a given.

Hate_Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are actually good for our society, they create wealth.

Hate_Speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
Counter_Speech: Modern thinking states that race is a social construct since people don't show genetic differences. Everyone is defined by their own dna.

Hate_Speech: Intolerance is the only possible reaction towards a religion of death.
Counter_Speech: Death cults usually don't attract new followers, so Islam is not a religion of death.

Hate_Speech: black folks are very dangerous.
Counter_Speech: Is this even a thing? Is there any source for this? If you could provide such source, I would appreciate it.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants help to create new jobs. They come here to live in better housing and have better schools for their children.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
Counter_Speech: By recognising the constitution that gives them freedom to practice Islam, they are bringing chaos and instability to your country?

Hate_Speech: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
Counter_Speech: Why should Jews be isolated from the rest of us? They have been part of society for a long time and we won't gain any advantages by excluding them. It will instead be a huge loss.

Hate_Speech: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
Counter_Speech: There's a vast amount of evidence that show that Jews have faced many societal challenges during the past centuries.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: Women are people, and they are to be respected and protected.

Hate_Speech: Because the Jews planned 9/11, of course! This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. They are all guilty until proven innocent.
Counter_Speech: Some people tend to believe conspiracy theories more, but even they would benefit from a shared perspective on this, especially one based on factual evidence.

Hate_Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counter_Speech: The ECHR says that men and women have the same rights, so why can't you say the same?

Hate_Speech: But some jobs aren't suited for women. Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
Counter_Speech: Why are you saying this? Women have contributed greatly to science. For example, Florence Parpart, a woman, invented the fridge in 1914.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: To be a feminist you don't have to wish for women domination. It's all about women's equality.

Hate_Speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
Counter_Speech: I think you're reducing everything to nazism. Discrimination on the basis of gender is wrong.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
Counter_Speech: Women are humans deserving of respect, don't you agree?

Hate_Speech: Jews are genetically evil.
Counter_Speech: Being Jewish doesn't make a persona automatically bad.

Hate_Speech: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
Counter_Speech: This is not what being a citizen is about. The idea is that each citizen has the right to choose their faith and also choose who to vote.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
Counter_Speech: A country can't be "male dominated" but also a democracy, since democracy is about equal rights and opportunities for everyone.

Hate_Speech: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think that migrants deserve to have a dignified life in our country? Banning certain nationalities is not the solution.

Hate_Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counter_Speech: Every individual is created to be equal and regardless of your opinion, you should respect people's personal choices.

Hate_Speech: Skin color does matter, in fact all blacks are beasts and sexual predators.
Counter_Speech: This reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. If you remember, they said that the process was fair, they had a good attorney, and that the only reason for the sentence was that they were guilty, when in fact the process was not fair at all. This is what happens when we let prejudice like the one you expressed spread around.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: The core values of Islam are similar to the Western ones. It's completely false to claim that Islam is destroying Western culture.

Hate_Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Can you back this up with data? Yours seems like a gross generalization.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
Counter_Speech: That statement is not true. Rather than spreading hatred, we should promote the values of a inclusive society, such as love and respect for others.

Hate_Speech: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
Counter_Speech: All women are human beings. There's a problem when women believe they're subhuman because they were told so.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counter_Speech: The migrants that come here work and pay taxes, they're far from a burden.

Hate_Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, of course they will be attacked for it.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion and has nothing to do with extremist hatred that has been the cause of violence in many countries.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: There are so many immigrants peacefully living here, why would we need to deport them? They have human rights too, you know.

Hate_Speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
Counter_Speech: This is an argument that works only if you want to legitimize racial hatred, but even then it's a gross generalization.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: Apparently your words condemn all gay people, but these words are simply your personal opinion. What are your feelings about gay people?

Hate_Speech: Gay men are sick, it's not a prejudice. LGBT people are always messed up.
Counter_Speech: No surprises here. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people all have their own problems. But their problems are not ours, everyone has their own.

Hate_Speech: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
Counter_Speech: We welcome and respect the wishes of the people fleeing from wars in the Middle East and Africa.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence to back up this stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and no one is genetical inferior or superior.

Hate_Speech: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
Counter_Speech: People don't have to be necessarily minorities just to live their lives

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: Your opinion is not supported by scientific evidence, it's wrong to blame people for their sexuality. Do you truly believe that it's a mental disorder that affects who we are attracted to?

Hate_Speech: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion and people are free to believe in it. Freedom of choice is part of our culture.

Hate_Speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
Counter_Speech: You're not ashamed of your heritage, and that's okay. What's not okay is this discriminatory behavior that fills our society.

Hate_Speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
Counter_Speech: We can't blame people and see them as a threat because of their skin color.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Do you have evidence that children raised by lesbians grow worse than other children? I don't there is any.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counter_Speech: My condolences. I understand your pain. The murderers will be charged, but this doesn't imply that all POC are killers.

Hate_Speech: Are you sure? Migrants clearly hurt the economy.
Counter_Speech: Many people think of immigrants in Britain as a source of crime, poverty and so on. However, in reality the opposite is true, we only need to look at the numbers and the skilled labour of migrants. They are not only workers, but also employers that create jobs.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Jews were targeted for their different identity, but in the end we are all humans and to exclude people is counterproductive.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
Counter_Speech: Nothing that is in the Quran clashes with western culture.

Hate_Speech: I'm the one who has a problem with them! Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
Counter_Speech: In medicine and nursing homes, the Jewish community has a strong influence, but it doesn't stop at that. They have always been a strong force in society. The Jewish health workers saved many lives in the US and around the world, so your statements aren't true.

Hate_Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are completely able to integrate in our society. They are an integral part of our society and proud of their heritage. How can we be inclusive if we exclude them?

Hate_Speech: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
Counter_Speech: Even if their religious affiliation is different, Jews are deserving of respect.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
Counter_Speech: If they don't break the law then they are welcome to stay.

Hate_Speech: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
Counter_Speech: Actually, I really don't think that we could manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants and without their labor the health system would collapse.

Hate_Speech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
Counter_Speech: It is completely untrue that Jews are trying to overthrow our government. I honestly do not see the connection between being Jewish and trying to subvert our government.

Hate_Speech: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
Counter_Speech: Theres no reason to stop migrants and refugees coming to our country, they are welcome here.

Hate_Speech: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
Counter_Speech: They are not hateful with us. Do you personally know any Jewish person?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: It's fearmongering to consider all immigrants bad people.

Hate_Speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
Counter_Speech: Aren't you being a little bit dramatic? Immigration is a strength for us and it doesn't put anyone in danger.

Hate_Speech: Instead, it has been proven time and time again! Also, they control the world's governments.
Counter_Speech: How do you think it is possible that people of one religion are responsible for all the governments of the world? That's a conspiracy theory.

Hate_Speech: We can never live in peace with Muslims, Islam is dangerous: it is a cult of terrorism.
Counter_Speech: Terrorism has nothing to do with Islam, it's a prejudiced association. Muslims actually live peacefully and without problems alongside British people.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are still inferior to whites, even if what I said is a myth.
Counter_Speech: Do you have scientific proof that proves who is and isn't inferior?

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
Counter_Speech: This is just prejudice based on nothing more than opinion.

Hate_Speech: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
Counter_Speech: Each religion has its own beliefs and practices. Why should Muslim's right to pray be treated differently?

Hate_Speech: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
Counter_Speech: The LGBT community is made up of good people willing to help others and support loved ones. Perhaps you should try to do the same?

Hate_Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
Counter_Speech: LGBTI people are able to live their life in many countries. What's the burden for others?

Hate_Speech: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counter_Speech: If you want to isolate someone, the only "high-risk group" that you should focus on is people who have unprotected sex with different partners. Gays aren't part of this group by default.

Hate_Speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
Counter_Speech: You know, the "gay agenda" is actually about equal rights and therefore about acceptance and the right of people to be treated with respect and dignity

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
Counter_Speech: The media has convinced us that there is an influx of Muslims in Europe. This does not happen, since only around 25.7 million Muslims live in the EU (2016), which is around 4,9% of the European population.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
Counter_Speech: "Islam is not a joke" is utter nonsense, you know it is a serious mistake to connect fundamentalists and Islam as if all the believers are extremists.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counter_Speech: How can this be true? In this country, people can live following the values set by the US constitution, and not by fear.

Hate_Speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that Islam is not a religion of peace?

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have the right to practice their belief, as long as they don't force it on other people.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuality must be hidden, it is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
Counter_Speech: Wrong: homosexuality is a sexual orientation, not a mental illness.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: Haven't you noticed that LGBT+ people are becoming victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination more and more? Why are you encouraging this?

Hate_Speech: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
Counter_Speech: Feminism promotes love and consent, so feminists aren't vengeful and we don't have to fear them.

Hate_Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counter_Speech: Women aren't better at that job than men, so why should they be the only ones that do it?

Hate_Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
Counter_Speech: But in reality, millions of immigrants have greatly contributed to our country, especially in areas of creativity and innovation.

Hate_Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine White powerful makes, when they themselves are just envious, incompetent and useless.
Counter_Speech: No men would be born without women.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
Counter_Speech: Some immigrants work legally and take care of their families. We're welcoming to people from all over the world, we can't leave out people in need only because of their nationality.

Hate_Speech: You see? You have been braiwashed by the media... they are hiding the truth about refugees: there are so many immigrants that the situation is becoming increasingly toxic.
Counter_Speech: Such a statement only calls for misinformation. Don't listen to the news if you don't like it, and if you don't believe the news try to draw your conclusions from experience. If you feel judged for believing something you see as nonsensical, find the courage to speak out.

Hate_Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
Counter_Speech: Voting is a human right and women can't be deprived of it.

Hate_Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counter_Speech: No, our culture is fated to have female rulers, as they are the height of the civil world, they are proud and brave.

Hate_Speech: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
Counter_Speech: If they pay taxes, earn money etc., then they are no different from other citizens and we shouldn't care that they're immigrants. They have a right to a basic standard of living regardless of their status.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
Counter_Speech: As rightful guest workers, they have the right to be paid a price that is in accordance with the law.

Hate_Speech: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
Counter_Speech: Like most human beings, some women are better than others at certain things and men don't need to intervene to fix this.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counter_Speech: The truth is that there is no difference between the feelings of men and women, we just have to learn to love and respect each other.

Hate_Speech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
Counter_Speech: It is a customary, mainstream and established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be used all over the world?

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: I don't think Muslim are a problem, what makes them so?

Hate_Speech: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
Counter_Speech: Do you know any Muslims that share your opinion regarding their hate towards immigrants or Christians?

Hate_Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing
Counter_Speech: Jews are great role models to us because of how much they contributed to this country.

Hate_Speech: I hate negros: they are all killers.
Counter_Speech: This is a internet rumor, in reality violent black people are just like other violent people. Their skin color doesn't matter.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners, why should I read their book? I don't want to associate myself with them.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is allowed to their own opinion, but also to their own beliefs and religion.

Hate_Speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
Counter_Speech: Cooperation of its members is what builds a society. Let's be kind to one another and respect differences.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
Counter_Speech: Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, but they are proud to be British as anyone else, and proud to be a part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Black people are worse than dogs.
Counter_Speech: I don't think black people are inherently worse or better than us, they just have a different skin color. They're the same as us in all other respects.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
Counter_Speech: Such a characterization of Islam is very simplistic and inaccurate. This is why some Muslims don't feel comfortable being out and about in Britain, they're scared of attacks from racist people.

Hate_Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counter_Speech: This is false. It is a dangerous to get one's ideas from being born into a majorly white country. We're actually born in a country that cares about and protects human rights regardless of skin color.

Hate_Speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
Counter_Speech: Shouldn't we instead stop seeing black people as non-human and start including them in the school curriculum?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
Counter_Speech: Islam promotes only love and compassion, it's wrong to say otherwise.

Hate_Speech: Still, we should remove them.
Counter_Speech: It does not promote respect for a person's humanity to label them by biology.

Hate_Speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
Counter_Speech: The premise that women are childlike is a big cultural stereotype which can negatively impact how women view themselves.

Hate_Speech: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
Counter_Speech: Be respectful to those who have suffered in one of the most horrible events in the history of mankind...I think it should be remembered forever

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: In what way are Jews controlling? You need to realize that Jews are normal people, not members of a secret intellgence.

Hate_Speech: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure what makes you say that. Wouldn't you agree that women have always worked hard for their families and to contribute to our society?

Hate_Speech: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
Counter_Speech: Where's the evidence?

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that a minority of 2,5% of the population can control all levels of government? Every minority has the right to be represented in a democratic society, and this means that no group has control over everything.

Hate_Speech: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
Counter_Speech: In fact, women have rights, the problem is to have them respected. Of course, it means to treat them with human dignity too.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews should be respected as members of our society, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people who profess a different religion.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
Counter_Speech: Feminism doesn't care for power, it's about equality

Hate_Speech: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
Counter_Speech: Let's see what women have to say about this topic instead of using sexist stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race, but they still try to get into our society.
Counter_Speech: Jews only care about themselves, really? If they were, why would they prefer to live in our country where they are a minority?

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: I completely disagree. How can you devalue women so much when so many of them are brave and strong? You should check out the #MeToo movement, which gives voice to women who have experienced sexual assault. They are to be respected.

Hate_Speech: If they don't control it, how did they get those positions? I'm telling you, Jews control the news media, Hollywood, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
Counter_Speech: So, even "most religious organizations"? Well, that's a new one to me.

Hate_Speech: They definitely aren't like us. Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings. It is our job to respect the bodies and personal boundaries of everyone, instead of pushing our expectations on them.

Hate_Speech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
Counter_Speech: Women are people and therefore human. They didn't choose to be oppressed and their womanhood shouldn't be ashamed. Being a man isn't inherently better.

Hate_Speech: Their heritage is being responsible for the 9/11 attack.
Counter_Speech: In each historical period something happens that is blamed on Jews. Will they also be responsible of alien invasions?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: All of us have close relatives who died because of different causes, COVID among them. Let's not make any baseless parallels, and let's not judge people by their religion.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are all perverts.
Counter_Speech: It's frequent for LGBT people to be harassed, bullied and even murdered. To speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies is very harmful because it can lead to them being in danger, and the polic can't protect everyone.

Hate_Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counter_Speech: We should focus on the main problems that we face today without judging other people by their skin color.

Hate_Speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
Counter_Speech: Why would someone find this questionable if they wanted to date to find love?

Hate_Speech: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
Counter_Speech: I'm partially in favor of that: I think we ought to go out and protest against these problems. But be careful about defending your privilege, truth and justice are just around the corner.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
Counter_Speech: Did you spy a lot of homosexuals? Not all of them have multiple partners, many prefer to have only one. This goes for heterosexuals too.

Hate_Speech: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
Counter_Speech: I think this idea is offensive. Black lives matter too!

Hate_Speech: Gay men are promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: LGBT+ people aren't all promiscous. Usually they're just attracted to other people like anybody else.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a burden to our society.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are people just like you and me. You don't have a problem with being gay, do you?

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: The point is that it makes no sense to be racist, regardless of the skin colour.

Hate_Speech: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counter_Speech: The only people we can isolate are high-risk groups can be isolated, that is to say all those who have unprotected sex with different partners. Someone doesn't belong to this group by default because of homosexuality.

Hate_Speech: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
Counter_Speech: A society is composed of people playing different parts, and most of them value diversity. Blacks aren't inferior only because of the color of their skin, that's completely false.

Hate_Speech: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
Counter_Speech: Maybe it's time for you to check some profiles on the internet dating sites: there's a lot of gay men. Well, in this case I don't think the real problem is gays.

Hate_Speech: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
Counter_Speech: This is racial discrimination. Even though some racist groups want to promote the idea that it's all the POC's fault and that they are inferior, the rise in crime and violence in this country is the result of poverty and other inequalities.

Hate_Speech: Yes, in fact violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counter_Speech: Please stop blaming black people for everything. We are all members of the same community, so they suffer from this violence too.

Hate_Speech: I wish I lived in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counter_Speech: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights must be followed in every country, you know?

Hate_Speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept all LGBT trans-shit as well.
Counter_Speech: In my opinion, transgender people should be treated and accepted as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with their birth gender.

Hate_Speech: Yes! For example, we are paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
Counter_Speech: Articles like this use migrants and benefit users as scapegoats to take away attention from far more serious scandals. Millionaires and corporations not paying taxes cost a lot more to the public purse.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
Counter_Speech: Are you really sure that Jews only care about themselves? If they did, why do they want to live in this country, where they're a minority? Do you have an answer?

Hate_Speech: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
Counter_Speech: Researchers exclude that immigrants are the cause.

Hate_Speech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you say that only Jews want to influence the government in this complex, diverse and international world. Every citizens has the right and will to influence it.

Hate_Speech: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
Counter_Speech: We should rather show compassion and sympathy to people who are fleeing persecution

Hate_Speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
Counter_Speech: It actually worked and because this Nazi killing machine was all too efficient, survivors have lost so much and endured terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

Hate_Speech: But they contribute nothing to society!
Counter_Speech: Immigrants may come from another country, but this doesn't mean that they don't contribute to ours. Check statistics and you will see their economic contribution.

Hate_Speech: It's impossible to integrate them, Jews do not belong to this planet.
Counter_Speech: Maybe Jews are descendants of aliens? Did they come here riding a pink unicorn? Totally legit, right?

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the banks.
Counter_Speech: Is there any reason why there never are reports in the media about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe they control the media? Or the government, even! What about the Galactic Republic? #sarcasm

Hate_Speech: Jewish folks are less human.
Counter_Speech: Judaism is religion, and like with any other religion, Jews shouldn't be persecuted for theirs.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counter_Speech: For centuries immigrants have been part of our society and have contributed to its success. The majority of migrants coming here do so legally or have a permission to stay, so I don't see the problem in immigration.

Hate_Speech: Well, they surely welcome boys. Islam has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
Counter_Speech: Even if there is research being done in that direction, there is still a lack of evidence to show that radicalization is linked to religious practice. If you have more information I would like to see it, so I'll be able to decide what I think.

Hate_Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think like this for this specific group? You can live life in so many ways.

Hate_Speech: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
Counter_Speech: There isn't that much difference between British and Muslims living in the United Kingdom, and these differences are not enough to justify discrimination.

Hate_Speech: You better watch out, because they are the real psychopaths.
Counter_Speech: Studies show that the proportion of psychopath homosexual men is similar to the percentage of psycopath heterosexual men.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Muslims are human beings with human rights, and despite that they are still persecuted in many non Muslim countries.

Hate_Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
Counter_Speech: As far as I know, Muslims are compatible with Western societies - and many of them are simply proud of their religion.

Hate_Speech: I hate gays
Counter_Speech: You don't like gays, fine, but this doesn't allow you to hate them. What did they do to you? It doesn't seem like they affected you.

Hate_Speech: But what is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
Counter_Speech: Love is the result of your particular emotional and mental state, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be carefully selected. Heterosexual love shouldn't be treated as better, there are other ways of loving that are deserving of respect all the same.

Hate_Speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
Counter_Speech: No, hating someone just because of their religion, skin colour or gender is wrong.

Hate_Speech: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
Counter_Speech: Shouldn't you watch out your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?

Hate_Speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
Counter_Speech: Do you think all gay people are a threat? Or do you think that they are different from others? Being gay doesn't make you dangerous.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
Counter_Speech: Your words are indicative of a climate of fear against Muslims. They're just humans like you, how are you afraid of them?

Hate_Speech: Because they are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims constitute around 5% of Europe's population, this means that Muslims make up only a small part of our society, but are still very important. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

Hate_Speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry but it looks like most homophobes are here and not in Saudi Arabia. I think it's sad that being gay is still not accepted in the 21st century.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
Counter_Speech: Our great and advanced civilization wouldn't be the most wonderful civilization on the planet if we would ban someone because of their sexuality.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: A lot of people claim to be tolerant and respectful towards gay people, but statements like yours make me doubt that.

Hate_Speech: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
Counter_Speech: Women are human. As you have the right to state your opinion, so do women have the right to choose for themselves. The idea that half the population of the world should submit to the other half leads only to a waste of talents and potential.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
Counter_Speech: Migrants in the UK are willing to do hard manual labour. And as it happens, migrants perform jobs that native people usually don't do. How is this lazy?

Hate_Speech: I think that they rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.

Hate_Speech: Woman are basically childlike.

Through better use of land, improving infrastructure, education and research we can reduce this effect.

Hate_Speech: I'm not the problem: the world would be a better place without niggas.

Hate_Speech: Jews run the world.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.

Counter_Speech: Gays hope to be accepted by the heterosexual community, but it's difficult seeing that many people think like you.

Hate_Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
Counter_Speech: If being a Jew means to redistribute the wealth to the poor, then I want to be Jewish too!

Hate_Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.

Hate_Speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.

Hate_Speech: Jews control the world

Hate_Speech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.

Hate_Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
Counter_Speech: The theory of Jewish "racial" difference was developed before modern sciences of physiology and genetics. It's still debatable whether the term "race" is scientifically sound, but what all scientists agree with is that physical traits are inherited and aren't connected with predispositions to emotions, intellect or morals.

Hate_Speech: immigrants cant speak English
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are entitled to learn what they usually don't get to know, and this includes our language.

Hate_Speech: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
Counter_Speech: We should actually praise Jews because thanks to their innovation and investment, the industry has thrived. Instead they are victims of discrimination and exclusion, which isn't fair.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: Do you know that Muslims have the same rights as anybody else?

Hate_Speech: Because they are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counter_Speech: It is simply not true because homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.

Hate_Speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
Counter_Speech: The only thing I think is a disease to you is an allergy to the word "mosque."

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.

Counter_Speech: you're saying that all gays are bad, but these words are only your personal thought. What do you think about gay people?

Counter_Speech: Well, the UK government doesn't accept sharia law, so...

Counter_Speech: In time, societies always grow and same sex relationships are part of the world now, why wouldn't we educate our children on different ways of life?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
Counter_Speech: The religion of Islam is peaceful

Hate_Speech: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
Counter_Speech: It is easier to blame others instead of looking at our own sexism.

Hate_Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counter_Speech: Knowing gay people at an early age does nothing bad to a child. The idea that children are put in danger because of this is completely false.

Hate_Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.

Hate_Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a hate movement.
Counter_Speech: Feminists believe that everyone should have equal rights. It's fair.

Hate_Speech: Feminism has no aim, it is just useless.
Counter_Speech: I don't get it. Feminism wants equality, and equality makes the most of humanity.

Hate_Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers.
Counter_Speech: If different cultures can coexist, they can compliment each other, inspire innovation, and thrive.

Hate_Speech: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
Counter_Speech: Women have always had a part in the economy and always contributed to society. Do they seem like slaves to you?

Hate_Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
Counter_Speech: Weird you say this, considering all the progress that the West has made in so many areas thanks to women.

Hate_Speech: That isn't a man's job, women are the only suitable housekeepers
Counter_Speech: That isn't true, but because there often are only men in positions of power, there is gender bias in the workplace, which makes it difficult for women to advance in society.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants have the same basic rights as UK citizens. They can stay in the UK even if they weren't born here, if the law permits it.

Hate_Speech: They are not a resource, they are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
Counter_Speech: A migrant is a person that comes here with the intention (and responsibility) to make our society better. The different people coming here seek citizenship to improve their life and also our country.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are a burden on our society.
Counter_Speech: The refugee crisis is global and has affected all continents, but it is our moral duty to help people fleeing from war-torn countries, like immigrants do.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counter_Speech: The problem is that regardless of where they're from and regardless of their qualification or rap sheet, we treat them all like criminals.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
Counter_Speech: I think all species are like this, but homo sapiens especially. This is a special case. And people of color are homo sapiens.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
Counter_Speech: Racism has no place in modern-day societies. Slavery was an atrocity that should never have happend.

Hate_Speech: Just look at the news! Black folks are criminals and thieves
Counter_Speech: It needs to be clear that black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. When the justice system fails to be fait to them, then it's the fault of the whole society and not of people of color.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: The Quran, Hadith and the Sunnah are all compatible with modern society and civilization. The diversity of the world must be respected.

Hate_Speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
Counter_Speech: Regardless of skin color, freedom of speech is a key right.

Hate_Speech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
Counter_Speech: Have you ever felt as though you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
Counter_Speech: You should not listen to the people that claim to speak for all Muslim and instead use their platform to promote hate and division. These violent preachers are the problem, not Islam itself.

Hate_Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counter_Speech: The N-word is a degrading insult against African Americans that is still used today. Political correctness has nothing to do with it.

Hate_Speech: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
Counter_Speech: You clearly lack in your knowledge of Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.

Hate_Speech: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
Counter_Speech: Sex isn't connected to race. Black or white, we're all the same despite our race, so we ca all experience emotion and humanity.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, Islam is the same as every other religion out there: it promotes peace and inclusion as well. The practices and beliefs of Islam and Western culture are completely compatible.

Hate_Speech: You are wrong: Islam is a disease and it must be eradicated.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a disease but a religion, therefore there is no need to eradicate it.

Hate_Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
Counter_Speech: How would you define a "Westerner"? Only white and European people?

Hate_Speech: They're too incompatible with it, they're the opposite of what Western societies need.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been part of Western society for a very long time, they even helped in creating and shaping it, so it doesn't make sense to say that they're incompatible with our societies.

Hate_Speech: Maybe the historian is in on it! The Protocols clearly state that everything is orchestrated and I trust them.
Counter_Speech: The Protocols are such a mess of nonsensical stuff that even Ernst Stavro Blofeld would have retired from world domination and surrendered to James Bond if he would've been asked to say something so edgy and melodramatic as: "The goyim are a flock of sheep and we are their wolves".

Hate_Speech: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counter_Speech: Every religion has a political side: Unitarinism, Buddhism, and of course Judaism.

Hate_Speech: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
Counter_Speech: Women have equal opportunities in this country as regulated by law. But the question remains how do we truly treat them?

Hate_Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own.
Counter_Speech: I have a Jewish best friends who dedicates herself to help women and disadvantaged children, her whole family helps to make the UK a better place.

Hate_Speech: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
Counter_Speech: Because they are humans. And deserve the same respect.

Hate_Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
Counter_Speech: Jewish people aren't a hated race, but normal people from all over the world with different traditions.

Hate_Speech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
Counter_Speech: Women are people and humans. They didn't choose to be oppressed and shouldn't be shamed to be born women. Being a man is not a badge of honor.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a drain on society.
Counter_Speech: A lot of Jews are good people. Try to talk to them about what they had to endure, get to know them better.

Hate_Speech: I hate Jews they want to rule the world.
Counter_Speech: If someone doesn't pose a threat, regardless of their religion, they should be respected even if you want to challenge their beliefs.

Hate_Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counter_Speech: What you say is not true. You are wrong about feminism, since it is a movement for equality and it strives for women to have the same rights as men.

Hate_Speech: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
Counter_Speech: Considering that women are human beings just like us, they also have rights just like us.

Hate_Speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
Counter_Speech: As a society we're always evolving and we are in a situation now where same sex relationships are the norm. It's important to expose children to all the different ways of life that there are out there.

Hate_Speech: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
Counter_Speech: You have no data to support your false assumption that all black people are violent or unstable.

Hate_Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
Counter_Speech: Let's be realistic: crime in this country is committed by different racial groups. The myht of "super predators" is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: Do you know what "devil worshippers" means?

Hate_Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counter_Speech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity or other things. However, it's important to realize that not everything should be feared, especially not a skin color.

Hate_Speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
Counter_Speech: Racial inequalities have more to do with institutional discrimination rather than individual choices.
