Counter_Speech: The LGBT community is made up of people of different sexual orientations and beliefs who ultimately want to live free of discrimination and hate, therefore they are not a danger to society. We should care about them and fight for equality instead.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: How do you know when someone has been raped by a Muslim? How about we stop throwing this generalizations around without evidence?

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
Counter_Speech: Many of them are working hard or working to complete their studies, is this lazy to you?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion, and its followers are very happy in our society. We must respect the differences between us instead of calling them contaminations.

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that black people and their children are incompatible with our society. We need to protect society as a whole, not only one part.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual orientation. Many people have experience with homosexuality. There is no need to condemn this.

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that all gay people are criminals? Why having a sexual orientation different from heterosexuality be considered criminal?

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: Many migrants are working and living in a new country, why should they be denied help? Although, it should be noted that immigrants never see any of the benefits you list. They are helped, but barely enough to get by.

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of our society for centuries, and have contributed greatly to our success. Why should they keep America down?

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that homosexuals are satanic when, in fact, they are innocent people who love someone else just as anyone else?

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: There is a shortage of housing in the UK, insufficient housing in hotels and so on, so there's a problem with that, let's face it. But this doesn't mean that we should send back migrants, because the shortage has been a problem long before immigration and it's a systematic issue.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual and physical preference. I do not think it is a problem for gay people to exist in society like the rest of the population.

Hate_Speech: Women should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and have rights. They are created equal, and they are free to choose on their own what they want to do.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality, not sexism.

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: The "LGBT agenda" doesn't exist. They simply want to get equality as everyone else, nothing else.

Hate_Speech: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: It is not acceptable to blame everything on a movement for equal rights and the empowerement of women. We must focus on tackling the root causes of social problems rather than fight against each other.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: The feminist movement is about equality and also about ensuring that women are able to live their lives as they wish. Oppression on men is not in the plans.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: Migrants fleeing war and poverty are coming here for help and a second chance at life. Why would they want the country where they are living to fail?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality between the sexes, which is far from deadly and oppressing.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counter_Speech: Black people are disadvantaged in their rights and I don't think it's bad that they want to be equal to the other citizens.

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are greedy.
Counter_Speech: Bisexuals are attracted to more than one gender, but this doesn't mean they are greedy. Why do you say so?

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: Muslim people are inherently human, like every other person on the planet. Why would you say that?

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counter_Speech: We mustn't forget that this would be an act of hate directed towards people that are already suffering and come here for a better life.

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: If you think that racism is okay, I think you should rethink your position. The problem is racism in general, not black people.

Hate_Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counter_Speech: If you look at the facts, it's impossible to say that the Holocaust is a "business". That's a very insulting thing to say.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always been part of our society and are our brothers and sisters, they don't want to see our culture be destroyed. We are a diverse society and that is why we have a lot in common with them.

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: We are all human beings, and we are all created equal. The notion that Africans are subhuman is completely false.

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: They have developed and are part of the modern world. Ours is a very diverse society that we should be proud of because we actually have a lot in common, and the people from "the third world" have a lot to contribute to our society.

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of immigrants who come to this country are happy, successful and educated, and there is nothing wrong with that.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews don't control Hollywood, it simply is a place of great freedom where many people work, including Jews.

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counter_Speech: You seem to be thinking that Jews were just a bunch of criminals. Perhaps it is better to be thinking of them as a religious and ethnic group rather than criminals.

Hate_Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counter_Speech: Why would it? The Koran is a peaceful religious book.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that being gay is a bad thing? I don't. It's only a sexual orientation that doesn't harm anyone.

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: This country has always been and always will be a welcoming place to everyone. It's not about immigrants making it worse, it's about them becoming part of our society.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come to this EU to work, pay taxes and live their lives. Why should we stop them?

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with a human value. Their reasoning skills are essential for a successful society.

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: Sexualisation isn't what is encouraged at Pride, but having fun and getting to know other kinds of people is! That's what kids are doing, and it's not bad.

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
Counter_Speech: The problem is not only racism, but also a lack of understanding of Islam, and the laws that make possible for minorities, like Muslims, to be protected. We should all be kinder and more informed on what our words imply.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are just as welcome here as anyone else in the country, it just means that they want a better quality of life. They are just as entitled to an equal standard of living as anyone else in the country. Isn't this what the American dream is about?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth spread to divide people. Not all black people are bad people. People of color are a diverse group, with different perspectives on life, even if a few are criminals, this doesn't mean that all are.

Hate_Speech: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
Counter_Speech: The notion that white people are different to Jews is simply untrue. We are both human beings.

Hate_Speech: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that a woman should be forced to maintain her house? Women (or men) are able to choose for themselves, and no one should tell someone else what they have to do.

Hate_Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counter_Speech: People should be able to match their identity to bureaucracy. To change the gender of their card is a requirement for transgender people to complete their transition.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that blacks are inferior. They are individuals with different skin color, but this doesn't make them less human.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They have rights, such as to stay in the country they are living in. They are welcome, as long as they respect the law.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by all of them? Immigrants are part of our people.

Hate_Speech: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt .. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.
Counter_Speech: There are many people who have settled in the US and have made contributions to our country. If we stop migrants, then we stop also our growth as a society.

Hate_Speech: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
Counter_Speech: The practice of bribery is illegal and if Jews really could be bribed easily, prisons would be full of Jewish people, but this is only a generalization and not the truth.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: That's not true. We should try to learn about people's genetic makeup and characteristics in a more inclusive way. For example, it's important to know that humans all have the same fundamental biology and all differences are individual.

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace. To refer to Islam as terrorism is to use it as a scapegoat.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is an individual preference.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: Jews are respected for their contributions to American society. Maybe it's time that we stop discriminating them.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with a full human value. To suggest otherwise is just wrong.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
Counter_Speech: I would like to see more respect for Islam and its adherents.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Rape is a problem, but it's not perpetrated mainly by Muslims. The main culprits are actually people the victims know well, like relatives, colleagues or friends.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: The arrival of these people is not a problem for the UK, they are an asset that helps our economy and country grow.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is only a personal preference on relationships, why would they be banned because of that?

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants are successful entrepreneurs and have made contributions to our society. The majority of immigrants are working professionals, why wouldn't they be welcome?

Hate_Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
Counter_Speech: Sometimes people may experience negative things about Muslims, but we have to acknowledge and respect our differences, even if it seems difficult.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, not objects, and they're absolutely worthy of respect and protection, like all human beings.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that Islam is a religion of exclusion? Because Islam teaches the exact opposite, is a religion of love and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about the domination of women. It is about equality.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: Are you saying that all black people are sick? This is a sweeping generalization.

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: As long as Muslims respect our values, theirs should be respected as well, because their culture has a long history and has developed alongside ours.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and it have been part of society for a long time, it's our culture too.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how it is possible to have a just and fair society when we are spreading this kind of misinformation. Everyone has the right to drive.

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: Women can choose their own lives and their right to vote must not be touched.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how it's possible that Muslims are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists. Maybe you should try to think about what it would be like if someone said this about Christians.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: No, they should not. Gay people have a right to education like everyone else. Why do you think otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: No one is born violent and insensitive. We are born with a unique genetic makeup, and we learn how to behave throughout our life, not at birth.

Hate_Speech: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. Moreover, homophobia can have a negative impact on a person's health, whereas homosexuality does not.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: Blacks are a small but important minority in society, because they are contribute to our community and make it better. They're not killers.

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: We can not link Islam and terrorism together, since Islam is a peaceful religion, not a destructive one.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: Children should be taught about love, not about discriminating against LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counter_Speech: Feminism means that a woman can make a conscious choice to have kids or not have kids and either are fine. Shaming a woman because of her choice or taking away that choice is never okay.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Jews are very human and deserve respect, like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counter_Speech: That is a conspiracy theory that has no basis at all! Jews are part of society, and are valued for who they are. They have a special place in history and culture, but this doesn't mean that you can blame them for everything.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews have contributed greatly to the United States. They are one of the people that make up our society, how could they not belong?

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
Counter_Speech: Work is an individual right. This means that also women have the right to work, they are more than capable of doing that.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by anti-immigration activists to divide our country and make it less inclusive.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: The European Union welcomes immigrants from every country. They are our brothers and sisters, not a burden.

Hate_Speech: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
Counter_Speech: I think that the problem is that people believe these stereotypes that are harmful towards black people. We need to educate our children and adults about how to live and work with black people instead.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: Blacks are individuals with different backgrounds, and this has nothing to do with being criminal.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: The notion that blacks are inherently inferior is simply wrong. Is it fair to judge people by the colour of their skin? I really don't think so.

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counter_Speech: The alleged 'violence' that some Muslims commit is a lie. Muslims are peaceful people and a democracy isn't possible without them.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion that share the same modern values as other religions.

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: This is a very misleading concept used to describe people who are discriminated against, particularly Africans. They are all people who have been affected by racism. They deserve to be valued and respected, and we are so proud of having them in our country.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are people, and they should be respected and valued for who they are.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: No, they should not. LGBT rights is an important social issue that we should respect.

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: Nazism was terrible, it did nothing to make the world better. It's very sad that despite how many people have died because of it, there are still people that think it wasn't that bad.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
Counter_Speech: The idea that feminists are subverting the will of the male is completely without foundation. Feminism is a movement to end the division between women and men and to promote equality of the sexes.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: This is wrong. Muslims don't care what other people believe in, they just want to follow Islam without problems.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not an abomination to God, quite the contrary. We cannot make homophobia a reality.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Isn't it time we stopped thinking about Muslims as a problem? They are just trying to live a normal life.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: I believe that the notion that black people are inferior to others is completely without foundation. They are British citizen like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: Taking a look at science proves that black people are not a sickness. A society where black people have prominent position is something that we should all wish for in order to have more equality.

Hate_Speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with a human value. To be able to express themselves freely and without discrimination is in their right!

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: The constitution guarantees that every person has the right to vote, including black people. Denying this right would be wrong.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
Counter_Speech: I think it's fair to say that black people are good people, they're just citizens. The same as you and me.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: The Jewish community is Jewish is not controlling, it doesn't make sense for them to be, unless you mean that they are controlling because they vote and participate in society, which every citizen in the country does.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: I don't see a lot of evidence for that. But there is enough evidence that women are suffering from sexual assaults, domestic violence and abuse. That's why feminism exists.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: There's nothing wrong with Jewish culture. I don't believe that American culture is dominated by Jews.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: There have been a lot of people who have made racist claims against them, but it is not ok to be racist against them, or against anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: The issue of gay people is not their sexuality, but the fact that they're not accepted in society as they should.

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
Counter_Speech: They’re interested in other people too. I’m sure you also know Jewish people who are generous, because selfishness is an individual trait and not something that all Jews share.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: People are allowed to be homosexual and to decide what they want to do in their private life. Everyone has the right to express love how they see fit, so banning gay people would be against human rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by that? Feminism doesn't want to diminish men's value, they want to uplift women so that they can reach equality to men.

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: You could use some background information to help you better understand black people. They are humans like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not rapists. What is the point of generalizing this way?

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: It’s not just about ‘sexualising’ children in drag but about letting them have fun and teaching them the value of embracing all kinds of people. It's not perverse.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are people, and they are to be treated equally. People shouldn't be dominated by anyone.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here, aren't they part of our culture after all?

Hate_Speech: Jews run our country.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by Anti-semites. Judaism is a religion, not a political party.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently inferior and should be marginalized.
Counter_Speech: The idea that blacks are inherently inferior is completely untrue. They are more likely to be bullied because of this stereotype, and this isn't acceptable.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are not a problem in our society. If you are concerned about the sexual orientation of other people this much, you should try to solve the issue.

Hate_Speech: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are not disgusting and especially they are not rapists. That is a dangerous stereotype that doesn't reflect reality.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
Counter_Speech: Women are not "lechers". They are human beings with rights and should be treated with respect and dignity.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: The Jews are great people and even if they have some influence over our society, this doesn't mean that they control everything. We are proud of their heritage.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that immigrants are lazy at all. They have created an atmosphere of social and economic cohesion and equality. They come to work and they are just learning and growing.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: If with 'strangehold' you mean that Jews vote and participate in politics like all citizens then sure, they have a stranglehold on the government.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews are important to society, they are part of the fabric of our society and it wouldn't be the same without them.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are a cancer is completely unfounded. How can you say that they are a cancer when they've been persecuted for so long? Someone already tried a "solution" and we should never repeat that time of history.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about women, and how everyone should have the same rights. It's not selfish to want equality.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with unique gifts and talents. We must respect and value them.

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a crime, it is an individual choice. You cannot blame people for their sexual preferences.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: I am not sure what you're talking about. The disease is mostly due to contact between people, Jews aren't to blame. They're not a disease.

Hate_Speech: We do not want Muslims in our country.
Counter_Speech: The country has always had a strong Muslim population, and Muslims are proud to be part of it. They are more than welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
Counter_Speech: Those that were responsible for 9/11, are not Jews. Jews have always contributed to the world in a meaningful way. It's unacceptable to blame them for something they didn't do.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: I don't think it is ok to be racist against a group of people, regardless of their skin color, ethnicity, religion etc.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about the destruction of manhood. It is about the empowerment of all human beings, even if it focuses on women.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: They have the right to vote if they get citizenship, because they will have the same right as anyone else then. It's a violation of human rights to prevent them from doing so.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
Counter_Speech: Refugees are people. They are our brothers and sisters, regardless of their religion.

Hate_Speech: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
Counter_Speech: We can’t allow the fear of people coming here define us, how can it be so hard to accept immigrants?

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a problem in many European countries, we can't keep accepting them.
Counter_Speech: The European Union does not have a migration problem because the EU has a migration policy which helps managing immigration.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: It is not appropriate to isolate someone for fear of stigma. We should work on our perception of differences instead of "locking up" others, don't you think?

Hate_Speech: Jewish people are a group of people who want to control the world.
Counter_Speech: The idea that Jews are "control freaks" is untrue. They are just like any other people.

Hate_Speech: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
Counter_Speech: People of colour have the right to be treated with respect and dignity, and not taking into account stereotypes about their sexual life.

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: The US has always supported migrants from all over the world, and this has led to a growth in economy and diversity which helped our country.

Hate_Speech: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a problem, it is a way of life as acceptable as any other. There is no evidence that they are insane, and we can't isolate them only because someone doesn't like them.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not terrorists. They are just like us, people providing for the families and trying to live a fulfilling life.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: LGBT people have the right to be respected and not harmed. We cannot allow them to live in fear, especially because they are not dangerous to anyone.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: In Islam, like in all religions and groups, the problem of rape is more about the individual rather than the religion. In fact, statistics show that rape has the same rate in all ethnic and religious groups.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth, many of them are hard-working people. The migrants who come to our country often want to work, and it's in their right to do so.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a fundamentalist ideology, and should be dismissed.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and everyone should be allowed to choose their own.

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Counter_Speech: Let's be fair, I think the concept of "bloodlines" is just a myth perpetuated by the racist media.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: We should be careful about what we say about other people. Gay people are just like any other person, and they are entitled to live their personal life as they wish.

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: To say that all gay people are criminals is just wrong. It's a gross generalisation.

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: Migrants come to the UK from all walks of life, they are welcomed here and helped, but not with all these benefits as you claim. These are lies spread by the media to pit "us" against "them".

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not the only ones who benefit from this. They contribute to the prosperity of the United States just as other minorities and groups do.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: Gays are good people like anyone else. Maybe it is time to focus on the positive aspects of society rather than on the negative.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: This is just a misconception. We have hundreds of vacant homes where both homeless people and migrants can stay, but the government has problems in allocating these houses

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuals are part of our society, they just happen to be happier when they are not rejected from the society they live in.

Hate_Speech: Women should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: We should respect diversity in society, not subjugate women.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality. It is about women taking part in society. And it is about their right to live their lives as they wish.

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: We don’t need to hate LGBT people, especially because they don't want to destroy anything at all. There are plenty of people that can benefit from the diversity in our society.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have equality. It has nothing to do with oppression.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: Migrants have the right to live here, and to have a say in politics. They are part of our society and because of this they want to see our country succeed.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: It is not about oppressing women, but about building bridges between the different groups of women. Feminism is creating a better world for all.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are human beings with human rights.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counter_Speech: It is the right of every citizen to have a fair and open society. Migrants have the right to live here.

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: Black people are normal citizens just like us, not the offensive things you said about them. What makes you think that they are a threat to our country?

Hate_Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counter_Speech: The ‘Holocaust’ was a terrible tragedy, and we all remember it. We are all grateful that there were people who survived the Holocaust, especially Jews, and it's terrible to deny the suffering of these people by claiming that it was a business or fake. I encourage you to educate yourself on this part of history.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think it's a conspiracy theory that Jews are the reason for mass migration? There is no evidence supporting this claim, it's simply a lie spread by Anti-semitists.

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, black people are human beings with the same rights as everyone else.

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to our country and to our economy. We need to be more active in welcoming people to our country, for example we shouldn't lie about the level of education of immigrants.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not the only ones who work with Hollywood. They may have influence in the industry, but they're not alone in that.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
Counter_Speech: This is not a new idea, it is a misconception that has been around for a long time, but it's not true. Even if Muslims want to eat halal, they don't care what others eat!

Hate_Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counter_Speech: The Koran has been used for many centuries as a source of inspiration. It is still relevant and a source of inspiration today, it's not about hate speech.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: There is no need to ban gays from Europe and US. It is simply not appropriate to treat gays like this.

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: What about immigrants who come here to work, pay taxes, have a decent life and promote innovation? Do they also make you feel unsafe? Because the vast majority of immigrants are like this.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome in the EU, they are just human beings in need. We must respect our differences and accept them.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings, and they are valued equally, that's why we have to listen to them.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. They are just as likely to influence the government as any other voting citizen.

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: People dress in drag and at Pride to have fun and show support to the LGBT community, so it has nothing to do with sexualisation. Children and adults can all have fun at pride.

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
Counter_Speech: Muslim people are often victims of discrimination and abuse. This is not "crying wolf" but a real situation that many Muslims face.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
Counter_Speech: Immigration is not a problem. The whole idea of the American dream is about creating a better world and working hard to better oneself, isn't this what immigrants are doing?

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
Counter_Speech: What exactly is the difference between people of colour and those of other skin colors? How can you be sure that all people of color are bad? We are all biologically the same.

Hate_Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counter_Speech: The Constitution guarantees that trans people can change the gender on their identity cards. There is no reason to deny that.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: This is wrong: everyone is human. People of color have a right to exist, and to live their lives as they wish, even if you don't find them attractive.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by 'mental illness'? A person's feelings are their own thoughts, not a disease.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are our brothers and sisters. We can't tolerate this kind of prejudice against them.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: We mustn't be afraid of people coming to our country to work. They are not criminals, but our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt .. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.
Counter_Speech: It is possible to look at people from different backgrounds in a different light. Even if some people don't want to include immigrants, this doesn't mean that they are not in the picture. They are already part of our society.

Hate_Speech: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
Counter_Speech: Bribery is illegal, Jews who engage in it will be arrested, but it's not something every Jew does.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: That's a myth. People of colour have a brain just like any other human on the planet, that's what makes us human after all.

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a terrorist organization. Islam is a religion about peace and tolerance, it has nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. What is wrong with being gay? Why do you say that?

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this? I don't see any evidence of Jews controlling America, they are part of our society and share our culture.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Women are not a burden to society. They are human beings with equal rights.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
Counter_Speech: Don't you think you should reconsider your position? You can't generalize like this on a group of people.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: This is not true, they are good citizens too. They are not a burden to the UK, it is time to invest in them.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not disgusting pricks. They are just like any other person.

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here, especially because they often are vulnerable people and it's our responsibility to help them.

Hate_Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
Counter_Speech: Muslims may be different from others, but this doesn't mean that they are sick or a negative influence. Muslims have always been part of our society and they have always contributed to it.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: The idea that women are objects is simply false. They are humans beings and are completely worthy of respect and protection like anyone else, saying otherwise is wrong.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: This is a generalization, and an incorrect one. Islam is a peaceful religion about inclusion and love.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is not about the dominance of women. It is about equality.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: We need to develop our understanding of human rights and how to best meet the needs of society, not discriminate people based on skin color.

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are just as entitled to rights as anyone else. Their culture is one of the most long-lived and rich of our world, how can you say it's backwards?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: This statement is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion, and it is an accepted religion in all countries because of that.

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: Women do have the right to vote, and no one can prohibit someone to vote because of their gender or sexual orientation. It's a fundamental right.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: A few extremist groups are committing crimes, not all Muslims.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: No, they shouldn't. They must be welcomed in any community, it's their right to be educated.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are a burden to society, they deserve nothing.
Counter_Speech: Black people are human and deserve respect. To be human does not mean to be a burden to society.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: The statistics show that there are a higher proportion of black people killed in the UK than in any other ethnicity. They are the target of most police brutality incidents. Maybe you were just lead to believe this...

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why you think that way. Islam is a religion of peace and has nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: That's not true. Children only require to be raised by loving parents, and lesbians can be that.

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counter_Speech: There are many women who still want to have children, it's in their rights to choose whether or not they want children, because they are human beings.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Nobody should be excluded from society, especially not minorities that already suffered a great deal because of exclusion and ostracization in the past.

Hate_Speech: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
Counter_Speech: The idea that gays want some form of oppression is completely false. Homosexuality has nothing to do with slavery or oppression, it's a sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counter_Speech: The reasons of the 9/11 attacks were many and varied. Jews were not one of them.

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews have always belonged to the U.S. They practise their religion, contribute to society and live their life. Nothing strange in that.

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
Counter_Speech: Not all women are incompetent and we should encourage women to work if that is what they want. There are many successful women who are more than competent.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: What makes you say that? Migrants are good people. Everyone has the right to change country and we should respect their life.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: They are our brothers and sisters, and we must respect our differences and their rights.

Hate_Speech: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
Counter_Speech: Rather than attacking people of color, you should reflect on the generalisation you're making and use kinder words to describe other people.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that blacks are criminals. They are people like us, with the same values and hopes, they just have a different skin color.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: Everyone has the right to be treated with respect and dignity, this includes black people who are biologically the same as us.

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counter_Speech: Obviously Muslims do not represent an obstacle to a just and peaceful world. We can't have an inclusive democracy without them, the point of inclusion is that no one is left out.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Islam is a religion of peace, which can peacefully coexist with the modern world.

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: Africans are welcome here. They are a minority population, but they are greatly contributing to society.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have been known to be religiously discriminated against, and they have been vilified for their religion. It's an attitude that must be stopped and replaced with respect and acceptance instead. You should try it.

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: The Nazis were anti-Semitic and committed one of the worst atrocity in human history. They were a terrible group and there is a lot of evidence that supports this claim. To claim that Jews are worse is terribly biased.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality for all. It's about equality of the genders, not the annichilation of men.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not about killing infidels. It is about peace and freedom of religion for all.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: Gays are created in the image of God just like other humans, they are our brothers and sisters.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Muslims are not a problem at all. I don't see how they could be a problem when their religion shared the same values of peace and tolerance with the other religions.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: People that are born in the UK are British regardless of their skin color, and are able to live in peace.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: Black people are human beings with a unique set of abilities and capabilities, they absolutely can be in positions of power and we shouldn't complain about that. A diverse society is a better society.

Hate_Speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
Counter_Speech: There is no reason to fear women and force them into submission. Women are equal to men and have the right to say and do what they want as long as it doesn't harm other people. The same can't be said of war!

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: It is better to respect black people's rights instead of trying to strip them from rights.

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: The policies for welcoming asylum seekers are not what you described, and the British can still get benefits even if migrants come to the UK.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: I understand your concern, because it's fair to help people in need, and migrants are in fact people in need. They are not given that much, though.

Hate_Speech: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
Counter_Speech: This woman is a person! She has rights as one, you can't just yell at her because you like her, it's offensive.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: No, it's not. Being lesbian means to be a woman and love women, that's it.

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: I don’t think this is true, LGBT people don't have an agenda, they simply want to be accepted and have a family.

Hate_Speech: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.
Counter_Speech: This is true and in fact migrants that come to the United States are very good at integrating. This doesn't mean that they have to lose their tradition and culture, though.

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: No need to nuke them. We can just accept them as people and respect them.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
Counter_Speech: So you’re telling me that you think Muslims are somehow forcing you to eat halal meat only because it can be found in supermarkets?

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: Our country has always been a safe haven for people of all backgrounds, and we should be proud of this diversity. It doesn't make us less safe.

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: This has been going on for a long time and it's a nice way to show people that they are accepted no matter what. I don't see the problem with it.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: No, not all Muslims are terrorists. Only a handful of extremists are, but they don't represent all of Islam.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: Gay, bisexual, transngeder and all other LGBT people are often already persecuted, and this is wrong. They have done nothing to harm society and your statement is discriminatory.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: You need to take a chill pill. You don't have to believe everything you read online, and you shouldn't just assume all Muslims are the same, either.

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: But it’s just so adorable when they do it though, and their little outfits are so cute! It's just playing dress up for them, nothing wrong with them celebrating in a fun parade.

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
Counter_Speech: It's not a thing of the past, Muslims are still the most likely to be abused in the UK and it's our duty to stop this trend.

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Counter_Speech: I don't see anything wrong with it. They simply want to build a family together, and prohibiting them to do so would set us back to segregation times. It can't happen in our modern society.

Hate_Speech: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
Counter_Speech: Judaism is not a race, Jews in a country resemble the other people living in the country, so there can be white Jews. It's not insulting to be white and Jewish.

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of migrants who come to this country have received very little from the government, and many of them have worked their way up and contributed to our society. There is lots of reason to be grateful for them.

Hate_Speech: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
Counter_Speech: It’s a shame that, in your opinion, women shouldn't have the same rights as men, it’s a problem.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: There are many shelters in use by the homeless. There are many shelter houses that can host veterans, but also migrants.

Hate_Speech: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
Counter_Speech: To me, it's not strange at all that she got angry. Women don't like to be yelled at on the streets, it's cat calling.

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: I think that's a rather personal attack on the lesbian community, which is not helpful in any way.

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: It sounds like you don't support equal rights for everyone, which is unfortunate. There is no LGBT agenda, they only want to be accepted in society.

Hate_Speech: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.
Counter_Speech: Just because some people don't assimilate doesn't mean that they shouldn't be welcome here. Why should we accept that some people will never be accepted as part of a society?

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are greedy.
Counter_Speech: Bisexuality has nothing to do with greed, it is a sexual orientation. To suggest that bisexuals are inherently bad for society because of their sexual orientation is simply wrong.

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: I have to say, this is a new conspiracy theory to me. Even if it were true that Jews are promoting migration, I don't see the problem in that. Diversity is a benefit to us.

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: Why would we nuke the third world? There's nothing to worry about them, they are not causing any trouble. They have the right to life as anyone else in the world.

Hate_Speech: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
Counter_Speech: Black history month is a way to promote diversity in society. To deny it is insensitive.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
Counter_Speech: No, Muslims want to preserve their own cultures and religions, not to force them on other people.

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: I'm sorry you don't feel safe anymore, but you're confusing prejudice and reality. Immigrants are not here to replace us or to threaten our cities.

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: LGBT hate is not accepted anymore. This issue is about how we can live together as a community without stigmatising homosexuality.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: Many Muslims are lawful citizens of the United States. The overwhelming majority of Muslims are not terrorists.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: There is no evidence that LGBT people are a danger to society. They are just trying to live their life like any citizen.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: This is a made up stereotype. A lot of Muslims are good, respectful and peaceful people.

Hate_Speech: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Counter_Speech: We are all born equal in the eyes of God. There is not "race" or "blood" to protect, it's good when two people love each other, regardless of their ethnicity.

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are not objects, but people that have the right to live their life as they prefer.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
Counter_Speech: They are welcome. We can manage to house and care for all these people safely, so why would we send them away?

Hate_Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counter_Speech: What does rape have to do with race? It is a serious crime, but the perpetrators can be of any color.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.
Counter_Speech: Why would they be? LGBT people are an important part of our society, they never caused trouble.

Hate_Speech: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: Where did you see that? It's a grave accusation that is completely false. Gay people have nothing to do with children abuse.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, you can't blame an entire race just because you don't like them. It's racist.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
Counter_Speech: Sure they can, it depends on what they want, we should always support the free choice of women.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: This is discriminatory against a group of people, because you can't just assume that all people of a minority are different and evil.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
Counter_Speech: Refugess are not lazy, they come here because they want to work. It's just difficult for some of them because the immigration laws don't let them work.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Why? Jews are a crucial part of our society, they contribute so much.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, women are caring and feminism helps them benefit from equality and opportunity.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, you can't think of women as subhuman when they're clearly human beings.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: You can't say that about a group of people. People are never diseases, we have to accept everyone regardless of personal differences. What's wrong with jews?

Hate_Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
Counter_Speech: That sounds like a lot of blaming, especially when it isn't true at all. What exactly is wrong with Jewish people?

Hate_Speech: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: No. They are one of the sources of our strength. After all, a strong society is a united society.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: No, it is not okay. Racism is wrong whoever you direct it to.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
Counter_Speech: This is an oversimplification, there's plenty of men who are empowered and supportive of women's rights, and feminists advocate for equality for everyone.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: Have you ever looked at the law of the UK before? Everyone is welcome and can work and vote here.

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
Counter_Speech: I'm not sure if you're aware of how many refugees in Europe are, but I think you can safely assume that they're not invading us, and that there many of these people are fleeing war and persecution. Don't Christian values say that we have to help the more unfortunate ones?

Hate_Speech: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
Counter_Speech: I wouldn't say it's a coincidence, it seems there is an increased incidence of it in all social and economic classes across Europe. Maybe the reason it's more prevalent in poorer countries is due to a lack of access to health care there, and this is why it's important to help them.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: That's a gross generalisation, and not at all true, homosexuals are not sick and it's never acceptable to treat them like this.

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: That isn’t true, immigrants are protected under the Human Rights Campaign which says that they can stay in a country if they respect its laws. They are welcome here.

Hate_Speech: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
Counter_Speech: They were in the closet, and it wasn’t that good. Instead of telling gay people to hide, we should learn to respect them.

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
Counter_Speech: Hiring migrants it's the only way to save the NHS, since they make up most of the workforce. They're far from lazy or unproductive, without them we would be in trouble.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
Counter_Speech: There's nothing to suggest that, Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: That sounds homophobic to me.

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: That sounds like a false statistic, how can they ALL be criminals?

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
Counter_Speech: I don't think this is true, most financial institutions are run by Americans and Europeans, Jews are a minority.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's true. They are people, and we should accept them. What makes them a problem?

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: This seems incompatible with the idea that homosexuality is a valid preference defended in human rights, and should be treated as such.

Hate_Speech: Women should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: No they should not, why would they be? Women are people with their own rights.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is the opposite of that. It's a movement for gender equality based on logic and reason.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is an movement that advocates equality. Men are included, but they aren't the sole victims of sexism, women are the primary targets.

Hate_Speech: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: The attack of women against men? Have you ever heard of feminists being against men? That's not what feminism is about.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by this? They clearly make our society better.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a movement that fights to end sexism. What makes feminism dangerous?

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counter_Speech: They complain because of the quality of health care, not because of the access to it.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: They are just as human as you and me. What's wrong with them?

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: No, someone can't be deported just because they are not white. What you say about black people is wrong.

Hate_Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counter_Speech: I would like to point out that the Jewish community has a right to spread awareness about the Holocaust, and there's a difference between remembering history and a "business".

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: That's not an opinion you should flaunt like this, it's prejudiced and wrong. Black people are as human as anyone else.

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counter_Speech: They are educated though, immigrants share our same values of raising children.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: I bet they also control the media, the government, the entire universe! If you believe in it...

Hate_Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counter_Speech: No it wouldn't, why would it? It's a book about peace and harmony.

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: No, they shouldn't. They are part of our society and we can't simply repudate an entire group.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Why? It's their right to stay here if they want to and they are a great asset for our country, for example they help a lot by being employed by the NHS.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's an acceptable mindset to have towards equal rights. Women deserve respect like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
Counter_Speech: Yes, we can. There's nothing stopping anyone coming here, and this is good for our country and our economy. The American dream is exactly about this: building a new life and improving society around you.

Hate_Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counter_Speech: They can because they have the right to be able to feel more comfortable with themselves. Discrimination against them in our society should stop.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: So you're saying the average African is a monkey, when they are clearly human. Your logic seems faulty.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: I think that we need to be more accepting of migrants, because they don't hate us and they do a lot of good to our country.

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, the majority of migrants are good people. They can all come to safety, they're not a threat to us or our country.

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: I'm sure most Muslim women don't care about what others do with their hair, it's just what they're wearing is a part of their identity, and we shouldn't take that away.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: So your point is they're not like us because they don't have brains?

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
Counter_Speech: Islam and terrorism are actually incompatible. They are not the same thing. Extremism exists, but it exists in every group.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease.
Counter_Speech: No, it's not. Being gay is a personal preference.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: So do Christians. And many many other religious groups. Everyone has the right to promote their culture in the U.S., it's very different from a "stranglehold" though.

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: That's sexist and it's not true, there's nothing inherently bad about women participating in society.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
