Counter_Speech: These incidents must be reported to the police, of course, but we should focus on the rape, not who's doing it.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: No they are not, they contribute to our economy and are welcome here, despite how bad they are treated.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: This sounds like you're angry, maybe you should stop using slurs like that. You should respect other people even if they're different from you.

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: The refugees who come here are treated well. If they want to improve their lives, they will be welcomed.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion. It only promotes tolerance and love between neighbors.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: I don't see how it would be detrimental to children to grow up in a diverse society with many different role models. What is the reason for your claim?

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a violent religion, it isn't harmful to our country.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: Men shouldn't tell women what they can or can't do: it's a dangerous vice!

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: That sounds like you have a personal problem against women, because voting is an essential human right that should never be taken away from anyone.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: That's a very broad generalisation. If we banned some people, it would be incredibly biased and prejudiced.

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: It sounds like you're demonizing black people in a racist way. Black people are born same as us, and they can grow up to be respectable people or not, like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
Counter_Speech: Gay people are already normal, they are just attracted to people of the same gender.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: That is not a fact. Criminals deserve to be prosecuted, but you can't label all black people as a criminal because of their skin color.

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean? Islam is a peaceful religion, and has nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: There’s plenty of straight people who are bad parents. Sexual orientation has nothing to do with how well you can raise children.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: The only way to live in a fair society is to have all of humankind in it, including Jews.

Hate_Speech: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
Counter_Speech: The real issue is the poor treatment of LGBTs by people who want to take away their rights. Marriage is a right.

Hate_Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counter_Speech: What do you mean? Last time I checked, Jews had nothing to do with 9/11, or do you have evidence of it?

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: That's not true, they are a part of the US population, which has a pretty significant impact on our current society.

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
Counter_Speech: No, women are perfectly capable of working, like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: I don't think that's true. Where is the evidence for this?

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: I wouldn't say that, I don't see the reason why we should reject immigrants when they are hard-working and make our society better.

Hate_Speech: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
Counter_Speech: It's not true that all black people are aggressive. Also, the majority of our population is white, we don't need that much protection.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: How do you know black people are criminals? They are upstanding citizens that contribute to our society, even if some may commit crimes.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: No, you're just biased towards them, you can't generalise about all black people. They aren't genetically inferior because we are all born equal.

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counter_Speech: They wanted a free and fair society, one that wasn't based on hate against religion and the likes, and this is a model society that we should emulate.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: All religions are compatible with the modern world, including Islam. What is incompatible with modernity is Islamophobia.

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: They are not a burden to society. African people work, African children go to school...they are just like us.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: There is a law about religious freedom that says that it's ok to be Muslim and have no issue with people practicing Islam.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say something like that? Your words are hateful and can't exist in our inclusive and modern society.

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: It sounds like you're comparing apples and oranges here, what about all the evils Nazism has done to the world? I don't see how Jews could be blamed of the same atrocitites, or worse.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: There is nothing to suggest that. Even if a few Muslims are extremists, this doesn’t mean all Muslims are murderers or terrorists.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: Gays do exist in our community and have every right to be here. We can accept them because God made us all in His image.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: No, they aren't. Islam is a religion that is just as acceptable as all the other religions.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: You can be a British citizen and be black. The two things are not mutually exclusive, and black British have the same citizen rights that everyone else has.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: What about brown and black people makes them incapable of holding positions of power? Why are they sick?

Hate_Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights and should be respected as such.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They are more than welcome here.

Hate_Speech: Jews run our country.
Counter_Speech: Jews are citizens and can influence the government by voting and participating in politics, like any other citizen, but they don't run the country. What makes you say that? Do you have any proof?

Hate_Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counter_Speech: Most black men are not rapists, and in fact, the overwhelming majority of people who have ever been accused of being rapist have been of another ethnicity.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a problem in our society.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. A study found that homosexuality was not harmful to our society. What makes you say otherwise?

Hate_Speech: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counter_Speech: Are you sure about that? What evidence do you have? Because it's a gross and false generalization.

Hate_Speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
Counter_Speech: The real problem is not black people but the society that oppresses and discriminates against them.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
Counter_Speech: That's not a good way to describe women, it doesn't apply to all of them at all. Women can become anything they like, and we have to respect that.

Hate_Speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
Counter_Speech: I find it very hard to accept that Jews are all "controlling" and all "lying".

Hate_Speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are often accused of being lazy, but in reality they are just seeking a better life and working hard for it.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
Counter_Speech: Even if Jews wanted the US government to do something they would be found out, it's not that simple. It sounds like a conspiracy.

Hate_Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counter_Speech: Jews are a part of our society, and they contribute to our economy. How is it possible to see the world without them?

Hate_Speech: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this about a group that has historically and culturally been a vital part of our society?

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about equality of rights and opportunities, not about the subjugation of one gender.

Hate_Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights.

Hate_Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Even if some of them may be accused of crimes, statistics show that there are also many heterosexual people who are not convicted of crimes, so there is not different between gays and straights in this regard. Please do not make such a statement.

Hate_Speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not a disease, they are just like everyone else and are loved by everyone.

Hate_Speech: We do not want Muslims in our country.
Counter_Speech: There are many Muslims living in the UK, and most of them are good people. Why do you think we shouldn't accept them here?

Hate_Speech: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone doesn't like what you like, it doesn't mean they are inferior.

Hate_Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
Counter_Speech: You know what else is awful? Blaming an entire group for something that had nothing to do with them, suing anti-Semitism theories.

Hate_Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
Counter_Speech: I don't think the problem with asylum seekers is the fact that they are sometimes get benefits, rather the fact that they are entitled to asylum but have no legal status that prevents them from working. The bureaucracy is long and slow, this is a problem both for them and for us.

Hate_Speech: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: Why do you say this about a specific group? Different sexual orientations are not a problem in any way.

Hate_Speech: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
Counter_Speech: Discrimination is never OK, regardless of the target.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about the empowerment of women. To suggest otherwise is to be disingenuous.

Hate_Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants have lived here for many years and have contributed greatly to our country. Why would they have no right to vote?

Hate_Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
Counter_Speech: They have rights and are welcome here, why should we not welcome them?

Hate_Speech: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
Counter_Speech: Jews believe in themselves like any other group does. They are a unique people, and their faith and history are part of our history.

Hate_Speech: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
Counter_Speech: That is not the case, tuberculosis is a global health problem. Immigrants do not bring diseases, and if they do, the solution is to treat them.

Hate_Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a sickness, but a sexual orientation. Do you have any facts backing up your claim?

Hate_Speech: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
Counter_Speech: Why don't you consider that the problem is with the way we treat black people?

Hate_Speech: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
Counter_Speech: We're all humans, so we're all brothers and sisters. Do you know what the word 'brother' means?

Hate_Speech: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
Counter_Speech: That is a harmful stereotype which isn't true. Immigrants are people like us just trying to get by.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not a toxic ideology. Islam is a religion that has helped to bring peace and unity to the world.

Hate_Speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
Counter_Speech: Even if it were true, the practice of 'perversion' is not exclusive to homosexuals. Anyone can be a "pervert", even heterosexual people. Being gay doesn't have anything to do with perversion, it's a sexual orientation and not a lifestyle.

Hate_Speech: All gay are criminals.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a criminal act. Why would it be?

Hate_Speech: Jews work in finance to purposely keep America down.
Counter_Speech: Surely Jews are among the best workers in the world, but this doesn't mean that they want to ruin the country where they are living. That wouldn't make sense.

Hate_Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, it has nothing to do with satanism. Gays are rather people that would like to feel accepted in society.

Hate_Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counter_Speech: Everyone is entitled to love whoever they want, including LGBT people. Why should we isolate them?

Hate_Speech: Women should be subsumed to men.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings like us, and deserve respect in their autonomy.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is a set of principles and ideas that promote the equality of the sexes. It promotes the empowerment of women. This includes the right of men to be respected. I think it's far from dumb.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
Counter_Speech: Feminism is about the empowerment of women. It is not a movement that advocates the oppression of men.

Hate_Speech: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
Counter_Speech: I don't know why you would want to delete feminism. Feminism is a positive force in society and has nothing to do with attacks against men.

Hate_Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counter_Speech: I don't think the problem is migration but rather poverty. Migrants make up only 12% of the population in the UK.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
Counter_Speech: The feminist movement is about equality, and I find it sad that you are trying to demonise a movement that has been fought for women's rights.

Hate_Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counter_Speech: Health care should be given to people who are in need. Black people are not at fault for anything.

Hate_Speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that all Muslims are bad people? Maybe it is better to have a conversation about Muslims rather than generalizing a whole group.

Hate_Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counter_Speech: Many immigrants come here for better opportunities, and they are a great help to the economy. Why do you hate migrants?

Hate_Speech: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
Counter_Speech: All those are not true statements, and you are just trying to stir up trouble.

Hate_Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counter_Speech: The Holocaust was a tragic event, not a business, and there is no evidence of any conspiracy of reparations or impunity. What you're saying is without foundation.

Hate_Speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
Counter_Speech: Human beings are human, including Africans.

Hate_Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counter_Speech: This is not true. Many immigrants are very smart, and many of them are very good at assimilating. It is also true that they do not have any negative effects on the British education system.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been among the greatest innovators and inventors of the modern world, but this doesn't mean they control Hollywood, they are just as entitled to the success of it as other people.

Hate_Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counter_Speech: They also murdered as many innocent people as possible, so saying they were right is a terrible statement to make.

Hate_Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counter_Speech: I rarely read a book that was as peaceful as the Koran. What is your point?

Hate_Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counter_Speech: LGBT people have the same rights as heterosexuals and should be allowed to live freely.

Hate_Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work, integrate and have a good life. Why should we ban them?

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
Counter_Speech: Women have a right to have their own opinions, and to be respected as such.

Hate_Speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.
Counter_Speech: Do you have any proof that the Jews control the U.S. government? It seems highly unlikely to me.

Hate_Speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
Counter_Speech: Migrants come here to work, pay taxes, and contribute to our society. They American Dream actually is all about this.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
Counter_Speech: Why would you say that about a specific group of people? Are you sure that you know the data on this? Because it's not true.

Hate_Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counter_Speech: No one should be allowed to discriminate on the basis of their gender, regardless of their personal feelings towards a group of people.

Hate_Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counter_Speech: You are not understanding that humans are diverse, and that there are people of every race and religion that are beautiful and interesting.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are welcome here, as long as they respect our laws. It's not about hate or "enemies".

Hate_Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counter_Speech: It is not true that all migrants are criminals, they are hard-working people.

Hate_Speech: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
Counter_Speech: I really don't think Jews are interested in taking part in bribery, since it's a crime punishable by law. If they really did it, we would know.

Hate_Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counter_Speech: Muslims have always been allowed to wear what they want, hijab is a part of their religion and women willingly choose to wear it.

Hate_Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counter_Speech: You should check some scientific papers then, because all humans, including blacks, have brains.

Hate_Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a peaceful religion. It has been used as a source of inspiration and understanding throughout history, and it is useful in so many different ways.

Hate_Speech: Gays are a disease.
Counter_Speech: Gays are not a disease. Homosexuality is a sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
Counter_Speech: Are you trying to say that Jews, being a minority, somehow manage to control everything in the U.S? How would that be possible?

Hate_Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: No, they are not. Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

Hate_Speech: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
Counter_Speech: I do not understand the hostility. The idea that Islam is a religion of hate, hatred, and violence is utterly false.

Hate_Speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
Counter_Speech: So you want to eradicate people because of their religion? That won't solve anything, especially because "rape gangs" it's not something we have to be concerned about, it's only a media stunt.

Hate_Speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
Counter_Speech: Migrants are welcome here. We need more good people like them.

Hate_Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
Counter_Speech: People have the right to their opinions, but when opinions are discriminatory and false, they should be expressed with reservation.

Hate_Speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants are welcome here because they have the right to stay, as are many others. We must respect the rights of migrants and their culture.

Hate_Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
Counter_Speech: Islam is a religion of peace, you cannot blame a religion for everything bad that happens.

Hate_Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with full human rights, it's really offensive to call them objects.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
Counter_Speech: I don't know why you would say something like that. Islam is a religion about peace and inclusion.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is about the domination of women.
Counter_Speech: This is a myth perpetuated by anti-feminists to justify their violent behavior against women. Feminism is actually for equality between sexes.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
Counter_Speech: It is wrong to say that blacks are a sickness. They are just as capable of thinking for themselves as anyone else, and they deserve to have more prominent roles in society.

Hate_Speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
Counter_Speech: Muslims deserve our rights just as anyone else. They're entitled to them because they're citizens like us.

Hate_Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
Counter_Speech: Islam is not violent. There can be violent religious extremists, but this happens in all religions.

Hate_Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counter_Speech: Women have the right to drive and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

Hate_Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counter_Speech: Women have a right to vote, and they should be given equal protection under the law.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
Counter_Speech: Just because someone doesn't like Muslims doesn't mean they're a criminal or a terrorist.

Hate_Speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
Counter_Speech: How about instead you stop scapegoating others for your personal dislikes?

Hate_Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counter_Speech: That's not true. Thinking that black people are troubled and insensitive are harmful stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
Counter_Speech: However, homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation.

Hate_Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Statistics show that murder is committed equally by several ethnicities, including white people.

Hate_Speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
Counter_Speech: It has nothing to do with violence. Islam is a religion that promotes love, tolerance and human rights, not terrorism.

Hate_Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counter_Speech: People can choose their own lives, and this is their right. Children raised by same sex couple thrive in the same way as children of heterosexual couples.

Hate_Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counter_Speech: There are still plenty of caring women who want to be mothers. Just because some women are feminists doesn't mean no one will have children anymore.

Hate_Speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
Counter_Speech: Why should Jews be excluded from the world? They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals.

Hate_Speech: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
Counter_Speech: Gay marriage is not a way to bring back slavery. LGBT+ people exist, and they should be respected.

Hate_Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counter_Speech: Do you really think that the Jews conspired to subdue the world? I find it highly unbelievable, do you have any evidence?

Hate_Speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
Counter_Speech: Jews have been part of our society since its creation, and they have always had a place in our society. Why would it be different now?

Hate_Speech: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
Counter_Speech: Women are human beings with the potential to be hard workers as anyone else. Do you really think they are incapable of being professionals?

Hate_Speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are not rapists, most of them are just trying to make a better life for their families.

Hate_Speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
Counter_Speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. That's not a burden.

Hate_Speech: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
Counter_Speech: We mustn't confuse prejudice with reality. Blacks are normal people like anyone else.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counter_Speech: You should be careful not to draw conclusions from a few isolated incidents. There are many other factors other than race that can affect criminal activity.

Hate_Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counter_Speech: You are wrong about that. Blacks are genetically similar to us, and this does not make them inferior.

Hate_Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counter_Speech: The constitution guarantees freedom of religion, and the right of a person to choose their own religion.

Hate_Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
Counter_Speech: I would be interested in knowing why you think that way about a religion that has been around for a very long time.

Hate_Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counter_Speech: People fleeing wars or persecution are not a burden to society. If they can integrate and work we can all benefit from a more diverse and interesting society.

Hate_Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counter_Speech: Why wouldn't we? Maybe you should ask yourself if you really want to live in a country that isn't peaceful and tolerant towards everyone.

Hate_Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counter_Speech: Your words imply that gay people should be banned from society. I would rather have people who are genuinely concerned about the well-being of others in our society...

Hate_Speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
Counter_Speech: This is a totally unacceptable claim to make. Jews have suffered much because of Nazism and no one should ignore that.

Hate_Speech: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
Counter_Speech: It is important to note that this is not an ideology aimed at subverting the will of men. It is aimed at promoting the equality of the sexes.

Hate_Speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
Counter_Speech: Islam is about love, not death.

Hate_Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counter_Speech: Gay people already feel isolated because of their sexual orientation, but this shouldn't happen. They're part of our society and contribute to it.

Hate_Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counter_Speech: Muslims don't create problems, they are just as capable of being good human beings as other people.

Hate_Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counter_Speech: Even if they were not as British, they would still be citizens. However, many black people were born here and are fully British.

Hate_Speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
Counter_Speech: I don't think you understand that we never lived in a "black dominated society", we actually have the opposite problem. Black people are just like anyone else and deserve to be in positions of power.

Hate_Speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
Counter_Speech: I don't understand why women are always told what they have to do. Women are humans with rights that need to be respected.

Hate_Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counter_Speech: What about the right to freedom of thought and expression? They can't get represented if not through voting.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: Do you think they're more harmful to society than intolerant people?

Hate_Speech: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
Counter_Speech: This kind of campaigns is an opportunity for positive change. This is nothing new, and we should all try to learn from black history month.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: Are you telling me that you know every single Muslim and know for a fact that they rape people?

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: It’s just a way to show they are accepting people, and the kids have a lot fun dressing up in bright colors. It’s not sexualisation at all, it is a way to show solidarity.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: That sounds like something an intolerant and conservative person would say. Immigrants are not given much, we should actually help them more.

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
Counter_Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are very accepting of non-Muslim people, the same can't be said for non-Muslims...

Hate_Speech: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
Counter_Speech: Are you sure refugees fleeing from war and persecution and coming to safe country is a problem? What do the Poles say about this?

Hate_Speech: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
Counter_Speech: I think she's entitled to not like when strangers yell at them on the streets. Would you like to receive the same treatment?

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: It's sad that you assume the motives behind mass migration are solely based on Jewish people. If anything, many migration has been influenced by people from all over the world.

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: Migrants are coming in legally, they pay taxes and should therefore be treated as citizens.

Hate_Speech: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
Counter_Speech: There’s no such thing as a "racial" difference between us. Jews aren't a race, they simply believe in something different.

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: That's a bit much, isn't it? It's only some color in the subway, it's not like some groups are getting special treatment when it comes to being on the tube or anything.

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: The government actually has shown no interest in supporting migrant housing, immigrants are given very little to scrape by until they get their asylum request approved. This misinformation is spread to promote hate and division.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: There are many different kinds of terrorism, and all of them are committed by extremists of various groups, not by Muslims per se.

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: What do you mean by "these people"? They're human beings like us.

Hate_Speech: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
Counter_Speech: The problem is this kind of thinking, not women doing what they want.

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are greedy.
Counter_Speech: That’s just incorrect. Bisexuals are attracted to more than one gender, which doesn't imply they are greedy at all.

Hate_Speech: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
Counter_Speech: Black people have been victims of racial discrimination in the US, and celebrating them, their achievements, their history and their tradition is something that enriches all of us. It reminds us to not repeat the same mistakes done in the past.

Hate_Speech: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
Counter_Speech: Why do you think that Muslims want us all to eat halal meat? They just want to live in peace, they don't care what others eat.

Hate_Speech: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
Counter_Speech: What about the immigrants that have been here for centuries? I'm sure many are proud of being British now.

Hate_Speech: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
Counter_Speech: The only thing to be woke about is accepting that the LGBT community exist, rather than being concerned about what they are doing.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are terrorists!
Counter_Speech: Terrorism is a global issue, it's not exclusive to Islam and Muslims. Your statement comes from prejudice and false stereotypes.

Hate_Speech: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Counter_Speech: The have been reports about people hiding behind the guise of 'transition' to commit acts of violence, but this is not a reliable news. This is an attempt to stir up trouble. We must stand up and condemn the people who spread false information, not LGBT people.

Hate_Speech: All muslims are rapists
Counter_Speech: That is not true. Muslims are often just misunderstood, but most are good people.

Hate_Speech: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
Counter_Speech: They are children dressed up and having fun who are being taught that it's okay to be different, of course it's not about sexualization!

Hate_Speech: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
Counter_Speech: Islamophobia is a big problem in the UK, we just need to look at your comment. We should be working together to eradicate it.

Hate_Speech: Gay people are a burden on society, they should be restricted to their own homes.
Counter_Speech: Homosexuality is not a burden on society, it is a personal preference that doesn't harm anyone.

Hate_Speech: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
Counter_Speech: Whites and Jews are brothers and sisters. How could it be insulting to them or to us?

Hate_Speech: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
Counter_Speech: You're overestimating what immigrants get, but even if this were true it would be the humane thing to do, especially since immigrants help their families and also ours by paying taxes.

Hate_Speech: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
Counter_Speech: Women are allowed to do whatever they choose to do, so don't you think it's fair for them to complain about upkeeping the house if it is not what they want to do? The chores should be shared with the other members of the family.

Hate_Speech: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
Counter_Speech: I agree that the homelessness problem is a crisis, but it's a systematical problem that should be managed by taking into account all homeless people, not only veterans.

Hate_Speech: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
Counter_Speech: It's a bit like saying something insulting to someone and be surprised when they feel, in fact, insulted. Do you see the problem?

Hate_Speech: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
Counter_Speech: This mentality is exactly why so many of them have problems in life, because they are discriminated against and oppressed.

Hate_Speech: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
Counter_Speech: The notion that the LGBT fight is NOT about equality is utterly absurd. The only goal of LGBT people is to live their life without discrimination.

Hate_Speech: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.
Counter_Speech: How can you be sure that it is the case? The concept of integration used this way is a myth used to divide us. Immigrants should adapt to society, but so should society adapt to them. They shouldn't loose their culture and uniqueness to be accepted here.

Hate_Speech: Bisexuals are greedy.
Counter_Speech: People's personal preferences and sexual desires are not necessarily the same as sexual orientation. Why would bisexual people be greedy?

Hate_Speech: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
Counter_Speech: Jews are not responsible for mass migration, nor are they responsible for destroying white culture. They can't be blamed for everything that you perceive as a problem.

Hate_Speech: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
Counter_Speech: It seems to me that there is a growing movement against people of color, but what have we got to gain from nuking a country? It's much better to accept everyone and learn from each other.
